causes_zh: 龜頭炎最好分為感染性與非感染性病因。感染性病因包括但不限於： 真菌感染（最常見的總體原因） 念珠菌皮膚癬菌病 細菌感染（第二常見的總體原因） 溶血性鏈球菌 表皮葡萄球菌/金黃色葡萄球菌 病毒感染 單純皰疹病毒 (HSV) 水痘帶狀皰疹病毒 (VZV) 人乳頭瘤病毒 (HPV) 猴痘 原蟲 陰道毛滴蟲寄生疥蟎 var.人型（疥瘡）虱病（蝨子）。非感染性病因包括但不限於： 炎症性疾病 環狀龜頭炎（反應性關節炎） 生殖器扁平苔蘚 動物園龜頭炎 銀屑病 硬化性苔蘚（乾性閉塞性龜頭炎，BXO） 假上皮瘤性、角化性和雲母性龜頭炎 癌前病症 凱拉特鮑文樣紅斑增生丘疹病 鮑文氏病 惡性疾病 鱗狀細胞癌 (SCC) 其他創傷 生殖器衛生不良 固定性藥疹 化療引起的，例如氟尿嘧啶 (5FU) 接觸性皮炎（刺激性和過敏性）。
symptoms_zh: 龜頭炎的臨床特徵因具體病因而異。一般來說，臨床特徵包括但不限於： 陰莖酸痛 排尿困難 瘙癢、出血和龜頭紅斑。具體的臨床特徵可以通過以下實施例來表徵。念珠菌龜頭炎 — 斑點狀紅斑，伴有紅色小“衛星”丘疹或乾燥的暗紅色區域。厭氧菌感染——惡臭、惡臭的炎症，有或沒有分泌物；可伴有腹股溝淋巴結壓痛。有氧菌感染 — 可能會出現均勻的紅斑和局部水腫。陰道毛滴蟲 — 表面糜爛可能導致包莖（未受割禮的人的陰莖包皮回縮）。HSV——紅斑基底上的聚集性水泡，可能會破裂，露出疼痛的淺灰色潰瘍。HPV — 多發肉色和/或紅斑環狀病變，使用 5% 醋酸後會變成醋酸白色。環狀龜頭炎 — 灰白色環形丘疹，合併形成“地理”區域，周圍環繞龜頭的白色紅斑邊緣。常伴有反應性關節炎的其他特徵（如結膜炎和關節炎）。佐恩龜頭炎——由於微血管出血和含鐵血黃素沉積，龜頭出現對稱的“辣椒斑”和橙色釉狀紅斑。生殖器扁平苔蘚——龜頭和陰囊上出現紫色環狀丘疹和斑塊；有時伴有中心色素沉著過度的線性白色“威克姆條紋”。BXO — 也稱為陰莖硬化性苔蘚；鱗狀粘膜和龜頭周圍角化過度，表現為白色融合性丘疹或像牙白色丘疹性病變。假性上皮瘤性角化過度和雲母性龜頭炎——龜頭上有厚厚的界限清楚的雲母狀鱗屑藥物引起的龜頭炎——龜頭邊界清晰的紅斑、水腫和/或起泡；可能是暴力的；發病前有刺激性藥物使用史。單擊此處查看龜頭炎的圖像
epidemiology_zh: 高達 6% 的年輕男性患有龜頭炎，總體患病率約為 3-11%。未受割禮的男性面臨更大的風險（一生中發病率增加約 68%），因為微生物、上皮碎片和分泌物可能積聚在陰莖頭和包皮上。難以區分未割包皮男性的龜頭炎症和包皮受累情況；因此更常被診斷為龜頭包皮炎。其他危險因素包括： 病態肥胖 使用安全套導尿管 未受控制的糖尿病 貧困 衛生條件差 某些藥物，例如：甲氧芐啶/磺胺甲噁唑 自身炎症性疾病，例如生殖器扁平苔蘚和牛皮癬。
prognosis_zh: 疼痛和潰瘍。炎症擴展至包皮（龜頭包皮炎）。龜頭和包皮之間粘連。包莖——包皮開口收縮，阻止陰莖頭回縮。由於慢性包皮炎症和水腫。可能導致排尿困難和性功能障礙。強行回縮可導致包皮過長；泌尿科急症。包皮過長 — 龜頭附近的包皮被卡住，限制了血流。一旦發生卡壓，尺寸和疼痛會在幾分鐘到幾小時內增大；這是一種泌尿科急症，需要解除收縮（通過背縫手術）。復發性生殖器感染（例如酵母菌）在健康個體中並不常見，可能需要篩查免疫功能低下的疾病（艾滋病毒、糖尿病、癌症）。

title: Basal cell carcinoma
snippet: BCC is a locally invasive skin tumour. The main characteristics are: Slowly growing plaque or nodule Skin coloured, pink or pigmented Varies in size from a few millimetres to several centimetres in diameter Spontaneous bleeding or ulceration. BCC is very rarely a threat to life. A tiny proportion of
causes: The cause of BCC is multifactorial. Most often, there are DNA mutations in the patched (PTCH) tumour suppressor gene , part of hedgehog signalling pathway. These may be triggered by exposure to ultraviolet radiation. Various spontaneous and inherited gene defects predispose to BCC.
symptoms: BCC is a locally invasive skin tumour. The main characteristics are: Slowly growing plaque or nodule Skin coloured, pink or pigmented Varies in size from a few millimetres to several centimetres in diameter Spontaneous bleeding or ulceration. BCC is very rarely a threat to life. A tiny proportion of BCCs grow rapidly, invade deeply, and/or metastasise to local lymph nodes.
epidemiology: Risk factors for BCC include: Age and sex : BCCs are particularly prevalent in elderly males. However, they also affect females and younger adults Previous BCC or other form of skin cancer ( squamous cell carcinoma , melanoma ) Sun damage ( photoageing , actinic keratoses ) Repeated prior episodes of sunburn Fair skin, blue eyes and blond or red hair — note; BCC can also affect darker skin types Previous cutaneous injury, thermal burn , disease (eg cutaneous lupus , sebaceous naevus ) Inherited syndromes: BCC is a particular problem for families with basal cell naevus syndrome ( Gorlin syndrome ), Bazex-Dupré-Christol syndrome , Rombo syndrome, Oley syndrome and xeroderma pigmentosum Other risk factors include ionising radiation, exposure to arsenic , immune suppression due to disease or medicines , and use of some other medicines such as hydrochlorothiazide.
snippet_zh: BCC 是一種局部侵襲性皮膚腫瘤。主要特徵是： 緩慢生長的斑塊或結節 膚色、粉紅色或有色素 大小不等，直徑從幾毫米到幾厘米 自發出血或潰瘍。BCC 很少會對生命造成威脅。一小部分
causes_zh: BCC 的原因是多因素的。最常見的是，補丁 (PTCH) 腫瘤抑制基因（刺猬信號通路的一部分）存在 DNA 突變。這些可能是由於暴露於紫外線輻射而引發的。各種自發性和遺傳性基因缺陷易導致基底細胞癌。
symptoms_zh: BCC 是一種局部侵襲性皮膚腫瘤。主要特徵是： 緩慢生長的斑塊或結節 膚色、粉紅色或有色素 大小不等，直徑從幾毫米到幾厘米 自發出血或潰瘍。BCC 很少會對生命造成威脅。一小部分基底細胞癌生長迅速、侵入較深和/或轉移至局部淋巴結。
epidemiology_zh: BCC 的危險因素包括： 年齡和性別：BCC 在老年男性中尤其常見。然而，它們也會影響女性和年輕人 既往患有基底細胞癌或其他形式的皮膚癌（鱗狀細胞癌、黑色素瘤） 陽光損傷（光老化、光化性角化病） 先前反复曬傷 白皙的皮膚、藍眼睛和金色或紅色的頭髮 - 注意； BCC 還會影響深色皮膚類型 既往皮膚損傷、熱燒傷、疾病（例如皮膚紅斑狼瘡、皮脂腺痣） 遺傳綜合徵：BCC 對於患有基底細胞痣綜合徵（Gorlin 綜合徵）、Bazex-Dupré-Christol 綜合徵、Rombo 綜合徵、Oley 綜合徵和色素性乾皮病的家庭來說是一個特殊問題。 其他危險因素包括電離輻射、砷暴露、免疫抑制等疾病或藥物，以及使用一些其他藥物，例如氫氯噻嗪。

title: Behçet disease
snippet: The features are similar, although Behçet disease is less common in those with skin of colour.
causes: Behçet disease is of unknown cause, but it is thought to have an autoimmune basis. It is associated with several genetic factors, particularly HLA -B51. Several infections have also been implicated as potential triggers including Streptococcus sanguis , herpes simplex virus , hepatitis viruses , and parvovirus B19 .
symptoms: The features are similar, although Behçet disease is less common in those with skin of colour.
epidemiology: Behçet disease is most common in individuals originating from eastern and central Asia as well as the eastern Mediterranean. It is most prevalent in Turkey (80–370 cases per 100,000), followed by Iran, and Japan. It is much rarer in those of northern European, African, and Latin American descent. Onset is usually between 30 and 40 years of age. It rarely occurs in children. It was previously thought that BD was more common in males compared with females, but more recent data suggests that incidence is similar, although this varies between different ethnic and geographic groups.
prognosis: Given the multi-system nature of Behçet disease, there are many potential complications. The most serious complications include: Vascular complications, particularly when the aorta and pulmonary arteries are affected — this can be life-threatening CNS involvement leading to permanent neurological deficits Blindness Bowel perforation and peritonitis.
snippet_zh: 儘管白塞病在有色皮膚的人中不太常見，但特徵相似。
causes_zh: 白塞病的病因不明，但被認為具有自身免疫基礎。它與多種遺傳因素有關，特別是 HLA -B51。一些感染也被認為是潛在的觸發因素，包括血鏈球菌、單純皰疹病毒、肝炎病毒和細小病毒 B19。
symptoms_zh: 儘管白塞病在有色皮膚的人中不太常見，但特徵相似。
epidemiology_zh: 白塞病在來自東亞和中亞以及東地中海的個體中最常見。該病在土耳其最為流行（每 10 萬人中有 80-370 例），其次是伊朗和日本。這種情況在北歐、非洲和拉丁美洲血統的人中更為罕見。發病年齡通常在30至40歲之間。它很少發生在兒童身上。此前人們認為，與女性相比，雙相情感障礙在男性中更常見，但最近的數據表明，發病率相似，儘管不同種族和地理群體之間存在差異。
prognosis_zh: 鑑於白塞病的多系統性質，存在許多潛在的並發症。最嚴重的並發症包括： 血管並發症，特別是當主動脈和肺動脈受到影響時，這可能危及生命 中樞神經系統受累，導致永久性神經功能缺損 失明 腸穿孔和腹膜炎。

title: Common benign skin lesions
snippet: Benign skin lesions are non-cancerous growths or markings on the skin, commonly including moles, seborrhoeic keratoses, skin tags, lipomas, and cysts.
causes: Benign lesions arise from normal skin structures such as melanocytes, keratinocytes, fibroblasts, or adnexal units. They may be influenced by genetics, ageing, sun exposure, friction, or local trauma.
symptoms: These lesions usually appear as stable bumps, patches, or growths that do not ulcerate, rapidly enlarge, or cause significant symptoms. Some may itch or become irritated due to friction.
epidemiology: Benign skin lesions can occur in individuals of any age group.
snippet_zh: 良性皮膚病變是指不具癌性、常見於皮膚上的增生或結節，例如痣、脂溢性角化、皮膚贅疣、脂肪瘤與皮膚囊腫。
causes_zh: 良性病變通常源自皮膚正常結構，如黑色素細胞、角質形成細胞、纖維母細胞或附屬器官，可能受到基因、老化、日曬、摩擦或局部外傷的影響。
symptoms_zh: 多呈現為穩定的突起、斑塊或小腫塊，不會快速增大或潰爛。部分病變可能因摩擦而搔癢或受到刺激。
epidemiology_zh: 任何年齡層的人都可能出現良性皮膚病變。

title: Blistering skin conditions
snippet: Blistering skin conditions include disorders where fluid-filled blisters form due to infection, inflammation, autoimmune disease, heat, or mechanical injury.
causes: Blistering may result from infections (herpes simplex, varicella-zoster, impetigo), autoimmune diseases (pemphigus, bullous pemphigoid, dermatitis herpetiformis), allergic or irritant reactions, burns, friction, medications, and genetic blistering disorders.
symptoms: Clear or cloudy fluid-filled blisters that may be tense or fragile, accompanied by redness, pain, itching, crusting, or erosions after rupture. Distribution and severity depend on the underlying cause.
snippet_zh: 起泡性皮膚病泛指因感染、發炎、自體免疫、燒燙傷或摩擦等因素導致皮膚出現充滿液體的水泡。
causes_zh: 常見原因包含感染（單純皰疹、帶狀皰疹、膿皰瘡）、自體免疫疾病（天疱瘡、類天疱瘡、疱疹樣皮炎）、過敏或刺激反應、燒燙傷、摩擦、藥物反應及遺傳性起泡疾病。
symptoms_zh: 可見透明或混濁的水泡，可能緊繃或易破，伴隨紅腫、疼痛、搔癢、結痂或破裂後的糜爛。表現會因病因不同而異。

title: Blue naevus
snippet: The common blue naevus is a small solitary, bluish, smooth surfaced macule , papule or plaque. They are generally round or oval in shape. The common blue naevus usually measures 0.5–1 cm in diameter. The cellular blue naevus is more nodular and usually measures at least 1 cm in diameter. The colour
causes: Blue naevi derive from the incomplete migration of melanocytes from the neural crest to the skin during foetal development. The melanocytes of blue naevi are located deeper in the skin within the dermis as compared to those of brown naevi, which are located in the more superficial epidermis. It has been held that the deeper location of dermal melanocytes in blue naevi causes their colour to be perceived by the eye as bluish. This phenomenon has classically been extrapolated to be due to the Tyndall effect, which posits that shorter (blue) wavelengths of incident light are preferentially scattered by the deeper-located dermal melanocytes; this is in contrast to the more superficially located epidermal melanocytes which appear brown. A more recent study, however, has suggested that the perception of blue colour in blue naevi may be more aptly regarded as a relative decrease in scatter of higher wavelength red light rather than as an increase in scatter of lower wavelength blue light. Thus, these authors conclude that blue naevi are perceived as blue because they scatter less red light, leading to a shift in hue toward blue (“subtractive colour mixing”), rather than because they scatter more blue light.
symptoms: The common blue naevus is a small solitary, bluish, smooth surfaced macule , papule or plaque. They are generally round or oval in shape. The common blue naevus usually measures 0.5–1 cm in diameter. The cellular blue naevus is more nodular and usually measures at least 1 cm in diameter. The colour of blue naevi can vary but is usually made up of blue to grey hues; rarely, the colour may be brown or yellowish. Blue naevi are usually found on the distal extremities ( dorsum of hands or feet), buttocks, scalp, and face, although they can occur anywhere on the body. Subungual blue naevi present as blue macules within the lunula or under the nail plate; they originate below the nail matrix and do not cause longitudinal melanonychia. Blue naevi have rarely been reported to involve the vagina , spermatic cord , lymph nodes , uterine cervix , prostate, and oral mucosa.
epidemiology: Blue naevi are twice as common in women compared to men. They are more common among Asians, with a prevalence between 3–5% compared to approximately 1–2% among Caucasian adults. They are rarely found at birth or within the first two years of life. Congenital blue naevi are present in about 1 in 3000 neonates. Most become evident later in childhood or adolescence.
prognosis: Common blue naevi do not have any complications. They are benign and remain unchanged throughout life. In contrast, cellular blue naevi can rarely transform into malignant cellular blue naevi (a type of melanoma ).
snippet_zh: 常見的藍痣是一種小的、孤立的、淺藍色的、表面光滑的斑疹、丘疹或斑塊。它們的形狀一般為圓形或橢圓形。常見的藍痣直徑通常為 0.5-1 厘米。細胞性藍痣呈結節狀，直徑通常至少為 1 厘米。顏色
causes_zh: 藍痣源自胎兒發育期間黑素細胞從神經嵴到皮膚的不完全遷移。與位於較淺表皮的棕色痣相比，藍色痣的黑色素細胞位於真皮內的皮膚深處。人們認為，藍痣中真皮黑素細胞的較深位置導致其顏色被眼睛感知為藍色。這種現像傳統上被推斷是由於丁達爾效應所致，該效應認為較短（藍色）波長的入射光優先被位於較深的真皮黑素細胞散射；這與位於較表面的表皮黑素細胞形成對比，其呈棕色。然而，最近的一項研究表明，藍痣對藍色的感知可能更恰當地被視為較高波長紅光散射的相對減少，而不是較低波長藍光散射的增加。因此，這些作者得出的結論是，藍痣被認為是藍色，因為它們散射較少的紅光，導致色調向藍色轉變（“減色混合”），而不是因為它們散射更多的藍光。
symptoms_zh: 常見的藍痣是一種小的、孤立的、淺藍色的、表面光滑的斑疹、丘疹或斑塊。它們的形狀一般為圓形或橢圓形。常見的藍痣直徑通常為 0.5-1 厘米。細胞性藍痣呈結節狀，直徑通常至少為 1 厘米。藍痣的顏色可能有所不同，但通常由藍色到灰色調組成；極少數情況下，顏色可能是棕色或淡黃色。藍痣通常出現在四肢遠端（手背或腳背）、臀部、頭皮和麵部，但也可能出現在身體的任何部位。甲下藍痣表現為月牙內或甲板下的藍色斑疹；它們起源於指甲基質下方，不會引起縱向黑甲。很少有報導稱藍痣累及陰道、精索、淋巴結、宮頸、前列腺和口腔粘膜。
epidemiology_zh: 藍痣在女性中的發病率是男性的兩倍。它們在亞洲人中更為常見，患病率在 3-5% 之間，而白種人成年人中的患病率約為 1-2%。它們在出生時或出生後的頭兩年內很少被發現。大約每 3000 名新生兒中就有 1 人患有先天性藍痣。大多數在童年或青春期後期變得明顯。
prognosis_zh: 普通藍痣沒有任何並發​​症。它們是良性的並且終生保持不變。相比之下，細胞性藍痣很少會轉化為惡性細胞性藍痣（黑色素瘤的一種）。

title: Boil
snippet: A boil (furuncle) is a deep bacterial infection of a hair follicle presenting as a painful red lump or pustule, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus.
causes: Boils result from bacterial infection of a hair follicle, most commonly Staphylococcus aureus. Contributing factors include friction, shaving, sweating, occlusion, obesity, poor hygiene, immunosuppression, diabetes, and colonisation with S. aureus.
symptoms: Painful red nodules or pustules centred on a hair follicle; may enlarge into abscesses or form multiple heads (carbuncle). Surrounding cellulitis, fever, and systemic symptoms can occur in severe cases.
snippet_zh: 癤子（癤、癰）是毛囊的深層細菌感染，通常表現為疼痛的紅色腫塊或膿皰，最常由金黃色葡萄球菌引起。
causes_zh: 癤子由毛囊遭細菌感染引起，最常見為金黃色葡萄球菌。易感因素包含摩擦、刮毛、流汗、悶熱、肥胖、衛生不佳、免疫力低下、糖尿病，以及金葡菌定植。
symptoms_zh: 以集中於毛囊的疼痛紅腫、膿皰或結節為主，可擴大成膿腫；若有多個破口則稱為癰。可能伴隨蜂窩組織炎、發燒或全身不適。

title: Bromhidrosis
snippet: Bromhidrosis presents as a bad body smell which the patient may be unaware of. Malodour may be the reason for the consultation, raised by a mother or partner, or be obvious during a medical consultation for other reasons. The odour may be worse after exercise, often adhering to clothing. Apocrine br
causes: Body odour is normal and is primarily produced by the breakdown of sweat, sebum , and keratin by bacteria on the skin surface (skin microbiota). What is regarded as acceptable is determined by cultural influences including race and social upbringing. Bromhidrosis may be classified as eccrine or apocrine, exogenous or endogenous : Eccrine bromhidrosis Eccrine glands are distributed over most of the skin surface. Eccrine sweat is secreted continuously and is normally odourless. Eccrine sweat is important in thermoregulation. Apocrine bromhidrosis Apocrine glands are located in the axillae , anogenital region, and breasts, and become active in puberty. Apocrine sweat is secreted intermittently and is normally odourless. Apocrine sweat is controlled by the sympathetic nervous system. Exogenous Skin microbiota — Corynebacterium species, Staphylococcus hominis , S epidermidis , Cutibacterium avidum , Acinetobacter schindleri . Skin infections — erythrasma , pitted keratolysis , trichomycosis , Sphingomonas paucimobilis . Nasal foreign body. Endogenous Foods — garlic , onion , asparagus , curry, alcohol. Medications and toxins — penicillin , bromides, dupilumab . Systemic and skin disorders — obesity , diabetes mellitus , liver disease, renal failure, skin disorders of palms/soles and flexures. Metabolic disorders — trimethylaminuria , phenylketonuria, hypermethioninaemia.
symptoms: Bromhidrosis presents as a bad body smell which the patient may be unaware of. Malodour may be the reason for the consultation, raised by a mother or partner, or be obvious during a medical consultation for other reasons. The odour may be worse after exercise, often adhering to clothing. Apocrine bromhidrosis is the most common form of bromhidrosis in adults and is localised , usually to the armpits and/or anogenital area. Eccrine bromhidrosis presents as a generalised malodour, and may be associated with bad breath (halitosis), anogenital odour, and smelly urine. Specific sites and features to look for on examination: Hyperhidrosis Skin folds — intertrigo , erythrasma , flexural dermatoses Body hair (particularly axillary) — trichomycosis Hands and feet — pitted keratolysis , palmoplantar keratoderma Inside the nose for foreign body. Underarm sweating Trichomycosis axillaris Macerated skin over the toes and ball of the foot in pitted keratolysis
epidemiology: Bromhidrosis can affect all age groups, races, and both sexes. Bromhidrosis is more common in adults than children as sebaceous glands and apocrine sweat glands do not become active until puberty. The elderly have a different body odour from babies, pre-pubescent children, teenagers, and adults. It has a male predominance, and can be a particular issue in hot humid tropical climates. There may be a genetic predisposition , with studies suggesting axillary malodour is more common in Europeans and Africans than Asians.
prognosis: Bromhidrosis can have a significant impact on quality of life, causing: Anxiety Low self-esteem Social withdrawal.
snippet_zh: 狐臭表現為一種患者可能沒有意識到的難聞的體味。惡臭可能是就診的原因，由母親或伴侶提出，或者由於其他原因在醫療諮詢期間很明顯。運動後氣味可能會更嚴重，通常會粘附在衣服上。大汗腺
causes_zh: 體臭是正常現象，主要是由皮膚表面細菌（皮膚微生物群）分解汗液、皮脂和角蛋白而產生的。什麼被認為是可以接受的取決於文化影響，包括種族和社會教養。臭汗症可分為小汗腺臭汗症和頂泌汗腺臭汗症，外源性或內源性： 小汗腺臭汗症 小汗腺分佈在大部分皮膚表面。小汗腺的汗液持續分泌，通常無味。小汗腺汗液對於體溫調節很重要。頂泌汗腺位於腋窩、肛門生殖器區域和乳房，在青春期變得活躍。頂泌汗是間歇性分泌的，通常是無味的。頂泌汗是由交感神經系統控制的。外源性皮膚微生物群——棒狀桿菌、人葡萄球菌、表皮葡萄球菌、阿維杜姆角質桿菌、辛德勒不動桿菌。皮膚感染——紅癬、凹陷性角化松解症、毛黴菌病、少動鞘氨醇單胞菌。鼻腔異物。內源性食物——大蒜、洋蔥、蘆筍、咖哩、酒精。藥物和毒素——青黴素、溴化物、dupilumab。全身和皮膚疾病——肥胖、糖尿病、肝病、腎功能衰竭、手掌/腳掌和彎曲部皮膚疾病。代謝紊亂——三甲胺尿、苯丙酮尿、高甲硫氨酸血症。
symptoms_zh: 狐臭表現為一種患者可能沒有意識到的難聞的體味。惡臭可能是就診的原因，由母親或伴侶提出，或者由於其他原因在醫療諮詢期間很明顯。運動後氣味可能會更嚴重，通常會粘附在衣服上。頂泌汗臭汗症是成人最常見的臭汗症，且局限於腋窩和/或肛門生殖器區域。小汗腺臭汗症表現為全身惡臭，可能與口臭（口臭）、肛門生殖器氣味和臭尿有關。檢查時要尋找的特定部位和特徵： 多汗症 皮膚皺襞 — 擦爛、紅癬、屈曲性皮膚病 體毛（尤其是腋毛） — 毛黴菌病 手腳 — 凹陷性角化松解症、掌蹠角化症 鼻子內是否有異物。腋下出汗 腋毛黴菌 腳趾和腳掌上的浸漬皮膚出現凹陷性角化松解症
epidemiology_zh: 狐臭可影響所有年齡組、種族和男女。腋臭在成人中比兒童更常見，因為皮脂腺和頂漿汗腺直到青春期才變得活躍。老年人的體味與嬰兒、青春期前的兒童、青少年和成人不同。它以男性為主，在炎熱潮濕的熱帶氣候中可能是一個特殊問題。可能存在遺傳傾向，研究表明腋臭在歐洲人和非洲人中比亞洲人更常見。
prognosis_zh: 狐臭會對生活質量產生重大影響，導致： 焦慮 低自尊 社交退縮。

title: Bullous pemphigoid
snippet: Bullous pemphigoid causes severe itch and (usually) large, tense bullae (fluid-filled blisters), which rupture forming crusted erosions. Other variable features include: Nonspecific rash for several weeks before blisters appear Eczematous areas resembling nummular dermatitis Urticaria-like red skin
causes: Bullous pemphigoid is the result of an attack on the basement membrane of the epidermis by IgG +/- IgE immunoglobulins ( antibodies ) and activated T lymphocytes (white blood cells). The target is the protein BP180 (also called Type XVII collagen ), or less frequently BP230 (a plakin). These proteins are within the NC16A domain of collagen XVII. They are associated with the hemidesmosomes , structures that ensure the epidermal keratinocyte cells stick to the dermis to make a waterproof seal. The binding of the autoantibodies to the proteins and release of cytokines from the T cells lead to complement activation, recruitment of neutrophils ( acute inflammatory cells) and the release of proteolytic enzymes. These destroy the hemidesmosomes and cause the formation of subepidermal blisters. The association of neurological diseases with bullous pemphigoid is thought to relate to the presence of collagen XVII in the central nervous system and skin hemidesmosomes. A rare variant of pemphigoid with IgG antibodies directed against a 200 kDa DEJ protein has been described – there is a strong association with psoriasis (laminin gamma 1).
symptoms: Bullous pemphigoid causes severe itch and (usually) large, tense bullae (fluid-filled blisters), which rupture forming crusted erosions. Other variable features include: Nonspecific rash for several weeks before blisters appear Eczematous areas resembling nummular dermatitis Urticaria-like red skin Annular (ring-shaped) lesions Smaller blisters ( vesicles ) Prurigo nodules ( pemphigoid nodularis ) Clear or cloudy, yellowish or bloodstained blister fluid Postinflammatory pigmentation Milia in healed areas Bullous pemphigoid typically involves the flexor aspects of the limbs. It may be localised to one area, or widespread on the trunk and proximal limbs. Frequently it affects the skin around skin folds. Blisters inside the mouth and in genital sites are uncommon. Some patients have a diagnosis of bullous pemphigoid made despite not having any bullae (non-bullous pemphigoid). This can affect any site on the body. Blisters of bullous pemphigoid on foot, skin of colour See more images of bullous pemphigoid .
epidemiology: Bullous pemphigoid often presents in people over 80 years of age, and mostly affects people over 50. It can occur in younger adults, but bullous pemphigoid in infants and children is rare. Bullous pemphigoid occurs equally in males and females. There is an association with human leukocyte antigen ( HLA ) indicating a genetic predisposition to the disease. It is more prevalent in older patients with neurological disease, particularly stroke, dementia and Parkinson disease. The risk of developing bullous pemphigoid is greater in people with psoriasis , and it can be precipitated by treatment of psoriasis with phototherapy . There may be an association with internal malignancy in some patients. A drug, an injury, or skin infection can trigger the onset of disease. Rarely, bullous pemphigoid can be associated with acquired haemophilia due to anti-factor VIII antibody formation.
prognosis: Bullous pemphigoid can be a serious disease, particularly when widespread or resistant to treatment. Morbidity and mortality result from: Bacterial staphylococcal and streptococcal skin infection , and sepsis Viral infection with herpes simplex , varicella or herpes zoster Complications of treatment Underlying and associated diseases.
snippet_zh: 大皰性類天皰瘡會引起嚴重的瘙癢和（通常）大而緊張的大皰（充滿液體的水皰），這些大皰破裂形成結痂糜爛。其他可變特徵包括： 在出現水泡之前持續數週的非特異性皮疹 類似於錢幣狀皮炎的濕疹區域 蕁麻疹樣紅色皮膚
causes_zh: 大皰性類天皰瘡是 IgG +/- IgE 免疫球蛋白（抗體）和活化的 T 淋巴細胞（白細胞）攻擊表皮基底膜的結果。目標是蛋白質 BP180（也稱為 XVII 型膠原蛋白），或者不太常見的 BP230（斑塊）。這些蛋白質位於 XVII 膠原蛋白的 NC16A 結構域內。它們與半橋粒相關，半橋粒是確保表皮角質形成細胞粘附到真皮上形成防水密封的結構。自身抗體與蛋白質的結合以及 T 細胞釋放細胞因子導致補體激活、中性粒細胞（急性炎症細胞）的募集以及蛋白水解酶的釋放。這些會破壞半橋粒並導致表皮下水皰的形成。神經系統疾病與大皰性類天皰瘡的關聯被認為與中樞神經系統和皮膚半橋粒中 XVII 膠原蛋白的存在有關。已經描述了一種罕見的類天皰瘡變體，其具有針對 200 kDa DEJ 蛋白的 IgG 抗體 - 與銀屑病（層粘連蛋白 γ 1）有很強的相關性。
symptoms_zh: 大皰性類天皰瘡會引起嚴重的瘙癢和（通常）大而緊張的大皰（充滿液體的水皰），這些大皰破裂形成結痂糜爛。其他可變特徵包括： 水皰出現前數週的非特異性皮疹 類似於錢幣狀皮炎的濕疹區域 蕁麻疹樣紅色皮膚 環形（環狀）病變 較小的水皰（囊泡） 癢疹結節（結節性類天皰瘡） 透明或渾濁、淡黃色或帶血的水皰液 癒合區域出現粟丘疹 大皰性類天皰瘡通常累及屈肌方面四肢。它可能局限於某一區域，也可能廣泛分佈於軀乾和四肢近端。它經常影響皮膚褶皺周圍的皮膚。口腔內和生殖器部位出現水泡並不常見。有些患者儘管沒有任何大皰（非大皰性類天皰瘡），但仍被診斷為大皰性類天皰瘡。這可能會影響身體的任何部位。腳上大皰性類天皰瘡的水泡，有色皮膚 查看更多大皰性類天皰瘡的圖片。
epidemiology_zh: 大皰性類天皰瘡常出現於 80 歲以上的人群，且多見於 50 歲以上的人群。可發生於年輕人，但嬰兒和兒童中的大皰性類天皰瘡很少見。大皰性類天皰瘡在男性和女性中的發生率相同。與人類白細胞抗原 (HLA) 相關，表明該疾病具有遺傳傾向。它在患有神經系統疾病的老年患者中更為普遍，特別是中風、癡呆和帕金森病。銀屑病患者患大皰性類天皰瘡的風險更大，並且通過光療治療銀屑病可能會誘發這種風險。某些患者可能與內部惡性腫瘤有關。藥物、受傷或皮膚感染都可能引發疾病。極少數情況下，由於抗因子 VIII 抗體的形成，大皰性類天皰瘡可能與獲得性血友病相關。
prognosis_zh: 大皰性類天皰瘡可能是一種嚴重的疾病，特別是當廣泛傳播或對治療產生耐藥性時。發病率和死亡率源自： 細菌性葡萄球菌和鏈球菌皮膚感染以及敗血症 單純皰疹、水痘或帶狀皰疹病毒感染 治療並發症 基礎疾病和相關疾病。

title: Capillaritis
snippet: Capillaritis is classified according to its appearance. It is characterised by tiny red and brown dots, described as cayenne pepper spots. These may be scattered over a body region or group together to form a flat red patch , which becomes brown and then slowly fades away over weeks to months. The c
causes: The capillaries are small blood vessels near the skin surface. For unknown reasons they sometimes become inflamed, although a true vasculitis is not seen on skin biopsy . Blood cells may pass through small gaps that arise between the cells, which make up the capillary walls. The result is petechial haemorrhages. These fade away depositing haemosiderin in the upper parts of the dermis.
symptoms: Capillaritis is classified according to its appearance. It is characterised by tiny red and brown dots, described as cayenne pepper spots. These may be scattered over a body region or group together to form a flat red patch , which becomes brown and then slowly fades away over weeks to months. The clinical descriptions are named after the dermatologist who first described them
epidemiology: Capillaritis can affect anyone, but is uncommon in children. It usually affects otherwise healthy people. Occasionally capillaritis arises as a reaction to a medication; many different drugs have been occasionally associated with capillaritis including meprobamate, carbamazepine and carbromal. In others a food additive or a viral infection may be responsible. Capillaritis may also develop after exercise.
prognosis: Capillaritis can disappear within a few weeks, recur from time to time, or persist for years.
snippet_zh: 毛細血管炎根據其外觀進行分類。它的特徵是微小的紅色和棕色斑點，被稱為辣椒斑。它們可能散佈在身體某個區域或聚集在一起形成扁平的紅色斑塊，變成棕色，然後在幾周到幾個月內慢慢消失。的c
causes_zh: 毛細血管是靠近皮膚表面的小血管。由於未知的原因，它們有時會發炎，儘管皮膚活檢並未發現真正的血管炎。血細胞可以穿過構成毛細血管壁的細胞之間的小間隙。結果是點狀出血。這些會逐漸消失，沉積在真皮上部的含鐵血黃素。
symptoms_zh: 毛細血管炎根據其外觀進行分類。它的特徵是微小的紅色和棕色斑點，被稱為辣椒斑。它們可能散佈在身體某個區域或聚集在一起形成扁平的紅色斑塊，變成棕色，然後在幾周到幾個月內慢慢消失。臨床描述以首先描述它們的皮膚科醫生命名
epidemiology_zh: 毛細血管炎可能影響任何人，但在兒童中並不常見。它通常會影響其他方面健康的人。有時，毛細血管炎是由藥物反應引起的。許多不同的藥物有時與毛細血管炎有關，包括甲丙氨酯、卡馬西平和卡溴馬。在其他情況下，食品添加劑或病毒感染可能是造成這種情況的原因。運動後也可能出現毛細血管炎。
prognosis_zh: 毛細血管炎可在幾週內消失、不時復發或持續數年。

title: Cat scratch disease
snippet: A small red raised spot develops at the site of contact with an infected cat’s saliva after 3–10 days. This changes into a fluid-filled blister that later forms a crusty sore. It is often mistaken for an insect bite. Most are found on the hands, arms, face, or neck as people often hold kittens close
causes: Patients with CSD have usually suffered a scratch or bite from a cat or kitten which is infected with the bacteria Bartonella henselae , a common infection in young cats. It is also known as Rochalimaea henselae . The bacteria is passed from cat to cat via fleas. In the absence of fleas, an infected cat cannot pass the infection to uninfected cats. Once infected, the bacteria are present in saliva deposited in the cat’s fur and claws.
symptoms: A small red raised spot develops at the site of contact with an infected cat’s saliva after 3–10 days. This changes into a fluid-filled blister that later forms a crusty sore. It is often mistaken for an insect bite. Most are found on the hands, arms, face, or neck as people often hold kittens close to their chest and face. The sore usually heals without scarring in several days or months. The nearest lymph nodes become swollen and tender, most often those in the head, neck, and armpit. This is known as regional lymphadenopathy. The lymph nodes may swell to 10–12 cm in the first two weeks of the disease. On questioning, patients often recall being licked, bitten, or scratched by a cat in the previous 1–8 weeks. About 50% of patients will experience additional signs and symptoms including: Fever Malaise /fatigue Headache Nausea and vomiting Sore throat Rash Stomach pains Conjunctivitis .
epidemiology: Risk factors for acquiring cat scratch disease (CSD) include: Owning a cat younger than 12 months Getting licked, bitten, or scratched by an infected kitten Contact with a cat if you have broken skin or mucosa Petting an infected cat Owning at least one kitten or cat with fleas Being immunocompromised Working with kittens and cats eg, veterinarians and veterinary nurses . CSD can occur in people of all ages but is most common in children and adolescents. The majority (80%) of patients with cat scratch disease are less than 21 years old. A primary lesion of cat scratch disease on the cheek - note the infra-auricular lymphadenopathy (CSD-patient2) Click here for more images of cat scratch disease
prognosis: Less common problems occur in about 10% of patients. These may include: Parinaud’s oculoglandular syndrome (POS), characterised by an inflamed lump in the eye and swollen lymph glands in front of the nearby ear Bacillary angiomatosis , especially in HIV or otherwise immunocompromised patients Bacillary hepatitis and splenitis (infection of the liver and spleen) Erythema nodosum (red lumps on the shins) Sepsis Encephalopathy Bacterial endocarditis Neuroretinitis. Encephalopathy is an uncommon complication of CSD that occurs one to six weeks after the lymph glands swell up. The abrupt symptoms of fever, seizures , and coma can be frightening. With hospitalisation and high doses of antibiotics , most patients recover completely. Immunocompromised patients (such as solid organ transplant recipients or people with HIV) can present with atypical manifestations such as thrombocytopaenic purpura , haemophagocytosis , and visceral disease resembling lymphoproliferative disorders.
snippet_zh: 3-10 天后，與受感染貓的唾液接觸的部位會出現一個紅色的小凸起點。這會變成充滿液體的水泡，隨後形成硬皮瘡。它經常被誤認為是昆蟲叮咬。大多數出現在手、手臂、臉或脖子上，因為人們經常把小貓抱得很近
causes_zh: CSD 患者通常被貓或小貓抓傷或咬傷，這些貓或小貓感染了漢塞巴爾通體，這是幼貓中常見的感染。它也被稱為 Rochalimaea henselae。細菌通過跳蚤在貓之間傳播。在沒有跳蚤的情況下，受感染的貓無法將感染傳染給未受感染的貓。一旦感染，細菌就會存在於貓的皮毛和爪子中沉積的唾液中。
symptoms_zh: 3-10 天后，與受感染貓的唾液接觸的部位會出現一個紅色的小凸起點。這會變成充滿液體的水泡，隨後形成硬皮瘡。它經常被誤認為是昆蟲叮咬。大多數長在手、手臂、臉或脖子上，因為人們經常把小貓抱在靠近胸部和臉部的地方。潰瘍通常會在幾天或幾個月內癒合，不會留下疤痕。最近的淋巴結變得腫脹且觸痛，最常見的是頭部、頸部和腋下的淋巴結。這被稱為區域淋巴結病。在疾病的前兩週，淋巴結可能腫大至 10-12 厘米。在詢問時，患者經常回憶起在過去 1-8 週內被貓舔、咬或抓傷的經歷。大約 50% 的患者會出現其他體徵和症狀，包括： 發燒 不適/疲勞 頭痛 噁心和嘔吐 喉嚨痛 皮疹 胃痛 結膜炎。
epidemiology_zh: 感染貓抓病 (CSD) 的危險因素包括： 擁有 12 個月以下的貓 被受感染的小貓舔、咬或抓傷 如果皮膚或粘膜破損，則與貓接觸 撫摸受感染的貓 擁有至少一隻小貓或有跳蚤的貓 免疫功能低下 與小貓和貓一起工作，例如獸醫和獸醫護士。CSD 可發生於所有年齡段的人，但最常見於兒童和青少年。大多數（80%）貓抓病患者年齡小於 21 歲。臉頰上貓抓病的原發病變 - 注意耳下淋巴結腫大 (CSD-患者2) 點擊此處查看更多貓抓病圖片
prognosis_zh: 大約 10% 的患者會出現不太常見的問題。這些可能包括： 帕里諾氏眼腺綜合徵 (POS)，其特徵是眼睛發炎腫塊和附近耳前淋巴腺腫脹 桿菌性血管瘤病，尤其是 HIV 或其他免疫功能低下的患者 桿菌性肝炎和脾炎（肝臟和脾臟感染） 結節性紅斑（小腿上有紅色腫塊） 膿毒症 腦病 細菌性心內膜炎神經視網膜炎。腦病是 CSD 的一種罕見並發症，發生在淋巴腺腫脹後一到六週。發燒、癲癇發作和昏迷等突發症狀可能會令人恐懼。通過住院治療和大劑量抗生素的治療，大多數患者可以完全康復。免疫功能低下的患者（例如實體器官移植受者或艾滋病毒感染者）可能會出現非典型表現，例如血小板減少性紫癜、噬血細胞增多症和類似淋巴細胞增殖性疾病的內臟疾病。

title: Cellulitis
snippet: Cellulitis can affect any site, but most often affects the limbs It is usually unilateral ; a bilateral disease is more often due to another condition It can occur by itself or complicate an underlying skin condition or wound. The first sign of the illness is often feeling unwell, with fever , chill
causes: The most common bacteria causing cellulitis are Streptococcus pyogenes (two-thirds of cases) and Staphylococcus aureus (one third). Rare causes of cellulitis include: Pseudomonas aeruginosa , usually in a puncture wound of foot or hand Haemophilus influenzae , in children with facial cellulitis Anaerobes , Eikenella , Streptococcus viridans , due to human bite Pasteurella multocida , due to cat or dog bite Vibrio vulnificus , due to saltwater exposure, eg coral injury Aeromonas hydrophila from fresh or saltwater exposure, eg following leech bites Erysipelothrix ( erysipeloid ), in butchers. Other forms of skin injury that may increase bacterial exposure and cellulitis infection include surgical wounds and insect bites. Cellulitis is generally not contagious as it affects the deeper layers of the skin.
symptoms: Cellulitis can affect any site, but most often affects the limbs It is usually unilateral ; a bilateral disease is more often due to another condition It can occur by itself or complicate an underlying skin condition or wound. The first sign of the illness is often feeling unwell, with fever , chills and shakes (rigors). This is due to bacteria in the bloodstream ( bacteraemia ). Systemic symptoms are soon followed by the development of a localised area of painful, red, swollen skin. Other signs include: Dimpled skin (peau d’orange) Warmth Blistering Erosions and ulceration Abscess formation Purpura : petechiae , ecchymoses , or haemorrhagic bullae Cellulitis may be associated with lymphangitis and lymphadenitis , which are due to bacteria within lymph vessels and local lymph glands. A red line tracks from the site of infection to nearby tender, swollen lymph glands. After successful treatment, the skin may flake or peel off as it heals. This can be itchy.
epidemiology: Cellulitis affects people of all ages and races. Risk factors for cellulitis include: Previous episode(s) of cellulitis Fissuring of toes or heels, eg due to athlete's foot , tinea pedis or cracked heels Venous disease, eg gravitational eczema , leg ulceration , and/or lymphoedema Current or prior injury, eg trauma , surgical wounds , radiotherapy , IV drug use Immunodeficiency, eg human immunodeficiency virus infection (HIV) Immune suppressive medications Diabetes Chronic kidney disease Chronic liver disease Obesity Pregnancy Alcoholism Many people falsely attribute an episode of cellulitis to an unseen spider bite . Documented spider bites have not led to cellulitis.
prognosis: Severe or rapidly progressive cellulitis may lead to complications that require prompt treatment: Necrotising fasciitis (a more serious soft tissue infection recognised by severe pain, skin pallor , loss of sensation, purpura , ulceration and necrosis ) Gas gangrene Severe sepsis (blood poisoning) Infection of other organs, eg pneumonia, osteomyelitis , meningitis Endocarditis (heart valve infection). Sepsis is recognised by fever, malaise , loss of appetite, nausea, lethargy , headache, aching muscles and joints. The serious infection leads to hypotension (low blood pressure, collapse), reduced capillary circulation, heart failure, diarrhoea, gastrointestinal bleeding, renal failure and loss of consciousness.
snippet_zh: 蜂窩組織炎可影響任何部位，但最常影響四肢，通常是單側；雙側疾病通常是由另一種情況引起的。它可以單獨發生，也可以使潛在的皮膚狀況或傷口復雜化。疾病的第一個跡象通常是感覺不適，發燒、發冷
causes_zh: 引起蜂窩組織炎的最常見細菌是化膿性鏈球菌（三分之二的病例）和金黃色葡萄球菌（三分之一）。引起蜂窩組織炎的罕見原因包括： 銅綠假單胞菌，通常出現在足部或手部的刺傷處 流感嗜血桿菌，發生於患有面部蜂窩組織炎的兒童 厭氧菌、艾肯菌屬、草綠色鏈球菌，由於人咬傷 多殺性巴斯德氏菌，由於貓或狗咬傷 創傷弧菌，由於接觸鹽水，例如珊瑚損傷 新鮮或水生的嗜水氣單胞菌鹽水暴露，例如屠宰場水蛭叮咬丹毒絲菌（丹毒）後。其他可能增加細菌暴露和蜂窩組織炎感染的皮膚損傷包括手術傷口和昆蟲叮咬。蜂窩織炎通常不具有傳染性，因為它會影響皮膚的深層。
symptoms_zh: 蜂窩組織炎可影響任何部位，但最常影響四肢，通常是單側；雙側疾病通常是由另一種情況引起的。它可以單獨發生，也可以使潛在的皮膚狀況或傷口復雜化。這種疾病的第一個症狀通常是感覺不適，包括發燒、發冷和發抖（寒戰）。這是由於血液中存在細菌（菌血症）造成的。全身症狀很快就會出現局部皮膚疼痛、紅腫。其他體徵包括： 皮膚凹陷（橙皮） 發熱 起泡 糜爛和潰瘍 膿腫形成 紫癜：瘀點、瘀斑或出血性大皰 蜂窩織炎可能與淋巴管炎和淋巴結炎有關，這是由淋巴管和局部淋巴腺內的細菌引起的。一條紅線從感染部位一直延伸到附近柔軟、腫脹的淋巴腺。成功治療後，皮膚在癒合過程中可能會剝落或脫落。這可能會很癢。
epidemiology_zh: 蜂窩織炎影響所有年齡段和種族的人。蜂窩織炎的危險因素包括： 既往蜂窩織炎發作 腳趾或腳後跟開裂，例如由於香港腳、足癬或腳後跟乾裂 靜脈疾病，例如重力性濕疹、腿部潰瘍和/或淋巴水腫 當前或既往受傷，例如外傷、手術傷口、放射治療、靜脈注射藥物 免疫缺陷，例如人類免疫缺陷病毒感染 (HIV) 免疫抑制藥物治療 糖尿病 慢性腎病 慢性肝病 肥胖 懷孕 酗酒 許多人錯誤地將蜂窩織炎的發作歸因於看不見的蜘蛛咬傷。有記錄的蜘蛛咬傷並未導致蜂窩織炎。
prognosis_zh: 嚴重或快速進展的蜂窩織炎可能會導致需要及時治療的並發症： 壞死性筋膜炎（一種更嚴重的軟組織感染，表現為劇烈疼痛、皮膚蒼白、感覺喪失、紫癜、潰瘍和壞死） 氣性壞疽 嚴重敗血症（血液中毒） 其他器官感染，例如肺炎、骨髓炎、腦膜炎 心內膜炎（心臟瓣膜感染）。膿毒症表現為發燒、不適、食慾不振、噁心、嗜睡、頭痛、肌肉和關節酸痛。嚴重感染會導致低血壓（低血壓、虛脫）、毛細血管循環減少、心力衰竭、腹瀉、胃腸道出血、腎衰竭和意識喪失。

title: Cherry angioma
snippet: Cherry angioma is an asymptomatic firm red, blue, or purple papule , 0.1–1 cm in diameter. When thrombosed, it can appear black in colour until examined with a dermatoscope when the red or purple colour is more easily seen. Cherry angiomas are usually multiple. They are usually scattered over any pa
causes: The cause of cherry angiomas is unknown. Genetic analysis has found cherry angiomas frequently carry specific somatic missense mutations in the GNAQ and GNA11 (Q209H) genes , which are also involved in other vascular and melanocytic proliferations.
symptoms: Cherry angioma is an asymptomatic firm red, blue, or purple papule , 0.1–1 cm in diameter. When thrombosed, it can appear black in colour until examined with a dermatoscope when the red or purple colour is more easily seen. Cherry angiomas are usually multiple. They are usually scattered over any part of the body surface, but are rarely found on the hands and feet or mucous membranes.
epidemiology: Cherry angiomas markedly increase in number from about the age of 40, so it has been estimated that 75% of people over 75 years of age have them. Although they also called senile angiomas, they can occur in young people too - 5% of adolescents have been found to have them. Cherry angiomas are very common in males and females of any age or race, with no difference in sexes or races affected. They are however more noticeable in white skin than in skin of colour. There may be a family history of similar lesions. Eruptive cherry angiomas have been rarely reported to be associated with internal malignancy and pregnancy.
snippet_zh: 櫻桃狀血管瘤是一種無症狀、堅硬的紅色、藍色或紫色丘疹，直徑 0.1-1 厘米。當血栓形成時，它可能呈黑色，直到用皮膚鏡檢查時更容易看到紅色或紫色。櫻桃狀血管瘤通常是多發的。它們通常分散在任何地方
causes_zh: 櫻桃狀血管瘤的病因尚不清楚。遺傳分析發現櫻桃狀血管瘤經常在 GNAQ 和 GNA11 (Q209H) 基因中攜帶特定的體細胞錯義突變，這些基因也參與其他血管和黑素細胞的增殖。
symptoms_zh: 櫻桃狀血管瘤是一種無症狀、堅硬的紅色、藍色或紫色丘疹，直徑 0.1-1 厘米。當血栓形成時，它可能呈黑色，直到用皮膚鏡檢查時更容易看到紅色或紫色。櫻桃狀血管瘤通常是多發的。它們通常散佈在身體表面的任何部位，但很少在手腳或粘膜上發現。
epidemiology_zh: 櫻桃狀血管瘤的數量從40歲左右開始顯著增加，因此估計75歲以上的人中有75%患有櫻桃狀血管瘤。雖然它們也被稱為老年性血管瘤，但它們也可能發生在年輕人身上 - 5% 的青少年被發現患有這种血管瘤。櫻桃狀血管瘤在任何年齡或種族的男性和女性中都很常見，受影響的性別或種族沒有差異。然而，它們在白色皮膚中比在有色皮膚中更明顯。可能有類似病變的家族史。很少有報導稱爆發性櫻桃血管瘤與內部惡性腫瘤和妊娠有關。

title: Chickenpox
snippet: In children, chickenpox usually begins as itchy red papules progressing to vesicles on the stomach, back and face, and then spreading to other parts of the body. Blisters can also arise inside the mouth The spread pattern can vary from child to child. There may be only a scattering of vesicles, or t
causes: Chickenpox is caused by primary infection with the varicella-zoster virus, of the Herpesviridae family. This virus is sometimes called herpesvirus type 3. Chickenpox is highly contagious and is easily spread from person to person by breathing in airborne respiratory droplets from an infected person's coughing or sneezing or through direct contact with the fluid from the open sores. A person who is not immune to the virus has a 70–80% chance of being infected with the virus if exposed to someone in the early stages of the disease.
symptoms: In children, chickenpox usually begins as itchy red papules progressing to vesicles on the stomach, back and face, and then spreading to other parts of the body. Blisters can also arise inside the mouth The spread pattern can vary from child to child. There may be only a scattering of vesicles, or the entire body may be covered with up to 500 vesicles. The vesicles tend to be very itchy and uncomfortable. Some children may also experience additional symptoms such as high fever, headache, cold-like symptoms, vomiting and diarrhoea. Chickenpox is usually more severe in adults and can be life-threatening in complicated cases. Most adults who get chickenpox experience prodromal symptoms for up to 48 hours before breaking out in the rash. These include fever, malaise , headache, loss of appetite and abdominal pain. Chickenpox is usually more severe in adults and can be life-threatening in complicated cases. The blisters clear up within one to three weeks but may leave a few scars. These are most often depressed ( anetoderma ), but they may be thickened ( hypertrophic scars ). Scarring is prominent when the lesions get infected with bacteria.
prognosis: In healthy children, chickenpox infection is usually an uncomplicated, self-limiting disease. Complications may include: Secondary bacterial infection of skin lesions caused by scratching Infection may lead to abscess , cellulitis, necrotising fasciitis and gangrene Dehydration from vomiting and diarrhoea Exacerbation of asthma Viral pneumonia Chickenpox lesions may heal with scarring. Some complications are more commonly seen in immunocompromised and adult patients with chickenpox. Disseminated primary varicella infection; this carries high morbidity Central nervous system complications such as Reye syndrome , Guillain-Barré syndrome and encephalitis Thrombocytopenia and purpura Varicella in pregnancy Non-immune pregnant women should take care to avoid contact with people who have chickenpox and to wash hands frequently when handling food, animals, and children. Exposure to varicella virus in pregnancy may cause viral pneumonia, premature labour and delivery and rarely maternal death. Approximately 25% of fetuses of mothers with chickenpox become infected. It is harmless to most of them. Offspring may remain asymptomatic , or develop herpes zoster at a young age without a previous history of primary chickenpox infection. They may also develop congenital varicella syndrome, one of the TORCH infections. Congenital varicella syndrome occurs in up to 2% of fetuses exposed to varicella in the first 20 weeks of gestation. It can result in spontaneous abortion, fetal chorioretinitis , cataracts , limb atrophy , cerebral cortical atrophy and microcephaly , cutaneous scars, and neurological disability. Mortality in newborns infected with varicella is up to 30%. Perinatal varicella If a mother develops chickenpox just before delivery or during the 28 days after delivery, her baby is at risk of severe infection. Shingles (herpes zoster) The varicella-zoster virus remains dormant in sensory ganglia after infection. It may reactivate after many years as shingles. Shingles presents with grouped vesicular lesions, which usually affect a single dermatome. Other infections occurring as a result of reactivation of virus include post-herpetic neuralgia , vasculopathy , myelopathy, retinal necrosis , cerebellitis and zoster sine herpete.
snippet_zh: 在兒童中，水痘通常以發癢的紅色丘疹開始，進展為胃部、背部和麵部的水皰，然後擴散到身體的其他部位。口腔內也可能出現水泡，不同兒童的傳播方式可能有所不同。可能只有分散的囊泡，或者
causes_zh: Chickenpox is caused by primary infection with the varicella-zoster virus, of the Herpesviridae family.這種病毒有時被稱為 3 型皰疹病毒。水痘具有高度傳染性，通過吸入感染者咳嗽或打噴嚏產生的空氣中的呼吸道飛沫，或通過直接接觸開放性瘡口的液體，很容易在人與人之間傳播。對該病毒沒有免疫力的人如果接觸處於疾病早期階段的人，則有 70-80% 的機會感染該病毒。
symptoms_zh: 在兒童中，水痘通常以發癢的紅色丘疹開始，進展為胃部、背部和麵部的水皰，然後擴散到身體的其他部位。口腔內也可能出現水泡，不同兒童的傳播方式可能有所不同。可能只有分散的小泡，或者整個身體可能被多達 500 個小泡覆蓋。水泡往往會非常瘙癢和不舒服。有些兒童還可能出現其他症狀，如高燒、頭痛、感冒樣症狀、嘔吐和腹瀉。水痘在成人中通常更為嚴重，在復雜的情況下可能會危及生命。大多數感染水痘的成年人在出現皮疹之前會出現長達 48 小時的前驅症狀。這些症狀包括發燒、不適、頭痛、食慾不振和腹痛。水痘在成人中通常更為嚴重，在復雜的情況下可能會危及生命。水泡會在一到三週內消失，但可能會留下一些疤痕。這些疤痕通常是凹陷的（皮膚乾燥症），但也可能變厚（肥厚性疤痕）。當病變被細菌感染時，疤痕會很明顯。
prognosis_zh: 對於健康兒童來說，水痘感染通常是一種簡單的自限性疾病。並發症可能包括： 抓傷引起的皮損繼發細菌感染 感染可能導致膿腫、蜂窩織炎、壞死性筋膜炎和壞疽 嘔吐和腹瀉導致脫水 哮喘惡化 病毒性肺炎 水痘皮損可能會癒合並留下疤痕。一些並發症在免疫功能低下和成年水痘患者中更常見。播散性原發性水痘感染；這會帶來高發病率的中樞神經系統並發症，如雷氏綜合徵、吉蘭-巴利綜合徵和腦炎、血小板減少症和妊娠期水痘紫癜。非免疫孕婦應注意避免與水痘患者接觸，並在處理食物、動物和兒童時經常洗手。懷孕期間接觸水痘病毒可能會導致病毒性肺炎、早產和分娩，很少會導致孕產婦死亡。患有水痘的母親的胎兒大約有 25% 會被感染。這對他們中的大多數人來說是無害的。後代可能保持無症狀，或在年輕時患上帶狀皰疹，而以前沒有原發性水痘感染史。他們還可能患上先天性水痘綜合症，這是 TORCH 感染之一。在妊娠前 20 週接觸水痘的胎兒中，高達 2% 的胎兒會出現先天性水痘綜合徵。它可導致自然流產、胎兒脈絡膜視網膜炎、白內障、肢體萎縮、大腦皮質萎縮和小頭畸形、皮膚疤痕和神經功能障礙。感染水痘的新生兒死亡率高達 30%。圍產期水痘 如果母親在分娩前或分娩後 28 天內出現水痘，她的寶寶就有嚴重感染的風險。帶狀皰疹（帶狀皰疹） 水痘帶狀皰疹病毒感染後在感覺神經節中保持休眠狀態。多年後它可能會以帶狀皰疹的形式重新激活。帶狀皰疹表現為成群的水皰性病變，通常影響單個皮節。由於病毒重新激活而發生的其他感染包括帶狀皰疹後神經痛、血管病、脊髓病、視網膜壞死、小腦炎和帶狀皰疹。

title: Chilblains
snippet: Chilblains commonly occur on the fingers, toes, and ears (acral sites). However, chilblains can develop on any areas exposed to chronic cold, such as the thighs/hips of horse riders (‘equestrian panniculitis ’). Chilblains develop several hours after exposure to damp cold and last for more than 24 h
causes: Cold causes constriction of small arteries and veins but a protective physiological reflex intermittently dilates the blood vessels to prevent skin ischaemia. Persistent or prolonged vasoconstriction due to an abnormal vascular reaction to cold may result in hypoxaemia and inflammation to produce chilblains.
symptoms: Chilblains commonly occur on the fingers, toes, and ears (acral sites). However, chilblains can develop on any areas exposed to chronic cold, such as the thighs/hips of horse riders (‘equestrian panniculitis ’). Chilblains develop several hours after exposure to damp cold and last for more than 24 hours. Chilblains typically present as: Itch and/or burning pain Localised swelling Blanchable red/purple discolouration. Dermoscopy is not very informative, but examination of the nailfold capillaries may be useful if an underlying connective tissue disease is suspected.
epidemiology: Chilblains can affect all age groups, but is most common in young to middle-aged adults, with a female predominance. Childhood chilblains are well-described but appear to be uncommon. Primary chilblains are unusual in the elderly and an underlying cause should be looked for. Risk factors predisposing to the development of chilblains include: Smoking Low body mass index and poor nutrition Occupational hazard for outdoor workers, such as fishermen and farmers Participation in ice-skating sports Underlying bone marrow disorders eg, chronic myelomonocytic leukaemia Underlying connective tissue disorders, particularly systemic lupus erythematosus (when it is called chilblain lupus ), dermatomyositis , Behcet disease , cutaneous small vessel vasculitis , and discoid lupus erythematosus Underlying acrocyanosis and primary or secondary Raynaud phenomenon Familial tendency to developing chilblains. Chilblains are seen in temperate climates rather than in countries with extreme cold where the air is often dry, and appropriate clothing and living conditions minimise the risk. Late winter and early spring, when it is wet and temperatures are above freezing, are the peak seasons for chilblains.
prognosis: Severe chilblains may blister, or become eroded and ulcerated.
snippet_zh: 凍瘡通常發生在手指、腳趾和耳朵（肢端部位）。然而，任何暴露於慢性寒冷的區域都可能出現凍瘡，例如騎馬者的大腿/臀部（“馬術脂膜炎”）。凍瘡在暴露於潮濕寒冷的數小時後形成，並持續超過 24 小時
causes_zh: 寒冷會導緻小動脈和靜脈收縮，但保護性生理反射會間歇性擴張血管，以防止皮膚缺血。由於血管對寒冷的異常反應而導致持續或長時間的血管收縮，可能會導致低氧血症和炎症，從而產生凍瘡。
symptoms_zh: 凍瘡通常發生在手指、腳趾和耳朵（肢端部位）。然而，任何暴露於慢性寒冷的區域都可能出現凍瘡，例如騎馬者的大腿/臀部（“馬術脂膜炎”）。凍瘡在暴露於潮濕寒冷的數小時後形成，並持續超過 24 小時。凍瘡通常表現為： 瘙癢和/或燒灼痛 局部腫脹 變白的紅色/紫色變色。皮膚鏡檢查提供的信息不多，但如果懷疑有潛在的結締組織疾病，甲襞毛細血管檢查可能會有所幫助。
epidemiology_zh: 凍瘡可影響所有年齡段，但最常見於青壯年，以女性為主。兒童凍瘡已被廣泛描述，但似乎並不常見。原發性凍瘡在老年人中並不常見，應尋找根本原因。誘發凍瘡的危險因素包括： 吸煙 體重指數低和營養不良 戶外工作者的職業危害，例如漁民和農民 參加滑冰運動 潛在的骨髓疾病，例如慢性粒單核細胞白血病 潛在的結締組織疾病，特別是系統性紅斑狼瘡（稱為凍瘡性狼瘡）、皮肌炎、白塞病疾病、皮膚小血管血管炎和盤狀紅斑狼瘡 潛在的手足發紺和原發性或繼發性雷諾現象 發生凍瘡的家族傾向。凍瘡常見於溫帶氣候，而不是極端寒冷的國家，那裡的空氣通常乾燥，適當的衣服和生活條件可以將風險降至最低。冬末春初，天氣潮濕，氣溫高於冰點，是凍瘡的高發季節。
prognosis_zh: 嚴重的凍瘡可能會起水泡，或者被侵蝕和潰爛。

title: Chondrodermatitis nodularis
snippet: Chondrodermatitis nodularis is a solitary, firm, and oval-shaped nodule , 4–6 mm in diameter, with central crust and surrounding erythema. In men, the most common site for CNH is the helix, while in women it is more often found on the antihelix. It is typically unilateral , located on the sleeping s
causes: The exact cause of chondrodermatitis nodularis is still unknown. There are several factors that contribute to its development. Repeated pressure and compromised blood supply to the ear (predominantly in people who sleep on one side) Exposure to cold and sun Trauma from headphones, mobile devices or hearing aids Connective tissue disease (eg, lupus erythematosus , dermatomyositis , and scleroderma ) Chondrodermatitis Chondrodermatitis Image provided by Dr Trevor Evans
symptoms: Chondrodermatitis nodularis is a solitary, firm, and oval-shaped nodule , 4–6 mm in diameter, with central crust and surrounding erythema. In men, the most common site for CNH is the helix, while in women it is more often found on the antihelix. It is typically unilateral , located on the sleeping side, but can be bilateral. CNH is painful and tender. Pain at night may prevent sleeping on the affected side. The lesion can bleed or discharge a small amount of scaly material.
epidemiology: Chondrodermatitis nodularis occurs more frequently in fair-skinned and middle-aged older males, with 10–35% of the cases reported in women. It is rarely reported in children.
prognosis: CNH usually resolves within a few months. It can recur.
snippet_zh: 結節性軟骨皮炎是一個孤立的、堅硬的橢圓形結節，直徑4-6毫米，中央有結痂，周圍有紅斑。在男性中，CNH 最常見的部位是耳輪，而在女性中，CNH 更常見於對耳輪。它通常是單側的，位於睡覺的地方。
causes_zh: 結節性軟骨皮炎的確切病因尚不清楚。有幾個因素有助於其發展。耳朵反复受壓和血液供應受損（主要是側睡的人） 暴露於寒冷和陽光下 耳機、移動設備或助聽器造成的創傷 結締組織疾病（例如紅斑狼瘡、皮肌炎和硬皮病） 軟骨皮炎 軟骨皮炎 圖片由 Dr Trevor Evans 提供
symptoms_zh: 結節性軟骨皮炎是一個孤立的、堅硬的橢圓形結節，直徑4-6毫米，中央有結痂，周圍有紅斑。在男性中，CNH 最常見的部位是耳輪，而在女性中，CNH 更常見於對耳輪。它通常是單側的，位於睡眠側，但也可以是雙側的。CNH 疼痛且觸痛。夜間疼痛可能會妨礙患側入睡。病變部位可能會出血或排出少量鱗狀物質。
epidemiology_zh: 結節性軟骨皮炎更常見於白皮膚和中老年男性，其中 10-35% 的病例發生在女性中。在兒童中很少有報導。
prognosis_zh: CNH 通常會在幾個月內解決。它可能會復發。

title: Comedonal acne
snippet: Comedonal acne is characterised by open and closed comedones (blackheads and whiteheads) caused by blockage of the hair follicle.
causes: Comedones form when follicular keratinisation increases and sebum production rises, blocking the sebaceous duct. Factors include DHT activity, reduced linoleate in sebum, proinflammatory cytokines (IL-1, IL-8), free fatty acids from acne bacteria, overhydration of skin, exposure to certain chemicals (oily pomades, isopropyl myristate, propylene glycol, cosmetic dyes), follicle rupture from trauma (squeezing, abrasive cleansing, peels, lasers), smoking, and dietary factors such as milk products and high glycaemic-index foods.
symptoms: Mainly non-inflamed comedones presenting as blackheads or whiteheads, usually on the face but may appear on chest or back.
snippet_zh: 粉刺性痤瘡以開放型粉刺（黑頭）與閉鎖型粉刺（白頭）為主，由毛囊開口被阻塞所產生。
causes_zh: 粉刺形成源於毛囊角化增加與皮脂分泌上升，使皮脂腺導管被堵塞。可能因素包括：皮膚內 DHT 活性過高、皮脂中亞油酸降低、IL-1/IL-8 等促炎細胞因子、痤瘡菌分解皮脂產生游離脂肪酸、皮膚過度含水（經前或保濕、潮濕環境）、接觸油性潤髮油、肉豆蔻酸異丙酯、丙二醇或化妝品染料、擠壓或磨擦造成毛囊破裂、吸菸，以及奶製品或高 GI 食物等飲食因素。
symptoms_zh: 以黑頭與白頭粉刺為主，通常出現在臉部，也可見於胸或背。

title: Cryotherapy
snippet: Cryotherapy uses extreme cold, usually liquid nitrogen, to destroy abnormal or unwanted skin tissue.
causes: Cryotherapy is not caused by a disease; it is a treatment method used for benign, premalignant, and some malignant skin lesions.
symptoms: Typical treatment reactions include pain or stinging during freezing, redness, swelling, blistering, crusting, and temporary changes in pigmentation.
prognosis: Possible outcomes include secondary wound infection, temporary nerve damage, permanent hypopigmentation, atrophic scarring, alopecia, or recurrence of the treated lesion requiring further therapy.
snippet_zh: 冷凍療法是利用極低溫（通常是液態氮）破壞異常或不需要的皮膚組織。
causes_zh: 冷凍療法本身不是疾病原因，而是一種用於治療良性、癌前病變及部分惡性皮膚病灶的處置方式。
symptoms_zh: 常見反應包括治療時的刺痛或疼痛、紅腫、水皰、結痂，以及暫時性的色素變化。
prognosis_zh: 可能出現的結果包括繼發性傷口感染、暫時性神經損傷、永久性色素減退、萎縮性疤痕、脫髮，或皮膚病灶的持續／復發而需追加治療。

title: Cutaneous horn
snippet: Cutaneous horns are usually asymptomatic. They can be injured causing pain and inflammation.
causes: Around half of horns have a benign base, and half are premalignant or malignant. The most common underlying lesions are seborrhoeic keratosis , viral warts (due to human papillomavirus), actinic keratosis , and well- differentiated squamous cell carcinoma (associated with exposure to the sun and other sources of UV radiation).
symptoms: Cutaneous horns are usually asymptomatic. They can be injured causing pain and inflammation.
epidemiology: A cutaneous horn is more common in older patients, with the peak incidence in those between 60 and 70. They are equally common in males and females, although there is a higher risk of the lesion being malignant in men. They are more common in people with fairer skins ( skin phototype I and 2).
snippet_zh: 皮角通常無症狀。他們可能會受傷，導致疼痛和炎症。
causes_zh: 大約一半的角具有良性基部，一半是癌前或惡性的。最常見的潛在病變是脂溢性角化病、病毒疣（由人乳頭瘤病毒引起）、光化性角化病和分化良好的鱗狀細胞癌（與暴露於陽光和其他紫外線輻射源有關）。
symptoms_zh: 皮角通常無症狀。他們可能會受傷，導致疼痛和炎症。
epidemiology_zh: 皮角在老年患者中更為常見，發病率最高的是 60 歲至 70 歲之間的患者。皮角在男性和女性中同樣常見，儘管男性病變惡性的風險更高。它們在皮膚較白皙的人中更常見（皮膚照片類型 I 和 2）。

title: Cutaneous lupus erythematosus
snippet: Cutaneous lupus erythematosus (CLE) refers to autoimmune skin manifestations of lupus with multiple clinical subtypes.
causes: CLE is multifactorial, involving genetic susceptibility, environmental triggers such as smoking and sun exposure, medications, and dysregulated innate and adaptive immune responses with autoantibodies.
symptoms: Clinical features vary by subtype but often include photosensitive rashes, scaly plaques, dyspigmentation, scarring, and in chronic forms, scarring alopecia.
epidemiology: Incidence is about 4 per 100,000 annually, prevalence 73 per 100,000. Strong female predominance (ages 20–50). More common in skin of colour. Up to 75% of SLE patients show cutaneous involvement, and CLE may precede SLE in 25%.
prognosis: Potential outcomes include progression to systemic lupus erythematosus, dyspigmentation, scarring, permanent hair loss, cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma, and neonatal lupus in infants born to mothers with Ro/La autoantibodies.
snippet_zh: 皮膚紅斑狼瘡是紅斑狼瘡的皮膚型態，屬於自體免疫相關的光敏性與慢性皮膚病變。
causes_zh: 病因包含遺傳易感性、吸菸、日曬、藥物、以及先天與適應性免疫反應失衡與自身抗體相關因素。
symptoms_zh: 依亞型而不同，常見表現包括光敏感性紅疹、鱗屑斑、色素沉著或減退、疤痕，以及慢性型的疤痕性脫髮。
epidemiology_zh: 年發病率約每十萬人 4 例、盛行率 73 例。女性（20–50 歲）明顯較多，深色皮膚族群更常見。約 75% 的 SLE 患者會出現皮膚表現，25% 的患者會先以皮膚病變作為 SLE 的首發徵象。
prognosis_zh: 可能併發 SLE、色素沉著異常、疤痕、永久性脫髮、皮膚鱗狀細胞癌，以及攜帶 Ro/La 抗體母親生下的新生兒紅斑狼瘡。

title: Cutaneous vasculitis
snippet: Clinical presentation of cutaneous vasculitis mainly depends on the size of the inflamed blood vessel. Capillaritis presents as pigmented purpura, characterised by petechiae resolving with haemosiderin deposition. Small vessel vasculitis is characterised by palpable purpura . Medium vessel vasculiti
causes: Many different insults may cause an identical inflammatory response within the blood vessel wall. Three main mechanisms are proposed. Direct injury to the vessel wall by bacteria or viruses Indirect injury by activation of antibodies Indirect injury through activation of complement , a group of proteins in the blood and tissue fluids that attack infection and foreign bodies.
symptoms: Clinical presentation of cutaneous vasculitis mainly depends on the size of the inflamed blood vessel. Capillaritis presents as pigmented purpura, characterised by petechiae resolving with haemosiderin deposition. Small vessel vasculitis is characterised by palpable purpura . Medium vessel vasculitis is associated with nodules and livedo reticularis . Large vessel vasculitis infrequently results in cutaneous features. Cutaneous vasculitis Cutaneous vasculitis Cutaneous vasculitis Cutaneous vasculitis Cutaneous vasculitis Cutaneous vasculitis See more images of cutaneous vasculitis ...
epidemiology: Cutaneous vasculitis can affect people of all ages and races. Some types of vasculitis have a predilection for certain age groups. Acute haemorrhagic oedema affects infants Henoch–Sch ö nlein purpura affects children Hypersensitivity vasculitis affects adults Older people are more likely to have diseases and medications that are potential causes of small vessel vasculitis

causes_zh: 許多不同的損傷可能會在血管壁內引起相同的炎症反應。提出了三個主要機制。細菌或病毒對血管壁的直接損傷 抗體激活引起的間接損傷 補體激活引起的間接損傷，補體是血液和組織液中攻擊感染和異物的一組蛋白質。
symptoms_zh: 皮膚血管炎的臨床表現主要取決於發炎血管的大小。毛細血管炎表現為色素性紫癜，其特徵是瘀點隨著含鐵血黃素沉積消退。小血管炎的特點是可觸及的紫癜。中血管炎與結節和網狀青斑有關。大血管炎很少導致皮膚特徵。皮膚血管炎 皮膚血管炎 皮膚血管炎 皮膚血管炎 皮膚血管炎 皮膚血管炎 查看更多皮膚血管炎圖片 ...
epidemiology_zh: 皮膚血管炎可影響所有年齡和種族的人。某些類型的血管炎在某些年齡組中具有好發性。急性出血性水腫影響嬰兒 過敏性紫癜影響兒童 過敏性血管炎影響成人 老年人更有可能患有可能導緻小血管血管炎的疾病和藥物

title: Darier disease
snippet: The symptoms and signs of Darier disease vary markedly between individuals. Some have very subtle signs that are asymptomatic and found only on careful inspection. Others have extensive lesions which can cause considerable distress to the affected individual. In an affected person the severity of th
causes: The abnormal gene in Darier disease has been identified as ATP2A2 , found on chromosome 12q23-24.1. This gene codes for the SERCA enzyme or pump (SarcoEndoplasmic Reticulum Calcium-ATPase) that is required to transport calcium within the cell. The exact mechanism by which this abnormal gene causes the disease is still under investigation but it appears that the way in which skin cells join together may be disrupted. The skin cells ( keratinocytes ) stick together via structures called desmosomes and it seems the desmosomes do not assemble properly if there is insufficient calcium.
symptoms: The symptoms and signs of Darier disease vary markedly between individuals. Some have very subtle signs that are asymptomatic and found only on careful inspection. Others have extensive lesions which can cause considerable distress to the affected individual. In an affected person the severity of the disease can fluctuate over time. The skin lesions are characterised by persistent , greasy, scaly papules. Affected sites include: Seborrhoeic areas of the face (scalp margins, forehead, ears, around the nostrils and sides of nose, eyebrows, and beard area) Scalp and neck Central chest and back Skin folds, such as armpits, groin, under the breasts, and between the buttocks The papules have a firm, harsh feel like coarse sandpaper and may be skin-coloured, yellow-brown, or brown in colour. If several of the small papules grow together they may form larger warty lesions which can become quite smelly within skin folds. There may be a heavily crusted rash similar to seborrhoeic dermatitis . Other skin signs may include: Small pits on the palms and soles Bleeding under the skin. Atypical presentations of Darier disease are common. Flat, freckle-like lesions Blistered papules Large, raised, warty lesions A linear pattern, with papules following the lines of embryonal development of the skin ( segmental distribution) Acne conglobata ( cystic acne) is associated with Darier disease in some individuals. Darier disease on the mid-back Scalp disease Facial cysts
epidemiology: The onset of skin changes is usually in adolescence. Darier disease is inherited in an autosomal dominant pattern, which means that a single gene passed from one parent causes the condition. The chance of a child inheriting the abnormal gene if one parent is affected is 1 in 2 (50%) but not all people with the abnormal gene will develop clinical features of the disease.
prognosis: Most affected patients develop signs of Darier disease before the age of 20 years. Many have mild and unnoticed Darier disease. More severe disease may have a chronic relapsing-remitting pattern. The signs may clear up altogether. Flare-ups may be caused by any of the following factors. Exposure to sunlight or heat. Topical steroid use Bacterial infection , usually Staphylococcus aureus Herpes simplex infection – including severe Kaposi varicelliform eruption (see eczema herpeticum ). In most patients, general health remains good regardless of the severity of the disease. However it can have a major impact on psychosocial functioning and wellbeing (including depression and anxiety).
snippet_zh: 達里爾病的症狀和體徵因人而異。有些人有非常微妙的跡象，無症狀，只有經過仔細檢查才能發現。其他人則有廣泛的病變，可能會給受影響的人帶來相當大的痛苦。在受影響的人中，情況的嚴重程度
causes_zh: Darier 病的異常基因已被鑑定為 ATP2A2 ，位於染色體 12q23-24.1 上。該基因編碼細胞內運輸鈣所需的 SERCA 酶或泵（肌內質網鈣-ATP 酶）。這種異常基因導致疾病的確切機制仍在研究中，但皮膚細胞結合在一起的方式似乎可能被破壞。皮膚細胞（角質形成細胞）通過稱為橋粒的結構粘在一起，如果鈣不足，橋粒似乎無法正確組裝。
symptoms_zh: 達里爾病的症狀和體徵因人而異。有些人有非常微妙的跡象，無症狀，只有經過仔細檢查才能發現。其他人則有廣泛的病變，可能會給受影響的人帶來相當大的痛苦。對於受影響的人來說，疾病的嚴重程度可能會隨著時間的推移而波動。皮膚損害的特點是持續性、油膩性、鱗狀丘疹。受影響的部位包括： 面部的脂溢區域（頭皮邊緣、前額、耳朵、鼻孔周圍和鼻子兩側、眉毛和鬍鬚區域） 頭皮和頸部 胸部中央和背部 皮膚褶皺，如腋窩、腹股溝、乳房下方和臀部之間 丘疹有堅硬、粗糙的感覺，如粗糙的砂紙，顏色可能是膚色、黃棕色或棕色。如果幾個小丘疹生長在一起，它們可能會形成更大的疣狀病變，這些病變在皮膚皺褶內會變得非常難聞。可能會出現類似於脂溢性皮炎的嚴重結痂皮疹。其他皮膚症狀可能​​包括： 手掌和腳底出現小凹坑 皮下出血。Darier 病的非典型表現很常見。扁平、雀斑樣病變 起泡丘疹 大、凸起、疣狀病變 線性模式，丘疹遵循皮膚胚胎髮育線（節段性分佈） 聚合性痤瘡（囊性痤瘡）與某些個體的毛囊性痤瘡有關。中背部毛囊疾病 頭皮疾病 面部囊腫
epidemiology_zh: 皮膚變化通常發生在青春期。達里爾病以常染色體顯性遺傳模式遺傳，這意味著從父母之一傳遞的單個基因導致了這種疾病。如果父母一方受到影響，孩子遺傳異常基因的機率為二分之一 (50%)，但並非所有攜帶異常基因的人都會出現該疾病的臨床特徵。
prognosis_zh: 大多數受影響的患者在 20 歲之前就會出現戴里爾病的症狀。許多人患有輕微且未被注意到的達里爾病。更嚴重的疾病可能具有慢性複發緩解模式。這些跡象可能會完全消失。突發事件可能由以下任何因素引起。暴露於陽光或高溫下。局部類固醇使用 細菌感染，通常是金黃色葡萄球菌 單純皰疹感染 – 包括嚴重的卡波濟水痘樣皮疹（參見皰疹性濕疹）。對於大多數患者來說，無論疾病的嚴重程度如何，總體健康狀況仍然良好。然而，它可能對社會心理功能和健康（包括抑鬱和焦慮）產生重大影響。

title: Dermatitis
snippet: Dermatitis encompasses acute, subacute, and chronic inflammatory skin reactions with varied clinical appearances.
causes: Causes vary by subtype but generally involve skin barrier disruption, inflammation, irritants, allergens, or underlying systemic factors.
symptoms: Acute dermatitis presents with redness, swelling, papules, vesicles, oozing, or blistering. Chronic eczema shows thickened skin, increased skin markings, hyperkeratosis, scaling, fissuring, excoriation, and hyperpigmentation. Subacute dermatitis displays mixed features of both.
epidemiology: Dermatitis is common, affecting about 20% of people at some point. Atopic dermatitis and pityriasis alba are more common in children; hand eczema in young to middle-aged adults; venous eczema, asteatotic dermatitis, and nummular eczema in older adults. No consistent racial predisposition.
prognosis: Varies by subtype and chronicity; many cases improve with appropriate skin care, trigger avoidance, and treatment.
snippet_zh: 皮炎是一組急性、亞急性與慢性炎症性皮膚反應，臨床表現多變。
causes_zh: 不同類型原因不同，但多與皮膚屏障受損、發炎、刺激物、過敏原或系統性因素相關。
symptoms_zh: 急性皮炎：紅腫、丘疹、水皰、滲出、甚至起水泡。慢性濕疹：皮膚增厚、皮紋加深、角化、脫屑、裂痕、抓痕與色素沉著。亞急性皮炎：兼具急性與慢性特徵。
epidemiology_zh: 非常常見，約五分之一的人一生中曾受影響。兒童常見特應性皮炎與白糠疹；青壯年常見手部濕疹；中老年常見靜脈性濕疹、乾燥性皮炎與錢幣狀濕疹。無一致種族差異。
prognosis_zh: 依類型與慢性程度而異，多數在良好保濕、避免誘因與治療下可改善。

title: Dermatitis herpetiformis
snippet: DH presents as intense itch and a symmetrical blistering rash. Vesicles (often 3–5 mm in diameter) or blisters develop on erythematous skin but are often eroded and crusted due to scratching. Distribution is a helpful diagnostic clue; lesions most commonly appear on the scalp, shoulders, buttocks, e
causes: Dermatitis herpetiformis (DH) and coeliac disease are due to intolerance to the gliadin fraction of gluten found in wheat, rye, and barley. Gluten triggers production of IgA antibodies and an autoimmune process that targets the skin and gut. In coeliac disease, gluten causes intestinal inflammation resulting in diarrhoea, tiredness, weight loss, abdominal discomfort, and metabolic consequences of malabsorption. The majority (>90%) of patients with DH also have gluten-sensitive enteropathy . Gastrointestinal symptoms are usually mild; some patients remain symptom -free. Around 15–25% of coeliac patients have concurrent DH. These patients tend to have a more severe intestinal pathology in comparison to those without DH.
symptoms: DH presents as intense itch and a symmetrical blistering rash. Vesicles (often 3–5 mm in diameter) or blisters develop on erythematous skin but are often eroded and crusted due to scratching. Distribution is a helpful diagnostic clue; lesions most commonly appear on the scalp, shoulders, buttocks, elbows, and knees. It is characterised by prurigo (extremely itchy papules ) and vesicles on normal or reddened skin. DH may also present initially as digital petechiae. Flat red patches, thickened plaques , and weals may occur resembling other inflammatory skin conditions such as dermatitis , scabies , and papular urticaria . Lesions resolve to leave postinflammatory hypopigmentation and hyperpigmentation . DH may be exacerbated by some medications (eg, potassium iodide, non-steroidal anti-inflammatory medications, leuprolide acetate, progesterone ), and premenstrually. Images of dermatitis herpetiformis
epidemiology: Dermatitis herpetiformis (DH) has a prevalence of 10 per 100,000 population. DH predominantly affects Caucasians aged 15–50 years, but may occur in other ages and ethnicities. It is rare in those of African and Asian ancestry, and most common in Irish and Swedish people. Mean age at diagnosis is 40–50 years. There is a male predominance of 2:1. More females <20 years are affected than males; males tend to present at a later age. There is a genetic predisposition with an association with human leukocyte antigens ( HLA ) DQ2 and DQ8. ~90% of patients with coeliac disease carry HLA-DQ2, leaving only a small proportion of patients with lower risk heterodimers (such as HLA-DQ8). 10–15% of individuals with DH have an affected first degree relative. Some patients have a personal or family history of other autoimmune diseases including thyroid disease , pernicious anaemia , type 1 diabetes , vitiligo , Addison disease , alopecia areata , and haemochromatosis .
prognosis: The following conditions may affect patients with dermatitis herpetiformis (DH), especially when it is associated with coeliac disease: Aphthous ulcers and angular cheilitis Dry skin , nail , and hair abnormalities Dental problems: thin enamel Neurological problems: ataxia (loss of balance), polyneuropathy, epilepsy Heart problems: pericarditis and cardiomyopathy Recurrent miscarriages Fatty liver resulting in abnormal liver function tests Non-Hodgkin lymphoma (NHL)* affecting the intestines or any part of the body. *The risk of NHL is increased six to tenfold among DH patients. Strict adherence to a gluten-free diet reduces this rare but serious complication. Fortunately, increased lymphoma risk is evident only during the first 5 years after DH diagnosis and gluten-free diet adherence.

causes_zh: 皰疹樣皮炎 (DH) 和乳糜瀉是由於對小麥、黑麥和大麥中的麥膠蛋白部分不耐受而導致的。麩質會觸發 IgA 抗體的產生以及針對皮膚和腸道的自身免疫過程。在乳糜瀉中，麩質會引起腸道炎症，導致腹瀉、疲倦、體重減輕、腹部不適和吸收不良的代謝後果。大多數 (>90%) DH 患者還患有麩質敏感性腸病。胃腸道症狀通常較輕微；一些患者仍然沒有症狀。大約 15-25% 的乳糜瀉患者同時患有 DH。與沒有 DH 的患者相比，這些患者往往有更嚴重的腸道病理。
symptoms_zh: DH 表現為劇烈瘙癢和對稱的水皰皮疹。紅斑皮膚上會出現水皰（直徑通常為 3-5 毫米）或水皰，但經常因抓撓而被侵蝕並結痂。分佈是一個有用的診斷線索；病變最常出現在頭皮、肩膀、臀部、肘部和膝蓋上。其特徵是正常或發紅皮膚上出現癢疹（極度瘙癢的丘疹）和水皰。DH 最初也可能表現為數字瘀點。可能會出現扁平的紅色斑塊、增厚的斑塊和傷痕，類似於其他炎症性皮膚病，如皮炎、疥瘡和丘疹性蕁麻疹。病變消退後留下炎症後色素沉著不足和色素沉著過度。某些藥物（例如碘化鉀、非甾體類抗炎藥物、醋酸亮丙瑞林、黃體酮）和經前可能會加劇 DH。皰疹樣皮炎圖片
epidemiology_zh: 皰疹樣皮炎 (DH) 的患病率為每 100,000 人 10 人。DH 主要影響 15-50 歲的白種人，但也可能發生在其他年齡和種族。這種情況在非洲和亞洲血統的人中很少見，在愛爾蘭和瑞典人中最常見。診斷時的平均年齡為 40-50 歲。男女比例為2：1。20 歲以下女性受影響的人數多於男性；男性往往出現較晚的年齡。存在與人類白細胞抗原 (HLA) DQ2 和 DQ8 相關的遺傳傾向。約 90% 的乳糜瀉患者攜帶 HLA-DQ2，只有一小部分患者攜帶風險較低的異二聚體（例如 HLA-DQ8）。10-15% 的 DH 患者有受影響的一級親屬。一些患者有其他自身免疫性疾病的個人史或家族史，包括甲狀腺疾病、惡性貧血、1型糖尿病、白癜風、阿狄森氏病、斑禿和血色素沉著症。
prognosis_zh: 以下情況可能會影響皰疹樣皮炎 (DH) 患者，尤其是與乳糜瀉相關時： 口瘡性潰瘍和口角炎 皮膚乾燥、指甲和毛髮異常 牙齒問題：牙釉質薄 神經系統問題：共濟失調（失去平衡）、多發性神經病、癲癇 心臟問題：心包炎和心肌病 反复流產 脂肪肝導致肝功能檢查異常 非霍奇金淋巴瘤(NHL)* 影響腸道或身體任何部位。*DH 患者患 NHL 的風險增加六到十倍。嚴格遵守無麩質飲食可以減少這種罕見但嚴重的並發症。幸運的是，淋巴瘤風險增加僅在 DH 診斷和堅持無麩質飲食後的前 5 年內才明顯。

title: Dermatofibroma
snippet: A dermatofibroma usually presents as a solitary firm papule or nodule on a limb. A dermatofibroma can occur anywhere on the skin. Dermatofibroma size varies from 0.5–1.5 cm diameter; most lesions are 7–10 mm diameter. A dermatofibroma is tethered to the skin surface and mobile over subcutaneous tiss
causes: It is not clear if dermatofibroma is a reactive process or a true neoplasm. The lesions are composed of proliferating fibroblasts. Histiocytes may also be involved. They are sometimes attributed to minor trauma including insect bites, injections, or a rose thorn injury, but not consistently. Multiple dermatofibromas can develop in patients with altered immunity such as HIV , immunosuppression , or autoimmune conditions.
symptoms: A dermatofibroma usually presents as a solitary firm papule or nodule on a limb. A dermatofibroma can occur anywhere on the skin. Dermatofibroma size varies from 0.5–1.5 cm diameter; most lesions are 7–10 mm diameter. A dermatofibroma is tethered to the skin surface and mobile over subcutaneous tissue. The overlying skin dimples on pinching the lesion – the dimple or pinch sign. Colour may be pink to light brown in white skin, and dark brown to black in dark skin; some appear paler in the centre. Dermatofibromas do not usually cause symptoms, but they are sometimes painful, tender, or itchy. Clinical variants include giant, eruptive, and multiple forms. Dermatofibroma Dermatofibroma Dermatofibroma Dermatofibroma Pinch sign of dermatofibroma Dermoscopy of dermatofibroma See more images of dermatofibroma .
epidemiology: Dermatofibromas are mostly seen in adults. People of every ethnicity can develop dermatofibromas. Ordinary dermatofibromas are more common in women than in men, although some histologic variants are more commonly identified in males.
prognosis: Because dermatofibromas are often raised lesions, they may be traumatised, for example by a razor. Occasionally dozens may erupt within a few months, usually in the setting of immunosuppression. Dermatofibroma does not give rise to cancer. However, occasionally, it may be mistaken for dermatofibrosarcoma protuberans or desmoplastic melanoma .
snippet_zh: 皮膚纖維瘤通常表現為肢體上孤立的堅硬丘疹或結節。皮膚纖維瘤可發生在皮膚的任何部位。皮膚纖維瘤的大小直徑為 0.5-1.5 厘米；大多數病變直徑為 7-10 毫米。皮膚纖維瘤附著在皮膚表面並在皮下組織上移動
causes_zh: 目前尚不清楚皮膚纖維瘤是反應性過程還是真正的腫瘤。病變由增殖的成纖維細胞組成。組織細胞也可能參與其中。有時將其歸因於輕微創傷，包括昆蟲叮咬、注射或玫瑰刺傷，但情況並不總是如此。免疫力改變（例如 HIV、免疫抑製或自身免疫性疾病）的患者可能會出現多發性皮膚纖維瘤。
symptoms_zh: 皮膚纖維瘤通常表現為肢體上孤立的堅硬丘疹或結節。皮膚纖維瘤可發生在皮膚的任何部位。皮膚纖維瘤的大小直徑為 0.5-1.5 厘米；大多數病變直徑為 7-10 毫米。皮膚纖維瘤附著在皮膚表面並在皮下組織上移動。擠壓病變部位時，覆蓋的皮膚會出現凹陷——凹陷或擠壓跡象。白色皮膚的顏色可能是粉紅色到淺棕色，深色皮膚的顏色可能是深棕色到黑色；有些在中心顯得更蒼白。皮膚纖維瘤通常不會引起症狀，但有時會感到疼痛、壓痛或發癢。臨床變異包括巨大型、爆發型和多種型。皮膚纖維瘤 皮膚纖維瘤 皮膚纖維瘤 皮膚纖維瘤捏徵 皮膚纖維瘤的皮膚鏡檢查 查看皮膚纖維瘤的更多圖像。
epidemiology_zh: 皮膚纖維瘤主要見於成人。每個種族的人都可能患上皮膚纖維瘤。普通皮膚纖維瘤在女性中比在男性中更常見，儘管一些組織學變異在男性中更常見。
prognosis_zh: 由於皮膚纖維瘤通常是隆起的病變，因此它們可能會受到損傷，例如被剃刀損傷。有時幾個月內可能會爆發數十次，通常是在免疫抑制的情況下。皮膚纖維瘤不會引起癌症。然而，有時可能會被誤認為隆突性皮膚纖維肉瘤或促纖維增生性黑色素瘤。

title: Dermographism
snippet: Dermographism, a form of physical urticaria, is characterised by raised red lines appearing on the skin after stroking or scratching.
causes: The exact mechanism is unclear. Minor skin trauma may release antigens that trigger IgE-dependent mast cell activation, leading to histamine release and local swelling.
symptoms: Linear wheals or raised red marks appearing minutes after stroking the skin. Lesions may itch or burn, but many cases are asymptomatic.
epidemiology: Can occur at any age but is most common in young adults. Affects about 5% of the population. Usually occurs in otherwise healthy individuals and may be associated with infections or medications.
prognosis: Symptoms may persist for months to years. Idiopathic symptomatic dermographism often lasts around 6 years, while forms linked to triggers may resolve within weeks.
snippet_zh: 皮膚划痕症是一種物理性蕁麻疹，其特徵為皮膚被摩擦後出現隆起的紅色條紋。
causes_zh: 確切機制尚未明確。輕微皮膚外力可能釋放抗原，引發 IgE 依賴的肥大細胞活化，造成組胺釋放與局部腫脹。
symptoms_zh: 皮膚被摩擦後數分鐘內出現線狀風團或紅色隆起。有些患者會癢或灼熱，但多數情況無明顯症狀。
epidemiology_zh: 可見於任何年齡，最常見於年輕成人。約 5% 人口會出現明顯反應。通常患者其他方面健康，部分與感染或藥物相關。
prognosis_zh: 可能持續數月至數年。特發性症狀性皮膚划痕症平均約持續 6 年；若為感染等誘因所致，通常在數天至數週內改善。

title: Digital myxoid pseudocyst
snippet: The digital pseudocyst is semi- translucent , with a smooth shiny surface. It is most often located within a centimetre of the base of the nail. It often causes a groove in the nail. This may be up to several millimetres across and extends the length of the nail. Jelly-like sticky fluid may be expre
causes: The cyst arises from degeneration in the connective tissue on the top of the last segment of the finger. There appear to be two variations. The first is a form of focal mucinosis , a condition characterised by abnormal deposits of mucopolysaccharides (mucins) in the skin. The other variation arises from extension of the lining of the finger joint and is due to osteoarthritis – a type of ganglion. See pathology of a digital myxoid pseudocyst .
symptoms: The digital pseudocyst is semi- translucent , with a smooth shiny surface. It is most often located within a centimetre of the base of the nail. It often causes a groove in the nail. This may be up to several millimetres across and extends the length of the nail. Jelly-like sticky fluid may be expressed from the pseudocyst (sometimes tinged with blood). causes_zh: 囊腫是由手指最後一段頂部的結締組織變性引起的。似乎有兩種變化。第一種是局灶性粘蛋白沉著症，其特徵是皮膚中粘多醣（粘蛋白）異常沉積。另一種變化是由於手指關節內壁的延伸引起的，這是由於骨關節炎（一種神經節）引起的。參見數字粘液樣假性囊腫的病理學。

title: Discoid eczema
snippet: Discoid eczema usually affects the limbs, particularly the legs, but the rash may be widespread. Although often bilateral , the distribution can be asymmetrical especially if related to varicose veins. There are two clinical forms of discoid eczema: Exudative acute discoid eczema: oozy papules , bli
causes: The cause of discoid eczema is unknown. Some cases are associated with Staphylococcus aureus infection. The eruption can be precipitated by: A localised injury such as scratch, insect bite or thermal burn Impetigo or wound infection Contact dermatitis Dry skin Varicose veins (varicose eczema)
symptoms: Discoid eczema usually affects the limbs, particularly the legs, but the rash may be widespread. Although often bilateral , the distribution can be asymmetrical especially if related to varicose veins. There are two clinical forms of discoid eczema: Exudative acute discoid eczema: oozy papules , blisters, and plaques Dry discoid eczema: subacute or chronic erythematous , dry plaques Individual plaques are well circumscribed , mostly 1–3 cm in diameter, and inflamed. The majority of patches are round or oval. The plaques are usually very itchy. The skin between the patches is usually dry and irritable. Severe discoid eczema may generalise, with numerous small to large itchy plaques appearing all over the body due to an autoeczematisation reaction. Patches may clear up without leaving a sign. In dark skin, marks may persist for months as dark brown postinflammatory hyperpigmentation or pale postinflammatory hypopigmentation.
epidemiology: Discoid eczema can affect all age groups. It is slightly more common in older adult males and younger adult females. In males there is an association with chronic alcohol ism. Drug-induced discoid eczema can be due to medications that cause skin dryness. Discoid eczema can occur in association with atopic eczema , eczema craquelé, and secondary eczematisation .
prognosis: Discoid eczema tends to be a chronic condition that often relapses especially in cold winter months. Many cases do eventually resolve. Click to see images of discoid eczema
