causes_zh: 盤狀濕疹的病因尚不清楚。有些病例與金黃色葡萄球菌感染有關。以下情況可能會引發皮疹： 局部損傷，如抓傷、昆蟲叮咬或熱燒傷 膿皰瘡或傷口感染 接觸性皮炎 皮膚乾燥 靜脈曲張（曲張性濕疹）
symptoms_zh: 盤狀濕疹通常影響四肢，尤其是腿部，但皮疹可能廣泛分佈。雖然通常是雙側的，但分佈可能是不對稱的，特別是與靜脈曲張相關時。盤狀濕疹有兩種臨床形式： 滲出性急性盤狀濕疹：滲出性丘疹、水皰和斑塊 乾性盤狀濕疹：亞急性或慢性紅斑、乾燥斑塊 個別斑塊邊界清楚，直徑大多為 1-3 厘米，並有炎症。大多數斑塊是圓形或橢圓形的。斑塊通常非常瘙癢。斑塊之間的皮膚通常乾燥且易過敏。嚴重的盤狀濕疹可能會普遍出現，由於自身濕疹反應，全身出現許多從小到大的瘙癢斑塊。補丁可能會清除而不留下任何痕跡。在深色皮膚中，痕跡可能會持續數月，表現為深棕色炎症後色素沉著過度或蒼白炎症後色素沉著不足。
epidemiology_zh: 盤狀濕疹可影響所有年齡段。在老年男性和年輕女性中稍微常見。在男性中，與慢性酒精中毒有關。藥物引起的盤狀濕疹可能是由導致皮膚乾燥的藥物引起的。盤狀濕疹可能與特應性濕疹、裂紋性濕疹和繼發性濕疹有關。
prognosis_zh: 盤狀濕疹往往是一種慢性疾病，經常復發，尤其是在寒冷的冬季。許多案件最終都會得到解決。點擊查看盤狀濕疹圖片

title: Discoid lupus erythematosus
snippet: DLE may be localised (above the neck in 80%) or generalised (above and below the neck in 20%). Often the rash is asymptomatic but it can be itchy and sore. Most patients with DLE only have skin involvement but some have or subsequently develop signs of SLE. Typically, the lesions evolve over time. T
causes: The causes of DLE are endogenous and exogenous. Endogenous factors include: Genetic predisposition with major histocompatibility complex alleles HLA -DQA1 and DRB1. Single nucleotide polymorphism TYK2 , IRF5 , CTLA4 are also associated. Interferon, particularly type 1, is a key cytokine in pathogenesis. IRF5 and TYK2 are involved in interferon regulation. ITGAM polymorphisms confer a greater risk for DLE than systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) . Exogenous factors include: Smoking which is more common in those with DLE and which also impairs the efficacy of antimalarials Ultraviolet radiation can provoke DLE as it is a photosensitive disorder. However, it can be found in non-sun exposed areas.
symptoms: DLE may be localised (above the neck in 80%) or generalised (above and below the neck in 20%). Often the rash is asymptomatic but it can be itchy and sore. Most patients with DLE only have skin involvement but some have or subsequently develop signs of SLE. Typically, the lesions evolve over time. Typical signs of localised DLE include: Initial dry red patches evolve to form red plaques with adherent scale. Follicular hyperkeratosis (plugs of keratin within hair follicles ) is common. When this scale is removed using sticky tape the horny plugs can be seen giving rise to the “carpet-tack” sign. As DLE progresses atrophic scarring and scarring alopecia is common. This is associated with hyper- and or hypo- pigmentary change and is especially noticeable in those with skin of colour. DLE is typically located on the nose, cheeks, ear lobes, and conchal bowl (Shuster sign). It may involve lips, oral mucosa , nose, or eyelids. Signs of generalised DLE include: The morphology of the lesions is similar to that on the face and scalp but they are distributed widely including the anterior chest, upper back, dorsum of hands and less commonly on the lower limbs, palms, and soles. Rarely, there is involvement of the anogenital mucosa. Conchal bowl discoid lupus erythematosus (Shuster sign) (DLE-patient4) Active inflammatory discoid lupus erythematosus with hypopigmented scarred areas on the cheek (DLE-patient8) Well circumscribed scarred ear lobe due to discoid lupus erythematosus (DLE-patient8) Scarring alopecia due to discoid lupus erythematosus (DLE-patient4) erythematosus Discoid lupus erythematosus Scarring alopecia with follicular plugging in discoid lupus erythematosus (DLE-patient4) Click here for more images
epidemiology: DLE can affect males and females of any age but occurs more frequently in women in their 20s, 30s, and 40s. Children are rarely affected. The estimated prevalence is around 20–40 people in every 100,000. DLE is more common in skin of colour. For example, in New Zealand, Māori, and Pacific people have a significantly higher relative risk of discoid lupus erythematosus compared to the European population. This ethnic disparity has also been observed in the USA with those with skin of colour having an increased incidence of DLE.
prognosis: Discoid lupus erythematosus can have an impact physically and psychologically affecting the patient’s quality of life. Dermatology Life Quality Index (DLQI) measures matched with Cutaneous Lupus Disease Area and Severity Index (CLASI) measures have shown that quality of life in patients with DLE is poor. DLE commonly scars causing facial disfigurement and permanent alopecia . Pigmentary change may improve over long periods. There is a link between DLE and systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) . Approximately 5% of patients with localised and 15% with generalised DLE develop SLE.
snippet_zh: DLE 可能是局部性的（80% 為頸部以上），也可能是全身性的（20% 為頸部上方和下方）。皮疹通常沒有症狀，但可能會發癢和疼痛。大多數 DLE 患者僅有皮膚受累，但有些患者有或隨後出現 SLE 症狀。通常，病變會隨著時間的推移而演變。時間
causes_zh: DLE的病因有內源性和外源性。內源性因素包括： 主要組織相容性複合體等位基因 HLA -DQA1 和 DRB1 的遺傳傾向。單核苷酸多態性TYK2、IRF5、CTLA4也相關。干擾素，尤其是 1 型乾擾素，是發病機制中的關鍵細胞因子。IRF5 和 TYK2 參與乾擾素調節。ITGAM 多態性導致 DLE 的風險高於系統性紅斑狼瘡 (SLE)。外源性因素包括： 吸煙在 DLE 患者中更為常見，也會損害抗瘧藥的功效 紫外線輻射會引發 DLE，因為它是一種光敏性疾病。然而，它可以在非陽光照射的區域找到。
symptoms_zh: DLE 可能是局部性的（80% 為頸部以上），也可能是全身性的（20% 為頸部上方和下方）。皮疹通常沒有症狀，但可能會發癢和疼痛。大多數 DLE 患者僅有皮膚受累，但有些患者有或隨後出現 SLE 症狀。通常，病變會隨著時間的推移而演變。局部 DLE 的典型症狀包括： 最初的干紅色斑塊逐漸發展成帶有粘附鱗片的紅色斑塊。毛囊角化過度（毛囊內的角蛋白栓）很常見。當使用膠帶去除該鱗片時，可以看到角質塞，從而產生“地毯粘”的跡象。隨著 DLE 的進展，萎縮性疤痕和疤痕性脫髮很常見。這與色素過多和/或色素減少有關，對於有色皮膚的人尤其明顯。DLE 通常位於鼻子、臉頰、耳垂和耳甲碗（舒斯特徵）。它可能涉及嘴唇、口腔粘膜、鼻子或眼瞼。全身性 DLE 的體徵包括： 皮損形態與面部和頭皮相似，但分佈廣泛，包括前胸、上背部、手背，較少見於下肢、手掌和足底。很少有肛門生殖器粘膜受累。Conchal 碗盤狀紅斑狼瘡（Shuster 徵）（DLE-患者 4） 活動性炎性盤狀紅斑狼瘡，臉頰上有色素減退的疤痕區域（DLE-患者 8） 盤狀紅斑狼瘡導致的界限清楚的疤痕耳垂（DLE-患者 8） 盤狀紅斑狼瘡導致的疤痕性脫髮（DLE-患者 4）盤狀紅斑狼瘡 盤狀紅斑狼瘡伴有毛囊堵塞的疤痕性脫髮 (DLE-病人4) 點擊此處查看更多圖片
epidemiology_zh: DLE 可影響任何年齡的男性和女性，但在 20 多歲、30 多歲和 40 多歲的女性中更常見。兒童很少受到影響。據估計，每 10 萬人中就有 20 至 40 人患病。DLE 在有色皮膚中更為常見。例如，與歐洲人群相比，新西蘭、毛利人和太平洋島民患盤狀紅斑狼瘡的相對風險明顯較高。在美國也觀察到了這種種族差異，有色皮膚的 DLE 發病率更高。
prognosis_zh: 盤狀紅斑狼瘡會對患者的身體和心理產生影響，影響生活質量。皮膚科生活質量指數 (DLQI) 測量與皮膚狼瘡疾病面積和嚴重程度指數 (CLASI) 測量相匹配表明，DLE 患者的生活質量很差。DLE 通常會留下疤痕，導致面部毀容和永久性脫髮。長期來看，色素變化可能會有所改善。DLE 和系統性紅斑狼瘡 (SLE) 之間存在聯繫。大約 5% 的局限性 DLE 患者和 15% 的全身性 DLE 患者會發展為 SLE。

title: Drug hypersensitivity syndrome
snippet: Drug hypersensitivity syndrome usually develops over several days, with onset 2-8 weeks after starting the responsible medicine. A high fever of 38–40 C is usually noticed first. This is quickly followed by a widespread skin rash. Characteristics of the rash are diverse. Morbilliform eruption affect
causes: Drug hypersensitivity syndrome is a delayed T cell -mediated reaction. Tissue damage is due to cytotoxic T cells and cytokine release. There is a genetic predisposition to drug hypersensitivity syndrome. A defect in the way the liver metabolises drugs may be responsible. Re-activation of human herpesvirus 6 (HHV6, the cause of roseola ) or Epstein-Barr virus (EBV) may also be important.
symptoms: Drug hypersensitivity syndrome usually develops over several days, with onset 2-8 weeks after starting the responsible medicine. A high fever of 38–40 C is usually noticed first. This is quickly followed by a widespread skin rash. Characteristics of the rash are diverse. Morbilliform eruption affects 80% of cases, with varying morphology including targetoid lesions , blisters and pustules Erythroderma or exfoliative dermatitis (involving > 90% body surface area) may follow in about 10% Facial swelling affects 30% Mucosal involvement affects 25% (lips, mouth, throat, genitalia ) The rash can last many weeks. Drug eruption Drug eruption Drug eruption
epidemiology: Drug hypersensitivity syndrome is relatively rare. It mainly affects adults and is equal in incidence in males and females. Genetic susceptibility and HLA associations have been found for several causative drugs. The most common drugs to cause this reaction are a number of anticonvulsant drugs (particularly carbamazepine, phenobarbital, and phenytoin), the anti- gout drug, allopurinol, olanzapine, and the sulphonamide group of antibiotics . It has been estimated that at least 1 in every 10,000 patients treated with an anticonvulsant will develop drug hypersensitivity syndrome. The risk of drug hypersensitivity syndrome in patients on allopurinol depends on the dose of allopurinol, associated kidney disease, and concomitant thiazide diuretics. It has been rarely reported with many other medications, including azathioprine . It can be very difficult to determine the exact cause of drug hypersensitivity syndrome if several medicines have been commenced in preceding weeks. In about 10% of cases, the causative drug is never identified. Drug hypersensitivity syndrome occurring within 2 weeks of starting the responsible drug is most likely with beta-lactam antibiotics or iodinated contrast media. Onset is delayed more than 2 weeks with anticonvulsants and allopurinol.
prognosis: Causes of death from drug hypersensitivity syndrome include: Acute liver failure causing coagulation problems, jaundice , and impaired consciousness Multiorgan failure Fulminant myocarditis Haemophagocytosis.
snippet_zh: 藥物過敏綜合徵通常在幾天內出現，在開始使用相關藥物後 2-8 週發病。通常首先會注意到 38-40°C 的高燒。隨後很快就會出現大範圍的皮疹。皮疹的特徵多種多樣。麻疹狀噴發影響
causes_zh: 藥物過敏綜合徵是一種延遲性 T 細胞介導的反應。組織損傷是由於細胞毒性 T 細胞和細胞因子的釋放造成的。藥物過敏綜合徵存在遺傳傾向。肝臟代謝藥物的方式缺陷可能是造成這種情況的原因。人類皰疹病毒 6（HHV6，玫瑰疹的病因）或 Epstein-Barr 病毒 (EBV) 的重新激活也可能很重要。
symptoms_zh: 藥物過敏綜合徵通常在幾天內出現，在開始使用相關藥物後 2-8 週發病。通常首先會注意到 38-40°C 的高燒。隨後很快就會出現大範圍的皮疹。皮疹的特徵多種多樣。麻疹樣皮疹影響 80% 的病例，具有不同的形態，包括靶樣病變、水皰和膿皰。約 10% 的病例可能會出現紅皮病或剝脫性皮炎（涉及 > 90% 的體表面積）。面部腫脹影響 30%。粘膜受累影響 25%（嘴唇、口腔、咽喉、生殖器）。皮疹可持續數週。藥疹 藥疹 藥疹
epidemiology_zh: 藥物過敏綜合徵相對罕見。它主要影響成年人，男性和女性的發病率相同。已發現多種致病藥物與遺傳易感性和 HLA 相關。引起這種反應的最常見藥物是許多抗驚厥藥物（特別是卡馬西平、苯巴比妥和苯妥英）、抗痛風藥物、別嘌呤醇、奧氮平和磺酰胺類抗生素。據估計，每 10,000 名接受抗驚厥藥物治療的患者中至少有 1 人會出現藥物過敏綜合徵。服用別嘌呤醇的患者發生藥物過敏綜合徵的風險取決於別嘌呤醇的劑量、相關的腎臟疾病和合併使用的噻嗪類利尿劑。包括硫唑嘌呤在內的許多其他藥物很少有報導。如果在前幾週開始使用多種藥物，則可能很難確定藥物過敏綜合徵的確切原因。大約 10% 的病例中，致病藥物始終無法確定。開始使用相關藥物後 2 週內發生的藥物過敏綜合徵最有可能與使用 β-內酰胺抗生素或碘造影劑有關。使用抗驚厥藥和別嘌呤醇後，發病會延遲 2 週以上。
prognosis_zh: 藥物過敏綜合徵導致的死亡原因包括： 急性肝衰竭導致凝血問題、黃疸和意識障礙 多器官衰竭 暴發性心肌炎 噬血細胞增多症。

title: Dyshidrotic eczema (pompholyx)
snippet: Dyshidrotic eczema (pompholyx) is a chronic, recurrent condition and appears as small, deep-seated, fluid-filled blisters (vesicles) on the sides of the fingers, hands, and feet. The vesicles are small (1–2mm), often symmetrical, with no associated erythema , and they do not occur elsewhere on the b
causes: The cause of dyshidrotic eczema (pompholyx) is not known. It is not related to occlusion of sweat glands as was first thought when the disease was recognised over 100 years ago, but there are some factors associated with the disorder, including: Atopy — the evidence is mixed with some reporting it as a risk and others not Contact dermatitis : Allergic contact dermatitis to a variety of antigens including nickel , chromium , and cobalt Irritant contact dermatitis may exacerbate the condition. Fungal infection — Tinea pedis can be associated with a dyshidrotic-like eruption Photoinduction — associated with ultraviolet A exposure Immunoglobulin therapy Hyperhidrosis — excessive sweating is an aggravating factor Other factors: Seasonal variation can also aggravate a recurrence Smoking Oral contraceptive pill Aspirin.
symptoms: Dyshidrotic eczema (pompholyx) is a chronic, recurrent condition and appears as small, deep-seated, fluid-filled blisters (vesicles) on the sides of the fingers, hands, and feet. The vesicles are small (1–2mm), often symmetrical, with no associated erythema , and they do not occur elsewhere on the body. Vesicles may coalesce into larger blisters. It is extremely itchy . The vesicles commonly resolve after 2–3 weeks with peeling. Vesicles can also occur in other types of hand dermatitis . Click here for images
epidemiology: The exact prevalence of dyshidrotic eczema (pompholyx) is not known. Approximately 20% of patients assessed in a patch test clinic for hand dermatitis had dyshidrotic eczema (pompholyx). Occurrence appears not to correlate with age or gender.
prognosis: Dyshidrotic eczema (pompholyx) can lead to: Secondary infection , eg, bacterial infection with Staphylococcus aureus or Streptococcus pyogenes producing lymphangitis and cellulitis Paronychia and nail dystrophy if adjacent or proximal to the nail fold Physical and psychological disability; potential economic cost due to loss of work opportunity.
title_zh: 出汗不良性濕疹（汗皰疹）
snippet_zh: 出汗不良性濕疹（汗皰疹）是一種慢性、復發性疾病，表現為手指、手和腳兩側的小而深的、充滿液體的水皰（水皰）。水皰很小（1-2毫米），通常是對稱的，沒有相關的紅斑，並且它們不會出現在身體的其他地方
causes_zh: 出汗不良性濕疹（汗皰疹）的原因尚不清楚。它與 100 多年前人們首次認識到該疾病時所認為的那樣與汗腺閉塞無關，但存在一些與該疾病相關的因素，包括： 特應性 — 證據混雜，一些報告稱其為風險，另一些則不報告 接觸性皮炎：對包括鎳、鉻和鈷在內的多種抗原的過敏性接觸性皮炎 刺激性接觸性皮炎可能會加劇病情。真菌感染 — 足癬可能與出汗困難樣皮疹有關 光誘導 — 與紫外線 A 暴露有關 免疫球蛋白治療 多汗症 — 出汗過多是一個加重因素 其他因素： 季節變化也會加重複發 吸煙 口服避孕藥 阿司匹林。
symptoms_zh: 出汗不良性濕疹（汗皰疹）是一種慢性、復發性疾病，表現為手指、手和腳兩側的小而深的、充滿液體的水皰（水皰）。水皰很小（1-2毫米），通常是對稱的，沒有相關的紅斑，並且不會出現在身體的其他部位。水泡可能會合併成更大的水泡。非常癢。水泡通常會在 2-3 週後消退並脫皮。水皰也可出現在其他類型的手部皮炎中。單擊此處查看圖像
epidemiology_zh: 出汗不良性濕疹（汗皰疹）的確切患病率尚不清楚。在斑貼試驗診所進行的手部皮炎評估中，大約 20% 的患者患有汗皰症（汗皰疹）。發生率似乎與年齡或性別無關。
prognosis_zh: 出汗不良性濕疹（汗皰疹）可導致： 繼發感染，例如金黃色葡萄球菌或化膿性鏈球菌的細菌感染，產生淋巴管炎和蜂窩組織炎 甲溝炎和指甲營養不良（如果鄰近或接近甲襞） 身體和心理殘疾；由於失去工作機會而造成的潛在經濟成本。

title: EASI score
snippet: The Eczema Area and Severity Index (EASI) is a validated tool used to assess the severity and extent of atopic dermatitis based on redness, thickness, scratching, and lichenification across defined body regions.
causes: EASI does not describe causes; it is a scoring system used after eczema is already present.
symptoms: EASI evaluates four clinical signs: erythema (redness), induration or papulation (thickness), excoriation (scratch marks), and lichenification (skin thickening), along with the extent of affected areas.
epidemiology: EASI is used worldwide in clinical practice and research to standardise the assessment of atopic dermatitis severity.
prognosis: EASI itself does not predict prognosis but helps track improvement or worsening over time with treatment or natural disease variation.
snippet_zh: 濕疹面積與嚴重度指數（EASI）是一項經驗證的工具，用於依據紅斑、肥厚、抓痕與苔蘚化等指標，評估異位性皮膚炎的範圍與嚴重程度。
causes_zh: EASI 本身不是疾病原因説明，而是用於已存在濕疹後的量化評分工具。
symptoms_zh: EASI 評估四項臨床表現：紅斑、肥厚或丘疹、抓痕、苔蘚化，並量化皮損在各身體區域的受影響比例。
epidemiology_zh: EASI 在全球的臨床照護與研究中廣泛使用，可提供一致的異位性皮膚炎嚴重度評估。
prognosis_zh: EASI 本身不提供預後，但可協助追蹤治療反應或病程變化。

title: Eczema herpeticum
snippet: Eczema herpeticum starts with clusters of itchy and painful blisters. It may affect any site but is most often seen on face and neck. Blisters can occur in normal skin or sites actively or previously affected by atopic dermatitis or another skin disease. New patches form and spread over 7–10 days an
causes: Most cases of eczema herpeticum are due to Herpes simplex type 1 or 2. Eczema herpeticum usually arises during a first episode of infection with Herpes simplex ( primary herpes). Signs appear 5–12 days after contact with an infected individual, who may or may not have visible cold sores. Eczema herpeticum may also complicate recurrent herpes. However, repeated episodes of eczema herpeticum are unusual. Eczema herpeticum can affect males and females of all ages but is more commonly seen in infants and children with atopic dermatitis . Patients with atopic dermatitis appear to have reduced immunity to herpes infection. Their underlying dermatitis can be mild to severe, active or inactive. Eczema herpeticum is better called Kaposi varicelliform eruption when a breakdown of the skin barrier is not due to eczema. Examples of non- eczematous conditions prone to severe localised herpes infections are: Thermal burns Pemphigus vulgaris Darier disease Benign familial pemphigus Cutaneous T-cell lymphoma / mycosis fungoides Ichthyosis . Other viruses may occasionally be responsible for a similar eruption, such as eczema coxsackium due to coxsackievirus A16 (the cause of hand foot and mouth disease ). As smallpox has been eliminated, disseminated vaccinia as a consequence of smallpox vaccination is now very rare. It was reported to be very severe, with mortality of up to 50%.
symptoms: Eczema herpeticum starts with clusters of itchy and painful blisters. It may affect any site but is most often seen on face and neck. Blisters can occur in normal skin or sites actively or previously affected by atopic dermatitis or another skin disease. New patches form and spread over 7–10 days and may rarely be widely disseminated throughout the body. The patient is unwell, with fever and swollen local lymph nodes. The blisters are monomorphic , that is, they all appear similar to each other. They may be filled with clear yellow fluid or thick purulent material. They are often blood-stained i.e., red, purple or black. New blisters have central dimples (umbilication). They may weep or bleed. Older blisters crust over and form sores (erosions) Lesions heal over 2–6 weeks. In severe cases where the skin has been destroyed by infection, small white scars may persist long term. Secondary bacterial infection with staphylococci or streptococci may lead to impetigo and cellulitis . Severe eczema herpeticum may affect multiple organs, including the eyes, brain, lung, and liver. snippet_zh: 皰疹性濕疹始於一簇簇又癢又痛的水泡。它可能影響任何部位，但最常見於面部和頸部。水皰可能發生在正常皮膚或活躍或先前受特應性皮炎或其他皮膚病影響的部位。新斑塊在 7-10 天內形成並傳播
causes_zh: 大多數皰疹濕疹病例是由 1 型或 2 型單純皰疹引起的。皰疹濕疹通常出現在單純皰疹（原發性皰疹）感染的首次發作期間。與感染者接觸後 5-12 天就會出現症狀，感染者可能有也可能沒有明顯的唇皰疹。皰疹性濕疹也可能使復發性皰疹複雜化。然而，皰疹性濕疹反復發作並不常見。皰疹性濕疹可影響所有年齡段的男性和女性，但更常見於患有特應性皮炎的嬰兒和兒童。特應性皮炎患者似乎對皰疹感染的免疫力降低。他們的潛在皮炎可以是輕度到重度、活動性或非活動性。當皮膚屏障的破壞不是由濕疹引起時，皰疹性濕疹更適合稱為卡波西水痘樣皮疹。容易發生嚴重局部皰疹感染的非濕疹病症的例子有： 熱燒傷 尋常型天皰瘡 戴里爾病 良性家族性天皰瘡 皮膚 T 細胞淋巴瘤/蕈樣肉芽腫 魚鱗病。其他病毒有時也可能引起類似的皮疹，例如柯薩奇病毒 A16（手足口病的病因）引起的柯薩奇濕疹。由於天花已被消滅，因接種天花疫苗而引起的播散性痘苗現在非常罕見。據報導，情況非常嚴重，死亡率高達50%。
symptoms_zh: 皰疹性濕疹始於一簇簇又癢又痛的水泡。它可能影響任何部位，但最常見於面部和頸部。水皰可能發生在正常皮膚或活躍或先前受特應性皮炎或其他皮膚病影響的部位。新斑塊在 7-10 天內形成並擴散，很少會在全身廣泛傳播。患者身體不適，發燒，局部淋巴結腫大。這些水泡是單形的，也就是說，它們看起來都彼此相似。它們可能充滿透明的黃色液體或粘稠的膿性物質。它們通常帶有血跡，即紅色、紫色或黑色。新水泡中央有凹痕（臍）。他們可能會哭泣或流血。較舊的水泡結痂並形成瘡（糜爛） 病變需 2-6 週才能癒合。在嚴重的情況下，皮膚被感染破壞，白色的小疤痕可能會長期存在。葡萄球菌或鏈球菌繼發細菌感染可能導致膿皰病和蜂窩織炎。嚴重的皰疹濕疹可能會影響多個器官，包括眼睛、大腦、肺和肝臟。它很少會致命。皰疹性濕疹 皰疹性濕疹 皰疹性濕疹 查看更多皰疹性濕疹圖片 ...

title: Emollients and moisturisers
snippet: Emollients and moisturisers are topical products used to reduce skin dryness, restore barrier function, and improve comfort in various dry or irritated skin conditions.
causes: Dry or irritated skin that benefits from emollients may be related to eczema, environmental factors, frequent washing, irritants, ageing, or reduced skin barrier lipids.
symptoms: Skin that requires moisturisers may present with dryness, roughness, flaking, tightness, mild itching, or sensitivity.
epidemiology: Dry skin is common in all age groups and is more frequent in individuals with atopic conditions or high exposure to detergents, cold climates, or low humidity.
prognosis: Most cases of dry or irritated skin improve with consistent use of appropriate emollients and avoidance of irritants.
snippet_zh: 潤膚劑和保濕劑是用於減少皮膚乾燥、恢復皮膚屏障並改善不適感的外用產品，常用於各種乾燥或受刺激的皮膚狀況。
causes_zh: 需要使用潤膚劑的乾燥或受刺激皮膚可能與濕疹、環境因素、頻繁清潔、刺激物、老化或皮脂減少有關。
symptoms_zh: 皮膚可能表現為乾燥、粗糙、脫屑、緊繃、輕微瘙癢或敏感，因而需要使用保濕產品。
epidemiology_zh: 乾燥皮膚可見於所有年齡層，在異位性體質、常接觸清潔劑、寒冷氣候或低濕度環境中特別常見。
prognosis_zh: 大多數乾燥或受刺激的皮膚在持續使用適當的潤膚保濕產品並避免刺激物後均可改善。

title: Epidermoid cyst
snippet: The clinical features of an epidermoid cyst include [4]: A firm, flesh-coloured or yellowish round papule or nodule fixed to the skin surface but typically mobile over deeper layers Diameter 1–3 cm A central punctum Foul-smelling cheesy debris can be expressed from the central punctum. Epidermoid cy
causes: An epidermoid cyst generally results from an occluded pilosebaceous unit. On non-hair-bearing areas of the body, such as the buttock, palm of the hand, or sole of the foot, an epidermoid cyst may be due to traumatic implantation of epidermal cells into the dermis where keratin accumulates within an epithelium-lined sac [2].
symptoms: The clinical features of an epidermoid cyst include [4]: A firm, flesh-coloured or yellowish round papule or nodule fixed to the skin surface but typically mobile over deeper layers Diameter 1–3 cm A central punctum Foul-smelling cheesy debris can be expressed from the central punctum. Epidermoid cysts are most common on the central trunk (eg, chest and shoulders) and face but can occur almost anywhere on the body. Epidermoid cysts are common the scrotum and vulva . They may be solitary or multiple, and are generally asymptomatic. The contents of a s small lid epidermoid cyst incised with a green needle A recurrent epidermoid cyst - note the scar from a previous incomplete excision
epidemiology: Epidermoid cysts most commonly occur in adults, particularly when young-to-middle aged. They occur twice as frequently in men than in women [3]. They may occur frequently in acromegaly . Multiple small epidermoid cysts on the cheeks are seen associated with solar elastosis in Favre-Racouchot syndrome . Genetic disorders which may increase the risk of developing multiple epidermoid cysts include [1]: Gardner syndrome Pachyonychia congenita type 2 Basal cell naevus syndrome . Gardner syndrome
prognosis: Rupture of the cyst contents into the dermis results in swelling, redness, and tenderness. This can be due to trauma or bacterial infection , commonly by Staphylococcus aureus , Escherichia coli , and group A streptococcus [1]. Surgical excision can lead to bleeding, secondary bacterial infection , and scarring. If the cyst has ruptured, or the capsule is not removed in its entirety, the cyst may recur. Cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma may very rarely arise within an epidermoid cyst [5]. An inflamed cyst on the lid An inflamed cyst accentuating the punctum
snippet_zh: 表皮樣囊腫的臨床特徵包括 [4]： 堅硬、肉色或淡黃色的圓形丘疹或結節，固定在皮膚表面，但通常在更深層移動，直徑 1-3 cm 中央淚點 中央淚點可流出惡臭的干酪碎片。表皮樣細胞
causes_zh: 表皮樣囊腫通常由閉塞的毛囊皮脂腺單位引起。在身體的非毛髮區域，例如臀部、手掌或腳底，表皮樣囊腫可能是由於表皮細胞外傷植入真皮，角蛋白在上皮內襯的囊內積聚所致[2]。
symptoms_zh: 表皮樣囊腫的臨床特徵包括 [4]： 堅硬、肉色或淡黃色的圓形丘疹或結節，固定在皮膚表面，但通常在更深層移動，直徑 1-3 cm 中央淚點 中央淚點可流出惡臭的干酪碎片。表皮樣囊腫最常見於中央軀幹（例如胸部和肩膀）和麵部，但幾乎可以發生在身體的任何部位。表皮樣囊腫常見於陰囊和外陰。它們可能是單獨的或多個的，並且通常無症狀。用綠針切開的小眼瞼表皮樣囊腫的內容物 復發性表皮樣囊腫 - 注意先前不完全切除留下的疤痕
epidemiology_zh: 表皮樣囊腫最常見於成人，尤其是中青年。它們在男性中的發生頻率是女性的兩倍[3]。它們可能經常出現在肢端肥大症中。在 Favre-Racouchot 綜合徵中，臉頰上出現多個小表皮樣囊腫，與日光性彈性組織變性有關。可能增加發生多發性表皮樣囊腫風險的遺傳性疾病包括 [1]： 加德納綜合徵 先天性厚甲症 2 型基底細胞痣綜合徵。加德納綜合症
prognosis_zh: 囊腫內容物破裂進入真皮會導致腫脹、發紅和壓痛。這可能是由於外傷或細菌感染造成的，通常是金黃色葡萄球菌、大腸桿菌和 A 族鏈球菌感染 [1]。手術切除可能導致出血、繼發細菌感染和疤痕。如果囊腫破裂，或者囊腫沒有完全去除，囊腫可能會復發。皮膚鱗狀細胞癌很少發生在表皮樣囊腫內[5]。眼瞼上有發炎的囊腫 淚點突出的發炎囊腫

title: Erythema annulare centrifugum
snippet: Erythema annulare centrifugum typically affects the thighs, buttocks, and upper arms. However, any location on the body can be affected. Erythema annulare centrifugum usually starts as a small pink papule that gradually enlarges over several weeks to form annular plaques with central clearing. These
causes: Erythema annulare centrifugum has been shown to occur in association with underlying medical conditions and medications in 33–72% of cases [1,2]. It is thought to be a form of hypersensitivity reaction . The most commonly associated conditions are: Cutaneous fungal infection ( tinea pedis ) Internal malignancy Adverse reaction to medications Pregnancy Haematological disorders Endocrine disorders Rheumatic disease . Dietary causes of erythema annulare centrifugum include blue cheese and tomatoes. Stress has also been associated with the disease [1,3].
symptoms: Erythema annulare centrifugum typically affects the thighs, buttocks, and upper arms. However, any location on the body can be affected. Erythema annulare centrifugum usually starts as a small pink papule that gradually enlarges over several weeks to form annular plaques with central clearing. These plaques can vary in size from a few millimetres to a few centimetres in size. Annular lesions can be partial (arciform) and coalesce to form polycyclic (ringed), serpiginous (wavy), and gyrate (revolving) patterns. Classically, the annular or arciform lesions have an advancing outer erythematous edge with a trailing (inner) scaly edge. The rash may be itchy.
epidemiology: Erythema annulare centrifugum most often occurs in adults, but all ages can be affected. The average age of onset is 40 years [1].
prognosis: Erythema annulare centrifugum tends to recur over several months or years, but it can spontaneously remit. Kim et al showed that 18.5% of affected individuals had persistent skin lesions for over 1 year and that the average duration of skin lesions was 4.7 months [1].
snippet_zh: 離心性環狀紅斑通常影響大腿、臀部和上臂。然而，身體上的任何位置都可能受到影響。離心性環狀紅斑通常以粉紅色小丘疹開始，在幾週內逐漸擴大，形成中央透明的環形斑塊。這些
causes_zh: 33-72% 的病例顯示，離心性環狀紅斑的發生與基礎疾病和藥物治療有關 [1,2]。它被認為是超敏反應的一種形式。最常見的相關病症有： 皮膚真菌感染（足癬） 內部惡性腫瘤 藥物不良反應 懷孕 血液系統疾病 內分泌疾病 風濕性疾病。離心性環狀紅斑的飲食原因包括藍紋奶酪和西紅柿。壓力也與該疾病有關[1,3]。
symptoms_zh: 離心性環狀紅斑通常影響大腿、臀部和上臂。然而，身體上的任何位置都可能受到影響。離心性環狀紅斑通常以粉紅色小丘疹開始，在幾週內逐漸擴大，形成中央透明的環形斑塊。這些斑塊的尺寸可以從幾毫米到幾厘米不等。環形病變可以是部分的（弧形）和合併形成多環（環形）、蛇行（波狀）和迴轉（旋轉）模式。典型地，環形或弓形病變具有前進的外紅斑邊緣和後（內）鱗狀邊緣。皮疹可能會發癢。
epidemiology_zh: 離心性環狀紅斑最常發生在成人中，但所有年齡段的人都可能受到影響。平均發病年齡為40歲[1]。
prognosis_zh: 離心性環狀紅斑往往會在幾個月或幾年內復發，但可以自行緩解。Kim等研究表明，18.5%的受影響個體存在持續性皮損超過1年，皮損平均持續時間為4.7個月[1]。

title: Erythema multiforme
snippet: Many patients report prodromal symptoms including fatigue, malaise , myalgia , or fever. These likely represent the course of precipitating illness rather than true prodrome.
causes: Infection precipitates 90% of cases, with HSV type 1 being the predominant cause. Other infectious triggers include: HSV type 2 Cytomegalovirus Epstein-Barr virus Influenza virus Vulvovaginal candidiasis SARS-CoV-2 Orf . Mycoplasma pneumoniae infection is often listed as a trigger of erythema multiforme, however mucocutaneous manifestations associated with this infection have recently been classified as their own independent entity, reactive infectious mucocutaneous eruption (RIME) . Medications which may trigger erythema multiforme include: Antibiotics (including erythromycin, nitrofurantoin, penicillins, sulfonamides , and tetracyclines) Anti-epileptics Non-steroidal anti- inflammatory drugs Vaccinations (most common cause in infants). Other conditions associated with erythema multiforme (usually in persistent disease) include: Inflammatory bowel disease Hepatitis C Leukaemia Lymphoma Solid organ cancer malignancy. In many cases, the inciting factor remains unknown. Most research on the mechanism of disease has focused on the herpes-associated presentation. The herpes virus is phagocytosed by mononuclear cells which express cutaneous lymphocyte antigen (a skin-homing receptor ). Engulfed viral DNA is then transferred to the epidermis and into keratinocytes. Within the keratinocyte layer, expression of viral DNA fragments induces a cell-mediated immune response, including the production of interferon-γ which upregulates the inflammatory process.
symptoms: Many patients report prodromal symptoms including fatigue, malaise , myalgia , or fever. These likely represent the course of precipitating illness rather than true prodrome.
epidemiology: Erythema multiforme affects less than 1% of the population. It is most common in young adults (aged 20–40 years) with a modest predominance in males. There is no association with race. There appears to be a genetic predisposition in people carrying the HLA -DQB1*0301 allele , which shares an even stronger association with herpes-related erythema multiforme. Multiple other alleles have been associated with its recurrent form.
prognosis: Cutaneous lesions resolve without scarring, though hyperpigmentation may persist for several months. Ocular involvement can lead to more serious complications including: Keratitis Conjunctival scarring Uveitis Permanent visual impairment.
snippet_zh: 許多患者報告有前驅症狀，包括疲勞、不適、肌痛或發燒。這些可能代表了疾病的進程，而不是真正的前驅症狀。
causes_zh: 90% 的病例由感染引起，其中 1 型 HSV 是主要原因。其他感染觸發因素包括： HSV 2 型鉅細胞病毒 Epstein-Barr 病毒 流感病毒 外陰陰道念珠菌病 SARS-CoV-2 Orf 。肺炎支原體感染通常被列為多形性紅斑的觸發因素，但與這種感染相關的皮膚粘膜表現最近被歸類為獨立的實體，即反應性感染性皮膚粘膜疹（RIME）。可能引發多形紅斑的藥物包括： 抗生素（包括紅黴素、呋喃妥因、青黴素、磺胺類和四環素） 抗癲癇藥 非甾體抗炎藥 疫苗接種（嬰兒中最常見的原因）。與多形紅斑（通常為持續性疾病）相關的其他病症包括： 炎症性腸病 丙型肝炎 白血病 淋巴瘤 實體器官癌惡性腫瘤。在許多情況下，誘發因素仍然未知。大多數關於疾病機制的研究都集中在與皰疹相關的表現上。皰疹病毒被表達皮膚淋巴細胞抗原（皮膚歸巢受體）的單核細胞吞噬。然後，被吞噬的病毒 DNA 被轉移到表皮並進入角質形成細胞。在角質形成細胞層內，病毒 DNA 片段的表達會誘導細胞介導的免疫反應，包括產生上調炎症過程的干擾素-γ。
symptoms_zh: 許多患者報告有前驅症狀，包括疲勞、不適、肌痛或發燒。這些可能代表了疾病的進程，而不是真正的前驅症狀。
epidemiology_zh: 多形紅斑影響不到 1% 的人口。它最常見於年輕人（20-40 歲），其中男性略多見。與種族無關。攜帶 HLA -DQB1*0301 等位基因的人似乎存在遺傳傾向，該等位基因與皰疹相關的多形紅斑的關聯性更強。多個其他等位基因與其複發形式相關。
prognosis_zh: 皮膚病變消退後不會留下疤痕，但色素沉著過度可能會持續數月。眼部受累可導致更嚴重的並發症，包括： 角膜炎 結膜疤痕 葡萄膜炎 永久性視力障礙。

title: Erythema nodosum
snippet: Erythema nodosum presents with tender bilateral erythematous subcutaneous nodules 3–20 cm in diameter erupting over one to several weeks. They are accompanied by fever and joint pain. In 50% the ankle is swollen and painful for up to several weeks. The knees and other joints can also be affected [8]
causes: Erythema nodosum is a hypersensitivity reaction of unknown cause in up to 55% of patients [6]. In other cases, it is associated with an identified infection , drug, inflammatory condition, or malignancy [7]. Throat infections ( streptococcal disease or viral infection) Primary tuberculosis ( TB ), a rare cause in New Zealand Yersinia infection; this causes diarrhoea and abdominal pain Chlamydia infection Fungal infection: histoplasmosis , coccidioidomycosis Parasitic infection: amoebiasis , giardiasis Other viral and bacterial diseases associated with erythema nodosum include herpes simplex , viral hepatitis , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection, Campylobacter infection, and Salmonella infection.
symptoms: Erythema nodosum presents with tender bilateral erythematous subcutaneous nodules 3–20 cm in diameter erupting over one to several weeks. They are accompanied by fever and joint pain. In 50% the ankle is swollen and painful for up to several weeks. The knees and other joints can also be affected [8].
epidemiology: Erythema nodosum can occur in all ethnicities, sexes, and ages, but is most common in women between the ages of 25 and 40 [4]. It is 3–6 times more common in women than in men except before puberty when the incidence is the same in both sexes [5].
prognosis: Erythema nodosum has few known complications and lesions usually resolve spontaneously. A rare complication is encapsulated fat necrosis , or ‘mobile encapsulated lipoma’ [14].
snippet_zh: 結節性紅斑表現為雙側皮下直徑 3-20 厘米的觸痛紅斑結節，在一到幾週內出現。它們伴有發燒和關節疼痛。50% 的人腳踝腫脹且疼痛長達數週。膝蓋和其他關節也會受到影響 [8]
causes_zh: 結節性紅斑是一種原因不明的超敏反應，發生率高達 55% 的患者 [6]。在其他情況下，它與已確定的感染、藥物、炎症或惡性腫瘤有關[7]。喉嚨感染（鏈球菌病或病毒感染） 原發性結核病（TB），是新西蘭耶爾森菌感染的罕見原因；這會導致腹瀉和腹痛 衣原體感染 真菌感染：組織胞漿菌病、球孢子菌病 寄生蟲感染：阿米巴病、賈第鞭毛蟲病 與結節性紅斑相關的其他病毒和細菌性疾病包括單純皰疹、病毒性肝炎、人類免疫缺陷病毒 (HIV) 感染、彎曲桿菌感染和沙門氏菌感染。
symptoms_zh: 結節性紅斑表現為雙側皮下直徑 3-20 厘米的觸痛紅斑結節，在一到幾週內出現。它們伴有發燒和關節疼痛。50% 的人腳踝腫脹且疼痛長達數週。膝蓋和其他關節也會受到影響[8]。
epidemiology_zh: 結節性紅斑可發生於所有種族、性別和年齡，但最常見於 25 歲至 40 歲之間的女性 [4]。除青春期前外，女性的發病率是男性的 3-6 倍，此時兩性的發病率相同 [5]。
prognosis_zh: 結節性紅斑幾乎沒有已知的並發症，病變通常會自行消退。一種罕見的並發症是包裹性脂肪壞死，或“移動性包裹性脂肪瘤”[14]。

title: Erythrasma
snippet: Erythrasma presents as well-defined pink or brown patches with fine scaling and superficial fissures. Mild itching may be present. The common sites for erythrasma are armpits, groin and between the toes. The intergluteal fold, submammary , and periumbilical skin may also be affected. Widespread infe
causes: The bacteria responsible for erythrasma are gram-positive, non- spore -forming, aerobic or facultative bacilli called Corynebacterium minutissimum . Erythrasma may coexist with or be confused with other causes of intertrigo including fungal infections such as tinea or Candida albicans (thrush).
symptoms: Erythrasma presents as well-defined pink or brown patches with fine scaling and superficial fissures. Mild itching may be present. The common sites for erythrasma are armpits, groin and between the toes. The intergluteal fold, submammary , and periumbilical skin may also be affected. Widespread infections are most often associated with diabetes mellitus. Erythrasma is classified into three types according to location. Interdigital erythrasma: between the 3rd, 4th and 5th toe web spaces Intertriginous erythrasma: in the armpits, groin, under the breasts and umbilicus Generalised /disciform erythrasma: on the trunk Wood's light fluorescence See more images of erythrasma .
epidemiology: Erythrasma affects males and females, but it is thought to be more common in the groin of males and between the toes of females. It is reported to be more prevalent in the following circumstances: Warm climate Excessive sweating Skin of colour Diabetes Obesity Poor hygiene Advanced age Other immunocompromised states.
prognosis: Erythrasma is usually self-limiting. It can be complicated by contact dermatitis , lichenification , postinflammatory pigmentation , and coinfection with other bacteria , yeasts , and dermatophytes . Serious complications are very rare. Corynebacteria have been reported to causes abscess , cellulitis , cutaneous granuloma , endocarditis , pyelonephritis, endophthalmitis, arteriovenous fistula infection and meningitis.
snippet_zh: 紅癬表現為輪廓分明的粉紅色或棕色斑塊，有細小的鱗屑和表面裂隙。可能會出現輕度瘙癢。紅癬的常見部位是腋窩、腹股溝和腳趾之間。臀間皺襞、乳房下和臍周皮膚也可能受到影響。廣泛感染
causes_zh: 引起紅癬的細菌是革蘭氏陽性、不形成孢子、需氧或兼性桿菌，稱為微小棒狀桿菌。紅癬可能與其他引起擦爛的原因共存或混淆，包括真菌感染，如癬或白色念珠菌（鵝口瘡）。
symptoms_zh: 紅癬表現為輪廓分明的粉紅色或棕色斑塊，有細小的鱗屑和表面裂隙。可能會出現輕度瘙癢。紅癬的常見部位是腋窩、腹股溝和腳趾之間。臀間皺襞、乳房下和臍周皮膚也可能受到影響。廣泛的感染通常與糖尿病有關。紅癬根據部位分為三種類型。指間紅癬：在第三、第四和第五趾蹼之間 間擦性紅癬：在腋窩、腹股溝、乳房下方和臍部 全身性/盤狀紅癬：在軀幹上 伍德氏光熒光 查看更多紅癬圖片。
epidemiology_zh: 紅癬影響男性和女性，但據認為在男性腹股溝和女性腳趾之間更常見。據報導，這種情況在以下情況下更為普遍： 氣候溫暖 出汗過多 皮膚有色 糖尿病 肥胖 衛生條件差 高齡 其他免疫功能低下的狀態。
prognosis_zh: 紅癬通常是自限性的。接觸性皮炎、苔蘚樣變、炎症後色素沉著以及與其他細菌、酵母菌和皮膚癬菌的合併感染可能使病情複雜化。嚴重並發症非常罕見。據報導，棒狀桿菌可引起膿腫、蜂窩織炎、皮膚肉芽腫、心內膜炎、腎盂腎炎、眼內炎、動靜脈瘺感染和腦膜炎。

title: Erythroderma
snippet: Erythroderma is often preceded by a morbilliform (measles-like) eruption , dermatitis , or plaque psoriasis . Generalised erythema can develop quite rapidly in acute erythroderma, or more gradually over weeks to months in chronic erythroderma.

symptoms: Erythroderma is often preceded by a morbilliform (measles-like) eruption , dermatitis , or plaque psoriasis . Generalised erythema can develop quite rapidly in acute erythroderma, or more gradually over weeks to months in chronic erythroderma.
epidemiology: Erythroderma is rare. It can arise at any age and in people of all races. It is about 3 times more common in males than in females. Most have a pre-existing skin disease or a systemic condition known to be associated with erythroderma. About 30% of cases of erythroderma are idiopathic. Erythrodermic atopic dermatitis most often affects children and young adults, but other forms of erythroderma are more common in middle-aged and elderly people. The most common skin conditions to cause erythroderma are: Drug eruption — with numerous diverse drugs implicated ( list of drugs ) Dermatitis especially atopic dermatitis Psoriasis , especially after the withdrawal of systemic steroids or other treatment [see Erythrodermic psoriasis ] Pityriasis rubra pilaris Other skin diseases that less frequently cause erythroderma may include: Other forms of dermatitis: contact dermatitis ( allergic or irritant ), stasis dermatitis ( venous eczema ) and in babies, seborrhoeic dermatitis or staphylococcal scalded skin syndrome Blistering diseases including pemphigus and bullous pemphigoid Sezary syndrome (the erythrodermic form of cutaneous T-cell lymphoma ) Several very rare congenital ichthyotic conditions. Erythroderma may also be a symptom or sign of systemic disease. These may include: Haematological malignancies, such as lymphoma and leukaemia Internal malignancies, such as carcinoma of rectum , lung, fallopian tubes, colon, prostate ( paraneoplastic erythroderma) Graft-versus-host disease HIV infection . It is not known why some skin diseases in some people progress to erythroderma. The pathogenesis is complicated, involving keratinocytes and lymphocytes , and their interaction with adhesion molecules and cytokines. The result is a dramatic increase in turnover of epidermal cells.
prognosis: Erythroderma often results in acute and chronic local and systemic complications. The patient is unwell with temperature dysregulation and losing a great deal of fluid by transpiration through the skin. Heat loss leads to hypothermia. Fluid loss leads to electrolyte abnormalities and dehydration. Red skin leads to high-output heart failure. A secondary skin infection may occur ( impetigo , cellulitis ). General unwellness can lead to pneumonia. Hypoalbuminaemia from protein loss and increased metabolic rate causes oedema. Longstanding erythroderma may result in pigmentary changes (brown and/or white skin patches).

symptoms_zh: 紅皮病之前通常會出現麻疹樣（麻疹樣）皮疹、皮炎或斑塊狀銀屑病。急性紅皮病的全身紅斑發展得相當快，而慢性紅皮病的全身紅斑則在數周至數月內逐漸發展。
epidemiology_zh: 紅皮病很少見。它可以出現在任何年齡和所有種族的人中。男性的發病率是女性的 3 倍左右。大多數人患有已知與紅皮病相關的皮膚病或全身性疾病。大約 30% 的紅皮病病例是特發性的。紅皮病特應性皮炎最常影響兒童和年輕人，但其他形式的紅皮病在中年和老年人中更常見。引起紅皮病的最常見皮膚病是： 藥疹 — 涉及多種不同藥物（藥物清單） 皮炎，尤其是特應性皮炎 牛皮癬，尤其是在停用全身類固醇或其他治療後 [參見紅皮病型銀屑病] 毛髮紅糠疹 其他不太常見引起紅皮病的皮膚病可能包括： 其他形式的皮炎：接觸性皮炎（過敏性或過敏性皮炎）刺激性）、瘀滯性皮炎（靜脈性濕疹）以及嬰兒的脂溢性皮炎或葡萄球菌燙傷皮膚綜合徵 水皰性疾病，包括天皰瘡和大皰性類天皰瘡 塞扎里綜合徵（皮膚 T 細胞淋巴瘤的紅皮病形式） 幾種非常罕見的先天性魚鱗病。紅皮病也可能是全身性疾病的症狀或體徵。這些可能包括： 血液惡性腫瘤，如淋巴瘤和白血病 內部惡性腫瘤，如直腸癌、肺癌、輸卵管癌、結腸癌、前列腺癌（副腫瘤性紅皮病） 移植物抗宿主病 HIV 感染。目前尚不清楚為什麼某些人的某些皮膚病會發展為紅皮病。發病機制複雜，涉及角質形成細胞和淋巴細胞，以及它們與粘附分子和細胞因子的相互作用。結果是表皮細胞的更新顯著增加。
prognosis_zh: 紅皮病常常導致急性和慢性局部和全身並發症。患者因溫度失調而感到不適，並且通過皮膚蒸騰而流失大量液體。熱量損失導致體溫過低。液體流失會導致電解質異常和脫水。紅色皮膚會導致高輸出量心力衰竭。可能會發生繼發性皮膚感染（膿皰病、蜂窩織炎）。全身不適可導致肺炎。蛋白質損失和代謝率增加導致的低白蛋白血症會導致水腫。長期存在的紅皮病可能會導致色素變化（棕色和/或白色皮膚斑塊）。

title: Exanthems
snippet: Non-specific exanthems appear as spots or blotches and may or may not be itchy. The rash is usually widespread and may be more extensive on the trunk than the extremities. In most cases, prior to the rash appearing, patients may have symptoms of general unwellness that include: Fever Malaise Headach
causes: Exanthems during childhood are very common and are usually due to specific viral infections : Chickenpox (varicella) Measles (morbillivirus) Rubella (rubella virus) Roseola (herpes virus 6B) Erythema infectiosum (parvovirus B19). Viral exanthems also include: Acute human immunodeficiency virus infection syndrome Smallpox Viral hepatitis Infectious mononucleosis and aminopenicillin rash ( Epstein-Barr virus ) Papular purpuric glove and socks syndrome (parvovirus B19) Pityriasis rosea (herpes virus 6 and 7) Papular acrodermatitis of childhood Erythema multiforme Laterothoracic exanthem Some cases of acute generalised exanthematous pustulosis Nonspecific viral exanthem. Exanthems caused by bacterial infections include: Staphylococcal toxin infections: Toxic shock syndrome (TSS) Staphylococcal scalded skin syndrome (SSSS). Streptococcal toxin infections: Scarlet fever Streptococcal toxic shock-like syndrome (STSS) . Other specific infections that can give rise to exanthems include: Mycoplasma pneumonia Rickettsial diseases . Exanthems may also be due to a drug (especially antibiotics and nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs ). See: Morbilliform drug eruption Drug hypersensitivity syndrome . Acute connective tissue diseases can present with an exanthem: Systemic lupus erythematosus Systemic-onset juvenile arthritis Adult-onset Still disease . Some exanthems are of unknown cause, for example, Kawasaki disease .
symptoms: Non-specific exanthems appear as spots or blotches and may or may not be itchy. The rash is usually widespread and may be more extensive on the trunk than the extremities. In most cases, prior to the rash appearing, patients may have symptoms of general unwellness that include: Fever Malaise Headache Loss of appetite Abdominal pain Irritability Muscular aches and pains. These signs and symptoms may vary depending on the cause of the exanthem. See individual causes for details. Viral exanthems often occur in small epidemics , so there may be other children effected at the same time.
snippet_zh: 非特異性皮疹表現為斑點或斑點，可能會或可能不會發癢。皮疹通常廣泛分佈，軀幹的皮疹可能比四肢更廣泛。在大多數情況下，在出現皮疹之前，患者可能會出現全身不適的症狀，包括： 發燒 不適 頭痛
causes_zh: 兒童時期的皮疹非常常見，通常是由於特定的病毒感染引起的：水痘（水痘）、麻疹（麻疹病毒）、風疹（風疹病毒）、玫瑰疹（皰疹病毒 6B）、傳染性紅斑（細小病毒 B19）。病毒性皮疹還包括： 急性人類免疫缺陷病毒感染綜合徵 天花 病毒性肝炎 傳染性單核細胞增多症和氨基青黴素皮疹（EB 病毒） 丘疹性紫癜 手套和襪子綜合徵（細小病毒 B19） 玫瑰糠疹（皰疹病毒 6 和 7） 兒童丘疹性肢端皮炎 多形性紅斑 胸外側皮炎 某些急性全身性皮疹病例發疹性膿皰病 非特異性病毒性皮疹。細菌感染引起的皮疹包括： 葡萄球菌毒素感染：中毒性休克綜合徵 (TSS) 葡萄球菌燙傷皮膚綜合徵 (SSSS)。鏈球菌毒素感染：猩紅熱鏈球菌中毒性休克樣綜合徵（STSS）。其他可能引起皮疹的特定感染包括： 肺炎支原體 立克次體疾病。蕁麻疹也可能是由藥物引起的（特別是抗生素和非甾體類抗炎藥）。參見：麻疹樣藥疹藥物過敏綜合徵。急性結締組織疾病可伴有皮疹： 系統性紅斑狼瘡 全身性幼年關節炎 成人斯蒂爾病。有些皮疹的原因不明，例如川崎病。
symptoms_zh: 非特異性皮疹表現為斑點或斑點，可能會或可能不會發癢。皮疹通常廣泛分佈，軀幹的皮疹可能比四肢更廣泛。在大多數情況下，在出現皮疹之前，患者可能會出現全身不適的症狀，包括： 發燒 不適 頭痛 食慾不振 腹痛 煩躁 肌肉酸痛。這些體徵和症狀可能因出疹原因而異。詳細信息請參閱個別原因。病毒性皮疹通常發生在小規模流行病中，因此可能有其他兒童同時受到影響。

title: Facial rashes
snippet: Facial rashes refer to a broad range of conditions that cause redness, bumps, scaling, or irritation on the face, commonly triggered by dermatitis, infection, allergies, or inflammatory skin diseases.
causes: Facial rashes can arise from dermatitis (eczema, contact allergy, irritants), infections, inflammatory conditions such as acne or rosacea, autoimmune disorders, environmental triggers, or topical products that disrupt the skin barrier.
symptoms: Typical features include facial redness, bumps, patches, scaling, dryness, itching, or burning. Distribution and appearance vary depending on the underlying condition.
epidemiology: Facial rashes occur across all age groups and skin types. Common in individuals with sensitive skin, atopic tendency, or exposure to irritants.
prognosis: Most facial rashes improve with removal of triggers and appropriate treatment. Chronic inflammatory conditions may require long-term management.
snippet_zh: 面部皮疹包含多種會在臉部引起泛紅、丘疹、乾屑或刺激感的皮膚狀況，常由濕疹、感染、過敏或發炎性皮膚病引起。
causes_zh: 面部皮疹的原因包括濕疹（異位性皮膚炎、接觸性皮炎）、感染、痤瘡或酒糟等發炎性疾病、自體免疫疾病、環境刺激或影響皮膚屏障的外用產品。
symptoms_zh: 常見表現有臉部泛紅、丘疹、斑塊、乾屑、乾燥、瘙癢或灼熱感。不同疾病的分布與型態可能差異很大。
epidemiology_zh: 面部皮疹可發生於所有年齡層與膚質，於敏感肌、易過敏體質或經常接觸刺激物者更常見。
prognosis_zh: 多數面部皮疹在找出誘因並接受適當治療後可改善；若屬慢性發炎性疾病，可能需要長期管理。

title: Female pattern hair loss
snippet: Female pattern hair loss (FPHL) presents as progressive thinning over the central scalp with preservation of the frontal hairline, driven mainly by genetic predisposition and hormonal influences.
causes: FPHL has a strong polygenic inheritance pattern, with susceptibility genes potentially inherited from either parent. Androgen levels are usually normal, and the exact role of androgens remains uncertain compared to male pattern baldness. Estrogen influence is unclear; FPHL becomes more common after menopause, suggesting a possible growth-promoting role before menopause.
symptoms: FPHL typically causes gradual thinning over the crown and mid-scalp with preservation of the frontal hairline. Hair shafts become thinner (miniaturisation), and part lines widen. Shedding may or may not be present. The condition is chronic and progresses slowly over years.
epidemiology: FPHL affects up to 40% of women by age 50 and becomes increasingly common after menopause. It can occur in adolescents but is far more frequent in adult and peri-menopausal women.
prognosis: FPHL is chronic and progressive but treatable. Regrowth is partial; the goal of therapy is stabilisation and cosmetic improvement. Earlier treatment gives better outcomes.
snippet_zh: 女性型脫髮（FPHL）表現為中央頭皮逐漸變稀，前額髮際線多數保留，主要受遺傳與荷爾蒙影響。
causes_zh: FPHL 具有強烈的多基因遺傳特性，易感基因可從任一父母遺傳。大多數患者的雄激素水平正常，其在女性脫髮中的作用仍不明確。雌激素的影響也不確定，但 FPHL 在更年期後更常見，可能反映雌激素對毛髮的刺激作用減弱。
symptoms_zh: 典型表現為頭頂與中央分線逐漸稀疏，髮絲變細（微小化），分線變寬，而前額髮際線多保持完整。掉髮量可多可少。病程緩慢、呈慢性進展。
epidemiology_zh: 約 40% 女性在 50 歲前出現 FPHL，更年期後更常見。雖可見於青少年，但主要發生於成人與更年期女性。
prognosis_zh: FPHL 為慢性且持續進展，但可透過治療改善。多數為部分再生，治療目標是減緩惡化、提升外觀。越早治療效果越好。

title: Fixed drug eruption
snippet: Fixed drug eruption can be categorised by clinical morphology. The most common form is the localised pigmenting type; other presentations include bullous (localised or generalised ), mucosal , non-pigmenting, or generalised. Fixed drug eruption typically presents as a single (or small number of) wel
causes: Fixed drug eruption is a delayed type IV hypersensitivity reaction. In the initial phase memory CD8+ T-cells at the dermo- epidermal junction release interferon-gamma when activated by the medication antigen causing epidermal basal layer damage. Recruited T-cells and neutrophils damage melanocytes and keratinocytes. During the resolution phase, dermal macrophages collect the melanin resulting in the typical post- inflammatory hyperpigmentation. Regenerating basal keratinocytes release interleukin -15 leading to the formation of resident memory CD8+ T-cells which remain quiescent but in a primed state ready to respond to the chemical antigen again. Fixed drug eruption is usually due to oral medications, with antimicrobials and non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAID) being the most common culprits. Less common drug exposures may be topical or intravaginal. Fixed food eruptions may be due to antibiotics, flavouring or colouring agents, or preservatives in the food . Herbal supplements and caffeine have also been implicated. For a more detailed list, see the Appendix at the end.
symptoms: Fixed drug eruption can be categorised by clinical morphology. The most common form is the localised pigmenting type; other presentations include bullous (localised or generalised ), mucosal , non-pigmenting, or generalised. Fixed drug eruption typically presents as a single (or small number of) well-defined , round or oval red or violaceous patch or plaque which may blister or ulcerate. It is usually asymptomatic but can be itchy or painful. Over the next few days and weeks, the surface may become scaly or crusted before peeling, and the colour fades to leave brown post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation. Post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation tends to be more prominent in skin of colour. In contrast to many other drug eruptions, the patient remains systemically well. The hands and feet, eyelids, and anogenital areas are common sites. Lesions in the oral mucosa are usually found on the lips, tongue and hard palate. A fixed drug eruption may occur at the same location as previous skin trauma such as a burn, insect bite, or venepuncture. On the first occasion, the eruption may develop after weeks to years of regular ingestion of the drug, but subsequent episodes develop within minutes to hours of recommencing the implicated drug. A patch of fixed drug eruption shows a refractory period during which it will not flare even with re-exposure. With subsequent episodes, the original patch may enlarge and more patches may appear. The post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation darkens with each recurrence.
prognosis: Blisters and erosions Post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation Recurrence Cross-reaction with other medications Generalised bullous fixed drug eruption can be complicated by fluid loss, electrolyte imbalance, and secondary infection.
snippet_zh: 固定性藥疹可根據臨床形態進行分類。最常見的形式是局部色素沉著型；其他表現包括大皰性（局部或全身性）、粘膜性、非色素性或全身性。固定性藥疹通常表現為單個（或少量）腫塊
causes_zh: 固定性藥疹是一種遲髮型IV型超敏反應。在初始階段，真皮-表皮交界處的記憶 CD8+ T 細胞在被藥物抗原激活時釋放乾擾素-γ，導致表皮基底層損傷。招募的 T 細胞和中性粒細胞會損害黑素細胞和角質形成細胞。在消退階段，真皮巨噬細胞收集黑色素，導致典型的炎症後色素沉著過度。再生的基底角質形成細胞釋放白細胞介素-15，導致形成常駐記憶CD8+ T細胞，這些細胞保持靜止狀態，但處於準備狀態，準備再次對化學抗原做出反應。固定性藥疹通常是由口服藥物引起的，其中抗菌藥物和非甾體抗炎藥 (NSAID) 是最常見的罪魁禍首。不太常見的藥物暴露可能是局部或陰道內的。固定的食物噴發可能是由於食物中的抗生素、調味劑或著色劑或防腐劑造成的。草藥補充劑和咖啡因也與此有關。更詳細的列表請參見最後的附錄。
symptoms_zh: 固定性藥疹可根據臨床形態進行分類。最常見的形式是局部色素沉著型；其他表現包括大皰性（局部或全身性）、粘膜性、非色素性或全身性。固定性藥疹通常表現為單個（或少量）邊界清楚的圓形或橢圓形紅色或紫羅蘭色斑塊或斑塊，可能會起水泡或潰瘍。它通常無症狀，但可能會發癢或疼痛。在接下來的幾天和幾週內，表面可能會在脫皮前變得鱗狀或結痂，並且顏色會褪去，留下棕色的炎症後色素沉著過度。炎症後色素沉著在有色皮膚中往往更為突出。與許多其他藥疹相比，患者全身狀況良好。手腳、眼瞼和肛門生殖器區域是常見部位。口腔粘膜病變通常出現在嘴唇、舌頭和硬腭上。固定性藥疹可能發生在與先前皮膚創傷（例如燒傷、昆蟲叮咬或靜脈穿刺）相同的位置。第一次，定期服用藥物數周至數年後可能會出現皮疹，但隨後的發作會在重新開始服用相關藥物後數分鐘至數小時內發生。一塊固定性藥疹顯示出一個不應期，在此期間即使再次暴露也不會發作。在後續劇集中，原始補丁可能會擴大並且可能會出現更多補丁。炎症後色素沉著隨著每次復發而加深。
prognosis_zh: 水皰和糜爛 炎症後色素沉著過度 復發 與其他藥物的交叉反應 全身性大皰性固定性藥疹可能因液體流失、電解質失衡和繼發感染而並發。

title: Folliculitis
snippet: Folliculitis is inflammation of the hair follicles, most commonly presenting as small red or pustular bumps caused by infection, irritation, or occlusion.
causes: Folliculitis may arise from bacterial infection (most commonly Staphylococcus aureus), yeast such as Malassezia, fungal infection, viral infection, friction, shaving irritation, sweat/occlusion, ingrown hairs, or inflammatory skin diseases including acne and dermatitis.
symptoms: Typical symptoms include red papules, pustules, or tender bumps centered on hair follicles. Lesions may itch or burn. They are commonly found on the scalp, beard area, chest, back, buttocks, and thighs. Severe cases may form boils or deeper nodules.
epidemiology: Folliculitis is extremely common and can occur in all ages. Risk is increased in individuals who shave frequently, sweat excessively, wear tight clothing, use occlusive products, are immunocompromised, or have underlying dermatitis.
prognosis: Most cases resolve with removal of triggers or appropriate antimicrobial therapy. Recurrent or chronic folliculitis may require long-term management, especially if related to shaving, occlusion, or yeast overgrowth.
snippet_zh: 毛囊炎是毛囊的發炎，常表現為紅色或膿頭小丘疹，通常由感染、刺激或堵塞引起。
causes_zh: 毛囊炎的原因包括細菌感染（最常見為金黃色葡萄球菌）、酵母菌如馬拉色菌、真菌感染、病毒感染、摩擦、刮毛刺激、流汗/悶熱、毛髮倒插，或與痤瘡、皮膚炎等發炎性皮膚病相關。
symptoms_zh: 典型症狀為紅色丘疹、膿疱或觸痛的小結節，中心多為毛囊位置。可能伴隨搔癢或灼熱感。常見部位包括頭皮、鬍鬚區、胸、背、臀部與大腿。較嚴重時可形成癤或較深的硬塊。
epidemiology_zh: 毛囊炎非常常見，可發生於所有年齡層。風險因子包括常刮毛、易出汗、穿緊身衣物、使用悶塞性產品、免疫力低下或原本有皮膚炎。
prognosis_zh: 大多數毛囊炎去除誘因或經適當治療後可痊癒。反覆或慢性毛囊炎可能需要長期管理，尤其是與刮毛、悶熱或酵母菌相關的類型。

title: Folliculitis barbae
snippet: Itchy, tender, papulopustular eruption surrounding hair follicles in hair-bearing skin areas (such as the beard-line, neck, axilla , and groin) Frequently arises after shaving Lesions may discharge pus or serous fluid If the colonization of S. aureus seeds deeper in the skin, it may induce sycosis b
causes: Folliculitis barbae is most often due to Staphylococcus aureus ( S. aureus ) colonization of more superficial portions of the hair follicle (for example, the infundibulum ) and skin surface. However, cases of herpes simplex and candida folliculitis barbae (folliculitis barbae candidomycetica) have been reported. Reinfection by S. aureus after successful treatment may suggest persistent colonization of S. aureus within the nasal cavity or on previously used shaving equipment, such as razors.
symptoms: Itchy, tender, papulopustular eruption surrounding hair follicles in hair-bearing skin areas (such as the beard-line, neck, axilla , and groin) Frequently arises after shaving Lesions may discharge pus or serous fluid If the colonization of S. aureus seeds deeper in the skin, it may induce sycosis barbae, which presents as persistent sinus tracts, abscesses , and inflammation deep between hair follicles.
epidemiology: Folliculitis barbae most commonly affects recently shaved hair-bearing areas in men (such as the beard-line) of lighter skin types. Folliculitis may also develop after laser hair removal. However, it may also present in individuals who do not shave. Cases of folliculitis barbae may occur secondary to viral, mycologic, or eosinophilic causes, and may be seen in competitive athletes and immunosuppressed persons.
prognosis: Postinflammatory hyperpigmentation Scarring, hypertrophic scarring, and keloid formation Possible hair loss Sycosis barbae
snippet_zh: 有毛髮的皮膚區域（如鬍鬚線、頸部、腋窩和腹股溝）的毛囊周圍出現瘙癢、觸痛、丘疹膿皰性皮疹。 剃須後經常出現。 病變可能會排出膿液或漿液。 如果金黃色葡萄球菌種子在皮膚深處定植，可能會誘發昏厥。
causes_zh: 須部毛囊炎最常見的原因是金黃色葡萄球菌 (S. aureus) 定植於毛囊較淺的部分（例如漏斗部）和皮膚表面。然而，已有單純皰疹和須部念珠菌毛囊炎（須部毛囊炎念珠菌）病例的報導。成功治療後金黃色葡萄球菌的再次感染可能表明金黃色葡萄球菌在鼻腔內或以前使用的剃須設備（例如剃刀）上持續定植。
symptoms_zh: 有毛髮的皮膚區域（如鬍鬚線、頸部、腋窩、腹股溝）毛囊周圍發癢、觸痛、丘疹膿皰性皮疹，多在剃須後出現，病變可排出膿液或漿液，若金黃色葡萄球菌種子定植於皮膚較深處，可誘發須部膿腫，表現為持續存在的竇道、膿腫和毛囊深處的炎症。
epidemiology_zh: 須部毛囊炎最常影響淺色皮膚類型男性最近剃毛的毛髮區域（例如鬍鬚線）。激光脫毛後也可能出現毛囊炎。然而，它也可能出現在不刮鬍子的人身上。須部毛囊炎病例可能繼發於病毒、真菌或嗜酸性粒細胞原因，並且可能見於競技運動員和免疫抑制者。
prognosis_zh: 炎症後色素沉著過度 疤痕、增生性疤痕和疤痕疙瘩形成 可能脫髮 須部缺損

title: Folliculitis decalvans
snippet: Folliculitis decalvans typically affects the scalp, often around the crown, but may affect the beard area, axillae , limbs, and pubic hair. The characteristic clinical features include: Irregular, atrophic white patches of scarring and hair loss — solitary or multiple Induration of the scalp Follicu
causes: Folliculitis decalvans is considered to be the result of an abnormal immune response to Staphylococcus aureus , although this is not yet proven.
symptoms: Folliculitis decalvans typically affects the scalp, often around the crown, but may affect the beard area, axillae , limbs, and pubic hair. The characteristic clinical features include: Irregular, atrophic white patches of scarring and hair loss — solitary or multiple Induration of the scalp Follicular pustules and perifollicular crusts at the patch periphery Follicular hyperkeratosis , scale , and erosions Tufting — multiple hair shafts emerge from a single hair follicle , resulting in a ‘doll’s hair’ appearance Mild itch, discomfort, or pain. Perifollicular crusting and scale Tufted hairs and perifollicular crusting Tufted hairs and perifollicular erythema
epidemiology: Folliculitis decalvans usually presents in the 4 th and 5 th decades, with a male predominance. Children are not affected. There are probably no racial differences in prevalence , although it has been claimed to be more common in African-American women. Familial cases have been rarely reported.
prognosis: Permanent progressive hair loss Psychological effects of hair loss Squamous cell carcinoma
snippet_zh: 脫髮性毛囊炎通常影響頭皮，通常在頭頂周圍，但也可能影響鬍鬚區域、腋窩、四肢和陰毛。典型的臨床特徵包括： 不規則、萎縮性白色疤痕斑塊和脫髮——單發或多發 頭皮毛囊硬結
causes_zh: 脫髮性毛囊炎被認為是對金黃色葡萄球菌免疫反應異常的結果，儘管這一點尚未得到證實。
symptoms_zh: 脫髮性毛囊炎通常影響頭皮，通常在頭頂周圍，但也可能影響鬍鬚區域、腋窩、四肢和陰毛。典型的臨床特徵包括： 不規則、萎縮性白色疤痕和脫髮——單發或多發 頭皮硬結 毛囊膿皰和毛囊周圍結痂 毛囊角化過度、鱗屑和糜爛 簇生——單個毛囊中長出多個毛幹，導致“娃娃頭髮”外觀 輕度瘙癢、不適或疼痛。毛囊周圍結痂和鱗屑 簇毛和毛囊周圍結痂 簇毛和毛囊周圍紅斑
epidemiology_zh: 脫髮性毛囊炎通常出現在四、五歲，男性多見。兒童不受影響。儘管據稱該病在非裔美國女性中更為常見，但患病率可能不存在種族差異。家族性病例很少有報導。
prognosis_zh: 永久性進行性脫髮 脫髮的心理影響 鱗狀細胞癌

title: Food additives and E numbers
snippet: Food additives and E numbers are substances added to foods to enhance flavour, colour, preservation, or texture. Some additives can trigger intolerance, urticaria, or eczema-like reactions in susceptible individuals.
causes: Food additives—including preservatives, colourings, antioxidants, flavour enhancers, and thickeners—may provoke hypersensitivity reactions. Common triggers include sulphites, benzoates, tartrazine, and certain natural colourants. These reactions are usually non–IgE mediated intolerances, but true allergic reactions can occasionally occur.
symptoms: Symptoms of additive-related reactions may include flushing, itching, hives, angioedema, eczema flares, asthma exacerbation, and nonspecific skin irritation. Symptoms often occur shortly after consumption and may be dose-dependent. Some individuals experience delayed eczematous reactions rather than immediate hives.
epidemiology: Reactions to food additives are relatively uncommon, affecting a small percentage of adults and children. Asthmatic patients, individuals with chronic urticaria, and those with atopic dermatitis may have higher sensitivity to certain additives such as sulphites.
prognosis: Avoidance of specific triggering additives usually leads to complete symptom resolution. Severe reactions are rare. Identifying the culprit often requires food diaries, supervised challenge testing, or elimination diets. Long-term outlook is excellent once triggers are avoided.
title_zh: 食品添加劑與 E 編號
snippet_zh: 食品添加劑與 E 編號是為了增強風味、色澤、保存或質地而添加於食品中的物質。部分添加劑可能在敏感族群中引發不耐、蕁麻疹或類濕疹反應。
causes_zh: 食品添加劑（如防腐劑、色素、抗氧化劑、增味劑、增稠劑）有時會引發過敏或非過敏性不耐反應。常見誘因包括亞硫酸鹽、苯甲酸鹽、塔黃素（Tartrazine）、某些天然色素。多數屬於非 IgE 型不耐，但偶爾也會出現真正的過敏反應。
symptoms_zh: 可能的症狀包括潮紅、瘙癢、蕁麻疹、血管性水腫、濕疹惡化、氣喘加劇或一般性皮膚刺激。症狀常在攝取後不久出現，且可能與劑量相關。有些人則會出現延遲性的濕疹型反應，而非立即性紅疹。
epidemiology_zh: 食品添加劑相關反應相對少見，只影響少部分成人與兒童。氣喘患者、慢性蕁麻疹患者以及異位性皮膚炎患者對特定添加劑如亞硫酸鹽較敏感。
prognosis_zh: 避免特定誘發的添加劑後通常可完全改善。嚴重反應十分罕見。找出誘因通常需依靠飲食紀錄、排除飲食或專業監督下的食物挑戰試驗。只要避免誘因，長期預後極佳。

title: Fungal nail infections
snippet: Onychomycosis may affect a single nail or multiple, commonly affecting the first toenail. It may also affect the surrounding skin, however, very rarely causes systemic involvement. Clinical types include: Distal and lateral subungual onychomycosis — the distal end and sides of the nail lift or becom
causes: Onychomycosis can be due to infection with dermatophytes or non-dermatophytes such as moulds and yeasts. Dermatophytes (over 75% of cases): Trichophyton rubrum , Epidermophyton floccosum , Microsporum species, Trichophyton verrucosum , Trichophyton tonsurans , Trichophyton violaceum , Trichophyton soudanense , Trichophyton krajdenii , Trichophyton equinum , and Arthoderma species. Non-dermatophyte Moulds (10% of cases): Aspergillus species, Scopulariopsis species, Fusarium species, Acremonium species, Syncephalastrum species, Scytalidium species, Paecilomyces species, Neoscytalidium species, Chaetomium species, Onchocola species, and Alternaria species. Yeasts (uncommon): Candida albicans , and rarely non-albicans candida yeasts (eg, tropicalis, or parapsilosis) For more information, see non-dermatophyte mould onychomycosis . Emerging evidence of the role of biofilm in fungal nail disease may account for antifungal drug resistance and increased virulence.
symptoms: Onychomycosis may affect a single nail or multiple, commonly affecting the first toenail. It may also affect the surrounding skin, however, very rarely causes systemic involvement. Clinical types include: Distal and lateral subungual onychomycosis — the distal end and sides of the nail lift or become discoloured and crumble. Superficial white onychomycosis — flaky, white patches and pits appear on the top of the nail plate. Proximal subungual onychomycosis — the proximal nail plate close to the lunula becomes discoloured and thickened. This pattern of disease is often related to underlying HIV infection . Endonyx onychomycosis — milky white discolouration of the nail plate develops without subungual hyperkeratosis or onycholysis. Onychauxis . Features that are observed include: Subungual hyperkeratosis — scaling occurs under the nail Jagged and crumbling of the free end of the nail plate Discolouration of the nail, eg, yellow, white, grey, or green discolouration Ridging, crumbling, and sometimes eventual complete nail plate destruction Scaling on the plantar skin and web spaces due to associated tinea pedis Onychoma or dermatophytoma — a thick localised area of infection in the nail plate. Onychomycosis may complicate other nail pathology such as trauma or psoriasis . Candida infection of the nail plate generally results from paronychia and starts near the nail fold (the cuticle ). The nail fold is swollen and red, lifted off the nail plate. White, yellow, green, or black marks appear on the nearby nail and spread. The nail may lift off its bed and is tender if you press on it. Mould infections are similar in appearance to tinea unguium. Click here for images
epidemiology: Onychomycosis is common in older aged adults (over 65 years), diabetics, immunocompromised patients (especially those with HIV disease ), and athletes. Onychomycosis may be present amongst family members due to autosomal inheritance ( HLA -DR8) or environmental factors. It rarely occurs in children. Other associated comorbidities include: tinea pedis , tinea manuum , psoriasis , peripheral vascular disease, venous insufficiency , hallux valgus, smoking, asymmetric gait nail unit syndrome , Down syndrome , and obesity. Predisposing patient factors include: chronic paronychia , hyperhidrosis (eg, with occlusive footwear), nail trauma , and using communal bathing or changing facilities.
prognosis: Fungal nail infections are often regarded as a trivial cosmetic problem. However, the effect it may have on one’s quality of life is undervalued as it can cause significant pain affecting full mobility and activities, and social stigma.
snippet_zh: 甲真菌病可能影響單個或多個指甲，通常影響第一個腳趾甲。它也可能影響周圍皮膚，但很少引起全身性受累。臨床類型包括： 遠端和側面甲下甲真菌病 — 指甲的遠端和側面翹起或變薄
causes_zh: 甲真菌病可能是由於皮膚癬菌或非皮膚癬菌（例如黴菌和酵母菌）感染所致。皮膚癬菌（超過 75% 的病例）：紅色毛癬菌、絮狀表皮癬菌、小孢子菌屬、疣狀毛癬菌、斷發毛癬菌、紫羅蘭毛癬菌、蘇丹毛癬菌、克拉吉登毛癬菌、馬毛癬菌和節皮癬菌屬。非皮膚癬菌黴菌（佔病例的 10%）：曲霉屬、帚黴屬、鐮刀菌屬、頂孢黴屬、合頭孢黴屬、柱囊黴屬、擬青黴屬、新囊黴屬、毛殼屬、盤孢黴屬和鍊格孢屬。酵母菌（不常見）：白色念珠菌，以及罕見的非白色念珠菌酵母（例如熱帶念珠菌或近平滑念珠菌）。有關更多信息，請參閱非皮膚癬菌黴菌性甲癬。生物膜在指甲真菌病中的作用的新證據可能是抗真菌藥物耐藥性和毒力增加的原因。
symptoms_zh: 甲真菌病可能影響單個或多個指甲，通常影響第一個腳趾甲。它也可能影響周圍皮膚，但很少引起全身性受累。臨床類型包括： 遠端和側面甲下甲真菌病 — 指甲的遠端和側面抬起或變色和碎裂。淺表白色甲癬——指甲板頂部出現片狀白色斑塊和凹坑。近端甲下甲真菌病 — 靠近月牙的近端指甲板變色並增厚。這種疾病模式通常與潛在的艾滋病毒感染有關。內甲真菌病 — 甲板出現乳白色變色，但沒有甲下角化過度或甲剝離。甲癬。觀察到的特徵包括： 甲下角化過度 — 指甲下出現鱗屑 指甲板自由端出現鋸齒狀和破碎 指甲變色，例如黃色、白色、灰色或綠色變色 指甲板起皺、破碎，有時甚至完全毀壞 因相關足癬而導致足底皮膚和蹼間隙脫屑 甲癬或皮膚癬菌瘤 — 甲板上較厚的局部感染區域。甲真菌病可能會使其他指甲病變複雜化，例如外傷或牛皮癬。指甲板的念珠菌感染通常由甲溝炎引起，並開始於甲襞（角質層）附近。甲襞腫脹、發紅，從甲板上脫落。附近的指甲上出現白色、黃色、綠色或黑色的痕跡並擴散。如果你按壓指甲，指甲可能會脫離指甲床，並且會變軟。黴菌感染的外觀與甲癬相似。單擊此處查看圖像
epidemiology_zh: 甲真菌病常見於老年人（65 歲以上）、糖尿病患者、免疫功能低下患者（尤其是艾滋病毒感染者）和運動員。由於常染色體遺傳 (HLA -DR8) 或環境因素，甲癬可能出現在家庭成員中。它很少發生在兒童身上。其他相關合併症包括：足癬、手癬、牛皮癬、周圍血管疾病、靜脈功能不全、拇外翻、吸煙、不對稱步態指甲單位綜合症、唐氏綜合症和肥胖。誘發患者的因素包括：慢性甲溝炎、多汗症（例如，穿著封閉性鞋）、指甲外傷以及使用公共浴室或更衣設施。
prognosis_zh: 指甲真菌感染通常被認為是一個微不足道的美容問題。然而，它對一個人的生活質量可能產生的影響卻被低估了，因為它可能會導致嚴重的疼痛，影響充分的活動能力和社會恥辱。

title: Fungal skin infections
snippet: Fungal skin infections include dermatophyte (tinea) infections, yeast infections, and mould-related skin diseases. They commonly present with redness, scaling, itching, and ring-shaped lesions depending on the organism involved.
causes: Fungal skin infections are caused by dermatophytes (such as Trichophyton, Microsporum, Epidermophyton), yeasts (most commonly Candida and Malassezia), and less often environmental moulds. Transmission occurs through direct skin contact, contaminated surfaces, shared personal items, animals, or soil exposure. Warm, moist environments and skin barrier damage increase susceptibility.
symptoms: Typical symptoms include red, scaly patches, ring-shaped plaques, itching, fissures, pustules, and maceration in moist areas. Distribution varies by type: tinea corporis causes ring-shaped lesions on the body; tinea pedis affects feet; tinea cruris affects groin; Candida causes moist, red, macerated plaques; Malassezia can cause hypopigmented or hyperpigmented patches.
epidemiology: Fungal infections are very common worldwide. Dermatophytes affect individuals of all ages, with increased prevalence in humid climates. Candida infections are more common in infants, diabetics, and immunocompromised individuals. Malassezia infections occur more frequently in adolescents and adults due to sebaceous activity.
prognosis: Most fungal infections respond well to topical or systemic antifungal treatment. Recurrence is common if predisposing factors—moisture, occlusion, immunosuppression, or untreated household contacts—are not addressed. Spread to nails or chronic skin involvement may require prolonged therapy.
snippet_zh: 皮膚真菌感染包含皮癬菌（癬）、酵母菌（如念珠菌）、以及部分黴菌引起的疾病。典型症狀包括紅、癢、脫屑、環狀皮損，依病原不同而異。
causes_zh: 皮膚真菌感染由皮癬菌（如毛癬菌、小孢子菌、表皮癬菌）、酵母菌（最常見為念珠菌、馬拉色菌）或環境黴菌引起。傳染途徑包括皮膚接觸、受污染的物品、共用衛生用具、動物接觸或土壤暴露。潮濕環境、皮膚屏障受損及免疫力下降會提高感染風險。
symptoms_zh: 常見症狀包括紅斑、脫屑、瘙癢、環狀斑塊、糜爛、膿皰或潮濕部位的浸軟。分布依類型不同：體癬呈現環狀皮損，足癬多見於足部，股癬在腹股溝，念珠菌造成紅且潮濕的糜爛性斑塊，馬拉色菌可造成色素減退或加深的斑塊。
epidemiology_zh: 皮膚真菌感染在全球非常常見。皮癬菌感染可見於各年齡層，在潮濕地區更普遍。念珠菌感染在嬰兒、糖尿病患者與免疫低下者更常見。馬拉色菌感染多發生於青春期與成年人，與皮脂活性相關。
prognosis_zh: 大多數真菌感染對外用或口服抗真菌藥物反應良好。但若潮濕環境、免疫問題或接觸來源未改善，容易復發。若波及指甲或形成慢性皮膚變化，可能需要較長期治療。

title: Generalised pustular psoriasis
snippet: The varying clinical presentation of GPP between differing skin types is not well documented, mainly due to the rarity of the disease. Erythema can be under-recognised in skin of colour, and therefore the severity of inflammation can be underestimated.
causes: The exact pathogenic mechanisms are not fully established. However, GPP is associated with a combination of genetic and environmental risk factors.
symptoms: The varying clinical presentation of GPP between differing skin types is not well documented, mainly due to the rarity of the disease. Erythema can be under-recognised in skin of colour, and therefore the severity of inflammation can be underestimated.
epidemiology: GPP can appear in any age group, although is most common in adults between 40–50 years old and is unusual in children. The age of onset is often earlier in patients with a family history of psoriasis, or with a homozygous interleukin 36 (IL-36) receptor antagonist (IL36RN) gene mutation. Females are generally more likely to be affected, although, for paediatric onset between 3–16 years of age, a male predominance has been reported. GPP can also affect pregnant women, which is termed impetigo herpetiformis , and is associated with increased maternal and fetal morbidity. Although GPP is distinct from plaque psoriasis , the two conditions are strongly associated with one another, making concurrent or previous plaque psoriasis a significant risk factor for developing GPP.
prognosis: Complications of acute skin failure include: Bacteraemia / septicaemia Fluid loss with hypovolaemia Impaired thermoregulatory control Metabolic disturbance. Other potential complications of GPP: Peripheral neuropathy Enteropathy Malabsorption of nutrients and medications Disturbed protein and electrolyte balance Renal impairment Acute respiratory distress syndrome Pancreatitis Neutrophilic cholangitis leading to cholestasis Cardiac failure. Such complications can be fatal. Death can result from cardiorespiratory failure during the acute eruptive phase of generalised pustular psoriasis, so it is essential to treat it as early as possible. Older patients are at particularly high risk. Maternal GPP can result in foetal abnormalities, preterm birth, placental insufficiency, and neonatal death.
snippet_zh: 不同皮膚類型之間 GPP 的不同臨床表現尚未得到充分記錄，這主要是由於該疾病的罕見性。有色皮膚中的紅斑可能被低估，因此炎症的嚴重程度可能被低估。
causes_zh: 確切的致病機制尚未完全確定。然而，GPP 與遺傳和環境風險因素相結合。
symptoms_zh: 不同皮膚類型之間 GPP 的不同臨床表現尚未得到充分記錄，這主要是由於該疾病的罕見性。有色皮膚中的紅斑可能被低估，因此炎症的嚴重程度可能被低估。
epidemiology_zh: GPP 可出現在任何年齡組，但最常見於 40-50 歲之間的成年人，在兒童中不常見。有銀屑病家族史或具有純合白細胞介素 36 (IL-36) 受體拮抗劑 (IL36RN) 基因突變的患者的發病年齡通常較早。女性通常更容易受到影響，但據報導，3-16 歲之間的兒童發病以男性為主。GPP 還會影響孕婦，稱為皰疹樣膿皰病，與孕產婦和胎兒發病率增加有關。儘管 GPP 與斑塊狀銀屑病不同，但這兩種情況彼此密切相關，使得併發或既往斑塊狀銀屑病成為發生 GPP 的重要危險因素。
prognosis_zh: 急性皮膚衰竭的並發症包括： 菌血症/敗血症 體液流失伴低血容量 體溫調節控制受損 代謝紊亂。GPP 的其他潛在並發症： 周圍神經病 腸病 營養物質和藥物吸收不良 蛋白質和電解質平衡紊亂 腎功能損害 急性呼吸窘迫綜合徵 胰腺炎 中性粒細胞性膽管炎導致膽汁淤積 心力衰竭。這些並發症可能是致命的。全身性膿皰型銀屑病急性發疹期可能因心肺衰竭而導致死亡，因此必須儘早治療。老年患者的風險尤其高。母體 GPP 可導致胎兒畸形、早產、胎盤功能不全和新生兒死亡。

title: Genital herpes
snippet: Genital herpes is a sexually transmitted infection caused by herpes simplex virus (HSV-1 or HSV-2), presenting with recurrent clusters of painful blisters or ulcers on the genital or perianal skin. Many infected individuals are asymptomatic or experience very mild symptoms.
causes: Genital herpes is caused by infection with herpes simplex virus type 1 (HSV-1) or type 2 (HSV-2). HSV-2 is the classic cause of anogenital infection, while HSV-1 increasingly causes genital disease due to oral-genital contact. After the primary infection, the virus becomes latent in dorsal root ganglia and may reactivate, causing recurrent outbreaks. Transmission occurs through direct skin or mucosal contact during viral shedding, including periods without visible lesions.
symptoms: Symptoms range from asymptomatic to severe. Typical primary infection includes clusters of painful vesicles, erosions, or ulcers on the genital skin, dysuria, fever, swollen lymph nodes, and malaise. Recurrent episodes tend to be milder and shorter. Some patients experience prodromal burning, tingling, or nerve pain before lesions appear.
epidemiology: Up to 20% of adults have evidence of HSV-2 infection. Many individuals have unrecognized or subclinical disease. HSV-1 genital infections are increasingly common, especially in younger populations.
prognosis: Genital herpes is chronic and incurable but manageable. Complications include urethritis, proctitis, neurogenic pain, urinary retention, and rarely meningitis. Severe, widespread infection can occur in immunocompromised individuals. Suppressive antiviral therapy reduces frequency and transmission risk.
snippet_zh: 生殖器皰疹是由 HSV-1 或 HSV-2 引起的性傳播感染，典型表現為生殖器或肛周反覆出現的疼痛水泡或潰瘍。許多感染者無症狀或僅有非常輕微的症狀。
causes_zh: 生殖器皰疹由第一型或第二型單純皰疹病毒（HSV-1、HSV-2）引起。HSV-2 是典型生殖器感染來源，而 HSV-1 亦因口交而日益常見。初次感染後，病毒潛伏於脊髓背根神經節，之後可能再活化引發復發。傳染途徑多為皮膚或黏膜直接接觸，包含無病灶時的病毒脫落期。
symptoms_zh: 症狀從無症狀到嚴重皆可能。典型初次感染會出現成群的疼痛性水泡、糜爛或潰瘍，並伴隨排尿灼痛、發燒、淋巴結腫大及不適感。復發期較輕微且時間短。有些患者在皮疹出現前會出現灼熱、刺痛或神經痛等前驅症狀。
epidemiology_zh: 多達五分之一的成年人有 HSV-2 感染證據，但多數人無症狀或症狀極輕。HSV-1 生殖器感染在年輕族群中越來越常見。
prognosis_zh: 生殖器皰疹無法根治，但可藥物控制。併發症包括尿道炎、直腸炎、神經性疼痛、排尿困難，極少數可引發腦膜炎。免疫低下者可能出現廣泛感染。長期抗病毒抑制療法可降低復發與傳染風險。

title: Genital psoriasis
snippet: Psoriasis of the external genitalia and perianal area often presents as well- demarcated , bright red, thin plaques. These usually lack scale , as friction between the skin surfaces rubs it off. Scales may be seen on the outer parts of the genital skin. Scales can be easily scraped off, leaving pinp
causes: Genital or anogenital psoriasis may be part of more generalised psoriasis. Psoriasis has multifactorial genetic and environmental causes. These are not fully understood. In the anogenital area, specific factors to consider include: Colonisation by bacteria and yeasts ( Candida albicans ) Injury to the skin, causing new plaques of psoriasis to develop ( Koebner phenomenon ) Psoriasis in the genital area may also be worsened by contact with irritants such as: Urine Faeces Tight-fitting clothes Friction associated with sexual intercourse.
symptoms: Psoriasis of the external genitalia and perianal area often presents as well- demarcated , bright red, thin plaques. These usually lack scale , as friction between the skin surfaces rubs it off. Scales may be seen on the outer parts of the genital skin. Scales can be easily scraped off, leaving pinpoint bleeding. In women, vulval psoriasis appears symmetrical. It can vary from silvery, scaly patches adjacent to the labia majora to moist, greyish plaques or glossy red plaques without scaling in the skin folds. In men, the penis and scrotum may be involved. The glans penis, the bulbous part of the end of the penis, and the corona (the base or "crown" of the glans) are most commonly affected. In circumcised men, plaques can be more scaly than on the rest of the genital skin. In uncircumcised men, nonscaling plaques are more common. Psoriatic napkin eruption presents as red and sometimes silvery plaques with well-defined borders in the nappy area of children under the age of 2 years. It usually clears up after a few months to a year, but may later generalise into plaque psoriasis. Psoriasis in genital areas can be very itchy at times. The plaques may also be fissured and painful. Psoriasis does not lead to scarring. The skin can return to a normal appearance with treatment or spontaneously. See images of genital psoriasis .
epidemiology: Genital psoriasis affects males and females, children and adults. In children, genital psoriasis is most common under the age of 2, when it presents as psoriatic napkin eruption.
snippet_zh: 外生殖器和肛周區域的牛皮癬通常表現為界限分明的鮮紅色薄斑塊。這些通常沒有鱗片，因為皮膚表面之間的摩擦會將其磨掉。生殖器皮膚的外部可能會看到鱗片。鱗片很容易刮掉，留下針跡
causes_zh: 生殖器或肛門生殖器牛皮癬可能是更廣泛的牛皮癬的一部分。牛皮癬具有多因素遺傳和環境原因。這些還沒有完全理解。在肛門生殖器區域，需要考慮的具體因素包括： 細菌和酵母菌定植（白色念珠菌） 皮膚損傷，導致出現新的牛皮癬斑塊（科布納現象） 生殖器區域的牛皮癬也可能因接觸刺激物而惡化，例如： 尿液 糞便 緊身衣服 與性交有關的摩擦。
symptoms_zh: 外生殖器和肛周區域的牛皮癬通常表現為界限分明的鮮紅色薄斑塊。這些通常沒有鱗片，因為皮膚表面之間的摩擦會將其磨掉。生殖器皮膚的外部可能會看到鱗片。鱗片很容易被刮掉，留下針尖狀出血點。在女性中，外陰牛皮癬表現為對稱性。它可以是大陰唇附近的銀色鱗狀斑塊，也可以是潮濕的灰色斑塊或皮膚皺褶處沒有鱗屑的有光澤的紅色斑塊。在男性中，陰莖和陰囊可能受累。陰莖頭、陰莖末端的球狀部分和冠（龜頭的基部或“冠”）最常受到影響。在接受過包皮環切的男性中，斑塊可能比生殖器皮膚的其他部分更具鱗片狀。在未受割禮的男性中，非鱗屑斑塊更為常見。2 歲以下兒童的尿佈區域出現銀屑病尿布疹，表現為紅色斑塊，有時呈銀色斑塊，邊界清晰。它通常會在幾個月到一年後消失，但隨後可能會發展為斑塊狀銀屑病。生殖器部位的牛皮癬有時會非常瘙癢。斑塊也可能出現裂痕和疼痛。牛皮癬不會導致疤痕。皮膚可以通過治療或自發恢復正常外觀。查看生殖器牛皮癬的圖像。
epidemiology_zh: 生殖器牛皮癬影響男性和女性、兒童和成人。在兒童中，生殖器牛皮癬最常見於 2 歲以下，表現為牛皮癬餐巾疹。

title: Genital skin problems
snippet: Genital skin problems include a wide spectrum of conditions such as infections, inflammatory diseases, allergic reactions, and benign or malignant growths affecting the vulva, penis, scrotum, perineum, or surrounding skin.
causes: Common causes include infections (fungal, bacterial, viral, parasitic), inflammatory dermatoses (eczema, psoriasis, lichen sclerosus), allergic and irritant reactions, friction or moisture-related conditions, and benign or malignant lesions. Sexual activity, hygiene practices, and systemic conditions can also contribute.
symptoms: Symptoms vary widely depending on the condition but may include itching, redness, swelling, burning, pain, erosions, ulcers, discharge, fissures, plaques, papules, or nodules on the genital skin. Some conditions are asymptomatic and found incidentally.
epidemiology: Genital skin conditions are common across all age groups and occur in both sexes. Certain conditions—such as fungal infections—are more frequent in humid climates, while inflammatory disorders may be associated with autoimmune disease. Sexual activity and comorbidities influence prevalence patterns.
prognosis: Prognosis depends on the underlying condition. Many inflammatory or infectious causes respond well to treatment, while chronic dermatoses may recur. Early diagnosis improves outcomes especially for neoplastic lesions.
snippet_zh: 生殖器皮膚問題範圍很廣，包括感染、發炎性疾病、過敏反應以及良性或惡性增生，影響外陰、陰莖、陰囊、會陰或周邊皮膚。
causes_zh: 常見原因包括感染（真菌、細菌、病毒、寄生蟲）、發炎性皮膚病（濕疹、乾癬、硬化性苔癬）、過敏或刺激反應、摩擦或潮濕導致的皮膚問題，以及良性或惡性病變。性行為、衛生習慣與全身性疾病也可能影響發生率。
symptoms_zh: 症狀依疾病不同而異，可能包含搔癢、紅腫、灼熱、疼痛、糜爛、潰瘍、分泌物、裂隙、斑塊、丘疹或結節。部分疾病無症狀，在檢查時才被發現。
epidemiology_zh: 生殖器皮膚疾病在各年齡層都常見，男女皆會受到影響。潮濕環境增加真菌感染風險，而某些發炎性疾病與自身免疫有關。性行為及共病會影響疾病分布模式。
prognosis_zh: 預後取決於基礎疾病。多數感染性與發炎性問題治療效果良好，但慢性皮膚病可能反覆發作。及早診斷對於惡性病變特別重要。

title: Geographic tongue
snippet: Geographic tongue is characterised by irregularly-shaped, red, map-like, smooth and swollen patches surrounded by white lines. Geographic tongue can occur suddenly and persist for months or longer, and may often recur. Most often there are no symptoms but burning or irritation of the tongue are comm
causes: The cause of geographic tongue is unknown but geographic tongue occurs more often in patients who have psoriasis , especially pustular psoriasis . It is also seen in patients with a food allergy , allergic contact dermatitis , asthma, atopic dermatitis , reactive arthritis , anaemia , hormonal disturbance, emotional stress and in patients with early-stage of type 1 diabetes .
symptoms: Geographic tongue is characterised by irregularly-shaped, red, map-like, smooth and swollen patches surrounded by white lines. Geographic tongue can occur suddenly and persist for months or longer, and may often recur. Most often there are no symptoms but burning or irritation of the tongue are common, particularly when eating hot, spicy and acidic food.
epidemiology: Geographic tongue affects approximately 1–3% of the adult population worldwide. It is less common in children. The incidence is twice as high in women than in men. Patients may have a family history of geographic tongue or fissured tongue.
prognosis: There are no major long-term complications associated with geographic tongue.
snippet_zh: 地圖舌的特點是形狀不規則、紅色、地圖狀、光滑、腫脹的斑塊，周圍有白線。地圖舌可能突然出現並持續數月或更長時間，並且經常可能複發。大多數情況下沒有任何症狀，但常見舌頭灼燒或刺激
causes_zh: 地圖舌的病因尚不清楚，但地圖舌多見於銀屑病患者，尤其是膿皰性銀屑病患者。食物過敏、過敏性接觸性皮炎、哮喘、特應性皮炎、反應性關節炎、貧血、荷爾蒙紊亂、情緒壓力以及早期 1 型糖尿病患者也可能出現這種情況。
symptoms_zh: 地圖舌的特點是形狀不規則、紅色、地圖狀、光滑、腫脹的斑塊，周圍有白線。地圖舌可能突然出現並持續數月或更長時間，並且經常可能複發。大多數情況下沒有任何症狀，但舌頭灼燒或刺激很常見，特別是在吃熱、辣和酸性食物時。
epidemiology_zh: 地圖舌影響全世界大約 1-3% 的成年人口。在兒童中較少見。女性的發病率是男性的兩倍。患者可能有地圖舌或裂紋舌的家族史。
prognosis_zh: 地圖舌不存在重大的長期並發症。

title: Granular parakeratosis
snippet: Granular parakeratosis can present as an intertrigo ( rash in body folds) or as a non- intertriginous rash. It presents as a red or brown patchy scaly rash, most often in the armpits or in other skin folds. It is sometimes itchy. In severe cases, the rash spreads widely over the trunk. As it heals,
causes: Granular parakeratosis is thought to be provoked by friction, occlusion , and sweating. A defect in filaggrin production may predispose to granular parakeratosis. This protein is normally present in the upper epidermis, but there are various genetic variants that lead to a weakness of the skin's barrier function. These include a common cause of dry skin, ichthyosis vulgaris . Cosmetic or laundry products containing the antiseptic , benzalkonium chloride , may be responsible for some cases. Acting as a surfactant, benzalkonium chloride may disrupt cellular lipid membranes and inactivate enzymes within the skin, inducing proliferation , abnormal development of the skin cells ( keratinocytes ), and irritant contact dermatitis . Recurrent flexural pellagroid dermatitis [1] was reported to be an irritant contact dermatitis to the anionic surfactant, sodium lauryl sulphate (SLS), in soapless cleansing bars. This may induce proliferation and abnormal development of the skin cells (keratinocytes). Changes in the skin microbiota have also been blamed.
symptoms: Granular parakeratosis can present as an intertrigo ( rash in body folds) or as a non- intertriginous rash. It presents as a red or brown patchy scaly rash, most often in the armpits or in other skin folds. It is sometimes itchy. In severe cases, the rash spreads widely over the trunk. As it heals, the skin peels off ( desquamation ), resembling the peeling seen in pellagra . Granular parakeratosis Granular parakeratosis Granular parakeratosis See more images of granular parakeratosis .
epidemiology: Granular parakeratosis is often reported in middle-aged women but has been reported to affect babies, children and men of all races.
