causes_zh: 舔嘴唇可能會在有或沒有初始刺激的情況下開始，例如在寒冷、乾燥的天氣中乾裂。患者不斷地（通常是無意識的）舔嘴唇，用唾液重新潤濕皮膚。反复舔唇導致唾液持續乾濕循環，破壞正常的皮膚屏障功能並引起炎症。持續的炎症會進一步導致舔唇，從而使循環持續下去[1,3]。
symptoms_zh: 舔嘴唇會導致嘴唇和周圍皮膚慢性發紅、乾燥和脫皮，其分佈通常與患者舌頭的範圍相對應。炎症區域經常跨越嘴唇的朱紅色邊緣。冬季症狀可能會惡化。患者經常主訴有燒灼感和乾燥感[1-3]。舔唇者皮炎
prognosis_zh: 儘管舔嘴唇似乎是一種良性習慣，但可能存在嚴重的並發症。皮膚破損可​​導致繼發性皮膚細菌感染（通常是金黃色葡萄球菌）或酵母菌感染（白色念珠菌）。慢性炎症可能導致長期炎症後色素沉著過度或色素沉著不足[4]。

title: Lipodermatosclerosis
snippet: Lipodermatosclerosis is a chronic inflammatory and fibrosing disorder of the lower legs associated with long-standing venous insufficiency.
causes: Caused by venous insufficiency due to incompetent venous valves, venous outflow obstruction, or impaired calf muscle pump. Resulting venous hypertension increases leukocyte trapping and migration into tissue, triggering chronic inflammation and collagen overproduction leading to fibrosis of subcutaneous fat.
symptoms: Characterised by painful, hardened, indurated skin on the lower legs, often above the ankles. The skin becomes red-brown, tight and tender, sometimes giving an 'inverted champagne bottle' appearance. Acute disease may cause severe pain, swelling and warmth; chronic disease leads to fibrosis, hyperpigmentation and risk of venous ulcers.
epidemiology: Occurs primarily in middle-aged to older adults. More common in women and associated with immobility, obesity, venous insufficiency and other risk factors for poor lower-limb circulation.
prognosis: Healing is often slow due to chronic inflammation and fibrosis. Venous ulcers are common and difficult to manage. Long-term compression and venous management improve outcomes.
snippet_zh: 脂性皮膚硬化症是一種與長期靜脈功能不全相關的下肢慢性發炎與纖維化疾病。
causes_zh: 由靜脈功能不全引起，包括靜脈瓣膜失能、靜脈流出阻塞、小腿肌肉泵功能不足。靜脈高壓導致白血球滯留並滲入組織，引發慢性發炎，促進膠原蛋白過度生成並造成皮下脂肪纖維化。
symptoms_zh: 下肢（特別是踝部上方）出現疼痛、緊繃、變硬的皮膚。皮膚呈紅棕色、腫脹、壓痛，嚴重時可呈現「倒香檳瓶」外觀。急性期可表現劇痛、腫脹與發熱；慢性期會有纖維化、色素沉著並增加靜脈性潰瘍風險。
epidemiology_zh: 多見於中老年人，女性更常見，與肥胖、不動、靜脈曲張與其他下肢循環不佳的狀況高度相關。
prognosis_zh: 因慢性發炎與纖維化，傷口癒合較差。常合併靜脈性潰瘍，治療困難。長期使用壓力治療與改善靜脈循環可提升預後。

title: Livedo reticularis
snippet: Livedo reticularis is characterised by: Net or lace-like cyanotic pattern Blotchy, reddish-blue to purple (a livid colour) Transient or persistent Mostly affects legs It may be more pronounced in cold conditions May or may not improve with warming Cold exposure may result in tingling and numbness of
causes: Livedo reticularis results from a disturbance of blood flow to the skin, causing low blood flow and reduced oxygen tension to the skin. Cutaneous vasculature is comprised of a series of 1–3 cm cones. The apex of each cone is located deep within the dermis at the site of an ascending arteriole. At the margin of each cone, the density of the arterial bed is decreased, and the superficial venous plexus is more prominent. Any pathological or physiological process which impairs blood flow to the skin results in higher amounts of deoxygenated haemoglobin , leading to a livid discolouration. Physiological arteriolar vasospasm in response to cold, produces reversible skin discolouration, such as in cutis marmorata. Prolonged vasospasm, thrombosis or hyperviscosity can cause the pathological skin changes of livedo racemosa. A unilateral form of livedo reticularis due to local heat injury is known as erythema ab igne .
symptoms: Livedo reticularis is characterised by: Net or lace-like cyanotic pattern Blotchy, reddish-blue to purple (a livid colour) Transient or persistent Mostly affects legs It may be more pronounced in cold conditions May or may not improve with warming Cold exposure may result in tingling and numbness of affected skin. In cutis marmorata , mottling is diffuse , mild and usually symptomless. The livedo commonly occurs on the legs and gradually resolves on rewarming. Cutis marmorata telangiectatica congenita is more pronounced than cutis marmorata. Primary livedo reticularis in adults is intermittent, and the changes in skin colour are less influenced by ambient temperature. Cutis marmorata Cutis marmorata Livedo racemosa often affects the trunk and buttocks as well as legs. The net-like violaceous pattern tends to be composed of irregular, broken macules with an annular pattern. Livedo reticularis
epidemiology: Cutis marmorata causes temporary or physiological livedo in about 50% of healthy infants and many adults, particularly young women when exposed to the cold. Cutis marmorata telangiectatica congenita is a rare condition in which pronounced livedo is present at birth or soon after. It often improves with age. There are several congenital abnormalities associated with cutis marmorata telangiectatica. Primary livedo reticularis is the idiopathic form in adults and can be persistent. The diagnosis is usually made once other more severe causes of livedo reticularis have been ruled out. Secondary livedo, or livedo racemosa, is associated with a range of systemic diseases.
prognosis: Livedo reticularis itself is relatively benign. However, thromboembolic disease due to associated conditions such as antiphospholipid syndrome may lead to serious arterial events, including the death of the patient.
snippet_zh: 網狀青斑的特徵為： 網狀或花邊狀紫紺圖案 有斑點、紅藍色至紫色（青色） 短暫或持續 主要影響腿部 在寒冷條件下可能更明顯 可能會或可能不會隨著變暖而改善 冷暴露可能會導致刺痛和麻木
causes_zh: 網狀青斑是由於皮膚血流紊亂引起的，導致血流量低和皮膚氧張力降低。皮膚脈管系統由一系列 1-3 厘米的圓錐體組成。每個錐體的頂點位於真皮深處升小動脈的位置。在每個錐體的邊緣，動脈床密度降低，淺靜脈叢更加突出。任何損害皮膚血流的病理或生理過程都會導致脫氧血紅蛋白含量增加，從而導致青紫色變色。寒冷引起的生理性小動脈血管痙攣會產生可逆的皮膚變色，例如馬爾莫拉皮膚。長期的血管痙攣、血栓形成或高粘滯血症可引起總狀青斑的病理性皮膚改變。由於局部熱損傷而導致的單側網狀青斑被稱為火紅斑。
symptoms_zh: 網狀青斑的特徵為： 網狀或花邊狀紫紺圖案 有斑點、紅藍色至紫色（青色） 短暫或持續 主要影響腿部 在寒冷條件下可能更明顯 可能會或可能不會隨著變暖而改善 寒冷暴露可能會導致受影響皮膚的刺痛和麻木。在馬爾莫拉皮膚中，斑點是瀰漫性的、輕微的，通常無症狀。青斑通常發生在腿部，並在復溫後逐漸消退。先天性毛細血管擴張症比馬爾莫拉皮膚更明顯。成人的原發性網狀青斑是間歇性的，膚色的變化受環境溫度的影響較小。馬爾莫拉皮膚 馬爾莫拉皮膚 總狀青斑經常影響軀幹、臀部以及腿部。網狀紫羅蘭色圖案往往由具有環形圖案的不規則、破碎的斑點組成。網狀青斑
epidemiology_zh: 大約 50% 的健康嬰兒和許多成年人，特別是暴露在寒冷環境中的年輕女性，皮膚斑塊會導致暫時性或生理性青斑。先天性毛細血管擴張性皮膚是一種罕見的疾病，在出生時或出生後不久就出現明顯的青斑。它通常會隨著年齡的增長而改善。有幾種先天性異常與皮膚毛細血管擴張有關。原發性網狀青斑是成人的特發性形式，並且可以持續存在。通常在排除其他更嚴重的網狀青斑病因後即可做出診斷。繼發性青斑或總狀青斑與一系列全身性疾病有關。
prognosis_zh: 網狀青斑本身是相對良性的。然而，抗磷脂綜合徵等相關病症引起的血栓栓塞性疾病可能導致嚴重的動脈事件，包括患者死亡。

title: Malassezia folliculitis
snippet: Malassezia folliculitis presents as monomorphic, itchy follicular papules and pustules, most often on the upper back and chest, but also on the forehead, hairline, chin, neck and upper limbs.
causes: Caused by overgrowth of Malassezia yeast within hair follicles. Contributing factors include heat, humidity, excess sebum, occlusion, sweating, antibiotic use, and immunosuppression.
symptoms: Uniform itchy papules and pustules arising from hair follicles, mainly on the upper trunk. No comedones, distinguishing it from acne. Wood lamp may show yellow-green fluorescence. Dermoscopic features may include perifollicular erythema, perilesional scale, and hypopigmented or coiled hairs.
epidemiology: Most common in adolescent and young adult males. Risk factors include hot humid environments, high sebum production, hyperhidrosis, occlusive skin products, prior antibiotics, and immunosuppression including steroid use or HIV infection.
prognosis: Generally responsive to antifungal therapy. Recurrences are common if triggers persist, such as sweating, occlusion, or untreated seborrhoeic dermatitis.
snippet_zh: 馬拉色菌毛囊炎是一種單形性、以毛囊為基底的發癢丘疹與膿皰，最常見於上胸、上背，也可出現在前額、髮際線、下巴、頸部與上肢外側。
causes_zh: 由馬拉色菌在毛囊內過度增生所致。常見誘因包含高溫潮濕、皮脂分泌旺盛、過度出汗、保養品或防曬的閉塞、抗生素使用、以及免疫抑制如類固醇或 HIV。
symptoms_zh: 皮損為均一的小丘疹與膿皰，均起自毛囊，伴隨明顯搔癢。無粉刺，與尋常痤瘡不同。木燈可見黃綠色螢光。皮膚鏡可能顯示毛囊周圍紅斑、病灶旁鱗屑、色素減退毛髮或捲曲毛髮。
epidemiology_zh: 最常見於青少年與年輕成年男性。危險因子包括炎熱潮濕環境、皮脂旺盛、多汗、閉塞性產品、抗生素使用與免疫抑制（如類固醇及 HIV）。
prognosis_zh: 大多對抗真菌治療反應良好，但若誘因持續（如流汗、皮膚閉塞、未治療的脂漏性皮膚炎），容易復發。

title: Measles
snippet: Measles develops through distinct clinical stages. Incubation period Ranges from 7–14 days (average 10–11 days). The patient usually has no symptoms. Some may experience symptoms of primary viral spread (fever, spotty rash, and respiratory symptoms due to virus in the bloodstream) within 2–3 days of
causes: Measles is caused by the measles virus, which belongs to the morbillivirus family.
symptoms: Measles develops through distinct clinical stages. Incubation period Ranges from 7–14 days (average 10–11 days). The patient usually has no symptoms. Some may experience symptoms of primary viral spread (fever, spotty rash, and respiratory symptoms due to virus in the bloodstream) within 2–3 days of exposure. Prodrome Generally begins 10–12 days after exposure. Presents as fever, malaise , and loss of appetite, followed by conjunctivitis (red eyes), cough, and coryza (blocked or runny nose). 2–3 days into the prodromal phase, Koplik spots appear. These are blue-white spots on the inside of the mouth opposite the molars, and occur 24–48 hours before the exanthem (rash) stage. Prodromal symptoms usually last for 2–5 days but in some cases may persist for as long as 7–10 days. Exanthem (rash) Flat red spots ranging from 0.1–1.0cm in diameter appear on the 4th or 5th day following the start of symptoms. This non-itchy rash begins on the face and behind the ears. Within 24–36 hours it spreads over the entire trunk and extremities (palms and soles rarely involved). The spots may join together, especially in areas of the face. The onset of the rash usually coincides with a high fever of at least 40C. The rash begins to fade 3–4 days after it first appears. It fades first to a purplish hue and then to brown/coppery coloured lesions with fine scales. Recovery A cough may persist for 1–3 weeks. Measles-associated complications may be the cause of persisting fever beyond the 3rd day of the rash.
epidemiology: Before widespread immunisation against measles in industrialised countries, measles was a very common childhood disease that carried a high death rate. Nowadays in countries where measles is part of an immunisation programme, the risk of exposure and incidence of actual disease cases is low. A recent trend by some parents not to immunise their children has led to an increase in the number of cases of measles, and its complications. In developing countries, measles still occurs frequently and is associated with a high rate of complications and death. It remains a common disease even in some developed countries of Europe and Asia. WHO reported a surge in cases worldwide in 2018, with nearly 10 million cases, and more than 140,000 deaths mostly in children under 5 years of age. The highest incidence rates were in the Ukraine, Somalia, Democratic Republic of Congo, Liberia and Madagascar. The US reported its highest rate of infection in 25 years, and four countries in Europe lost their 'measles elimination' status.
prognosis: Approximately 30% of reported measles cases have one or more complications. Gastrointestinal: diarrhoea that may be fatal if dehydration occurs, mouth ulceration , appendicitis, hepatitis , mesenteric adenitis, and pancreatitis. Ears: otitis media (almost exclusively in children) may lead to deafness. Respiratory tract: laryngobronchitis, measles croup, and pneumonia (either primary viral or secondary bacterial) — the most common cause of death from measles. Heart: myocarditis and pericarditis. Haematological system: thrombocytopenia , causing bleeding and disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC). Eyes: conjunctivitis and/or corneal ulceration leading to blindness (especially if vitamin A deficient), and squint. Kidneys: acute glomerulonephritis ( inflammation of kidneys) and renal failure. Nervous system: febrile seizures and encephalitis. Malnutrition (especially if from a poor community). Measles infection during pregnancy increases the risk of premature labour and delivery, fetal loss and maternal death. Rarely, subacute sclerosing panencephalitis—a fatal condition—develops decades after a measles infection due to persistence of the measles virus in the central nervous system.
snippet_zh: 麻疹的發展經歷了不同的臨床階段。潛伏期 7-14 天（平均 10-11 天）。患者通常沒有任何症狀。有些人可能會在感染後 2-3 天內出現原發性病毒傳播症狀（發燒、斑點皮疹和血液中病毒引起的呼吸道症狀）
causes_zh: 麻疹是由屬於麻疹病毒科的麻疹病毒引起的。
symptoms_zh: 麻疹的發展經歷了不同的臨床階段。潛伏期 7-14 天（平均 10-11 天）。患者通常沒有任何症狀。有些人可能會在接觸後 2-3 天內出現原發性病毒傳播症狀（發燒、斑點皮疹和血液中病毒引起的呼吸道症狀）。前驅症狀通常在接觸後 10-12 天開始。表現為發燒、不適和食慾不振，然後出現結膜炎（眼睛發紅）、咳嗽和鼻塞（鼻塞或流鼻涕）。進入前驅期 2-3 天后，出現 Koplik 斑。這些藍白色斑點位於口腔內側與臼齒相對的位置，出現在出疹（皮疹）階段前 24-48 小時。前驅症狀通常持續 2-5 天，但在某些情況下可能持續長達 7-10 天。疹子（皮疹） 症狀開始後第 4 或第 5 天出現直徑為 0.1-1.0 厘米的扁平紅色斑點。這種不癢的皮疹始於面部和耳後。在 24-36 小時內，它會擴散到整個軀乾和四肢（手掌和腳底很少受累）。這些斑點可能會連接在一起，尤其是在面部區域。皮疹發作通常伴隨著至少 40 攝氏度的高燒。皮疹首次出現後 3-4 天開始消退。它首先褪色為紫色，然後變成帶有細鱗片的棕色/銅色病變。恢復 咳嗽可能會持續 1-3 週。麻疹相關並發症可能是出疹第三天后持續發燒的原因。
epidemiology_zh: 在工業化國家廣泛接種麻疹疫苗之前，麻疹是一種非常常見的兒童疾病，死亡率很高。如今，在將麻疹納入免疫計劃的國家，接觸麻疹的風險和實際疾病病例的發病率都很低。最近一些家長不給孩子接種疫苗的趨勢導致麻疹及其並發症的病例數量增加。在發展中國家，麻疹仍然頻繁發生，並且並發症和死亡率很高。即使在歐洲和亞洲的一些發達國家，它仍然是一種常見疾病。世衛組織報告稱，2018 年全球病例激增，病例數接近 1000 萬，死亡人數超過 14 萬，其中大部分是 5 歲以下兒童。發病率最高的是烏克蘭、索馬里、剛果民主共和國、利比里亞和馬達加斯加。美國報告感染率創25年來最高水平，歐洲四個國家失去了“消除麻疹”的地位。
prognosis_zh: 大約 30% 報告的麻疹病例有一種或多種並發症。胃腸道：如果發生脫水則可能致命的腹瀉、口腔潰瘍、闌尾炎、肝炎、腸系膜腺炎和胰腺炎。耳朵：中耳炎（幾乎只發生在兒童中）可能會導致耳聾。呼吸道：喉支氣管炎、麻疹性喉炎和肺炎（原發性病毒性肺炎或繼發性細菌性肺炎）——麻疹最常見的死亡原因。心臟：心肌炎、心包炎。血液系統：血小板減少，引起出血和彌散性血管內凝血（DIC）。眼睛：結膜炎和/或角膜潰瘍導致失明（尤其是缺乏維生素 A 時）和斜視。腎臟：急性腎小球腎炎（腎臟炎症）和腎功能衰竭。神經系統：熱驚厥、腦炎。營養不良（特別是來自貧困社區）。懷孕期間感染麻疹會增加早產、胎兒流產和孕產婦死亡的風險。極少數情況下，由於麻疹病毒在中樞神經系統中持續存在，亞急性硬化性全腦炎（一種致命性疾病）會在麻疹感染數十年後出現。

title: Melanocytic naevus
snippet: Melanocytic naevi vary widely in clinical, dermatoscopic and histological appearance. They may arise on any part of the body. They differ in appearance depending on the body site. They may be flat or protruding. They vary in colour from pink or flesh tones to dark brown, steel blue, or black. Light-
causes: Although the exact reason for the local proliferation of naevus cells is unknown, it is clear that the number of melanocytic naevi a person has depends on genetic factors, on sun exposure, and on immune status. People with many melanocytic naevi tend to have family members that also have many similar lesions. Somatic mutations in RAS genes are associated with congenital melanocytic naevi . New melanocytic naevi may erupt following the use of BRAF inhibitor drugs ( vemurafenib , dabrafenib ). People living in Australia and New Zealand have many more naevi than their relatives residing in Northern Europe. Immunosuppressive treatment leads to an increase in the numbers of naevi.
symptoms: Melanocytic naevi vary widely in clinical, dermatoscopic and histological appearance. They may arise on any part of the body. They differ in appearance depending on the body site. They may be flat or protruding. They vary in colour from pink or flesh tones to dark brown, steel blue, or black. Light-skinned individuals tend to have light-coloured naevi and dark-skinned individuals tend to have dark brown or black naevi. Although mostly round or oval in shape, moles are sometimes unusual shapes. They range in size from a couple of millimetres to several centimetres in diameter.
epidemiology: Almost everyone has at least one melanocytic naevus. About 1% of individuals are born with one or more congenital melanocytic naevi. This is usually sporadic, with rare instances of familial congenital naevi. Fair-skinned people tend to have more melanocytic naevi than darker skinned people. Melanocytic naevi that appear during childhood (aged 2 to 10 years) tend to be the most prominent and persistent throughout life. Melanocytic naevi that are acquired later in childhood or adult life often follow sun exposure and may fade away or involute later. Most white-skinned New Zealanders have 20–50 melanocytic naevi.
prognosis: People worry about their moles because they have heard about melanoma , a malignant proliferation of melanocytes that is the most common reason for death from skin cancer . At first, melanoma may look similar to a harmless melanocytic naevus , but in time it becomes more disordered in structure and tends to enlarge. People with a greater number of naevi have a higher risk of developing melanoma than those with few naevi, especially if they have over 100 of them. Melanocytic naevi sometimes change for other reasons than melanoma, for example following sun exposure or during pregnancy. They can enlarge, regress or involute (disappear). A Meyerson naevus is itchy and dry because it is surrounded by eczema. A Sutton or halo naevus is surrounded by a white patch and fades away over several years A recurrent naevus is one that appears in a scar following surgical removal of a melanocytic naevus — this may have an odd shape.
snippet_zh: 黑素細胞痣在臨床、皮膚鏡和組織學外觀上差異很大。它們可能出現在身體的任何部位。它們的外觀因身體部位而異。它們可以是平坦的或突出的。它們的顏色各異，從粉色或肉色到深棕色、鋼藍色或黑色。光-
causes_zh: 儘管痣細胞局部增殖的確切原因尚不清楚，但很明顯，一個人的黑素細胞痣的數量取決於遺傳因素、陽光照射和免疫狀態。患有許多黑素細胞痣的人往往其家庭成員也有許多類似的病變。RAS 基因的體細胞突變與先天性黑素細胞痣有關。使用 BRAF 抑製劑藥物（維莫非尼、達拉非尼）後可能會出現新的黑素細胞痣。居住在澳大利亞和新西蘭的人比居住在北歐的親戚有更多的痣。免疫抑制治療會導致痣數量增加。
symptoms_zh: 黑素細胞痣在臨床、皮膚鏡和組織學外觀上差異很大。它們可能出現在身體的任何部位。它們的外觀因身體部位而異。它們可以是平坦的或突出的。它們的顏色各異，從粉色或肉色到深棕色、鋼藍色或黑色。淺膚色的人往往有淺色痣，深色皮膚的人往往有深棕色或黑色痣。雖然痣的形狀大多為圓形或橢圓形，但有時痣的形狀也很不尋常。它們的尺寸範圍從直徑幾毫米到幾厘米不等。
epidemiology_zh: 幾乎每個人都至少有一種黑素細胞痣。大約 1% 的人出生時患有一種或多種先天性黑素細胞痣。這通常是散發性的，罕見的是家族性先天性痣。皮膚白皙的人比膚色深的人往往有更多的黑素細胞痣。童年時期（2 至 10 歲）出現的黑素細胞痣往往是最突出且持續一生的。在兒童期或成年後獲得的黑素細胞痣通常在陽光照射後出現，並可能隨後消失或消退。大多數白皮膚新西蘭人有 20-50 個黑素細胞痣。
prognosis_zh: 人們擔心自己的痣，因為他們聽說過黑色素瘤，這是一種黑色素細胞的惡性增殖，是皮膚癌死亡的最常見原因。起初，黑色素瘤可能看起來與無害的黑色素細胞痣相似，但隨著時間的推移，它的結構變得更加無序，並且往往會擴大。痣數量較多的人比痣較少的人患黑色素瘤的風險更高，尤其是痣數量超過 100 顆的人。黑素細胞痣有時會因黑色素瘤以外的其他原因發生變化，例如日曬後或懷孕期間。它們可以放大、回歸或漸開線（消失）。梅爾森痣因周圍有濕疹而又癢又乾。薩頓痣或暈痣周圍有白色斑塊，數年後會消失。復發性痣是手術切除黑素細胞痣後出現在疤痕中的痣，形狀可能很奇怪。

title: Melanoma
snippet: Melanomas can occur anywhere on the body, not only in areas that get a lot of sun. In New Zealand, the most common site in men is the back (around 40% of melanomas in men), and the most common site in women is the leg (around 35% of melanomas in women). causes: Melanoma is thought to begin as an uncontrolled proliferation of melanin-producing cells (melanocytic stem cells) that have undergone a genetic transformation. The cause of these cell mutations can be acquired or inherited. Acquired 'sporadic' mutations are the most common cause of cancer. They occur from damage to a cell during a person's life. The most common cause of melanoma is overexposure to UV radiation, eg, sun exposure, sunbed use. Germline 'inherited' mutations are passed down from the parent. Inherited ( familial ) melanoma is far less common (<10%). CDKN2A (also called p16INK4A or MTS1) is the gene primarily linked in up to 20–40% of familial melanomas. However, in recent years, a growing number of other genes have been implicated, including CDK4, MC1R, MITF, TERT, ACD, BAP1, POT1, and TERF2IP. Cutaneous melanoma can arise from otherwise normal-appearing skin (in about 75% of melanomas) or from within a pre-existing mole or freckle, which starts to grow larger and change in appearance. Precursor lesions include: Benign melanocytic naevus (normal mole) Atypical or dysplastic naevus (unusual-looking mole) Atypical lentiginous junctional naevus (flat naevus in heavily sun-damaged skin) or atypical solar lentigo Large or giant-sized congenital melanocytic naevus (brown birthmark). Melanomas have two growth phases, radial and vertical. Most melanomas arise as superficial tumours confined to the epidermis (ie, they have a horizontal growth phase; in situ ). These generally grow slowly, but at any time, further genetic changes may cause the tumour to progress to the vertical growth phase, in which the malignant cells breach the basement membrane , invading deeper tissues, resulting in invasive melanoma. Once the melanoma cells have reached the dermis, they may spread to other tissues via the lymphatic system to the local lymph nodes or via the bloodstream to other organs such as the lungs or brain. This is known as metastatic disease or secondary spread. The chance of this happening mainly depends on how deep the cells have penetrated the skin.
symptoms: Melanomas can occur anywhere on the body, not only in areas that get a lot of sun. In New Zealand, the most common site in men is the back (around 40% of melanomas in men), and the most common site in women is the leg (around 35% of melanomas in women). Although melanoma usually starts as a skin lesion, it can also grow on mucous membranes ( mucosal melanoma), such as the lips or genitals. Occasionally it occurs in other parts of the body such as the eye, brain, mouth or vagina. The first sign of a melanoma is usually an unusual looking freckle or mole and may itch or bleed. Melanomas may grow across the skin (known as the radial growth phase) or grow in depth (known as the vertical growth phase). Melanoma may be detected at an early stage when it is only a few millimetres in diameter, but it may grow to several centimetres in diameter before it is diagnosed. A melanoma may have a variety of colours including: Tan, dark brown, black, blue, red and, occasionally, light grey. Melanomas that are lacking pigment are called amelanotic melanoma. There may be areas of regression that are the colour of normal skin, or white and scarred. During its horizontal phase of growth, a melanoma is normally flat. As the vertical phase develops, the melanoma becomes thickened, raised, and palpable. Some melanomas are itchy or tender. More advanced lesions may bleed easily or crust over. Most melanomas have characteristics described by the ABCDE+EFG melanoma criteria or the Glasgow 7-point checklist.
epidemiology: Australia and New Zealand have the highest reported incidence and mortality of melanoma globally. About 1 in 15-18 white-skinned Australians and New Zealanders are expected to develop melanoma in their lifetime. Melanoma is the third most common cancer in Australia and New Zealand. In 2019, there were 2,727 melanoma registrations in New Zealand. There were 362 deaths from melanoma in 2016. Melanoma can occur in adults of any age but is very rare in children. According to the Australian Institute of Health and Welfare, in 2021: 7.9% of people diagnosed with melanoma were aged under 40 years 10.7% were aged 40-49 17.8% were aged 50-59 23.9% were aged 60-69 23.7% were aged 70-79 16% were aged 80 or older. The mean age for melanoma diagnosis is 65.7 years among men and 62.4 years among women. Melanoma is the most common cancer diagnosed in young Australians aged 15–29 years, accounting for 15% of all cancers in this age group. The main risk factors for developing the more common type of melanoma (eg, superficial spreading melanoma ) include: Increasing age Previous invasive melanoma or melanoma in situ Previous basal cell or squamous cell carcinoma Many melanocytic naevi ( moles ) Multiple (>5) atypical naevi (large or histologically dysplastic moles) A strong family history of melanoma with two or more first-degree relatives affected White/fair skin Parkinson disease UV exposure History of sunburn Weakened immune system or cancer-prone syndromes. These risk factors are not as relevant to rarer types of melanoma. Although the presence of a large number of common nevi is a strong risk factor for cutaneous melanoma, the majority of melanomas arise de novo. A 2017 meta-analysis of 38 studies including over 20,000 melanomas found that only 29 percent were nevus -associated, with the rest arising de novo.
prognosis: Metastasis and related systemic effects Side effects from systemic or radiation therapy Death Complications due to surgery: Wound infection Inability to close Dehiscence Skin necrosis Incomplete resection Seromas, lymphoedema, and lymphoceles with node dissection.
snippet_zh: 黑色素瘤可以發生在身體的任何部位，而不僅僅發生在陽光充足的部位。在新西蘭，男性最常見的部位是背部（約佔男性黑色素瘤的 40%），女性最常見的部位是腿部（約佔女性黑色素瘤的 35%）。儘管黑色素瘤通常始於皮膚病
causes_zh: 黑色素瘤被認為是由經過遺傳轉化的黑色素生成細胞（黑素細胞幹細胞）不受控制的增殖開始的。這些細胞突變的原因可以是後天獲得的或遺傳的。獲得性“散發”突變是癌症最常見的原因。它們是由於人一生中細胞受損而產生的。黑色素瘤最常見的原因是過度暴露於紫外線輻射，例如日曬、日光浴浴床。種系“遺傳”突變是從父母那裡遺傳下來的。遺傳性（家族性）黑色素瘤並不常見（<10%）。CDKN2A（也稱為 p16INK4A 或 MTS1）是與高達 20-40% 的家族性黑色素瘤主要相關的基因。然而，近年來，越來越多的其他基因也受到影響，包括 CDK4、MC1R、MITF、TERT、ACD、BAP1、POT1 和 TERF2IP。皮膚黑色素瘤可能源自其他正常外觀的皮膚（約佔黑色素瘤的 75%），也可能源自先前存在的痣或雀斑，這些痣或雀斑開始變大並改變外觀。前驅病變包括： 良性黑素細胞痣（正常痣） 非典型或發育不良痣（外觀異常的痣） 非典型雀斑交界痣（嚴重曬傷皮膚上的扁平痣）或非典型日光性雀斑 大型或巨型先天性黑素細胞痣（棕色胎記）。黑色素瘤有兩個生長階段：徑向生長階段和垂直生長階段。大多數黑色素瘤作為局限於表皮的淺表腫瘤出現（即，它們具有水平生長階段；原位）。這些細胞通常生長緩慢，但任何時候，進一步的基因變化都可能導致腫瘤進展到垂直生長階段，其中惡性細胞突破基底膜，侵入更深的組織，導致侵襲性黑色素瘤。一旦黑色素瘤細胞到達真皮，它們可能會通過淋巴系統擴散到其他組織，到達局部淋巴結，或通過血流擴散到其他器官，例如肺或大腦。這稱為轉移性疾病或繼發性傳播。發生這種情況的機會主要取決於細胞滲透皮膚的深度。
symptoms_zh: 黑色素瘤可以發生在身體的任何部位，而不僅僅發生在陽光充足的部位。在新西蘭，男性最常見的部位是背部（約佔男性黑色素瘤的 40%），女性最常見的部位是腿部（約佔女性黑色素瘤的 35%）。雖然黑色素瘤通常以皮膚病變開始，但它也可以在粘膜（粘膜黑色素瘤）上生長，例如嘴唇或生殖器。偶爾也會發生在身體的其他部位，如眼睛、大腦、口腔或陰道。黑色素瘤的第一個跡象通常是看起來不尋常的雀斑或痣，並且可能會發癢或流血。黑色素瘤可能會在皮膚上生長（稱為徑向生長階段）或向深處生長（稱為垂直生長階段）。當黑色素瘤直徑只有幾毫米時，就可以在早期被檢測到，但在確診之前，它的直徑可能會增長到幾厘米。黑色素瘤可能有多種顏色，包括：棕褐色、深棕色、黑色、藍色、紅色，偶爾還有淺灰色。缺乏色素的黑色素瘤稱為無色素性黑色素瘤。可能會有一些退化區域的顏色與正常皮膚相同，或者是白色且有疤痕。在水平生長階段，黑色素瘤通常是平坦的。隨著垂直期的發展，黑色素瘤變得增厚、凸起並可觸及。有些黑色素瘤會發癢或觸痛。更嚴重的病變可能容易出血或結痂。大多數黑色素瘤具有 ABCDE+EFG 黑色素瘤標准或格拉斯哥 7 點檢查表所描述的特徵。
epidemiology_zh: 澳大利亞和新西蘭的黑色素瘤發病率和死亡率是全球最高的。預計每 15-18 名白皮膚澳大利亞人和新西蘭人中就有 1 人在一生中會患上黑色素瘤。黑色素瘤是澳大利亞和新西蘭第三大常見癌症。2019 年，新西蘭登記了 2,727 例黑色素瘤。2016 年，有 362 人死於黑色素瘤。黑色素瘤可發生於任何年齡段的成年人，但在兒童中非常罕見。根據澳大利亞健康與福利研究所的數據，2021 年： 7.9% 被診斷患有黑色素瘤的人年齡在 40 歲以下 10.7% 年齡在 40-49 歲 17.8% 年齡在 50-59 歲 23.9% 年齡在 60-69 歲 23.7% 年齡在 70-79 歲 16% 年齡在 80 歲或以上。黑色素瘤診斷的平均年齡男性為 65.7 歲，女性為 62.4 歲。黑色素瘤是 15-29 歲澳大利亞年輕人中最常見的癌症，佔該年齡段所有癌症的 15%。形成更常見類型黑色素瘤（例如，淺表擴散性黑色素瘤）的主要危險因素包括： 年齡增長 既往侵襲性黑色素瘤或原位黑色素瘤 既往基底細胞或鱗狀細胞癌 許多黑色素細胞痣（痣） 多個（>5）非典型痣（大或組織學發育不良的痣） 有兩個或兩個以上一級親屬患有黑色素瘤的強烈家族史 白/白皮膚 帕金森病 紫外線暴露曬傷史 免疫系統減弱或易患癌症的綜合症。這些危險因素與較罕見類型的黑色素瘤無關。儘管大量常見痣的存在是皮膚黑色素瘤的一個強烈危險因素，但大多數黑色素瘤是從頭產生的。2017 年對 38 項研究（包括 20,000 多個黑色素瘤）進行的薈萃分析發現，只有 29% 與痣相關，其餘的都是從頭開始的。
prognosis_zh: 轉移和相關的全身效應 全身或放射治療的副作用 死亡 手術引起的並發症： 傷口感染 無法閉合 裂開 皮膚壞死 不完全切除 血清腫、淋巴水腫和淋巴腫大並伴有淋巴結清掃。

title: Melanonychia
snippet: Melanonychia refers to brown or black pigmentation of the nail plate, typically appearing as a longitudinal dark band due to melanin deposition.
causes: Melanin appears in the nail when normally dormant melanocytes in the nail matrix become activated. Causes include melanocytic activation (trauma, inflammation, medications, ethnic pigmentation) or melanocytic hyperplasia such as subungual melanoma.
symptoms: Most cases present as a longitudinal brown to black streak in a fingernail or toenail. The band may vary in width, color intensity, and sharpness. Concerning features include widening, irregular borders, color variegation, or nail fold pigmentation (Hutchinson sign).
epidemiology: More common in people with darker skin types. Physiologic longitudinal melanonychia is frequent in children and adults of African, Asian, or Hispanic descent. Can occur at any age depending on cause.
prognosis: Benign causes remain stable and harmless. However, melanonychia due to nail matrix melanoma carries a high risk of metastasis and has worse prognosis than melanoma in other sites. Trauma or inflammation-related melanonychia may lead to nail splitting or dystrophy.
snippet_zh: 黑甲症指指甲板出現棕色或黑色的色素沉著，最典型為一條縱向的深色色帶，由黑色素沉積所導致。
causes_zh: 當原本位於指甲基質、處於休眠狀態的黑素細胞被活化時，黑色素會沉積於生長中的指甲。成因包括黑素細胞活化（外傷、發炎、藥物、種族性色素沉著）或黑素細胞增生，例如甲下黑色素瘤。
symptoms_zh: 多數表現為指甲上縱向的棕黑色條紋，寬度、顏色深淺與邊界清晰度皆可不同。若出現色帶變寬、邊緣不規則、顏色不均或甲皺褶染色（Hutchinson 徵象）則較值得警覺。
epidemiology_zh: 在深色膚色族群中更常見。非洲、亞洲、拉丁美洲族群的兒童與成人常見生理性縱向黑甲症。依成因而可發生於任何年齡。
prognosis_zh: 良性黑甲症通常穩定且無害。但若為指甲基質黑色素瘤，則具高度轉移風險，預後比其他部位的黑色素瘤更差。由外傷或發炎引起者可能造成指甲裂開或營養不良。

title: Melasma
snippet: Melasma presents as bilateral, asymptomatic , light-to-dark brown macules or patches with irregular borders. Distinct patterns include: Centrofacial — forehead, cheeks, nose, upper lip (sparing the philtrum); 50-80% of presentations Malar — cheeks, nose Mandibular — jawline, chin Erythosis pigmentos
causes: The cause of melasma is complex; it has been proposed to be a photoageing disorder in genetically predisposed individuals. The pigmentation ultimately results from the overproduction of melanin by melanocytes ( pigment cells); either taken up by keratinocytes ( epidermal melanosis) and/or deposited in the dermis ( dermal melanosis, melanophages ). Factors implicated in the development of melasma include: Family history — 60% report affected family members Sun exposure — ultraviolet and visible light promote melanin production Hormones — pregnancy and the use of oestrogen / progesterone -containing oral contraceptives , intrauterine devices, implants, and hormone replacement therapy, are implicated in one-quarter of affected women; thyroid disorders can be associated with melasma Medications and scented products — new targeted therapies for cancer and perfumed soaps, toiletries, and cosmetics may cause a phototoxic reaction to trigger melasma Researchers are examining the roles of stem cell, neural , vascular , and local hormonal factors in promoting melanocyte activation.
symptoms: Melasma presents as bilateral, asymptomatic , light-to-dark brown macules or patches with irregular borders. Distinct patterns include: Centrofacial — forehead, cheeks, nose, upper lip (sparing the philtrum); 50-80% of presentations Malar — cheeks, nose Mandibular — jawline, chin Erythosis pigmentosa faciei — reddened or inflamed Extrafacial — forearms, upper arms, shoulders in a sun-exposed distribution. Melasma can be separated into epidermal, dermal, and mixed types, depending on the level of increased melanin in the skin.
epidemiology: Melasma is more common in women than in men, with an onset typically between the ages of 20 and 40 years. Melasma is most common in people who tan easily or have naturally brown skin ( Fitzpatrick skin phototypes III, IV). It is less common in people with fair skin (Fitzpatrick types I, II) or black skin (Fitzpatrick types V, VI).
prognosis: Melasma can have a severe impact on quality of life due to its visibility.
snippet_zh: 黃褐斑表現為雙側、無症狀、淺至深棕色斑疹或邊界不規則的斑塊。不同的模式包括： 面部中央 — 前額、臉頰、鼻子、上唇（不包括人中）； 50-80% 的表現 顴骨 — 臉頰、鼻子 下頜 — 下頜線、下巴 色素性紅斑
causes_zh: 黃褐斑的成因很複雜；它被認為是遺傳易感個體的光老化障礙。色素沉著最終是由於黑色素細胞（色素細胞）過度產生黑色素造成的；被角質形成細胞吸收（表皮黑變病）和/或沉積在真皮中（真皮黑變病、噬黑素細胞）。與黃褐斑形成有關的因素包括： 家族史 — 60% 的家庭成員報告受到影響 陽光照射 — 紫外線和可見光促進黑色素生成 激素 — 四分之一的受影響女性涉及懷孕和使用含雌激素/孕激素的口服避孕藥、宮內節育器、埋植劑和激素替代療法；甲狀腺疾病可能與黃褐斑有關 藥物和香味產品——針對癌症的新靶向療法以及香皂、盥洗用品和化妝品可能會引起光毒性反應，從而引發黃褐斑 研究人員正在研究幹細胞、神經、血管和局部激素因子在促進黑素細胞活化中的作用。
symptoms_zh: 黃褐斑表現為雙側、無症狀、淺至深棕色斑疹或邊界不規則的斑塊。不同的模式包括： 面部中央 — 前額、臉頰、鼻子、上唇（不包括人中）； 50-80% 的表現 顴骨 — 臉頰、鼻子 下頜 — 下頜線、下巴 面部色素紅斑 — 變紅或發炎 面外 — 前臂、上臂、肩膀，呈暴露在陽光下的分佈。根據皮膚黑色素增加的程度，黃褐斑可分為表皮型、真皮型和混合型。
epidemiology_zh: 黃褐斑在女性中比男性更常見，通常在 20 至 40 歲之間發病。黃褐斑最常見於容易曬黑或擁有自然棕色皮膚的人（菲茨帕特里克皮膚照片類型 III、IV）。在白皮膚（菲茨帕特里克 I、II 型）或黑皮膚（菲茨帕特里克 V、VI 型）的人中較少見。
prognosis_zh: 由於黃褐斑的可見性，它會對生活質量產生嚴重影響。

title: Miliaria
snippet: Symptoms of heat rash vary depending on type: Miliaria crystallina presents as 1–2 mm superficial clear blisters that easily break. The blisters can look like beads of sweat. There is no inflammation. The blisters are usually seen widely spread on the head, neck, and upper trunk. The vesicles break
causes: Prickly heat results from sweating. The main contributing causes and risk factors are: Immature sweat ducts in a newborn child A hot and humid environment Intense exercise or physical activity Fever Occlusion of the skin with non-porous dressings or synthetic clothing against the skin Hospitalised or bedridden patients lying on waterproofed mattresses or mattress-protectors. Other diseases and treatments that have been associated with miliaria are: Drug-induced hyperhidrosis Adverse reaction to medication such as induction chemotherapy Stevens-Johnson syndrome / toxic epidermal necrolysis Genetic disease (Morvan syndrome and pseudohypoaldosteronism type I) Radiotherapy.
symptoms: Symptoms of heat rash vary depending on type: Miliaria crystallina presents as 1–2 mm superficial clear blisters that easily break. The blisters can look like beads of sweat. There is no inflammation. The blisters are usually seen widely spread on the head, neck, and upper trunk. The vesicles break easily to leave a bran-like scale. Miliaria rubra, the most common form of heat rash, results in red, 2–4 mm, non- follicular papules and papulovesicles. They are very itchy. Background erythema is often present. In children, miliaria involves the trunk and the skin folds of the neck, axilla or groin. In adults, miliaria often affects the upper trunk, scalp, neck and flexures , particularly in areas of friction with clothing. Miliaria pustulosa is a variant of miliaria rubra with pustules. Miliaria profunda presents as asymptomatic deep papules. The flesh–coloured, 1–3 mm diameter papules develop on the trunk and extremities.
epidemiology: Miliaria crystallina affects up to 9% of neonates , with the mean age of 1 week. It can also occur in adults with fever. Miliaria rubra is the most common type of heat rash. It is seen in children and in up to 30% of adults who move to a tropical environment or are unexpectedly exposed to heat and humidity. Although miliaria may develop within days of arriving in the tropics, it often takes several months to peak. Miliaria profunda is rare and presents in adult males. Heat rash can affect all age groups and racial groups.
prognosis: Complications of miliaria include: Secondary bacterial infection , commonly caused by staphylococci Impaired thermoregulation Hyperhidrosis in non-affected areas.
snippet_zh: 痱子的症狀因類型而異：結晶痱子表現為 1-2 毫米的淺表透明水泡，很容易破裂。水泡看起來像汗珠。沒有炎症。水泡通常廣泛分佈在頭部、頸部和上軀幹。囊泡破裂
causes_zh: 痱子是由出汗引起的。主要的致病原因和風險因素有： 新生兒的汗管不成熟 炎熱潮濕的環境 劇烈運動或體力活動 發燒 無孔敷料或合成服裝貼合皮膚遮擋皮膚 住院或臥床的患者躺在防水床墊或床墊保護墊上。與痱子相關的其他疾病和治療有： 藥物引起的多汗症 對藥物的不良反應，如誘導化療 史蒂文斯-約翰遜綜合徵/中毒性表皮壞死松解症 遺傳性疾病（莫文綜合徵和 I 型假性醛固酮增多症） 放射治療。
symptoms_zh: 痱子的症狀因類型而異：結晶痱子表現為 1-2 毫米的淺表透明水泡，很容易破裂。水泡看起來像汗珠。沒有炎症。水泡通常廣泛分佈在頭部、頸部和上軀幹。囊泡很容易破裂，留下麩皮狀的鱗片。紅色痱子是最常見的痱子，可導致紅色、2-4 毫米的非濾泡性丘疹和丘皰疹。他們很癢。經常出現背景紅斑。在兒童中，痱子累及軀乾和頸部、腋窩或腹股溝的皮膚皺襞。在成人中，痱子經常影響上軀幹、頭皮、頸部和彎曲處，特別是與衣服摩擦的區域。膿皰痱子是帶有膿皰的紅色痱子的一種變種。深部痱子表現為無症狀的深部丘疹。軀乾和四肢出現直徑 1-3 毫米的肉色丘疹。
epidemiology_zh: 晶狀痱子影響高達 9% 的新生兒，平均年齡為 1 週。發燒的成人也可能發生這種情況。痱子是最常見的痱子類型。這種情況常見於兒童和高達 30% 的成年人，他們搬到熱帶環境或意外暴露在高溫和潮濕的環境中。儘管痱子可能在到達熱帶地區後幾天內出現，但通常需要幾個月的時間才能達到高峰。深痱子很罕見，多見於成年男性。痱子會影響所有年齡段和種族群體。
prognosis_zh: 痱子的並發症包括： 繼發性細菌感染，通常由葡萄球菌引起 體溫調節受損 非受影響區域多汗。

title: Milium
snippet: Milia are small, white, keratin-filled cysts that commonly occur on the face, especially the eyelids and cheeks, but may appear anywhere.
causes: Milia form when keratin becomes trapped beneath the skin surface. Causes include primary developmental milia, skin trauma, burns, blistering disorders, long-term steroid use, heavy skincare products, or healing after dermatologic procedures.
symptoms: Typical presentation is small, white to yellow, firm dome-shaped papules, usually 1–2 mm in size. They are asymptomatic, non-itchy, non-red, and do not become inflamed unless manipulated.
epidemiology: Common in all ages, from newborns to adults. Primary neonatal milia occur in up to 50% of newborns, while secondary milia occur after skin injury or procedures.
prognosis: Benign and harmless. Many resolve spontaneously, especially in infants. Persistent lesions can be removed by simple extraction if desired.
snippet_zh: 粟粒疹是小型白色、角蛋白堆積的囊腫，最常見於臉部，尤其是眼瞼與臉頰，也可能出現在身體其他部位。
causes_zh: 粟粒疹是角蛋白被困在皮膚表層下所造成。原因包括：原發性發育性粟粒疹、皮膚外傷、燒燙傷、水皰性疾病、長期使用類固醇、厚重保養品或皮膚治療後的癒合反應。
symptoms_zh: 典型表現為直徑約 1–2 mm 的白色或淡黃色、堅硬、半球狀丘疹，無痛、不癢、無紅腫，除非被擠壓才可能發炎。
epidemiology_zh: 常見於所有年齡層，從新生兒到成人。新生兒原發性粟粒疹盛行率可達 50%；成人多見於皮膚受傷或手術後的次發性粟粒疹。
prognosis_zh: 為良性無害，多數會自然消退，尤其是嬰兒。若持續存在或影響外觀，可透過簡單的針挑移除。

title: Molluscum contagiosum
snippet: Molluscum contagiosum presents as clusters of small round papules. The papules range in size from 1 to 6 mm and may be white, pink or brown. They often have a waxy, shiny look with a small central pit (this appearance is sometimes described as umbilicated). Each papule contains white cheesy material
causes: Molluscum contagiosum is caused by a poxvirus, the molluscum contagiosum virus. There are at least 4 viral subtypes. There are several ways the virus can spread: Direct skin-to-skin contact Indirect contact via shared towels or other items Auto- inoculation into another site by scratching or shaving Sexual transmission in adults. Transmission of molluscum contagiosum appears to be more likely in wet conditions, such as when children bathe or swim together. The incubation period is usually about 2 weeks but can be as long as 6 months.
symptoms: Molluscum contagiosum presents as clusters of small round papules. The papules range in size from 1 to 6 mm and may be white, pink or brown. They often have a waxy, shiny look with a small central pit (this appearance is sometimes described as umbilicated). Each papule contains white cheesy material. There may be few or hundreds of papules on one individual. They mostly arise in warm moist places, such as the armpit, behind the knees, groin or genital areas. They can arise on the lips or rarely inside the mouth. They do not occur on palms or soles. When molluscum contagiosum is autoinoculated by scratching, the papules often form a row. Molluscum contagiosum frequently induces dermatitis around them and affected skin becomes pink, dry and itchy. As the papules resolve, they may become inflamed, crusted , or scabby for a week or two. Shiny umbilicated papules Typical umbilicated papules Associated with eczema See more images of molluscum contagiosum ...
epidemiology: Molluscum contagiosum mainly affects infants and young children under the age of 10 years. It is more prevalent in warm climates than cool ones, and in overcrowded environments. Adolescents and adults are less often infected. Molluscum contagiosum tends to be more numerous and last longer in children who also have atopic dermatitis , due to deficiencies in the skin barrier . It can be very extensive and troublesome in patients with human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection or that have other reasons for poor immune function.
prognosis: Secondary bacterial infection from scratching ( impetigo ) Conjunctivitis when the eyelid is infected Disseminated secondary eczema ; this represents an immunological reaction or 'id' to the virus Numerous and widespread molluscum contagiosum that are larger than usual may occur in immune-deficient patients (such as uncontrolled HIV infection or in patients on immune suppressing drugs) , and often affect the face Spontaneous, pitted scarring Scarring may be spontaneous or due to surgical treatment
snippet_zh: 傳染性軟疣表現為小圓形丘疹簇。丘疹的大小為 1 至 6 毫米，可能是白色、粉紅色或棕色。它們通常具有蠟質、閃亮的外觀，並帶有一個小中心坑（這種外觀有時被描述為臍狀）。每個丘疹含有白色乾酪狀物質
causes_zh: 傳染性軟疣是由痘病毒（傳染性軟疣病毒）引起的。至少有 4 種病毒亞型。病毒可以通過多種方式傳播： 直接皮膚接觸 通過共用毛巾或其他物品間接接觸 通過抓傷或剃須自動感染到另一個部位 成人中的性傳播。傳染性軟疣的傳播似乎在潮濕的條件下更容易發生，例如當孩子們一起洗澡或游泳時。潛伏期通常約為 2 週，但也可能長達 6 個月。
symptoms_zh: 傳染性軟疣表現為小圓形丘疹簇。丘疹的大小為 1 至 6 毫米，可能是白色、粉紅色或棕色。它們通常具有蠟質、閃亮的外觀，並帶有一個小中心坑（這種外觀有時被描述為臍狀）。每個丘疹含有白色乾酪物質。一個人身上可能有幾個或數百個丘疹。它們大多出現在溫暖潮濕的地方，如腋窩、膝蓋後面、腹股溝或生殖器區域。它們可能出現在嘴唇上或很少出現在口腔內。它們不會出現在手掌或腳掌上。當傳染性軟疣通過抓撓自行接種時，丘疹常形成一排。傳染性軟疣經常會引起周圍的皮炎，受影響的皮膚會變成粉紅色、乾燥和發癢。當丘疹消退後，它們可能會發炎、結痂或結痂，持續一兩週。閃亮的臍丘疹 典型的臍丘疹 與濕疹相關 查看更多傳染性軟疣的圖片 ...
epidemiology_zh: 傳染性軟疣主要影響10歲以下的嬰幼兒。它在溫暖的氣候中比在涼爽的氣候中以及在過度擁擠的環境中更普遍。青少年和成人較少被感染。由於皮膚屏障的缺陷，患有特應性皮炎的兒童中傳染性軟疣的數量往往更多且持續時間更長。對於人類免疫缺陷病毒 (HIV) 感染或因其他原因導致免疫功能低下的患者來說，這種情況可能非常廣泛且麻煩。
prognosis_zh: 抓傷引起的繼發性細菌感染（膿皰瘡） 眼瞼感染時結膜炎 播散性繼發性濕疹；這代表對病毒的免疫反應或“id” 免疫缺陷患者（例如不受控制的 HIV 感染或服用免疫抑製藥物的患者）可能會出現比平時更大的大量廣泛的傳染性軟疣，並且經常影響面部 自發性、凹陷性疤痕 疤痕可能是自發的，也可能是由於手術治療造成的

title: Morbilliform drug reaction
snippet: On the first occasion, a morbilliform rash usually appears 1–2 weeks after starting the drug, but it may occur up to 1 week after stopping it. On re-exposure to the causative (or related) drug, skin lesions appear within 1–3 days. It is very rare for a drug that has been taken for months or years to
causes: Morbilliform drug eruption is a form of allergic reaction. It is mediated by cytotoxic T-cells and classified as a Type IV immune reaction. The target of attack may be drug, a metabolite of the drug, or a protein bonded to the drug. Inflammation follows the release of cytokines and other effector immune cells.
symptoms: On the first occasion, a morbilliform rash usually appears 1–2 weeks after starting the drug, but it may occur up to 1 week after stopping it. On re-exposure to the causative (or related) drug, skin lesions appear within 1–3 days. It is very rare for a drug that has been taken for months or years to cause a morbilliform drug eruption. Morbilliform drug eruption usually first appears on the trunk and then spreads to the limbs and neck. The distribution is bilateral and symmetrical. The primary lesion is a pink-to-red flat macule or papule. Annular , targetoid , urticaria -like or polymorphous morphology may occur. Lesions mostly blanch with pressure but may be non-blanchable ( purpuric ) on the lower legs. Discrete lesions may merge together to form large erythematous patches or plaques. Axilla , groin, hands and feet are usually spared. Paradoxical prominent rash in axillae and groins may be due to symmetrical drug related intertriginous and flexural exanthem (SDRIFE) Mucous membranes, hair and nails are not affected in uncomplicated drug eruptions. The rash may be associated with a mild fever and itch. As it improves, the redness dies away and the surface skin peels off.
epidemiology: About 2% of prescriptions of new drugs cause a drug eruption. About 95% of these are morbilliform drug eruptions. They mainly affect people prescribed beta-lactam antibiotics ( penicillins , cephalosporins), sulfonamides , allopurinol, anti-epileptic drugs and nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAID) . Numerous other drugs have been reported to cause morbilliform drug eruptions, including herbal and natural therapies. Predisposing factors include: Previous drug eruption or strong family history of drug eruptions Underlying viral infection , particularly acute Epstein-Barr virus (EBV, infectious mononucleosis ) and human herpesvirus 6 and 7 (see also roseola , pityriasis rosea ) Immunodeficiency including human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) , cystic fibrosis , autoimmune disorders Multiple medications
prognosis: In the early phase, it may not be possible to clinically distinguish an uncomplicated morbilliform eruption from other more serious cutaneous adverse reactions (SCAR). These are: Drug hypersensitivity syndrome Stevens Johnson syndrome – toxic epidermal necrolysis (SJS/TEN) Acute generalised exanthematous pustulosis (AGEP) Patients with the following symptoms/signs should be hospitalised for specialist assessment and supportive care. Erythroderma (whole-body involvement) High fever or significant malaise Any mucosal involvement Skin tenderness Blistering Pustules Palpable purpura Evidence of other organ involvement (eg liver, kidneys, lungs, blood)
snippet_zh: 第一次，麻疹樣皮疹通常在開始用藥後 1-2 週出現，但也可能在停藥後 1 週內出現。再次接觸致病（或相關）藥物後，皮膚損傷會在 1-3 天內出現。服用數月或數年的藥物很少見
causes_zh: 麻疹樣藥疹是過敏反應的一種形式。它由細胞毒性 T 細胞介導，屬於 IV 型免疫反應。攻擊目標可以是藥物、藥物的代謝物或與藥物結合的蛋白質。炎症發生在細胞因子和其他效應免疫細胞的釋放之後。
symptoms_zh: 第一次，麻疹樣皮疹通常在開始用藥後 1-2 週出現，但也可能在停藥後 1 週內出現。再次接觸致病（或相關）藥物後，皮膚損傷會在 1-3 天內出現。服用數月或數年的藥物引起麻疹狀藥疹的情況非常罕見。麻疹樣藥疹通常首先出現在軀幹，然後蔓延至四肢和頸部。分佈呈雙側且對稱。主要病變是粉紅色至紅色的扁平斑疹或丘疹。可能會出現環形、靶樣、蕁麻疹樣或多形形態。病變大部分會因壓力而變白，但小腿上可能不會變白（紫癜）。離散的病變可能合併在一起形成大的紅斑或斑塊。腋窩、腹股溝、手和腳通常不會受到影響。腋窩和腹股溝的反常顯著皮疹可能是由於對稱性藥物相關間擦和彎曲皮疹 (SDRIFE) 引起的。在無並發症的藥疹中，粘膜、毛髮和指甲不受影響。皮疹可能伴有輕度發燒和瘙癢。隨著病情的改善，發紅現象會消失，表面皮膚也會脫落。
epidemiology_zh: 大約 2% 的新藥處方會導致藥疹。其中約95%是麻疹狀藥疹。它們主要影響服用β-內酰胺類抗生素（青黴素、頭孢菌素）、磺胺類、別嘌呤醇、抗癲癇藥和非甾體抗炎藥（NSAID）的人群。據報導，許多其他藥物也會引起麻疹樣藥疹，包括草藥和自然療法。誘發因素包括： 既往藥疹或強烈的藥疹家族史 潛在的病毒感染，特別是急性 Epstein-Barr 病毒（EBV，傳染性單核細胞增多症）和人類皰疹病毒 6 型和 7 型（另見玫瑰疹、玫瑰糠疹） 免疫缺陷，包括人類免疫缺陷病毒 (HIV)、囊性纖維化、自身免疫性疾病 多種藥物治療
prognosis_zh: 在早期階段，臨床上可能無法區分簡單的麻疹狀皮疹和其他更嚴重的皮膚不良反應（SCAR）。它們是： 藥物過敏綜合徵 史蒂文斯約翰遜綜合徵 - 中毒性表皮壞死松解症 (SJS/TEN) 急性全身性發疹性膿皰病 (AGEP) 具有以下症狀/體徵的患者應住院接受專科評估和支持治療。紅皮病（全身受累） 高燒或明顯不適 任何粘膜受累 皮膚壓痛 起泡膿皰 可觸及紫癜 其他器官受累的證據（例如肝、腎、肺、血液）

title: Nail disorders
snippet: Nail disorders include abnormalities of the nail plate, nail bed, nail fold, and surrounding skin, caused by trauma, infection, inflammation, systemic disease, or tumors.
causes: Common causes include fungal infections (onychomycosis), bacterial infections, psoriasis, eczema, trauma, systemic diseases such as thyroid disease or anemia, aging, medications, and benign or malignant tumors of the nail unit.
symptoms: Typical presentation includes nail discoloration, thickening, brittleness, pitting, ridging, splitting, lifting from the nail bed, pain, swelling of the nail fold, or deformity depending on the underlying cause.
epidemiology: Nail disorders affect individuals of all ages. Onychomycosis is more common in adults and elderly individuals, while structural abnormalities and trauma-related changes are frequent in younger populations. Certain systemic diseases increase risk.
prognosis: Prognosis depends on the underlying condition. Some nail disorders resolve with treatment (e.g., infections), while chronic inflammatory or systemic diseases may cause persistent or recurring nail changes.
snippet_zh: 指甲疾病包括指甲板、甲床、甲襞及周圍皮膚的異常，可由感染、外傷、發炎、全身性疾病或腫瘤引起。
causes_zh: 常見原因包括真菌感染（甲癬）、細菌感染、乾癬、濕疹、外傷、甲狀腺疾病、貧血、老化、藥物副作用，以及指甲單位的良性或惡性腫瘤。
symptoms_zh: 常見表現包括指甲變色、增厚、脆裂、凹陷、縱紋、分裂、指甲與甲床分離、疼痛、甲襞腫脹或指甲變形，會依照不同病因而異。
epidemiology_zh: 指甲疾病可發生於各年齡層。甲癬較常見於成人與老年人，而結構異常或外傷相關問題在年輕族群較多見。部分全身性疾病會增加發生風險。
prognosis_zh: 預後取決於病因。有些指甲疾病可在治療後改善（如感染），但慢性發炎或全身性疾病可能導致持續或反覆的指甲變化。

title: Nail psoriasis
snippet: Fingernails and toenails can be affected by nail psoriasis. Psoriatic nail dystrophy can cause tenderness and pain, altered sense of fine touch, and difficulty picking up or manipulating objects such as shoelaces or buttons.
causes: Psoriasis is a multifactorial systemic disease including inflammation and epidermal hyperproliferation. Nail psoriasis can involve the nail bed, nail matrix, hyponychium , and nail folds. Theories include: Activation of the antimicrobial peptide LL-37 by Candida and the cytokine overflow theory Increased expression of interleukin (IL)-10 in the affected nail bed compared to downregulation of IL-10 in psoriatic skin lesions Koebnerisation of psoriasis in onychomycosis or nail trauma.
symptoms: Fingernails and toenails can be affected by nail psoriasis. Psoriatic nail dystrophy can cause tenderness and pain, altered sense of fine touch, and difficulty picking up or manipulating objects such as shoelaces or buttons.
epidemiology: Nail psoriasis affects 90% of patients with chronic plaque psoriasis at some time in their life. It is more common in adults with a prevalence of up to 80%, compared to children in whom it has been reported in 7–13%. In the absence of skin or joint disease, psoriatic nail disease has been described in 5–10% of adults. Psoriatic nail disease may be a risk factor the development of psoriatic arthritis and is often associated with prolonged severe cutaneous psoriasis. Nail psoriasis can affect all races and age groups, and both sexes, although a male predominance has been reported in one large case series.
prognosis: Secondary onychomycosis in the damaged nail plate Psychosocial effects impacting social relationships and work-related activities Association with psoriatic arthritis and metabolic syndrome
snippet_zh: 手指甲和腳趾甲可能會受到指甲牛皮癬的影響。銀屑病指甲營養不良可導致壓痛和疼痛、精細觸覺改變以及拾取或操作鞋帶或鈕扣等物體困難。
causes_zh: 牛皮癬是一種多因素的全身性疾病，包括炎症和表皮過度增殖。指甲牛皮癬可累及甲床、甲基質、甲下層和甲襞。理論包括： 念珠菌激活抗菌肽 LL-37 和細胞因子溢出理論 與銀屑病皮損中 IL-10 的下調相比，受影響甲床中白細胞介素 (IL)-10 的表達增加，甲真菌病或指甲外傷中銀屑病科布納化。
symptoms_zh: 手指甲和腳趾甲可能會受到指甲牛皮癬的影響。銀屑病指甲營養不良可導致壓痛和疼痛、精細觸覺改變以及拾取或操作鞋帶或鈕扣等物體困難。
epidemiology_zh: 90% 的患者在一生中的某個時期患有慢性斑塊狀銀屑病，指甲銀屑病影響著他們。該病在成人中更為常見，患病率高達 80%，而兒童中的患病率為 7-13%。在沒有皮膚或關節疾病的情況下，5-10% 的成年人患有銀屑病指甲病。銀屑病指甲病可能是銀屑病關節炎發展的危險因素，並且通常與長期嚴重的皮膚銀屑病有關。指甲牛皮癬可影響所有種族和年齡組以及男女，儘管在一項大型病例係列中報導男性占主導地位。
prognosis_zh: 受損指甲板中的繼發性甲真菌病 影響社會關係和工作相關活動的心理社會影響 與銀屑病關節炎和代謝綜合徵的關聯

title: Napkin dermatitis
snippet: Napkin dermatitis presents as erythematous macules and papules in the genital area that can spread to involve the lower abdomen and thighs. Irritant napkin dermatitis: well- demarcated variable erythema , oedema , dryness and scaling. Affected skin is in contact with the wet napkin and tends to spar
causes: Napkin dermatitis follows damage to the normal skin barrier and is primarily a form of irritant contact dermatitis . Urine and occlusion lead to overhydration and skin maceration. Faecal bile salts and enzymes break down stratum corneum lipids and proteins. A mixture of urine and faeces creates ammonium hydroxide, raising pH. The wet skin is colonised by micro- organisms , particularly candida. Mechanical friction from limb movement may increase discomfort. Pre-existing skin conditions such as atopic dermatitis or seborrheic dermatitis predispose a baby to napkin dermatitis. Babies who are breastfed have a lower incidence of napkin dermatitis, as faeces in breastfed babies have a lower pH than in formula-fed babies. As babies start to eat solid foods, the stool frequency and pH start to increase and napkin dermatitis occurs more often. Other causes of napkin rashes include: Candida albicans Impetigo Infantile seborrhoeic dermatitis Atopic eczema Psoriasis Miliaria Acrodermatitis enteropathica Acrodermatitis enteropathica-like conditions Biotin responsive dermatosis Rare disorders. Napkin dermatitis is not due to: Allergy to the napkins Toxins in the napkins Washing powders (unless these are not thoroughly removed by rinsing) Dermatophyte fungal infections ( tinea ).
symptoms: Napkin dermatitis presents as erythematous macules and papules in the genital area that can spread to involve the lower abdomen and thighs. Irritant napkin dermatitis: well- demarcated variable erythema , oedema , dryness and scaling. Affected skin is in contact with the wet napkin and tends to spare the skin folds. Chafing: erythema and erosions where the napkin rubs, usually on waistband or thighs. Granuloma gluteale infantum : red or purple nodules Candida albicans : erythematous papules and plaques with small satellite spots or superficial pustules. Impetigo ( Staphylococcus aureus and Streptococcus pyogenes ): irregular blisters and pustules. Infantile seborrhoeic dermatitis : cradle cap and bilateral salmon pink patches, often desquamating, in skin folds. Atopic dermatitis : bilateral scratched, dry plaques anywhere, but uncommon in the nappy area and family history is common. Psoriasis : persistent , well- circumscribed , symmetrical , shiny, red, scaly or macerated plaques; other sites may be involved; family history common. Disseminated secondary eczema or autoeczematisation: rash in distal sites associated with severe napkin rash. Napkin dermatitis may predispose the infant to urinary tract infection and, in females, to vaginal infection. Napkin dermatitis Napkin dermatitis thrush Napkin dermatitis See more images of napkin dermatitis .
epidemiology: Napkin dermatitis most often affects babies aged 3 to 15 months of age, especially those wearing traditional cloth nappies (50%). It is much less prevalent in babies wearing modern breathable and multilayered disposable nappies. Napkin dermatitis can also affect older children and adults that are incontinent (see Incontinence-associated dermatitis ).
snippet_zh: 餐巾皮炎表現為生殖器區域的紅斑和丘疹，可擴散至下腹部和大腿。刺激性餐巾皮炎：界限清楚的可變紅斑、水腫、乾燥和脫屑。受影響的皮膚與濕餐巾接觸並容易產生摩擦
causes_zh: 餐巾皮炎是由於正常皮膚屏障受損而引起的，主要是刺激性接觸性皮炎的一種形式。尿液和閉塞會導致過度水合和皮膚浸漬。糞便膽汁鹽和酶分解角質層脂質和蛋白質。尿液和糞便的混合物會產生氫氧化銨，從而提高 pH 值。潮濕的皮膚上有微生物，特別是念珠菌。肢體運動產生的機械摩擦可能會增加不適感。已有的皮膚病，如特應性皮炎或脂溢性皮炎，會使嬰兒容易患餐巾紙皮炎。母乳喂養的嬰兒餐巾紙皮炎的發病率較低，因為母乳喂養的嬰兒糞便的 pH 值低於配方奶餵養的嬰兒。當嬰兒開始吃固體食物時，大便頻率和pH值開始增加，餐巾皮炎更容易發生。餐巾紙皮疹的其他原因包括： 白色念珠菌 膿皰病 嬰兒脂溢性皮炎 特應性濕疹 牛皮癬 痱子 肢端皮炎 腸病肢端皮炎 腸病樣病症 生物素反應性皮膚病 罕見疾病。餐巾皮炎的原因不是： 對餐巾過敏 餐巾中的毒素 洗衣粉（除非沒有通過沖洗徹底去除） 皮膚癬菌感染（癬）。
symptoms_zh: 餐巾皮炎表現為生殖器區域的紅斑和丘疹，可擴散至下腹部和大腿。刺激性餐巾皮炎：界限清楚的可變紅斑、水腫、乾燥和脫屑。受影響的皮膚與濕餐巾接觸，並且往往不會傷害皮膚褶皺。擦傷：餐巾摩擦處出現紅斑和糜爛，通常發生在腰帶或大腿上。嬰兒臀肉芽腫：紅色或紫色結節白色念珠菌：紅斑丘疹和斑塊，伴有小衛星斑或淺表膿皰。膿皰病（金黃色葡萄球菌和化膿性鏈球菌）：不規則水皰和膿皰。嬰兒脂溢性皮炎：乳痂和雙側鮭魚粉紅色斑塊，常脫落，位於皮膚皺褶處。特應性皮炎：雙側任何地方有抓傷、乾燥斑塊，但在尿佈區域不常見，家族史很常見。牛皮癬：持續存在、邊界清楚、對稱、有光澤、紅色、鱗狀或浸漬斑塊；可能涉及其他站點；家族史常見。播散性繼發性濕疹或自身濕疹：遠端部位出現皮疹，伴有嚴重的餐巾紙皮疹。餐巾皮炎可能使嬰兒容易發生尿路感染，女性則容易發生陰道感染。餐巾皮炎 餐巾皮炎 鵝口瘡 餐巾皮炎 查看更多餐巾皮炎圖片。
epidemiology_zh: 餐巾皮炎最常影響 3 至 15 個月大的嬰兒，尤其是那些穿著傳統布尿布的嬰兒 (50%)。在穿著現代透氣多層一次性尿布的嬰兒中，這種情況要少得多。餐巾皮炎也會影響失禁的年齡較大的兒童和成人（參見失禁相關皮炎）。

title: Necrobiosis lipoidica
snippet: Necrobiosis lipoidica begins as a dull red papule or plaque on the shin which slowly enlarges into one or more yellowish-brown patches with a red rim. The patches: Most often occur on both shins and are found in other sites only rarely May be asymptomatic or tender May be round, oval, or an irregula
causes: The cause of necrobiosis lipoidica is unknown. Theories have included blood vessel changes such as develop in diabetes, or antibody -mediated vasculitis.
symptoms: Necrobiosis lipoidica begins as a dull red papule or plaque on the shin which slowly enlarges into one or more yellowish-brown patches with a red rim. The patches: Most often occur on both shins and are found in other sites only rarely May be asymptomatic or tender May be round, oval, or an irregular shape Central atrophy - shiny, pale, and thinned, with prominent blood vessels ( telangiectasia ) May demonstrate reduced sweating and sensation.
epidemiology: Necrobiosis lipoidica is three times more common in females than in males, and usually develops in young and middle-aged adults. 1% of patients with diabetes will develop necrobiosis lipoidica. It can occur in both type 1 and type 2 diabetes mellitus. 11–65% of patients with necrobiosis lipoidica have diabetes or prediabetes. Diabetes associated with necrobiosis lipoidica can be well controlled or poorly controlled. Patients with type 1 diabetes are more likely to be younger than those with type 2 diabetes or without diabetes. Other associations include obesity, hypertension , dyslipidaemia and thyroid disease. Necrobiosis lipoidica is rare in children.
prognosis: Ulceration complicates 1/3 of cases of necrobiosis lipoidica, usually following minor injury to an established patch. The ulcer may be very painful or painless. Ulcers due to necrobiosis lipoidica are at risk of secondary bacterial infection and delayed healing. Squamous cell carcinoma has been reported to develop in ulcerated necrobiosis lipoidica.
snippet_zh: 類脂壞死症開始時是脛骨上的暗紅色丘疹或斑塊，慢慢擴大成一個或多個帶有紅色邊緣的黃棕色斑塊。斑塊： 最常見於雙側小腿，很少見於其他部位 可能無症狀或觸痛 可能是圓形、橢圓形或不規則形
causes_zh: 類脂壞死的原因尚不清楚。理論包括血管變化，例如糖尿病或抗體介導的血管炎。
symptoms_zh: 類脂壞死症開始時是脛骨上的暗紅色丘疹或斑塊，慢慢擴大成一個或多個帶有紅色邊緣的黃棕色斑塊。斑塊： 最常見於雙側脛骨，很少見於其他部位 可能無症狀或觸痛 可能是圓形、橢圓形或不規則形狀 中央萎縮 - 有光澤、蒼白且變薄，血管突出（毛細血管擴張） 可能表現出出汗和感覺減少。
epidemiology_zh: 類脂壞死症在女性中的發病率是男性的三倍，通常發生於青壯年。1%的糖尿病患者會出現脂質壞死。它可以發生在 1 型和 2 型糖尿病中。11-65% 的脂質壞死病患者患有糖尿病或糖尿病前期。與脂質壞死相關的糖尿病可以得到很好的控制，也可以控制不佳。1 型糖尿病患者比 2 型糖尿病患者或非糖尿病患者更可能年輕。其他關聯包括肥胖、高血壓、血脂異常和甲狀腺疾病。類脂壞死症在兒童中很少見。
prognosis_zh: 1/3 的脂質壞死病病例中，通常在已形成的斑塊受到輕微損傷後，會發生潰瘍。潰瘍可能非常疼痛或無痛。脂質壞死引起的潰瘍有繼發細菌感染和延遲癒合的風險。據報導，鱗狀細胞癌在潰瘍性壞死性脂質中發生。

title: Necrotising fasciitis
snippet: Signs and symptoms vary between individuals but often some or all of the following are present.
causes: Usually caused by bacteria entering through a break in the skin. Common pathogens include group A Streptococcus, Staphylococcus aureus, Vibrio species, Aeromonas, Clostridium and mixed anaerobic–aerobic infections. Risk factors include trauma, surgery, burns, insect bites, injection sites, diabetes, vascular disease and immunosuppression.
symptoms: Early symptoms include severe pain out of proportion to the skin appearance, swelling, redness and warmth. Rapid progression leads to dusky or purplish skin, blistering, bullae, skin necrosis, fever, chills, confusion and rapid systemic toxicity. Crepitus may occur if gas-forming organisms are present.
epidemiology: Rare but life-threatening. Occurs in all ages but more common in older adults, diabetics, immunocompromised patients and those with chronic wounds or vascular disease. Can follow trauma, surgery, aquatic injuries or minor skin breaches.
prognosis: Prompt diagnosis and treatment are essential to reduce the risk of death and disfigurement from necrotising fasciitis. If diagnosed and treated early, most patients will survive necrotising fasciitis with minimal scarring. If there is significant tissue loss, later skin grafting will be necessary and in some patients amputation of limbs is required to prevent death. Up to 25% of patients will die from necrotising fasciitis, due to complications such as renal failure and septicaemia and multiorgan failure.
snippet_zh: 體徵和症狀因人而異，但通常會出現以下部分或全部症狀。
causes_zh: 通常由細菌經皮膚破口侵入引起。常見病原包含 A 組鏈球菌、金黃色葡萄球菌、弧菌屬、嗜水氣單胞菌、梭菌及厭氧與需氧混合感染。風險因子包括外傷、手術、燒燙傷、昆蟲叮咬、注射部位、糖尿病、血管疾病與免疫抑制。
symptoms_zh: 早期症狀包含與外觀不成比例的劇烈疼痛、腫脹、發紅與局部溫度上升。之後迅速惡化，形成暗紫色皮膚、水皰、大皰、皮膚壞死、發燒、寒顫、意識混亂與全身毒性反應。若為產氣菌感染，可能出現捻髮音（皮下氣體）。
epidemiology_zh: 罕見但極為致命。所有年齡都可發生，但較常見於老年人、糖尿病患者、免疫低下者、慢性傷口或血管疾病患者。可發生於外傷、手術後、水域暴露或輕微皮損後。
prognosis_zh: 及時診斷與治療對降低死亡與毀容風險至關重要。若及早治療，多數患者可存活且疤痕較少。若組織缺損嚴重需植皮，部分患者需要截肢以避免死亡。因腎衰竭、敗血症與多器官衰竭等併發症，約有 25% 患者可能死亡。

title: Neonatal cephalic pustulosis
snippet: Neonatal cephalic pustulosis presents in young infants as small inflammatory papules and pustules on the cheeks, forehead, or scalp.
causes: Associated with Malassezia (yeast) colonisation. Mycology of pustule smears may show Malassezia on microscopy or culture.
symptoms: Inflammatory papules and pustules mainly on the face of newborns — cheeks, forehead, scalp. Lesions are non-comedonal (unlike true acne). Infants otherwise appear well.
epidemiology: Common in newborns, typically appearing within the first few weeks of life. Considered a benign and self-limiting condition.
prognosis: Excellent. Usually resolves spontaneously within weeks. Antifungal therapy may be used but is often unnecessary.
snippet_zh: 新生兒頭部膿皰病在嬰兒臉部出現小型發炎性丘疹與膿皰，常見於臉頰、前額或頭皮。
causes_zh: 與馬拉色菌定植相關。面部膿皰的塗片在顯微鏡或培養中可見馬拉色菌。
symptoms_zh: 主要在新生兒臉部出現小丘疹與膿皰，包括臉頰、前額與頭皮。無粉刺形成，與真正的青春痘不同。嬰兒通常精神良好、無不適症狀。
epidemiology_zh: 常見於新生兒，通常在出生後數週內出現，屬於良性、自限性疾病。
prognosis_zh: 預後極佳，通常會在數週內自行消退。部分情況可使用抗真菌藥，但多數不需要。

title: Nicotinamide
snippet: Nicotinamide (vitamin B3) is used in dermatology for anti-inflammatory, barrier-supporting, and photoprotective benefits.
causes: Not applicable. Nicotinamide is a treatment and nutrient, not a disease.
symptoms: Not applicable. Nicotinamide does not cause symptoms; it is used to improve inflammatory skin conditions such as acne, rosacea, and to reduce actinic damage.
epidemiology: Widely used in adults for acne, rosacea, pigment disorders, and chemoprevention in high–skin-cancer-risk patients.
prognosis: Generally safe and well tolerated. Clinical outcomes depend on indication — often improves inflammation and reduces new actinic keratoses when taken regularly.
snippet_zh: 煙酰胺（維生素 B3）常用於皮膚科，具有抗發炎、強化皮膚屏障及光防護效果。
causes_zh: 不適用。煙酰胺是營養素與治療方式，而非疾病原因。
symptoms_zh: 不適用。煙酰胺本身不會引起症狀；其用途是改善發炎性皮膚病，如痤瘡、酒糟，以及減少光老化與日光損傷。
epidemiology_zh: 廣泛使用於成人族群，包含痤瘡、酒糟、色素問題及高皮膚癌風險族群的日光角化症預防。
prognosis_zh: 安全性高、耐受性佳；臨床效果依使用目的而異，規律使用可改善發炎並減少新發日光角化症。

title: Nodular prurigo
snippet: Nodular prurigo can vary in severity, from a few to hundreds of lesions of varying size. Initially, the rash : Consists of small, red or pink bumps (usually 3–8 mm in diameter) Is intensely itchy Has a hyperpigmented border Is located in easily accessible areas of the body – lateral aspects of the a
causes: The exact cause of prurigo nodularis remains unknown. It is thought to relate to a dysregulation of the nerves as skin biopsies have shown a greater number of nerve cells in the dermis but a reduced amount in the epidermis. There is also an increased number of Merkel cells in the epidermis and the papillary layer of the dermis, as well as more neutrophils and mast cells , thus more cytokine release; which may explain the severe itchiness . The itchiness may start as a result of an insect bite, stress, dermatitis , or another underlying skin or systemic condition. There is also an association with brachioradial pruritus , which results from traction of spinal nerves in the neck. Scratching will thicken and inflame skin, worsening the condition.
symptoms: Nodular prurigo can vary in severity, from a few to hundreds of lesions of varying size. Initially, the rash : Consists of small, red or pink bumps (usually 3–8 mm in diameter) Is intensely itchy Has a hyperpigmented border Is located in easily accessible areas of the body – lateral aspects of the arms and legs, shoulders, chest, and buttocks In some cases, presents as a papule before developing into a nodule or a plaque. Scratching leads to: Enlargement resulting in a nodular, raised, warty surface Nodules tend to be firm and small but can measure up to 3 cm in diameter Older nodules are normally darker and are surrounded by paler, dry skin Nodules are grouped and follow a symmetrical distribution Some may ulcerate increasing infection risk Healed lesions can leave a scar or discolouration Affected skin may harden and thicken ( hyperkeratotic ). Click here for images
epidemiology: Nodular prurigo can affect both sexes and people of all ages but is more common in older adults. There is also an association with: Atopy ( predisposition to asthma, atopic dermatitis , and hayfever) Drugs that produce chronic itch such as antimalarials, opioids, and targeted cancer treatments Internal disease such as: Cancer Diabetes Liver disease Chronic kidney disease HIV/AIDS Thyroid disorders .
prognosis: Aside from its chronicity , the main complications are: Automatic scratching behaviour that may develop in the absence of pruritus Local infection.
snippet_zh: 結節性癢疹的嚴重程度各不相同，從幾個到數百個不同大小的病變。最初，皮疹： 由紅色或粉紅色的小腫塊（直徑通常為 3-8 毫米）組成 極度瘙癢 邊緣色素沉著 位於身體容易觸及的區域 – 皮膚的側面
causes_zh: 結節性癢疹的確切病因尚不清楚。人們認為這與神經失調有關，因為皮膚活檢顯示真皮中的神經細胞數量較多，但表皮中的神經細胞數量減少。表皮和真皮乳頭層的默克爾細胞數量也增多，中性粒細胞和肥大細胞也增多，從而釋放更多的細胞因子；這或許可以解釋為什麼會出現嚴重的瘙癢。瘙癢可能是由於昆蟲叮咬、壓力、皮炎或其他潛在的皮膚或全身狀況引起的。它還與臂橈瘙癢有關，這是由頸部脊神經牽引引起的。抓撓會使皮膚增厚、發炎，使病情惡化。
symptoms_zh: 結節性癢疹的嚴重程度各不相同，從幾個到數百個不同大小的病變。最初，皮疹： 由紅色或粉紅色的小腫塊（直徑通常為 3-8 毫米）組成 極度瘙癢 邊緣色素沉著過多 位於身體容易觸及的部位 - 手臂和腿的側面、肩膀、胸部和臀部 在某些情況下，在發展為結節或斑塊之前表現為丘疹。抓撓會導致： 腫大，形成結節狀、凸起的疣狀表面 結節往往堅硬而小，但直徑可達 3 厘米 較老的結節通常顏色較深，周圍是蒼白、乾燥的皮膚 結節成群並呈對稱分佈 有些可能會潰爛，增加感染風險 癒合的病變可能會留下疤痕或變色 受影響的皮膚可能會變硬和增厚（角化過度）。單擊此處查看圖像
epidemiology_zh: 結節性癢疹可影響男女和所有年齡段的人，但在老年人中更為常見。它還與以下因素有關： 特應性（易患哮喘、特應性皮炎和花粉熱） 產生慢性瘙癢的藥物，例如抗瘧藥、阿片類藥物和靶向癌症治療 內科疾病，例如： 癌症 糖尿病 肝病 慢性腎病 HIV/艾滋病 甲狀腺疾病。
prognosis_zh: 除了其慢性性外，主要並發症有： 在沒有瘙癢的情況下可能出現的自動抓撓行為 局部感染。

title: Nodulocystic acne
snippet: Solitary or multiple inflammatory nodules and pseudocysts Firm, fluctuant , and/or tender Involvement of the face, neck, and trunk Nodulocystic acne: cheek Nodulocystic acne: chest Nodulocystic acne: face More images of acne ... Facial acne Back acne
causes: The pathogenesis of acne is believed to be multifactorial involving increased sebaceous gland activity, abnormal keratinisation of follicles , the action of microorganisms , and subsequent inflammation. Specific risk factors for nodulocystic acne include: Genetic factors Drugs including anabolic steroids, etanercept , imatinib Dietary supplements such as whey Haemodialysis.
symptoms: Solitary or multiple inflammatory nodules and pseudocysts Firm, fluctuant , and/or tender Involvement of the face, neck, and trunk Nodulocystic acne: cheek Nodulocystic acne: chest Nodulocystic acne: face More images of acne ... Facial acne Back acne
epidemiology: Nodulocystic acne is usually a disorder of adolescence and early adult life seen most commonly in males. However there is a rare juvenile form with onset before 6 years of age, also with a male predominance. No studies have shown an increased incidence in specific racial groups. Nodulocystic acne is associated with other follicular occlusion disorders particularly hidradenitis suppurativa . The acne conglobata variant of nodulocystic acne is the 'A' in a number of syndromes including: SAPHO , PASH, PASS, and PAPA .
prognosis: Psychological effects of acne Keloid, hypertrophic and atrophic scars Pyogenic granuloma
snippet_zh: 孤立性或多發性炎癥結節和假性囊腫 堅硬、波動和/或壓痛 累及面部、頸部和軀幹 結節囊性痤瘡：臉頰 結節囊性痤瘡：胸部 結節囊性痤瘡：面部 更多痤瘡圖片 ... 面部痤瘡 背部痤瘡
causes_zh: 痤瘡的發病機制被認為是多因素的，涉及皮脂腺活性增加、毛囊角質化異常、微生物的作用以及隨後的炎症。結節性囊性痤瘡的具體危險因素包括： 遺傳因素 藥物，包括合成代謝類固醇、依那西普、伊馬替尼 膳食補充劑，例如乳清 血液透析。
symptoms_zh: 孤立性或多發性炎癥結節和假性囊腫 堅硬、波動和/或壓痛 累及面部、頸部和軀幹 結節囊性痤瘡：臉頰 結節囊性痤瘡：胸部 結節囊性痤瘡：面部 更多痤瘡圖片 ... 面部痤瘡 背部痤瘡
epidemiology_zh: 結節囊性痤瘡通常是一種青春期和成年早期的疾病，最常見於男性。然而，有一種罕見的青少年形式在 6 歲之前發病，也以男性為主。沒有研究表明特定種族群體的發病率有所增加。結節囊性痤瘡與其他毛囊閉塞疾病特別是化膿性汗腺炎有關。結節囊性痤瘡的聚合性痤瘡變體是許多綜合徵中的“A”，包括：SAPHO、PASH、PASS 和 PAPA。
prognosis_zh: 痤瘡疤痕疙瘩、肥厚性和萎縮性疤痕、化膿性肉芽腫的心理影響

title: Notalgia paraesthetica
snippet: Notalgia paraesthetica often starts after a period of intense exercise leading to muscular stiffness, or a period of inactivity. A specific injury may be recalled. It is characterised by intense itch ( pruritus ) on the medial border of one scapula or both, ie, between the shoulder blades. This itch
causes: The nerves which supply sensation to the upper back emerge from the spinal cord (2nd to 6th thoracic segments) and run a long course up through the thick muscles of the back. They make a right-angled turn before reaching the skin. The nerves appear to be vulnerable to compression or traction. Partial compression or injury leads to the symptoms. The initial injury to the nerves may include: Back injury Herniated or 'slipped' disc Herpes zoster (shingles) Sunburn Myelopathy Small fibre neuropathy
symptoms: Notalgia paraesthetica often starts after a period of intense exercise leading to muscular stiffness, or a period of inactivity. A specific injury may be recalled. It is characterised by intense itch ( pruritus ) on the medial border of one scapula or both, ie, between the shoulder blades. This itch can be intermittent or continuous. It is unrelieved by scratching, although the scratching and rubbing may be pleasurable. The affected area may spread to both shoulder blades and more widely over the back and shoulders. In many patients, there are no visible signs. Visible changes often arise from rubbing and scratching the affected area. These include: Scratch marks Hyperpigmentation (brown marks) > Hypopigmentation (white marks) Lichen simplex (a type of eczema ) Scarring There may be changed sensation in the affected area of skin, when this is tested for with pinprick, cotton wool or heat and cold. There may be reduced or absent sweating in the affected area. Scratch marks Hyperpigmentation Scarring

causes_zh: 為上背部提供感覺的神經從脊髓（第二至第六胸段）發出，並沿著背部厚實的肌肉向上延伸很長一段路。它們在到達皮膚之前會進行直角轉彎。神經似乎容易受到壓迫或牽引。局部受壓或受傷會導致症狀。最初的神經損傷可能包括： 背部損傷 椎間盤突出或“滑脫” 帶狀皰疹（帶狀皰疹） 曬傷 脊髓病 小纖維神經病
symptoms_zh: 感覺異常痛通常在一段時間的劇烈運動導致肌肉僵硬或一段時間不活動後開始。可能會回憶起特定的傷害。其特徵是一側肩胛骨或兩側肩胛骨的內側緣（即肩胛骨之間）出現劇烈瘙癢（瘙癢）。這種瘙癢可以是間歇性的，也可以是持續性的。儘管抓撓和摩擦可能會令人愉悅，但抓撓並不能緩解這種症狀。受影響的區域可能會擴散到兩個肩胛骨，並更廣泛地擴散到背部和肩膀。許多患者沒有明顯的症狀。摩擦和抓傷受影響區域通常會產生明顯的變化。這些包括： 抓痕 色素沉著過度（棕色痕跡） > 色素沉著不足（白色痕跡） 單純性苔蘚（濕疹的一種） 疤痕 當用針刺、脫脂棉或冷熱測試時，受影響的皮膚區域的感覺可能會發生變化。受影響區域的出汗可能減少或消失。划痕 色素沉著 疤痕

title: Onychogryphosis
snippet: The clinical features of onychogryphosis include: Involvement of one or both great toenails, but any of the nails can be involved Opaque, yellow–brown thickening of the nail plate with elongation and increased curvature What is often described as a ‘ram’s horn’ or ‘oyster-like’ appearance The nail p
causes: The exact cause of onychogryphosis is not completely known. It is associated with: Skin diseases such as ichthyosis , psoriasis , pemphigus , tertiary syphilis , hyperuricaemia (the cause of gout ), and, in the past, smallpox Poor peripheral circulation, which may be associated with diabetes mellitus Traumatic injury to the nail bed Microtrauma due to poorly fitting shoes Hallux valgus (bunion) [1]. In onychogryphosis, the nail plate becomes hypertrophied and uneven at the proximal matrix (the nail growth plate). The direction of the deformity is determined by which side grows faster, whether due to an insufficiency of the nail matrix under the proximal nail fold or because the nail bed produces a greater quantity of keratin than normal [1].
symptoms: The clinical features of onychogryphosis include: Involvement of one or both great toenails, but any of the nails can be involved Opaque, yellow–brown thickening of the nail plate with elongation and increased curvature What is often described as a ‘ram’s horn’ or ‘oyster-like’ appearance The nail plate initially growing upwards and deviating in a lateral direction towards the other toes The nail bed exhibiting an irregular surface marked by striations that are most commonly transverse rather than longitudinal.
epidemiology: There have been a few reports of congenital onychogryphosis, and onychogryphosis can be seen in a number of rare genodermatoses. Acquired onychogryphosis is more common [1]. It is more often observed in older people, people with poor personal care, and patients with senile dementia [1–3].
prognosis: The complications of onychogryphosis may include: An ingrown toenail Paronychia Secondary onychomycosis ( fungal nail infection) Subungual gangrene (rarely).
snippet_zh: 甲彎曲症的臨床特徵包括： 一側或兩側大腳趾甲受累，但任何指甲均可受累 甲板不透明、黃棕色增厚，並伸長和彎曲度增加 通常被描述為“公羊角”或“牡蠣狀”外觀
causes_zh: 甲彎曲的確切原因尚不完全清楚。它與以下疾病相關： 皮膚病，如魚鱗病、牛皮癬、天皰瘡、三期梅毒、高尿酸血症（痛風的病因）和天花 外周循環不良，可能與糖尿病有關 甲床外傷 鞋不合腳造成的微創傷 拇外翻（拇囊炎）[1]。在甲彎症中，指甲板的近端基質（指甲生長板）變得肥大且不均勻。畸形的方向取決於哪一側生長得更快，無論是由於近端甲襞下的指甲基質不足，還是因為甲床產生的角蛋白數量比正常情況多[1]。
symptoms_zh: 甲彎曲症的臨床特徵包括： 一隻或兩隻大腳趾甲受累，但任何一個指甲都可能受累 甲板不透明、黃棕色增厚，並伸長和曲率增加 通常被描述為“公羊角”或“牡蠣狀”外觀 甲板最初向上生長，並向其他腳趾橫向偏離 甲床表現出不規則表面，有條紋，最常見的是橫向條紋，而不是橫向條紋縱向。
epidemiology_zh: 已有一些先天性甲彎曲的報導，甲彎曲可見於許多罕見的遺傳性皮膚病。獲得性甲彎曲更為常見[1]。它更常見於老年人、個人護理不佳的人和老年癡呆症患者[1-3]。
prognosis_zh: 甲彎曲的並發症可能包括： 腳趾甲向內生長 甲溝炎 繼發性甲真菌病（指甲真菌感染） 甲下壞疽（罕見）。

title: Onycholysis
snippet: Onycholysis can affect a single nail or multiple fingernails and/or toenails. The distal part of the nail is most commonly affected lifting the free edge; sometimes the nail may detach laterally or proximally. Oil spot sign is an island of onycholysis under a nail. Clinical features can include the
causes: Onycholysis can be primary (idiopathic, unknown cause) or secondary to one of many causes. Some examples are listed in Table 1. Cause Examples Traumatic Repetitive trauma, including manicure Prolonged immersion in water Chemical exposure including nail cosmetics Foreign body implantation Skin disease Psoriasis Hand dermatitis Lichen planus Infection Dermatophytes and yeasts eg, T. rubrum , C. albicans Scabies Systemic disease Endocrine eg, hypo- and hyperthyroidism , diabetes mellitus, pregnancy Infiltrative eg, amyloidosis , sarcoidosis Malignancy eg, multiple myeloma, [Sezary syndrome ](/topics/sezary syndrome) Photosensitivity eg, porphyrias Yellow nail syndrome Medication Drug-induced photosensitivity eg, antibiotics including tetracyclines , NSAIDs , psoralens, and oral retinoids Chemotherapeutic agents eg, taxanes Others Hereditary distal onycholysis (MIM 164800)
symptoms: Onycholysis can affect a single nail or multiple fingernails and/or toenails. The distal part of the nail is most commonly affected lifting the free edge; sometimes the nail may detach laterally or proximally. Oil spot sign is an island of onycholysis under a nail. Clinical features can include the following signs. An irregular but sharply defined border between the pink portion of the nail and the white edge of the lifted detached nail. The detached nail is usually white and opaque compared to the transparent normal nail that appears pink. Lateral / proximal onycholysis and oil spot sign are a yellow-pink colour rather than white. The nail surface may be normal or pitted, indented, or crumbly. Thickened hyperkeratotic skin may accumulate under the detached nail. Subungual haemorrhage can occur in acute -onset onycholysis. Onycholysis is usually painless, but may be painful if acute or inflammatory. Psoriatic onycholysis Nail lichen planus: onycholysis seen in 3rd and 5th fingernails Onycholysis in psoriatic nail dystrophy
epidemiology: Onycholysis can affect both sexes, all ages and races. It is most frequently seen in adult women.
prognosis: Onycholysis predisposes to secondary infection under the nail, most commonly with Candida albicans and Pseudomonas aeruginosa , resulting in discolouration of the nail. Onycholysis can be cosmetically unacceptable, especially for people who work with their hands in public view. Candida infection and onycholysis C. albicans infection and onycholysis Pseudomonas infection and onycholysis
