causes_zh: 急性甲溝炎通常是由於金黃色葡萄球菌（可能具有多重耐藥性）、化膿性鏈球菌、假單胞菌或其他細菌病原體的細菌感染所致。也可能是由唇皰疹病毒、單純皰疹病毒和酵母菌、白色念珠菌引起。慢性甲溝炎的病因尚不完全清楚。在許多情況下，這是由於甲襞皮炎引起的。通常可以培養幾種不同的微生物，特別是白色念珠菌和革蘭氏陰性桿菌、假單胞菌。
symptoms_zh: 查看簡介： 甲溝炎（甲襞感染）：原因、圖像、治療方法等 — DermNet 搜索 DermNet Ctrl K 您是醫療保健專業人員嗎 轉到 DERMNET PRO 主頁主題 A-Z 圖片 病例 皮膚檢查器 提供反饋 主菜單 主頁主題 A-Z 圖片 病例 皮膚檢查器 提供反饋 常見皮膚病 痤瘡 腳氣 蜂窩組織炎 唇皰疹 皮炎/濕疹 熱疹 蕁麻疹 膿皰病 銀屑病 癬酒渣鼻 脂溢性皮炎 帶狀皰疹 白癜風
epidemiology_zh: 急性甲溝炎可以影響任何人。然而，它更有可能發生在皮膚破損後，尤其是近端甲襞/角質層和甲板之間。例如： 如果咬指甲（甲咬癖）或習慣性摳甲褶（例如，習慣性指甲畸形） 吸吮手指或拇指的嬰兒 修甲後 腳趾甲向內生長（隱甲症） 使用雕刻或人造指甲 使用口服維A酸治療，使皮膚乾燥（阿維A、異維A酸） 其他藥物，包括表皮生長因子受體和 BRAF抑製劑（維莫非尼、達拉非尼） 慢性甲溝炎主要發生在患有手部皮炎或手部經常冰涼潮濕的人群中，例如： 奶農、漁民、調酒師、清潔工、家庭主婦、血液循環不良的人。 急性和慢性皮膚感染在患有糖尿病或慢性衰弱、或因藥物或疾病而免疫抑制的患者中往往更頻繁且更具侵襲性。
prognosis_zh: 急性甲溝炎可擴散導致嚴重的手部感染（蜂窩組織炎），並可能累及下面的肌腱（感染性肌腱炎）。慢性甲溝炎的主要並發症是指甲營養不良。它通常與扭曲的、有脊狀的指甲板有關。它們可能會變成黃色或綠色/黑色並且變脆。康復後，指甲需要一年的時間才能恢復正常。

title: Patch tests
snippet: Patch tests are diagnostic tools used to identify allergens responsible for allergic contact dermatitis by applying small amounts of allergens to the skin and evaluating delayed hypersensitivity reactions.
causes: Used to identify triggers of allergic contact dermatitis, including metals (nickel), fragrances, preservatives, rubber chemicals, dyes, and topical medications.
symptoms: Positive reactions appear 48–96 hours after allergen exposure, showing redness, swelling, papules, or small blisters at test sites, indicating type IV delayed hypersensitivity.
epidemiology: Commonly used in adults with chronic or recurrent dermatitis or suspected occupational/contact allergies.
prognosis: Patch testing is safe, with mild temporary irritation; results help guide long-term avoidance and management.
snippet_zh: 斑貼測試用於檢測引起接觸性皮膚炎的過敏原，方法是將少量過敏物質貼在皮膚上觀察延遲型過敏反應。
causes_zh: 主要用於找出接觸性皮膚炎的誘發物，如金屬（鎳）、香料、防腐劑、橡膠化學物、染料及外用藥物。
symptoms_zh: 陽性反應通常在貼後 48–96 小時出現，表現為局部紅腫、丘疹或小水疱，屬於第四型延遲性超敏反應。
epidemiology_zh: 多用於成人，尤其是慢性或反覆性皮膚炎、疑似職業性或接觸性過敏者。
prognosis_zh: 測試安全，僅少數會有短暫刺激；結果有助於長期避免過敏原並改善症狀。

title: Periocular dermatitis
snippet: Clinical features of periocular dermatitis include: Involvement of the areas surrounding the eye, including the upper and lower eyelids [1,3,5] Small erythematous papules and, less commonly, papulopustules and/or papulovesicles Scaling [3] Pruritus [3] or a burning sensation [5] Erythematous dry bac
causes: The cause of periocular dermatitis is not well understood. It is thought to be due to a combination of environmental and genetic factors [3]. Periocular dermatitis may be related to [3,5]: An impaired skin barrier – there is an association between atopic dermatitis and periocular dermatitis Disturbance of follicular microflora Alteration of the pilosebaceous unit.
symptoms: Clinical features of periocular dermatitis include: Involvement of the areas surrounding the eye, including the upper and lower eyelids [1,3,5] Small erythematous papules and, less commonly, papulopustules and/or papulovesicles Scaling [3] Pruritus [3] or a burning sensation [5] Erythematous dry background skin [1,4]. Periocular dermatitis Periocular dermatitis Periocular dermatitis
epidemiology: Periocular dermatitis is not uncommon. It most often arises in women between the ages of 16 and 45 years [2,3]. It can also affect children [4]. It often occurs in people using topical corticosteroids .
prognosis: Periocular dermatitis usually resolves with appropriate management, although it may take some weeks or even months to clear up. It can be prevented by avoiding applying potent topical corticosteroids and thick face creams around the eye.
snippet_zh: 眼周皮炎的臨床特徵包括： 眼睛周圍區域受累，包括上眼瞼和下眼瞼 [1,3,5] 小紅斑丘疹，以及較少見的丘疹膿皰和/或丘皰疹 鱗屑 [3] 瘙癢 [3] 或燒灼感 [5] 紅斑性乾性皮炎
causes_zh: 眼周皮炎的病因尚不清楚。人們認為這是環境和遺傳因素共同作用的結果[3]。眼周皮炎可能與以下因素有關 [3,5]： 皮膚屏障受損 – 特應性皮炎和眼周皮炎之間存在關聯 毛囊微生物區系紊亂 毛囊皮脂腺單位改變。
symptoms_zh: 眼周皮炎的臨床特徵包括： 眼睛周圍區域受累，包括上眼瞼和下眼瞼 [1,3,5] 小紅斑丘疹，以及較少見的丘疹膿皰和/或丘皰疹 鱗屑 [3] 瘙癢 [3] 或燒灼感 [5] 紅斑性乾燥背景皮膚 [1,4]。眼周皮炎 眼周皮炎 眼周皮炎
epidemiology_zh: 眼周皮炎並不罕見。它最常見於 16 歲至 45 歲之間的女性 [2,3]。它也會影響兒童[4]。它經常發生在使用外用皮質類固醇的人身上。
prognosis_zh: 眼周皮炎通常可以通過適當的治療來解決，儘管可能需要幾週甚至幾個月的時間才能痊癒。可以通過避免在眼睛周圍使用強效外用皮質類固醇和厚面霜來預防這種情況。

title: Periorificial dermatitis
snippet: Cutaneous features of periorificial dermatitis include: An acneiform eruption Clusters of skin-coloured to red papules, vesicles , and pustules Usually less than 2mm each; may coalesce into larger lesions Erythematous base with a sharp border Surrounding skin is often dry Scaly and flaky skin surfac
causes: The exact cause is not understood. A suggested mechanism proposes epidermal dysfunction as the primary disturbance, resulting in: Increased penetration of exogenous agents through the stratum corneum , triggering an irritation reaction Enhancing trans-epidermal water loss resulting in tightness and dryness, causing patients to increase use of topical products, leading to further irritation.
symptoms: Cutaneous features of periorificial dermatitis include: An acneiform eruption Clusters of skin-coloured to red papules, vesicles , and pustules Usually less than 2mm each; may coalesce into larger lesions Erythematous base with a sharp border Surrounding skin is often dry Scaly and flaky skin surface Burning sensation or skin tightness Itch . Pain is rare, although skin sensitivity is common and patients are otherwise systemically well. Whilst usually limited to the affected orifice, more severe POD may extend to the chin, cheeks, lateral lower eyelids, upper eyelids, forehead, and glabella. The immediate peri-vermillion skin is often spared, only rarely is it affected in severe cases. Topical steroids can obscure the primary rash and may also result in steroid-induced cutaneous side effects. Perioral dermatitis due to the use of a steroid nebuliser mask Papules and pustules (an unusual feature) in perioral dermatitis Florid perioral dermatitis due to potent topical steroid use Click here for more images
epidemiology: Periorificial dermatitis is slightly more common in lighter-skinned females and usually affects young to middle-aged women (20–45 years). However, it is also seen in young children, often between 7 months to 13 years old. The exact incidence and prevalence remain unknown.
prognosis: Granulomatous periorificial dermatitis — a variant of periorificial dermatitis that presents with persistent yellowish papules. Occurs mainly in young children and nearly always follows the use of a corticosteroid. Granulomatous perifollicular infiltrate on histopathology. Steroid rosacea presents with steroid-induced, large facial papules, papulopustules , and telangiectasia on the mid-face, including forehead and cheeks. Rebound flare of severe periorificial dermatitis may occur after abrupt cessation of potent topical steroid to facial skin. Psychological distress.
snippet_zh: 口周皮炎的皮膚特徵包括： 痤瘡樣皮疹 皮膚顏色至紅色的丘疹、水皰和膿皰簇，通常每個小於 2 毫米；可能合併成更大的病變 紅斑基底，邊緣尖銳 周圍皮膚通常乾燥 皮膚表面有鱗片狀和片狀
causes_zh: 確切原因尚不清楚。一種建議的機制認為表皮功能障礙是主要的干擾，導致： 外源性物質通過角質層的滲透增加，引發刺激反應 增強經表皮水分流失，導致緊繃和乾燥，導致患者增加外用產品的使用，導致進一步刺激。
symptoms_zh: 口周皮炎的皮膚特徵包括： 痤瘡樣皮疹 皮膚顏色至紅色的丘疹、水皰和膿皰簇，通常每個小於 2 毫米；可能合併成更大的病變 紅斑基底有尖銳邊界 周圍皮膚通常乾燥 皮膚表面有鱗片狀和片狀 燒灼感或皮膚緊繃 瘙癢。儘管皮膚敏感很常見並且患者其他系統狀況良好，但疼痛很少見。雖然通常僅限於受影響的孔口，但更嚴重的 POD 可能會延伸至下巴、臉頰、下眼瞼外側、上眼瞼、前額和眉間。緊鄰朱紅色的皮膚通常不會受到影響，但在嚴重的情況下很少會受到影響。外用類固醇可以掩蓋原發性皮疹，也可能導致類固醇引起的皮膚副作用。由於使用類固醇霧化面罩而導致的口周皮炎 口周皮炎中出現丘疹和膿皰（一種不尋常的特徵） 由於使用強效局部類固醇而導致的華麗口周皮炎 點擊此處查看更多圖片
epidemiology_zh: 口周皮炎在淺膚色女性中更為常見，通常影響年輕至中年女性（20-45 歲）。然而，它也常見於幼兒，通常在 7 個月至 13 歲之間。確切的發病率和患病率仍不清楚。
prognosis_zh: 肉芽腫性口周皮炎 — 口周皮炎的一種變體，表現為持續性黃色丘疹。主要發生於幼兒，幾乎總是在使用皮質類固醇後發生。組織病理學顯示肉芽腫性毛囊周圍浸潤。類固醇紅斑痤瘡表現為類固醇引起的大面部丘疹、丘疹膿皰和中面部（包括前額和臉頰）毛細血管擴張。突然停止對面部皮膚使用強效外用類固醇後，可能會出現嚴重口周皮炎的反彈。心理困擾。

title: Pitted keratolysis
snippet: The infection often occurs bilaterally on pressure-bearing areas, most commonly the ball of the foot and heel. Involvement of the palms have been reported in certain professions such as rice paddy farmers. It is often asymptomatic , however, when symptomatic there may be associated pruritus and pain
causes: Pitted keratolysis is caused by a range of bacterial species. The most common are Corynebacteria , Dermatophilus congolensis , Kytococcus sedentarius , Actinomyces , or Streptomyces . Bacteria thrive under moist and warm conditions. They proliferate and produce protease enzymes that cause destruction of the stratum corneum to create pits/craters. The odour is associated with the sulfur compounds (thiols, sulphides, and thioesters) which are produced by the bacteria.
symptoms: The infection often occurs bilaterally on pressure-bearing areas, most commonly the ball of the foot and heel. Involvement of the palms have been reported in certain professions such as rice paddy farmers. It is often asymptomatic , however, when symptomatic there may be associated pruritus and pain on walking. Characteristic features include: Pits on the stratum corneum (1–3mm); these may form confluences, irregular erosions , or sulci Some pits may have a brown appearance (giving the appearance of dirty feet) The appearance of the pits are often amplified when feet are wet. Associated features: Hyperhidrosis Slimy texture of the skin Malodorous feet. Variants of pitted keratolysis (less common): Painful plaque -like variant: tender erythematous to violaceous papules Large crateriform depressions Corynebacterial triad: pitted keratolysis, erythrasma , and trichomycosis axillaris . Click here for images
epidemiology: Pitted keratolysis is more commonly seen in men compared to women and can affect all age groups. Occupations at risk include: Athletes Industrial workers Miners Farmers Sailors and fishermen Military workers Occupations where feet are constantly wet (paddy field workers, boatmen). Factors that increase the risk of developing pitted keratolysis include: Hyperhidrosis — excessive sweating of the hands and feet Keratoderma — thickened skin of palms and soles Prolonged use of occlusive footwear (vinyl footwear, rubber boots) Diabetes mellitus Poor foot hygiene Hot humid weather Obesity Immunodeficiency .
prognosis: Psychosocial impact due to foot odour Limitation of function due to symptomatic pitted keratolysis No mortality is associated with pitted keratolysis.
snippet_zh: 感染通常發生在雙側受壓區域，最常見的是腳掌和腳後跟。據報導，棕櫚樹參與了某些職業，例如稻農。它通常是無症狀的，但是，當有症狀時，可能會伴有瘙癢和疼痛
causes_zh: 凹陷性角質松解症是由多種細菌引起的。最常見的是棒狀桿菌、剛果嗜皮菌、久坐球菌、放線菌或鏈黴菌。細菌在潮濕和溫暖的條件下繁殖。它們增殖並產生蛋白酶，導致角質層破壞，形成凹坑/彈坑。這種氣味與細菌產生的硫化合物（硫醇、硫化物和硫酯）有關。
symptoms_zh: 感染通常發生在雙側受壓區域，最常見的是腳掌和腳後跟。據報導，棕櫚樹參與了某些職業，例如稻農。它通常是無症狀的，但是，當有症狀時，可能會出現相關的瘙癢和行走疼痛。典型特徵包括： 角質層上有凹坑（1-3mm）；這些可能會形成匯合處、不規則的侵蝕或溝。一些凹坑可能具有棕色外觀（給人臟腳的外觀）。當腳濕時，凹坑的外觀通常會放大。相關特徵： 多汗症 皮膚質地粘滑 腳臭。凹陷性角化松解症的變體（較少見）： 疼痛斑塊樣變體：柔軟的紅斑至紫羅蘭色丘疹 大坑狀凹陷 棒狀桿菌三聯徵：凹陷性角化松解症、紅癬和腋毛黴菌病。單擊此處查看圖像
epidemiology_zh: 與女性相比，凹陷性角化松解症在男性中更常見，並且可以影響所有年齡段。面臨風險的職業包括： 運動員 產業工人 礦工 農民 水手和漁民 軍人 腳經常濕的職業（稻田工人、船夫）。增加出現凹陷性角化症風險的因素包括： 多汗症 - 手腳出汗過多 角皮病 - 手掌和腳底皮膚增厚 長期使用封閉性鞋類（乙烯基鞋、橡膠靴） 糖尿病 足部衛生不良 炎熱潮濕的天氣 肥胖 免疫缺陷。
prognosis_zh: 腳臭造成的社會心理影響 症狀性角化松解症導致功能受限 凹陷性角化松解症與死亡率無關。

title: Pityriasis alba
snippet: Classic pityriasis alba usually presents with 1 to 20 patches or thin plaques. Most lesions occur on the face, especially on the cheeks and chin. Patches may also appear on the neck, shoulders, and upper arms and are uncommon elsewhere. Patch size varies from 0.5 to 5 cm in diameter. Patches are rou
causes: The cause of pityriasis alba is unknown. Pityriasis alba often coexists with dry skin and atopic dermatitis . It often presents following sun exposure, perhaps because tanning of surrounding skin makes affected areas more prominent. Researchers have not reached any conclusions about the relationship of pityriasis alba to the following: Ultraviolet radiation Excessive or inadequate bathing Low levels of serum copper and other trace elements Malassezia yeasts (which produce a metabolite , pityriacitrin, that inhibits tyrosinase thus causing hypopigmentation).
symptoms: Classic pityriasis alba usually presents with 1 to 20 patches or thin plaques. Most lesions occur on the face, especially on the cheeks and chin. Patches may also appear on the neck, shoulders, and upper arms and are uncommon elsewhere. Patch size varies from 0.5 to 5 cm in diameter. Patches are round, oval or irregular in shape. Pityriasis alba may have well- demarcated or, more usually, poorly defined edges. Itch is minimal or absent. Hypopigmentation is more noticeable in summer. Dryness and scaling is more noticeable in winter when environmental humidity tends to be lower. Typically, a patch of pityriasis alba evolves through several stages. Slightly scaly pink patch or plaque with a just palpable papular surface. Hypopigmented patch or plaque with fine surface scale. Then post- inflammatory hypopigmented macule without scale. Resolution. Pityriasis alba on the cheeks Pityriasis alba on the cheeks Pityriasis alba Pityriasis alba See more images of pityriasis alba ...
epidemiology: Pityriasis alba is common worldwide with a prevalence in children of around 5%. Pityriasis alba mainly affects children and adolescents aged 3 to 16 years, but can occur in older and younger people. It affects boys and girls equally. The hypopigmentation of pityriasis alba is more prominent, and the condition perhaps more common, in dark skin compared to white skin.
snippet_zh: 典型的白糠疹通常表現為 1 至 20 個斑塊或薄斑塊。大多數病變發生在面部，尤其是臉頰和下巴。頸部、肩膀和上臂也可能出現斑塊，這在其他地方並不常見。貼片尺寸直徑從 0.5 到 5 厘米不等。補丁很柔
causes_zh: 白糠疹的病因尚不清楚。白糠疹常與皮膚乾燥和特應性皮炎並存。它通常在陽光照射後出現，可能是因為周圍皮膚曬黑使受影響的區域更加突出。研究人員尚未就白糠疹與以下因素的關係得出任何結論： 紫外線輻射 沐浴過多或不足 血清銅和其他微量元素水平低 馬拉色酵母菌（產生代謝物糠秕苷，抑制酪氨酸酶，從而導致色素沉著不足）。
symptoms_zh: 典型的白糠疹通常表現為 1 至 20 個斑塊或薄斑塊。大多數病變發生在面部，尤其是臉頰和下巴。頸部、肩膀和上臂也可能出現斑塊，這在其他地方並不常見。貼片尺寸直徑從 0.5 到 5 厘米不等。斑塊的形狀有圓形、橢圓形或不規則形狀。白糠疹的邊緣可能界限分明，或更常見的是邊界不清。瘙癢很少或不存在。色素減退在夏季更為明顯。冬季環境濕度較低，乾燥和結垢現象更為明顯。通常，一片白糠疹會經歷幾個階段的演變。輕微鱗狀的粉紅色斑塊或斑塊，表面可觸及丘疹。色素減退斑塊或斑塊，表面有細小鱗片。然後是炎症後色素減退的斑疹，無鱗屑。解決。臉頰上的白糠疹 臉頰上的白糠疹 白糠疹 查看更多白糠疹的圖片 ...
epidemiology_zh: 白糠疹在世界範圍內很常見，兒童患病率約為 5%。白糠疹主要影響 3 至 16 歲的兒童和青少年，但也可能發生在老年人和年輕人中。它同樣影響男孩和女孩。與白色皮膚相比，深色皮膚的白糠疹色素沉著不足更為突出，而且這種情況可能更常見。

title: Pityriasis lichenoides
snippet: PLEVA presents abruptly with a rapidly progressive rash: 10-50 reddish brown, erythematous , ovoid papules , 5-15mm in diameter Mainly on the trunk and proximal extremities Evolution into vesicles , pustules , haemorrhagic crusts, and ulcers Pruritus or burning sensation Most cutaneous lesions heal
causes: The cause of PL is unknown. The main hypotheses are that it may be: A hypersensitivity reaction to an infection , such as: Viruses ( Epstein-Barr Virus , cytomegalovirus , human immunodeficiency virus ) Bacteria ( Staphylococcus , Streptococcus ) Parasites ( Toxoplasma gondii ). An inflammatory reaction to medication, such as anti- TNF agents, statins, antidepressants, vaccines, and radiocontrast dye. A low-grade lymphoproliferative disorder.
symptoms: PLEVA presents abruptly with a rapidly progressive rash: 10-50 reddish brown, erythematous , ovoid papules , 5-15mm in diameter Mainly on the trunk and proximal extremities Evolution into vesicles , pustules , haemorrhagic crusts, and ulcers Pruritus or burning sensation Most cutaneous lesions heal with transient or persistent hyper- or hypo- pigmentation. Constitutional symptoms are usually mild (see complications below). PLC presents more slowly over several days with: Larger numbers of small erythematous papules with a brown hue visible on diascopy Mica-like scale on more established lesions Lesions at various stages of evolution Patients often experience periods of relapse and exacerbation. Patients often show features of both PLEVA and PLC, and PLEVA may evolve into PLC. Mucosal lesions have been reported.
epidemiology: The incidence of PL is unknown, but the disease is rare. It is most common in children and young adults under age 30 but can present at any age. There is a slight male predominance. All races are affected.
prognosis: Ulceronecrotic lesions may heal with varioliform scarring. A rare severe form of PLEVA ( Febrile Ulceronecrotic Mucha–Habermann Disease) has systemic features of malaise , fever , lymphadenopathy , arthritis , and/or bacteraemia. There may be mucosal, gastrointestinal, and pulmonary involvement. Mortality up to 25% is reported. The psychological impact should not be overlooked, particularly when skin lesions appear on more easily visible areas such as the face and upper arms.
snippet_zh: PLEVA 突然出現快速進展的皮疹： 10-50 個紅棕色、紅斑、卵圓形丘疹，直徑 5-15mm 主要出現在軀乾和四肢近端 演變成水皰、膿皰、出血痂和潰瘍 瘙癢或燒灼感 大多數皮膚病變癒合
causes_zh: PL 的病因尚不清楚。主要假設是，它可能是： 對感染的過敏反應，例如：病毒（EB病毒、鉅細胞病毒、人類免疫缺陷病毒）、細菌（葡萄球菌、鏈球菌）、寄生蟲（弓形蟲）。對藥物（例如抗 TNF 藥物、他汀類藥物、抗抑鬱藥、疫苗和放射性對比染料）的炎症反應。一種低度淋巴組織增生性疾病。
symptoms_zh: PLEVA 突然出現快速進展的皮疹： 10-50 個紅棕色、紅斑、卵圓形丘疹，直徑 5-15mm 主要出現在軀乾和四肢近端 演變成水皰、膿皰、出血性痂皮和潰瘍 瘙癢或燒灼感 大多數皮膚損傷癒合後伴有短暫或持續性色素沉著過多或過少。全身症狀通常很輕微（參見下面的並發症）。PLC 在幾天內表現得更慢： 大量小紅斑丘疹，在透視檢查中可見，呈棕色色調 更成熟的病變上有云母樣鱗片 處於不同演變階段的病變 患者經常經歷復發和惡化期。患者常同時表現出PLEVA和PLC的特徵，並且PLEVA可能演變成PLC。已有粘膜病變的報導。
epidemiology_zh: PL 的發病率尚不清楚，但這種疾病很罕見。它最常見於 30 歲以下的兒童和年輕人，但可以出現在任何年齡。男性略佔優勢。所有種族都受到影響。
prognosis_zh: 潰瘍壞死病變可能會隨著痘痘樣疤痕癒合。PLEVA（發熱性潰瘍壞死性穆哈-哈伯曼病）是一種罕見的嚴重形式，具有全身不適、發熱、淋巴結腫大、關節炎和/或菌血症的特徵。可能有粘膜、胃腸道和肺部受累。據報導死亡率高達 25%。心理影響不容忽視，特別是當皮膚病變出現在更容易看到的區域（例如面部和上臂）時。

title: Pityriasis rosea
snippet: Except for mild to severe itching in up to 25% of patients, no systemic symptoms are typically present during the rash phase of pityriasis rosea. A few days before the rash develops, up to 69% have flu-like symptoms eg, cough or sore throat.
causes: The exact cause is not known. Viral, bacterial , and non-infective causes have been hypothesised. Reports suggested pityriasis rosea may be caused by: Viral infections Herpesviruses 6 and 7 (HHV-6/7) have the strongest known association, however studies have not been confirmatory. Other viral infections , such as H1N1 influenza A and COVID-19 , may also be causative. Drug-induced reactions Many drugs have been associated, such as angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors , nonsteroidal anti- inflammatory drugs, hydrochlorothiazide, gold, captopril, atypical antipsychotics barbiturates, D-penicillamine, imatinib, metronidazole, isotretinoin, clozapine, and clonidine. Vaccines Pityriasis rosea may be triggered by the Bacillus Calmette-Guerin (BCG), H1N1, diphtheria, smallpox, hepatitis B, Pneumococcus, and COVID-19 vaccines.
symptoms: Except for mild to severe itching in up to 25% of patients, no systemic symptoms are typically present during the rash phase of pityriasis rosea. A few days before the rash develops, up to 69% have flu-like symptoms eg, cough or sore throat.
epidemiology: Pityriasis rosea is most common in teenagers and young adults (10–35 year-olds), however it can affect people of any age Occurs very slightly more often in women Approximate incidence of 0.5% to 2% May be more common in spring and autumn
prognosis: In most cases, pityriasis rosea is harmless. However, there are reports of complications such as: Premature delivery and foetal demise during pregnancy, within the first 15 weeks of gestation A severe cutaneous adverse reaction ( drug hypersensitivity syndrome ) due to reactivation of herpes 6/7 in association with a drug Prolonged skin discolouration.
snippet_zh: 除了高達 25% 的患者出現輕度至重度瘙癢外，玫瑰糠疹的皮疹期通常不會出現全身症狀。在出現皮疹前幾天，高達 69% 的人會出現類似流感的症狀，例如咳嗽或喉嚨痛。
causes_zh: 確切原因尚不清楚。已經假設了病毒、細菌和非感染性原因。報告表明玫瑰糠疹可能由以下原因引起： 病毒感染 皰疹病毒 6 型和 7 型 (HHV-6/7) 具有最強的已知關聯，但研究尚未得到證實。其他病毒感染，例如 H1N1 甲型流感和 COVID-19，也可能是致病原因。藥物引起的反應 許多藥物都與此相關，如血管緊張素轉換酶抑製劑、非甾體類抗炎藥、氫氯噻嗪、金、卡托普利、非典型抗精神病藥巴比妥類、D-青黴胺、伊馬替尼、甲硝唑、異維A酸、氯氮平和可樂定。疫苗 玫瑰糠疹可能由卡介苗 (BCG)、H1N1、白喉、天花、乙型肝炎、肺炎球菌和 COVID-19 疫苗引發。
symptoms_zh: 除了高達 25% 的患者出現輕度至重度瘙癢外，玫瑰糠疹的皮疹期通常不會出現全身症狀。在出現皮疹前幾天，高達 69% 的人會出現類似流感的症狀，例如咳嗽或喉嚨痛。
epidemiology_zh: 玫瑰糠疹最常見於青少年和年輕人（10-35 歲），但它可以影響任何年齡段的人 女性發病率稍高 發病率約為 0.5% 至 2% 春季和秋季可能更常見
prognosis_zh: 在大多數情況下，玫瑰糠疹是無害的。然而，也有並發症的報告，例如： 妊娠期間、妊娠前 15 週內的早產和胎兒死亡 由於與藥物相關的皰疹 6/7 重新激活而導致的嚴重皮膚不良反應（藥物過敏綜合徵） 皮膚長時間變色。

title: Pityriasis versicolor
snippet: Pityriasis versicolor affects the trunk, neck, and/or arms, and is uncommon on other parts of the body. The patches may be coppery brown, paler than surrounding skin, or pink. Pale patches may be more common in darker skin; this appearance is known as pityriasis versicolor alba. Sometimes the patche
causes: Pityriasis versicolor is caused by mycelial growth of fungi of the genus Malassezia . Malassezia are part of the normal skin microbiota ( microorganisms found on normal skin). They are dependent on lipid for survival. Fourteen different species of malassezia have been identified. The most common species cultured from pityriasis versicolor are M globosa , M restricta and M sympodialis . Usually malassezia grow sparsely in the seborrhoeic areas (scalp, face and chest) without causing a rash. It is not known why they sometimes grow more actively on the skin surface to form pityriasis versicolor. One theory implicates a tryptophan-dependent metabolic pathway. The yeasts induce enlarged melanosomes ( pigment granules ) within basal melanocytes in the brown type of pityriasis versicolor. It is easier to demonstrate the yeasts in scrapings taken from this type of pityriasis versicolor than in those taken from the white type. The white or hypopigmented type of pityriasis versicolor is thought to be due to a chemical produced by malassezia that diffuses into the epidermis and impairs the function of the melanocytes. The pink type of pityriasis versicolor is mildly inflamed, due to dermatiits induced by malassezia or its metabolites.
symptoms: Pityriasis versicolor affects the trunk, neck, and/or arms, and is uncommon on other parts of the body. The patches may be coppery brown, paler than surrounding skin, or pink. Pale patches may be more common in darker skin; this appearance is known as pityriasis versicolor alba. Sometimes the patches start scaly and brown, and then resolve through a non-scaly and white stage. Pityriasis versicolor is usually asymptomatic , but in some people it is mildly itchy. In general, pale or dark patches due to pityriasis versicolor do not tend to be more or less prone to sunburn than surrounding skin. Hyperpigmented , hypopigmented, and pink pityriasis versicolor are usually seen as distinct variants but may sometimes co-exist. Pink pityriasis versicolor may also co-exist with seborrhoeic dermatitis as both are associated with malassezia overgrowth. Pityriasis versicolor Pityriasis versicolor Pityriasis versicolor See more images of pityriasis versicolor .
epidemiology: Pityriasis versicolor most frequently affects young adults and is slightly more common in men than in women. It can also affect children, adolescents, and older adults. Pityriasis versicolor is more common in hot, humid climates than in cool, dry climates. It often affects people who perspire heavily. It may clear in the winter months and recur each summer. Although it is not considered infectious in the conventional sense, pityriasis versicolor sometimes affects more than one member of a family.
snippet_zh: 花斑癬影響軀幹、頸部和/或手臂，但在身體其他部位並不常見。這些斑塊可能是銅棕色，比周圍的皮膚更蒼白，或者是粉紅色。蒼白斑塊在深色皮膚中更為常見；這種現像被稱為白花斑癬。有時候是補丁
causes_zh: 花斑癬是由馬拉色菌屬真菌的菌絲生長引起的。馬拉色菌是正常皮膚微生物群（正常皮膚上發現的微生物）的一部分。它們的生存依賴於脂質。已鑑定出十四種不同的馬拉色菌。從花斑癬中培養出的最常見的種類是球糠疹、限制性糠疹和交花糠疹。通常，馬拉色菌在脂溢區域（頭皮、面部和胸部）稀疏生長，不會引起皮疹。目前尚不清楚為什麼它們有時會在皮膚表面生長得更活躍，形成花斑癬。一種理論暗示色氨酸依賴性代謝途徑。在棕色型花斑癬中，酵母菌會導致基底黑素細胞內的黑素體（色素顆粒）增大。與白色類型的花斑癬相比，從這種類型的花斑癬中提取的刮片中更容易顯示酵母菌。白色或色素減退型花斑癬被認為是由馬拉色菌產生的化學物質擴散到表皮並損害黑素細胞的功能所致。粉紅色型花斑癬是由於馬拉色菌或其代謝物引起的皮炎而引起的輕度炎症。
symptoms_zh: 花斑癬影響軀幹、頸部和/或手臂，但在身體其他部位並不常見。這些斑塊可能是銅棕色，比周圍的皮膚更蒼白，或者是粉紅色。蒼白斑塊在深色皮膚中更為常見；這種現像被稱為白花斑癬。有時，斑塊開始呈鱗狀和棕色，然後通過無鱗狀和白色階段消退。花斑癬通常無症狀，但有些人會出現輕微瘙癢。一般來說，由花斑癬引起的蒼白或深色斑塊並不比周圍皮膚更容易或不太容易曬傷。色素沉著過度、色素減退和粉紅色花斑癬通常被視為不同的變異，但有時也可能同時存在。粉紅色花斑癬也可能與脂溢性皮炎共存，因為兩者都與馬拉色菌過度生長有關。花斑癬 花斑癬 查看更多花斑癬的圖片。
epidemiology_zh: 花斑癬最常影響年輕人，男性略高於女性。它還會影響兒童、青少年和老年人。花斑癬在炎熱、潮濕的氣候中比在涼爽、乾燥的氣候中更常見。它經常影響大量出汗的人。它可能在冬季消失，並在每年夏季復發。儘管花斑癬不被認為具有傳統意義上的傳染性，但它有時會影響一個家庭的不止一名成員。

title: Psoriasis
snippet: Psoriasis usually presents with symmetrically distributed, red, scaly plaques with well-defined edges. The scale is typically silvery white, except in skin folds where the plaques often appear shiny with a moist peeling surface. The most common sites are the scalp , elbows, and knees, but any part o
causes: Psoriasis is multifactorial. It is classified as an immune-mediated genetic skin disease. This involves a complex interaction between the innate and adaptive immune systems. Genome -wide association studies report that the histocompatibility complex HLA -C*06:02 (previously known as HLA-Cw6) is associated with early-onset psoriasis and guttate psoriasis . This major histocompatibility complex is not associated with psoriatic arthritis , nail psoriasis , or late-onset psoriasis. Immune factors and inflammatory cytokines (messenger proteins ) such as IL1β and TNF α, IL-23, and IL-17 are responsible for the clinical features of psoriasis. These have therefore become targets for biological drugs and have led to success in drug management.
symptoms: Psoriasis usually presents with symmetrically distributed, red, scaly plaques with well-defined edges. The scale is typically silvery white, except in skin folds where the plaques often appear shiny with a moist peeling surface. The most common sites are the scalp , elbows, and knees, but any part of the skin can be involved. The plaques are usually very persistent without treatment. Itch is mostly mild but may be severe in some patients, leading to scratching and lichenification characterised by thickened leathery skin and increased skin markings. Painful skin cracks or fissures may occur, particularly on the palms and soles. Psoriasis can demonstrate the Koebner phenomenon . This involves the generation of new lesions on the skin that has been damaged or irritated such as by injury, burns etc. When psoriatic plaques clear up, they may leave brown or pale marks ( postinflammatory hypo- or hyperpigmentation ) that can be expected to fade over several months. Auspitz sign refers to pinpoint bleeding upon removal of the scaly layer in plaque psoriasis. It is related to the dilated dermal capillaries involved in the histological pathogenesis of chronic psoriasis.
epidemiology: Psoriasis affects 2–4% of males and females. It can start at any age including childhood , with onset peaks at 15–25 years and 50–60 years. It tends to persist lifelong, fluctuating in extent and severity. It is particularly common in Caucasians but may affect people of any ethnicity. About one-third of patients with psoriasis have family members with psoriasis.
snippet_zh: 牛皮癬通常表現為對稱分佈、邊緣清晰的紅色鱗狀斑塊。鱗片通常呈銀白色，但皮膚褶皺處的斑塊通常顯得閃亮，表面濕潤脫皮。最常見的部位是頭皮、肘部和膝蓋，但任何部位都可以。
causes_zh: 牛皮癬是多因素的。它被歸類為免疫介導的遺傳性皮膚病。這涉及先天性免疫系統和適應性免疫系統之間複雜的相互作用。全基因組關聯研究報告稱，組織相容性複合物 HLA -C*06:02（以前稱為 HLA-Cw6）與早發性銀屑病和點狀銀屑病相關。這種主要的組織相容性複合體與銀屑病關節炎、指甲銀屑病或遲發性銀屑病無關。免疫因子和炎症細胞因子（信使蛋白），如 IL1β 和 TNF α、IL-23 和 IL-17 是銀屑病臨床特徵的原因。因此，這些已成為生物藥物的目標，並導致藥物管理的成功。
symptoms_zh: 牛皮癬通常表現為對稱分佈、邊緣清晰的紅色鱗狀斑塊。鱗片通常呈銀白色，但皮膚褶皺處的斑塊通常顯得閃亮，表面濕潤脫皮。最常見的部位是頭皮、肘部和膝蓋，但皮膚的任何部位都可能受累。如果不進行治療，斑塊通常會非常持久。瘙癢大多是輕微的，但某些患者可能會很嚴重，導致抓傷和苔蘚樣變，其特徵是皮革樣皮膚增厚和皮膚斑紋增加。可能會出現疼痛的皮膚裂紋或裂縫，尤其是手掌和腳底。銀屑病可表現出Koebner現象。這涉及到因受傷、燒傷等而受損或受刺激的皮膚上產生新的病變。當銀屑病斑塊清除時，它們可能會留下棕色或蒼白的痕跡（炎症後色素沉著不足或色素沉著過度），預計幾個月後就會消失。Auspitz徵是指去除斑塊狀銀屑病鱗屑層後出現的針狀出血。它與慢性銀屑病組織學發病機制中涉及的真皮毛細血管擴張有關。
epidemiology_zh: 牛皮癬影響 2-4% 的男性和女性。它可以從任何年齡開始，包括童年，發病高峰在 15-25 歲和 50-60 歲。它往往會持續終生，其程度和嚴重程度會有所波動。它在白種人中尤其常見，但可能影響任何種族的人。大約三分之一的牛皮癬患者的家庭成員患有牛皮癬。

title: Pyogenic granuloma
snippet: Pyogenic granuloma of the skin presents as a painless red fleshy nodule , typically 5-10mm in diameter, that grows rapidly over a few weeks. The surface is initially smooth but can ulcerate, become crusty, or verrucous. Pyogenic granuloma is usually solitary, but multiple nodules and satellite lesio
causes: Factors associated with the development of a pyogenic granuloma may include: Trauma — recent minor trauma accounts for 7% of presentations and, in the oral cavity, chronic minor irritation is thought to be a common trigger. Nasal piercings are reported in association with intranasal pyogenic granuloma. Hormonal influences — can occur with oral contraceptive use and in 5% of pregnancies. Medications — oral retinoids , protease inhibitors (used in the treatment of HIV/AIDS ), targeted cancer therapies , and immunosuppression. Infection — Staphylococcus aureus is frequently detected. In the oral cavity, poor dental hygiene is a common association. There is no evidence for a viral aetiology.
symptoms: Pyogenic granuloma of the skin presents as a painless red fleshy nodule , typically 5-10mm in diameter, that grows rapidly over a few weeks. The surface is initially smooth but can ulcerate, become crusty, or verrucous. Pyogenic granuloma is usually solitary, but multiple nodules and satellite lesions can erupt. The most common sites involved are the fingers and face. Pyogenic granuloma easily bleeds with minor trauma. Oral mucosal pyogenic granulomas typically develop on the lip and gums ( gingiva ) as pedunculated or sessile slow-growing painless red papules ranging in size from a few millimetres to several centimetres. The surface can be ulcerated with a yellow-fibrinous surface, and easy bleeding. With time, the lesion becomes a paler pink colour. Other mucosal sites that can be affected include the conjunctiva and nasal mucosa. New lesion 2 weeks later 4 weeks after first photograph
epidemiology: Pyogenic granuloma often occurs in children around 6 years of age and during teenage and young adult life. There is an overall male predominance (3:2) except for oral lesions due to their association with pregnancy and oral contraceptive use. There is no racial predilection.
prognosis: Pyogenic granuloma can bleed profusely and frequently with minor trauma, resulting in anaemia. Oral pyogenic granuloma can rarely cause significant bone loss.
snippet_zh: 皮膚化膿性肉芽腫表現為無痛的紅色肉質結節，直徑通常為 5-10 毫米，在幾週內迅速生長。表面最初是光滑的，但可能會潰爛、結痂或疣狀。化膿性肉芽腫通常是單發的，但也有多發結節和衛星病變
causes_zh: 與化膿性肉芽腫的發生相關的因素可能包括： 外傷 — 近期發生的輕微外傷佔症狀的 7%，在口腔中，慢性輕微刺激被認為是常見的觸發因素。據報導，鼻穿孔與鼻內化膿性肉芽腫有關。荷爾蒙影響 — 使用口服避孕藥時和 5% 的妊娠中可能會出現這種情況。藥物——口服維A酸、蛋白酶抑製劑（用於治療艾滋病毒/艾滋病）、靶向癌症治療和免疫抑制。感染 — 經常檢測到金黃色葡萄球菌。在口腔中，牙齒衛生不良是一個常見的現象。沒有病毒病因學的證據。
symptoms_zh: 皮膚化膿性肉芽腫表現為無痛的紅色肉質結節，直徑通常為 5-10 毫米，在幾週內迅速生長。表面最初是光滑的，但可能會潰爛、結痂或疣狀。化膿性肉芽腫通常是孤立的，但也可爆發多個結節和衛星病變。最常見的受影響部位是手指和麵部。化膿性肉芽腫在輕微外傷時很容易出血。口腔粘膜化膿性肉芽腫通常出現在嘴唇和牙齦（牙齦）上，表現為有蒂或無蒂的緩慢生長的無痛紅色丘疹，大小從幾毫米到幾厘米不等。表面可潰爛，表面呈黃色纖維素狀，易出血。隨著時間的推移，病變部位會變成淡粉色。其他可能受影響的粘膜部位包括結膜和鼻粘膜。第一次照片後 2 週後 4 週後出現新病變
epidemiology_zh: 化膿性肉芽腫常發生於 6 歲左右的兒童以及青少年和青年時期。除口腔病變外，總體男性占主導地位（3:2），因為口腔病變與懷孕和口服避孕藥的使用有關。不存在種族偏好。
prognosis_zh: 化膿性肉芽腫可在輕微創傷下頻繁地大量出血，導致貧血。口腔化膿性肉芽腫很少會導致明顯的骨質流失。

title: Rashes affecting the lower legs
snippet: Lower leg rashes represent a variety of conditions including eczema, infections, vascular disorders, and inflammatory diseases commonly involving the shins and ankles.
causes: Lower leg rashes often arise from eczema (varicose eczema, asteatotic eczema), infections (cellulitis, tinea), vascular conditions (stasis dermatitis, vasculitis, livedo), contact allergy, dry skin, or trauma-related inflammation.
symptoms: Presentation varies by cause but can include redness, scaling, swelling, itching, pain, warmth, brownish discoloration from venous disease, or sharply demarcated plaques in inflammatory or infectious conditions.
epidemiology: More common in older adults, individuals with venous insufficiency, diabetes, chronic edema, or those with occupational long-standing posture. Infectious causes occur across all ages.
prognosis: Outcome depends on underlying condition. Venous-related rashes tend to be chronic and recurrent; infections resolve with treatment; eczema may require ongoing moisturising and anti-inflammatory therapy.
snippet_zh: 小腿皮疹包含多種類型，如濕疹、感染、血管性疾病與發炎性皮膚病，常出現在脛骨前側與踝部。
causes_zh: 常見原因包括濕疹（靜脈性濕疹、乾燥性濕疹）、感染（蜂窩組織炎、癬）、血管性問題（靜脈淤積性皮炎、血管炎、網狀青斑）、接觸性過敏、乾燥刺激或外力引起的發炎。
symptoms_zh: 症狀依病因不同，可能包括紅腫、脫屑、瘙癢、疼痛、灼熱、由於靜脈問題導致的棕色沉著，或是界線清楚的斑塊（常見於感染或特定發炎疾病）。
epidemiology_zh: 較常見於年長者、靜脈功能不全、糖尿病、慢性水腫者，或需久站的職業族群。感染類型則各年齡都可能發生。
prognosis_zh: 預後依病因而定。靜脈相關皮疹常為慢性與反覆發作；感染多能治癒；濕疹則需持續保濕與抗發炎治療。

title: Raynaud phenomenon
snippet: An attack of Raynaud phenomenon is triggered by exposure to cold, such as going out into a cold wind or immersing the hands in cold water. Sudden emotional or psychological upsets can also bring on an attack. The hands are most often affected, but it sometimes involves the feet and occasionally the
causes: Disorders that increase the viscosity (thickness) of the blood can also cause Raynaud phenomenon, by reducing blood flow through the small blood vessels in the fingers and toes. Raynaud phenomenon has been associated with hypothyroidism .
symptoms: An attack of Raynaud phenomenon is triggered by exposure to cold, such as going out into a cold wind or immersing the hands in cold water. Sudden emotional or psychological upsets can also bring on an attack. The hands are most often affected, but it sometimes involves the feet and occasionally the nipples, nasal tip, or earlobes. Typically, one or more fingers will turn white and numb and, on rewarming, blue due to a sluggish blood flow. This is sometimes followed by a bright red colour and swelling due to a compensatory increase in blood flow before the normal skin colour and sensation are restored. Attacks may be painful and can last from minutes to hours. Raynaud phenomenon of the nipples presents as breast pain, often associated with pregnancy or lactation . It may follow breast surgery. Typically it presents as extremely painful or throbbing breastfeeding precipitated by exposure to cold, and the usual sequential two or three colour phases of blanching , blueness and/or erythema. Raynaud phenomenon Systemic sclerosis
epidemiology: Raynaud phenomenon can be divided into two main types: Primary Raynaud phenomenon, also known as Raynaud Disease. This is not associated with any other conditions. It affects at least one in five young women, and is less common in males, children and older individuals. It as an exaggeration of the normal response of the circulation to cold. Secondary Raynaud phenomenon has the same symptoms due to an identifiable cause or condition. Primary Raynaud phenomenon is about twice as common as the secondary form. It usually starts under 25 years of age and is five times more common in women than in men. Individuals often recall cold intolerance dating back to childhood. Patients with secondary Raynaud phenomenon often have the symptoms of an associated condition (see below) or are on medication that can cause Raynaud phenomenon as a side effect.
prognosis: Severe untreated Raynaud phenomenon can rarely result in permanent damage to the affected extremities.
snippet_zh: 雷諾現象的發作是由於暴露在寒冷中而引發的，例如外出吹冷風或將手浸入冷水中。突然的情緒或心理不安也可能導致發作。手最常受到影響，但有時也會影響腳，偶爾也會影響腳部。
causes_zh: 血液粘度（厚度）增加的疾病也會減少流經手指和腳趾小血管的血流量，從而導致雷諾現象。雷諾現象與甲狀腺功能減退症有關。
symptoms_zh: 雷諾現象的發作是由於暴露在寒冷中而引發的，例如外出吹冷風或將手浸入冷水中。突然的情緒或心理不安也可能導致發作。手最常受到影響，但有時也會影響腳，偶爾也會影響乳頭、鼻尖或耳垂。通常情況下，一根或多根手指會變白、麻木，而在復溫後，由於血流緩慢，手指會變成藍色。有時，在恢復正常膚色和感覺之前，由於血流量代償性增加，隨後會出現鮮紅色和腫脹。發作可能會很痛苦，可持續幾分鐘到幾小時。乳頭雷諾現象表現為乳房疼痛，通常與懷孕或哺乳有關。它可能發生在乳房手術之後。通常，它表現為因暴露於寒冷而引起的極其疼痛或抽痛的母乳喂養，以及通常連續的兩個或三個顏色階段的變白、發青和/或紅斑。雷諾現象 系統性硬化症
epidemiology_zh: 雷諾現象可分為兩種主要類型： 原發性雷諾現象，又稱雷諾病。這與任何其他條件無關。它影響至少五分之一的年輕女性，在男性、兒童和老年人中較少見。它是循環系統對寒冷的正常反應的誇大。由於可識別的原因或狀況，繼發性雷諾現象具有相同的症狀。原發性雷諾現象的發生率約為繼發性雷諾現象的兩倍。通常在 25 歲以下開始發病，女性發病率是男性的五倍。人們經常回憶起童年時期的寒冷不耐受症。患有繼發性雷諾現象的患者通常會出現相關病症的症狀（見下文），或者正在服用可能導致雷諾現象副作用的藥物。
prognosis_zh: 未經治療的嚴重雷諾現像很少會對受影響的四肢造成永久性損傷。

title: Reactive perforating collagenosis
snippet: Reactive perforating collagenosis is a papulonodular mucocutaneous disorder with adherent keratotic plugs and crusts. Red-brown umbilicated papules and nodules , often with a cup-shaped depression, central keratotic crust , and erythematous halo Variable in shape and size, usually up to 10 mm in dia
causes: The pathogenesis of reactive perforating collagenosis is unclear. The inherited form appears to be due to a genetic abnormality in collagen causing focal damage and extrusion through the epidermis. Cold weather and skin trauma typically trigger or aggravate the skin lesions. Microvascular insufficiency and elevated fibronectin levels in plasma , as seen with diabetes and renal failure, may play a role in the acquired form. Another theory suggests microdeposition of substances and abnormal glycosylation of collagen I and III in diabetes alter collagen fibres. Superficial trauma, such as scratching, and cold leads to necrobiosis and epidermal thinning in susceptible patients.
symptoms: Reactive perforating collagenosis is a papulonodular mucocutaneous disorder with adherent keratotic plugs and crusts. Red-brown umbilicated papules and nodules , often with a cup-shaped depression, central keratotic crust , and erythematous halo Variable in shape and size, usually up to 10 mm in diameter; a rare giant form has been described with individual lesions up to 10 cm in diameter Lesions are typically intensely itchy; pain or tenderness is rare Koebner phenomenon is a common feature Commonly located on trunk or extensor aspect of the limbs but can be widespread occurring anywhere on the skin Hands, elbows, and knees are the common initial sites involved in the inherited form Mucosal lesions have been described Variable phenotype in the familial form, even within the one family
epidemiology: Familial reactive perforating collagenosis Rare Autosomal dominant or autosomal recessive inheritance and sporadic cases Onset is usually in infancy or early childhood Acquired reactive perforating collagenosis More common form Onset is usually in adulthood Female predominance 3:1 No clear racial predilection Strong association with diabetes mellitus and chronic renal disease ; 10% of haemodialysis patients develop reactive perforating collagenosis Other reported associations include concurrent itchy dermatoses , malignancies, pregnancy and endocrine disorders, infections and infestations, and medications
prognosis: Impact of chronic itch on quality of life Secondary bacterial skin infection Healing of individual lesions with scarring and/or dyspigmentation in all skin types
snippet_zh: 反應性穿孔性膠原病是一種丘疹結節性粘膜皮膚疾病，伴有粘附性角化栓和結痂。臍部紅棕色丘疹和結節，常有杯狀凹陷，中央有角化痂，紅斑暈，形狀和大小不一，直徑通常可達10毫米
causes_zh: 反應性穿孔性膠原病的發病機制尚不清楚。這種遺傳形式似乎是由於膠原蛋白的遺傳異常導致局灶性損傷和表皮擠壓所致。寒冷的天氣和皮膚創傷通常會引發或加重皮膚病變。微血管功能不全和血漿中纖連蛋白水平升高（如糖尿病和腎功能衰竭所見）可能在獲得性形式中發揮作用。另一種理論表明，糖尿病中物質的微沉積以及 I 型和 III 型膠原蛋白的異常糖基化會改變膠原纖維。淺表創傷，如抓傷和寒冷會導致易感患者壞死和表皮變薄。
symptoms_zh: 反應性穿孔性膠原病是一種丘疹結節性粘膜皮膚疾病，伴有粘附性角化栓和結痂。臍部紅棕色丘疹和結節，常有杯狀凹陷，中央有角化痂，有紅斑暈。形狀和大小可變，直徑通常可達10毫米；據描述，一種罕見的巨大形式，單個病變直徑可達 10 厘米。病變通常會劇烈瘙癢；疼痛或壓痛很少見 Koebner 現像是一種常見特徵 通常位於軀乾或四肢伸肌方面，但可以廣泛發生在皮膚的任何地方 手、肘和膝蓋是遺傳形式中涉及的常見起始部位 粘膜病變已被描述 家族形式中存在可變表型，甚至在一個家庭內
epidemiology_zh: 家族性反應性穿孔性膠原病 罕見 常染色體顯性或常染色體隱性遺傳和散發病例 發病通常在嬰儿期或幼儿期 獲得性反應性穿孔性膠原病 更常見 發病通常在成年期 女性佔多數 3:1 無明顯種族傾向 與糖尿病和慢性腎病密切相關； 10% 的血液透析患者出現反應性穿孔性膠原病其他報導的關聯包括並發瘙癢性皮膚病、惡性腫瘤、妊娠和內分泌紊亂、感染和侵染以及藥物治療
prognosis_zh: 慢性瘙癢對生活質量的影響繼發性細菌性皮膚感染所有皮膚類型中帶有疤痕和/或色素沉著的個別病變的癒合

title: Recurrent fissuring of posterior fourchette
snippet: Most women who present with posterior fourchette fissures are sexually active and symptoms follow intercourse. Symptoms may be mild, moderate, or severe in intensity, usually resolve within a few days, and may include: Pain on vaginal penetration during intercourse ( dyspareunia ) Pain on insertion
causes: The splitting occurs when the vulva stretches, particularly during sexual intercourse. This may be because the skin is stiff, inflamed, fragile, or for unknown reasons. Posterior fourchette fissuring may be primary , i.e., no underlying skin disease is diagnosed, or secondary to an infection or inflammatory skin disease. Common causes include: Vulvovaginitis due to Candida albicans (thrush) Herpes simplex infection ( genital herpes ) Atrophic vulvovaginitis Contact dermatitis due to irritants or less often, allergy Seborrhoeic dermatitis Atopic dermatitis Lichen simplex Aphthous ulceration Lichen sclerosus Delayed healing of tear or episiotomy wound following childbirth Pelvic floor muscle tension leading to vaginismus. Laceration of the posterior fourchette may also be due to straddle injury, violence or rape; in these situations bruising and other injuries may also be present. Similar symptoms experienced in the absence of fissuring or other visible signs may be described as vulvodynia or vestibulodynia .
symptoms: Most women who present with posterior fourchette fissures are sexually active and symptoms follow intercourse. Symptoms may be mild, moderate, or severe in intensity, usually resolve within a few days, and may include: Pain on vaginal penetration during intercourse ( dyspareunia ) Pain on insertion of a vaginal tampon Pain during vaginal examination Tearing sensation Bleeding or spotting Itching Burning Stinging on contact with semen, water, or urine. Affected women may be premenopausal or postmenopausal. Fissuring can occur at the first attempt at sexual intercourse or many years later, in women who have had children or who have never had children. They may also have other symptoms, including fissures in the skin folds elsewhere in the vulva. On careful clinical examination, there is usually a tiny split or linear erosion at the midline of the base of the vagina on the perineal skin. Colposcopy may be necessary to see the fissure. The posterior fourchette may form a tight band or tent (membranous hypertrophy ). In some cases, signs may be more impressive and include: Marked tenderness Deep, wide ulceration Redness of surrounding tissue Swelling or lumps Scarring. The vulva may appear entirely normal if the examination takes place after the fissure has healed. But often, a new fissure can appear while gently stretching the vulva.
snippet_zh: 大多數出現後唇裂的女性性生活活躍，性交後會出現症狀。症狀的強度可能是輕度、中度或重度，通常會在幾天內消退，可能包括： 性交時陰道插入時疼痛（性交疼痛） 插入時疼痛
causes_zh: 當外陰伸展時，特別是在性交過程中，會發生分裂。這可能是因為皮膚僵硬、發炎、脆弱或未知原因。後唇裂可能是原發性的，即沒有診斷出潛在的皮膚病，也可能是繼發於感染或炎症性皮膚病。常見原因包括： 白色念珠菌（鵝口瘡）引起的外陰陰道炎 單純皰疹感染（生殖器皰疹） 萎縮性外陰陰道炎 因刺激物或較少見的過敏引起的接觸性皮炎 脂溢性皮炎 特應性皮炎 單純性苔蘚 口瘡性潰瘍 硬化性苔蘚 分娩後撕裂或會陰切開傷口癒合延遲 盆底肌肉緊張導致陰道痙攣。後四肢撕裂也可能是由於跨騎傷害、暴力或強姦造成的；在這些情況下，還可能出現瘀傷和其他傷害。在沒有裂痕或其他可見體徵的情況下經歷的類似症狀可被描述為外陰痛或前庭痛。
symptoms_zh: 大多數出現後唇裂的女性性生活活躍，性交後會出現症狀。症狀的強度可能是輕度、中度或重度，通常會在幾天內消退，可能包括： 性交時插入陰道時疼痛（性交困難） 插入陰道衛生棉條時疼痛 陰道檢查時疼痛 撕裂感 出血或斑點 瘙癢 燒灼感 接觸精液、水或尿液時有刺痛感。受影響的女性可能是絕經前或絕經後。對於生育過或從未生育過的女性來說，裂痕可能會在第一次嘗試性交時或多年後發生。他們還可能有其他症狀，包括外陰其他部位的皮膚皺褶出現裂痕。仔細臨床檢查，會陰部皮膚陰道基部中線處常有微小裂口或線狀糜爛。可能需要陰道鏡檢查才能看到裂隙。後四肢可能形成緊帶或帳篷（膜肥大）。在某些情況下，體徵可能更令人印象深刻，包括： 明顯壓痛 深而廣泛的潰瘍 周圍組織發紅 腫脹或腫塊 疤痕。如果在裂痕癒合後進行檢查，外陰可能看起來完全正常。但通常，輕輕拉伸外陰時會出現新的裂痕。

title: Rheumatic fever
snippet: Rheumatic fever is an inflammatory disease that appears weeks after streptococcal throat infection, affecting joints, heart, nervous system, and sometimes the skin.
causes: Triggered by autoimmune reaction after group A streptococcal pharyngitis. The immune system mistakenly attacks the patient’s own tissues, including heart, joints, skin, and brain.
symptoms: Non-specific symptoms include fever, abdominal pain, and muscle aches. Major features include migratory polyarthritis (ankles, knees, elbows, wrists), carditis affecting valves and myocardium, Sydenham chorea, erythema marginatum (annular pink patches on trunk and limbs), and subcutaneous nodules over joints or scalp.
epidemiology: Common in children aged 5–15 years. Most prevalent in developing countries. Highest rates occur in Māori and Pacific peoples, Aboriginal Australians, and Pacific Island nations. Associated with poverty, overcrowding, and limited sanitation.
prognosis: Complications mainly involve rheumatic heart disease, including permanent damage to mitral and aortic valves, heart failure, pericarditis, and arrhythmias such as atrial fibrillation.
snippet_zh: 風濕熱是一種在鏈球菌性咽喉炎後數週出現的全身性發炎疾病，可影響關節、心臟、神經系統與皮膚。
causes_zh: 由 A 群鏈球菌咽喉感染後的自體免疫反應引起，免疫系統錯誤攻擊自身的心臟、關節、皮膚與腦部組織。
symptoms_zh: 非特異性症狀包括發燒、腹痛和肌肉痠痛。主要表現為遷移性多關節炎（腳踝、膝、肘、手腕）、心臟炎（瓣膜與心肌）、西德納姆舞蹈症、邊緣紅斑（軀幹與四肢的環狀粉紅紅斑）、以及皮下結節（多位於關節、頭皮後方或脊椎）。
epidemiology_zh: 好發於 5–15 歲兒童。多見於開發中國家。最高發生率在紐西蘭的毛利人與太平洋族群、澳洲原住民與太平洋島國。與貧困、擁擠與衛生不良相關。可能具有家族易感基因。
prognosis_zh: 最嚴重的後果是風濕性心臟病，可造成二尖瓣與主動脈瓣永久性損傷、心力衰竭、心包炎與心律不整（如心房顫動）。

title: Rheumatoid arthritis and the skin
snippet: Atrophic (thin, wrinkled) skin, which is fragile and easy to bruise Pale, translucent skin on the backs of the hands Dry skin ( xerosis ) Palmar erythema (red palms) Raynaud phenomenon Nail changes – brittle nails , onycholysis , nail ridging and splitting, clubbing , ventral pterygium.
causes: Rheumatoid arthritis is multifactorial in origin. Although regarded as autoimmune with anti-citrullinated protein antibodies (ACPA) and rheumatoid factor (RF), genetic and environmental factors are also important in the pathogenesis. In ACPA-positive disease the most significant association is mapped to the HLA -DRB4 gene. ACPA are found in 60% of patients with rheumatoid arthritis (seropositive).
symptoms: Atrophic (thin, wrinkled) skin, which is fragile and easy to bruise Pale, translucent skin on the backs of the hands Dry skin ( xerosis ) Palmar erythema (red palms) Raynaud phenomenon Nail changes – brittle nails , onycholysis , nail ridging and splitting, clubbing , ventral pterygium.
epidemiology: Rheumatoid arthritis predominantly affects females (3:1) with an increased risk for those with a first-degree relative affected. The prevalence is estimated to be 1%. Rheumatoid arthritis affects all races. The peak age of onset is 35–50 years. Extra-articular involvement develops in approximately 40%, and skin changes in 30%.
prognosis: Extra-articular manifestations of rheumatoid arthritis often involve the skin particularly in patients with more severe disease. Some skin signs appear early in the disease course, others only in chronic long-standing rheumatoid arthritis; some are benign and self-limiting, while others may be a sign of serious systemic disease that can affect life-expectancy. For female patients with rheumatoid arthritis and positive Ro/La autoantibodies , there is a 10% risk of a baby having neonatal lupus erythematosus. Inadequately treated rheumatoid arthritis can result in disability and impact quality of life.
title_zh: 類風濕性關節炎和皮膚
snippet_zh: 萎縮性（薄、皺紋）皮膚，脆弱且容易瘀傷 手背皮膚蒼白、半透明 皮膚乾燥（乾燥） 手掌紅斑（手掌發紅） 雷諾現象 指甲變化 – 指甲變脆、甲剝離、指甲起皺和裂開、杵狀指、腹側翼狀胬肉。
causes_zh: 類風濕性關節炎的起源是多因素的。儘管抗瓜氨酸蛋白抗體（ACPA）和類風濕因子（RF）被認為是自身免疫性疾病，但遺傳和環境因素在發病機制中也很重要。在 ACPA 陽性疾病中，最顯著的關聯被映射到 HLA -DRB4 基因。ACPA 存在於 60% 的類風濕性關節炎（血清反應陽性）患者中。
symptoms_zh: 萎縮性（薄、皺紋）皮膚，脆弱且容易瘀傷 手背皮膚蒼白、半透明 皮膚乾燥（乾燥） 手掌紅斑（手掌發紅） 雷諾現象 指甲變化 – 指甲變脆、甲剝離、指甲起皺和裂開、杵狀指、腹側翼狀胬肉。
epidemiology_zh: 類風濕性關節炎主要影響女性（3:1），一級親屬患病的風險增加。患病率估計為 1%。類風濕性關節炎影響所有種族。發病高峰年齡為35-50歲。大約 40% 發生關節外受累，30% 發生皮膚變化。
prognosis_zh: 類風濕性關節炎的關節外表現通常涉及皮膚，特別是對於病情較嚴重的患者。一些皮膚症狀出現在病程早期，另一些則僅出現在慢性長期類風濕性關節炎中；有些是良性的、自限性的，而另一些則可能是嚴重全身性疾病的徵兆，可能影響預期壽命。對於患有類風濕性關節炎且 Ro/La 自身抗體陽性的女性患者，嬰兒患新生兒紅斑狼瘡的風險為 10%。類風濕性關節炎治療不充分會導致殘疾並影響生活質量。

title: Rhinophyma
snippet: Rhinophyma is a subtype of rosacea characterised by progressive thickening of the nasal skin, visible enlarged pores, and a bulbous nose appearance.
causes: The exact cause is unknown. Proposed mechanisms include dilation of blood vessels leading to skin thickening and vascular instability causing fluid leakage, inflammation, and scarring.
symptoms: Progressive thickening of nasal skin, enlarged pores, irregular surface nodularity, redness, and a bulbous nasal shape. Often occurs as part of phymatous rosacea.
epidemiology: Occurs predominantly in men, with male-to-female ratios ranging from 5:1 to 30:1, possibly related to androgen influence.
prognosis: Generally benign. Basal cell carcinoma may rarely arise within rhinophyma, but rhinophyma itself is not considered a premalignant condition.
snippet_zh: 鼻贅瘤是酒糟鼻的一種亞型，表現為鼻部皮膚逐漸增厚、毛孔變大，外觀呈球狀或肥厚。
causes_zh: 確切原因不明。可能機制包括血管擴張導致皮膚增厚，以及血管不穩定造成滲出，引發炎症與疤痕形成。
symptoms_zh: 鼻部皮膚逐漸增厚、表面凹凸不平、毛孔粗大、泛紅，鼻形變得球狀或肥厚。常見於酒糟鼻的肥大型（phymatous rosacea）。
epidemiology_zh: 好發於男性，男女比例約 5:1 至 30:1，可能與雄性激素相關。
prognosis_zh: 多為良性疾病。雖有報告指出可合併基底細胞癌，但鼻贅瘤本身並非惡性腫瘤的前兆。

title: Rosacea
snippet: Cutaneous features include: Transient recurrent erythema, ie, flushing Persistent facial erythema Telangiectasia Facial skin other than in the nasal alar region Eyelid margin telangiectasia Together often termed erythematotelangiectatic rosacea Inflammatory papules and pustules (papulopustular) Phym
causes: The pathogenesis of rosacea is thought to be multifactorial and includes: Genetic susceptibility Association with single nucleotide polymorphisms related to the class II major histocompatibility complex. Altered microbiome of the skin and gut Bacterial overgrowth of the small intestine, Helicobacter pylori infection, and increased density of Demodex folliculorum and Staphylococcus epidermidis on the skin may play a role in skin inflammation. Dysregulation of the immune response may lead to excessive inflammation, vasodilation , lymphatic dilatation, and angiogenesis. Neurocutaneous mechanisms Triggers include ultraviolet ( UV ) radiation, temperature change, exercise, spicy foods, alcohol, psychological stress, air pollution, and tobacco smoking. Calcitonin gene -related peptide (CGRP) may play a role in flushing and erythema. Impaired skin barrier Affected skin displays features indicating skin barrier impairment, allowing bacterial colonisation and inflammation. Innate immunity In the skin of patients with rosacea, there is increased expression and activity of toll-like receptor 2, cathelicidins, kallikrein 5, and mast cells. Furthermore, cathelicidin LL-37 increases sensitivity of the skin to the sun. The result is an exaggerated innate immune reaction to the initial trigger. Adaptive immunity Dominant T-helper (Th)1/Th17 gene expression in all features of rosacea. Increased Th17 expression can increase levels of cathelicidin LL-37 in keratinocytes and drive further inflammation. The most significant environmental trigger is UV radiation; affected skin is more sensitive to exposure. UV radiation can damage the dermis and increase skin inflammation.
symptoms: Cutaneous features include: Transient recurrent erythema, ie, flushing Persistent facial erythema Telangiectasia Facial skin other than in the nasal alar region Eyelid margin telangiectasia Together often termed erythematotelangiectatic rosacea Inflammatory papules and pustules (papulopustular) Phymatous changes Thickening of the skin due to hyperplasia/fibrosis of the sebaceous glands of the face Most common area affected is the nose (termed rhinophyma ) More commonly present in men. Rhinophyma Rhinophyma showing swelling and sebeceous gland openings (RO-patient1) Steroid induced papulopustular rosacea Steroid induced rosacea on the forehead Steroid induced facial rosacea Steroid induced papular rosacea Swelling and papulopustules in steroid induced rosacea (SR-patient4) Occasionally rosacea induces facial lymphoedema (Morbihan disease), producing redness, and swelling of the face and lids. Facial tenderness and burning pain accompanied by redness and flushing ( neurogenic rosacea) is a rare variant of rosacea. Lid lymphoedema and glabellar swelling in Morbihan disease Violaceous swelling of the lower lids in Morbihan disease Non-cutaneous ocular features (affects over 50% of patients with rosacea): Dryness Foreign-body sensation Photophobia Conjunctivitis Blepharitis Keratitis — can lead to long-term eyesight impairment. Click here for images of rosacea
epidemiology: Rosacea is estimated to affect around 5% of adults worldwide. Although rosacea is often thought to affect women more than men, studies have revealed an approximately equal gender distribution. Rosacea typically presents after the age of 30 and becomes more prevalent with age. However, it can occur at any age and occasionally presents in children. Although rosacea can affect anyone, it is more common in those with fair skin, blue eyes, and those of Celtic or North European descent. It may be more difficult and under-recognised in patients with skin of colour. Rosacea has been associated with depression, hypertension , cardiovascular diseases, anxiety disorder, dyslipidemia, diabetes mellitus, migraine, rheumatoid arthritis , Helicobacter pylori infection , ulcerative colitis , and dementia.
prognosis: Complications of rosacea include: Phymatous rosacea Inflammatory eye complications, eg, blepharokeratoconjunctivitis, sclerokeratitis Physical discomfort, eg, from ocular symptoms Negative psychosocial effects such as increased anxiety, depression, low self-esteem, and social isolation Trigger avoidance leading to lifestyle limitations.
snippet_zh: 皮膚特徵包括： 暫時性複發性紅斑，即潮紅 持續性面部紅斑 毛細血管擴張 鼻翼區域以外的面部皮膚 眼瞼邊緣毛細血管擴張 通常統稱為紅斑毛細血管擴張性紅斑痤瘡 炎性丘疹和膿皰（丘疹膿皰） Phym
causes_zh: 紅斑痤瘡的發病機制被認為是多因素的，包括： 遺傳易感性 與 II 類主要組織相容性複合體相關的單核苷酸多態性的關聯。皮膚和腸道微生物群的改變小腸細菌過度生長、幽門螺桿菌感染以及皮膚上毛囊蠕形蟎和表皮葡萄球菌密度增加可能在皮膚炎症中發揮作用。免疫反應失調可能導致過度炎症、血管舒張、淋巴管擴張和血管生成。神經皮膚機制 觸發因素包括紫外線 (UV) 輻射、溫度變化、運動、辛辣食物、酒精、心理壓力、空氣污染和吸煙。降鈣素基因相關肽（CGRP）可能在潮紅和紅斑中發揮作用。皮膚屏障受損受影響的皮膚表現出皮膚屏障受損的特徵，導致細菌定植和炎症。先天免疫 在紅斑痤瘡患者的皮膚中，Toll 樣受體 2、抗菌素、激肽釋放酶 5 和肥大細胞的表達和活性增加。此外，cathelicidin LL-37 會增加皮膚對陽光的敏感性。結果是對初始觸發因素產生誇大的先天免疫反應。適應性免疫 紅斑痤瘡所有特徵中顯性 T 輔助細胞 (Th)1/Th17 基因表達。Th17 表達增加會增加角質形成細胞中導管素 LL-37 的水平，並進一步引發炎症。最重要的環境觸發因素是紫外線輻射；受影響的皮膚對暴露更敏感。紫外線輻射會損傷真皮並加劇皮膚炎症。
symptoms_zh: 皮膚特徵包括： 短暫性複發性紅斑，即潮紅 持續性面部紅斑 毛細血管擴張 鼻翼區域以外的面部皮膚 眼瞼邊緣毛細血管擴張 通常統稱為紅斑毛細血管擴張性酒渣鼻 炎性丘疹和膿皰（丘疹膿皰） 膿皰性改變 由於皮脂腺增生/纖維化而導致皮膚增厚面部 最常見受影響的部位是鼻子（稱為鼻贅），更常見於男性。鼻贅 鼻贅顯示腫脹和皮脂腺開口（RO-患者 1） 類固醇誘發的丘疹膿皰性紅斑痤瘡 類固醇誘發的前額紅斑痤瘡 類固醇誘發的面部紅斑痤瘡 類固醇誘發的丘疹性紅斑痤瘡 類固醇誘發的紅斑痤瘡中的腫脹和丘疹膿皰（SR-患者 4） 偶爾紅斑痤瘡會誘發麵部淋巴水腫（莫爾比昂病），產生髮紅和腫脹臉部和眼瞼。面部壓痛和灼痛并伴有發紅和潮紅（神經源性酒渣鼻）是酒渣鼻的一種罕見變體。莫爾比昂病的眼瞼淋巴水腫和眉間腫脹 莫比昂病的下眼瞼嚴重腫脹 非皮膚眼部特徵（影響超過 50% 的紅斑痤瘡患者）： 乾燥 異物感 畏光 結膜炎 瞼緣炎 角膜炎 — 可導致長期視力障礙。單擊此處查看紅斑痤瘡的圖片
epidemiology_zh: 據估計，紅斑痤瘡影響著全世界約 5% 的成年人。雖然紅斑痤瘡通常被認為對女性的影響大於男性，但研究表明，性別分佈大致相等。紅斑痤瘡通常出現在 30 歲之後，並且隨著年齡的增長而變得更加普遍。然而，它可以發生在任何年齡，並且偶爾出現在兒童中。儘管紅斑痤瘡可能影響任何人，但在白皮膚、藍眼睛以及凱爾特人或北歐血統的人中更為常見。對於有色皮膚的患者來說，這可能更加困難並且未被充分認識。紅斑痤瘡與抑鬱症、高血壓、心血管疾病、焦慮症、血脂異常、糖尿病、偏頭痛、類風濕性關節炎、幽門螺桿菌感染、潰瘍性結腸炎和癡呆有關。
prognosis_zh: 紅斑痤瘡的並發症包括： 肉瘤性紅斑痤瘡 眼部炎症並發症，例如眼瞼角結膜炎、鞏膜角膜炎 身體不適，例如眼部症狀引起的 負面心理社會影響，例如焦慮、抑鬱、自卑和社交孤立增加 觸發迴避，導致生活方式限制。

title: Roseola
snippet: Roseola is a common childhood viral illness presenting with high fever for 3–5 days followed by a sudden rose-pink rash as the fever resolves.
causes: Roseola is caused by human herpesvirus 6 (HHV-6) or occasionally HHV-7.
symptoms: High fever (up to 40°C) for 3–5 days, mild upper respiratory symptoms, irritability, and tiredness. As fever subsides, a non-itchy pink rash appears on the trunk, sometimes spreading mildly to neck, face, or limbs. Nagayama spots may be seen on the soft palate. In 5–15% of young children, high fever may trigger febrile seizures.
epidemiology: Most common in children aged 6 months to 3 years; around 86% infected by age 1. Rare in adults due to lifelong immunity.
prognosis: Generally excellent. Febrile seizures may occur but are brief and not dangerous. Severe complications (encephalitis, hepatitis, myocarditis) are very rare. HHV-6 reactivation can cause systemic illness in immunosuppressed patients.
snippet_zh: 玫瑰疹是嬰幼兒常見的病毒感染，典型為 3–5 天高燒後，退燒時突然出現玫瑰粉紅色皮疹。
causes_zh: 主要由人類皰疹病毒第 6 型（HHV-6）引起，少數由 HHV-7 引起。
symptoms_zh: 症狀包括 3–5 天的高燒（可達 40°C），伴輕微上呼吸道症狀如喉嚨痛、咳嗽、流鼻涕或鼻塞，並可能有煩躁與疲倦。退燒時出現粉紅色、不癢、不痛的小斑丘疹，主要分布於軀幹，偶爾延伸至頸部或四肢。軟顎可能可見長山斑。約 5–15% 幼兒可能因高燒出現熱性痙攣。
epidemiology_zh: 最常見於 6 個月至 3 歲兒童；約 86% 的孩子在 1 歲前感染。成人罕見，因童年期感染可產生終身免疫。
prognosis_zh: 預後良好。熱性痙攣可能發生，但通常短暫且無危險。嚴重併發症如腦炎、肝炎、心肌炎極為罕見。免疫抑制者 HHV-6 重新活化可能引發發燒、皮疹、肺炎、肝炎或骨髓抑制。

title: Rubella
snippet: In 25-50% of rubella cases the disease is usually so mild there may be few or no signs or symptoms. In typical cases the incubation period is between 12-23 days, most people show symptoms within 16-18 days after exposure. Common symptoms include: Slight fever, sore throat, runny nose and malaise (ma
causes: Rubella is caused by the rubella virus, in the Rubivirus genus.
symptoms: In 25-50% of rubella cases the disease is usually so mild there may be few or no signs or symptoms. In typical cases the incubation period is between 12-23 days, most people show symptoms within 16-18 days after exposure. Common symptoms include: Slight fever, sore throat, runny nose and malaise (may occur prior to appearance of rash, more so in adults than in children). Tender or swollen glands almost always accompany rubella, most commonly behind the ears ( retroauricular ) and at the back of the neck ( occipital and posterior cervical lymph nodes ). Lymphadenopathy may occur in patients with rubella that do not have a rash. Mucosal involvement results in the Forchheimer sign , in which pinpoint or larger petechiae are noted on the soft palate and uvula during the prodromal period of rubella. Rash begins on the face that spreads to the neck, trunk and extremities. Appear as pink or light red spots about 2–3 mm in size. Lasts up to 5 days (average is 3 days). May or may not be itchy. As rash passes, affected skin may shed in flakes. Usually not as widespread as in measles. Other symptoms include pain and swelling in joints ( arthralgia and arthritis ). This is more common in adults, particularly women, and may persist longer than 2 weeks. The arthritis may become chronic and persist for months or years. Rubella rash Rubella rash Rubella rash
epidemiology: Rubella is now rarely seen in countries where rubella vaccination is part of their routine immunisation programme. In countries that do not have immunisation programmes in place, rubella continues to be a mild childhood illness that may even pass un-noticed. The major burden is congenital rubella syndrome and its devastating effects to the unborn fetus.
prognosis: Complications are rare with rubella in healthy infants and adults. Complications can include: Arthralgia or arthritis in adults Thrombocytopenic purpura Otitis media Encephalitis.

causes_zh: 風疹是由風疹病毒屬的風疹病毒引起的。
symptoms_zh: 在 25-50% 的風疹病例中，疾病通常很輕微，可能很少或沒有體徵或症狀。在典型情況下，潛伏期為 12-23 天，大多數人在接觸後 16-18 天內出現症狀。常見症狀包括：輕微發燒、喉嚨痛、流鼻涕和不適（可能在出現皮疹之前發生，成人比兒童更常見）。風疹幾乎總是伴隨著腺體壓痛或腫脹，最常見的是耳後（耳後）和頸後（枕骨和頸後淋巴結）。沒有皮疹的風疹患者可能會出現淋巴結腫大。粘膜受累會導致福希海默徵，即在風疹前驅期，軟齶和懸雍垂上出現針點或較大的瘀點。皮疹從面部開始，蔓延至頸部、軀乾和四肢。呈粉紅色或淺紅色斑點，大小約 2-3 毫米。持續長達 5 天（平均為 3 天）。可能會癢，也可能不會。隨著皮疹消失，受影響的皮膚可能會脫落片狀。通常不像麻疹那樣廣泛傳播。其他症狀包括關節疼痛和腫脹（關節痛和關節炎）。這種情況在成人中更為常見，尤其是女性，並且可能持續超過兩週。關節炎可能會變成慢性並持續數月或數年。風疹皮疹 風疹皮疹 風疹皮疹
epidemiology_zh: 目前，在將風疹疫苗接種納入常規免疫計劃的國家中，風疹已很少見。在沒有製定免疫計劃的國家，風疹仍然是一種輕微的兒童疾病，甚至可能被忽視。主要負擔是先天性風疹綜合徵及其對未出生胎兒的破壞性影響。
prognosis_zh: 對於健康嬰兒和成人來說，風疹並發症很少見。並發症可能包括： 成人關節痛或關節炎 血小板減少性紫癜 中耳炎 腦炎。

title: Scabies
snippet: Infection typically presents with a classical itchy rash. Lesions are symmetrical , and mainly affect the hands, wrists, axillae , thighs, buttocks, waist, soles of the feet, areola and vulva in females and penis and scrotum in males. The neck and above are usually spared, except in cases of crusted
causes: Scabies infection is usually transmitted through close bodily skin contact such as holding hands for prolonged periods; spread amongst sexual partners is common. A brief handshake or hug does not usually allow for transmission unless the patient has crusted scabies. Spread via fomites (clothing, towels, etc.) is very uncommon as the mite perishes within hours of leaving the host ; it is relevant in crusted scabies .
symptoms: Infection typically presents with a classical itchy rash. Lesions are symmetrical , and mainly affect the hands, wrists, axillae , thighs, buttocks, waist, soles of the feet, areola and vulva in females and penis and scrotum in males. The neck and above are usually spared, except in cases of crusted scabies and in infections occurring in infants, the elderly, and the immunocompromised. However, the rash may be generalised and eczematous features may dominate and mask the classical signs. Clinical suspicion is paramount. Itch Generalised Occurs in 4 to 6 weeks following initial infection (during which time the host is infectious) Occurs within hours of subsequent re-infection Worse at night-time May persist for several weeks after completion of treatment. Rash Erythematous papules Excoriations Linear scratch marks Dermatitis Nodules which may be skin coloured, red-brown, or violaceous Crusting ( hyperkeratosis as seen in crusted scabies) Vesicles which may also be secondary to a superimposed bacterial infection.
epidemiology: Scabies is a global disease, and anyone can be affected. It is estimated that about 204 million people are affected by scabies worldwide, with an annual incidence of 455 million cases. Scabies is more common in the elderly, children, and adolescents. The burden of disease is higher in low-income areas, in the tropics, and in poorly resourced communities and countries. Risk factors for scabies, particularly in developing countries, include: Crowded conditions Poor hygiene Poverty Malnutrition Homelessness Immunodeficiency. In developed countries, scabies occurs in family outbreaks and children may acquire it from close play contact in school or sleepovers. In situations where there may be close physical contact for the delivery of personal care, such as in care homes , large outbreaks are not uncommon. In young adults, sexual spread is frequent.
prognosis: Crusted scabies Previously known as Norwegian Scabies. Associated with dense hyperkeratosis of the skin. Caused by an altered host immune response. Seen particularly in patients with: Reduced T-cell immunity e.g., HIV Reduced peripheral sensation e.g., leprosy Patients unable to debride mites mechanically e.g., Down syndrome and subungual hyperkeratosis. Results in uncontrolled proliferation of mites (thousands to millions of mites, compared to 10–15 seen in classical scabies). Bullous scabies Usually seen in elderly males. Bullae may be tense or flaccid. Thought to be due to either secondary infection of a scabetic lesion with Staphylococcus aureus or due to an autoantibody response. Nodular scabies May be due to a local hypersensitivity reaction to dead mites or may be secondary to persistent infection. Commonly affects male genitalia (may be a widespread dominant feature in children) and breasts. Can be seen around the axillae or on the buttocks. May persist for months despite otherwise successful scabies treatment. Other complications of classical scabies include: Scabies incognito Modification of the clinical picture secondary to inappropriate use of steroids after misdiagnosis. Results in delayed diagnosis, sometimes for months or even years. Secondary bacterial infection Staphylococcus aureus or Streptococcus pyogenes bacteraemia. Impetigo . Pustular lesions on the palms, soles, fingers, and toes. Toxin -mediated diseases such as toxic shock syndrome , glomerulonephritis, and acute rheumatic fever. Psychological distress Scabies often afflicts young adults living away from home for the first time and the development of a contagious rash can be embarrassing. Stigma can lead to an inability to ensure household or sexual contacts are treated. Sleep disturbance and an unsightly rash compound the emotional impact of the illness, especially where diagnosis and comprehensive treatment is delayed, when the symptoms can persist for many months. snippet_zh: 感染通常表現為典型的瘙癢皮疹。病變對稱，女性主要累及手、手腕、腋窩、大腿、臀部、腰部、腳底、乳暈、外陰，男性主要累及陰莖、陰囊。頸部及以上部位通常不會受到影響，除非有結痂的情況
causes_zh: 疥瘡感染通常通過密切的身體皮膚接觸傳播，例如長時間握手；在性伴侶之間傳播很常見。除非患者有結痂的疥瘡，否則短暫的握手或擁抱通常不會導致傳播。通過污染物（衣服、毛巾等）傳播的情況非常罕見，因為蟎蟲在離開宿主後數小時內就會死亡；它與結痂疥瘡有關。
symptoms_zh: 感染通常表現為典型的瘙癢皮疹。病變對稱，女性主要累及手、手腕、腋窩、大腿、臀部、腰部、腳底、乳暈、外陰，男性主要累及陰莖、陰囊。頸部及以上部位通常不會受到影響，但結痂的疥瘡以及嬰兒、老年人和免疫功能低下者發生的感染除外。然而，皮疹可能是全身性的，濕疹特徵可能占主導地位並掩蓋了典型症狀。臨床懷疑至關重要。全身性瘙癢 初次感染後 4 至 6 週內發生（在此期間宿主具有傳染性） 在隨後再次感染後數小時內發生 夜間情況更嚴重 治療完成後可能會持續數週。皮疹 紅斑丘疹 抓痕 線狀抓痕 皮炎 結節，可能是膚色、紅棕色或紫羅蘭色 結痂（角化過度，見於結痂的疥瘡） 水皰，也可能繼發於疊加的細菌感染。
epidemiology_zh: 疥瘡是一種全球性疾病，任何人都可能受到影響。據估計，全世界約有 2.04 億人受到疥瘡的影響，每年發病人數為 4.55 億例。疥瘡多見於老年人、兒童和青少年。低收入地區、熱帶地區以及資源貧乏的社區和國家的疾病負擔更高。疥瘡的危險因素，特別是在發展中國家，包括： 擁擠的環境 衛生條件差 貧困 營養不良 無家可歸 免疫缺陷。在發達國家，疥瘡發生在家庭中，兒童可能通過在學校或過夜時的密切接觸而感染疥瘡。在提供個人護理時可能存在密切身體接觸的情況下，例如在療養院，大規模疫情爆發並不少見。在年輕人中，性傳播很常見。
prognosis_zh: 結痂疥瘡 以前稱為挪威疥瘡。與皮膚緻密角化過度有關。由宿主免疫反應改變引起。尤其見於患有以下疾病的患者： T 細胞免疫力降低，例如艾滋病毒 周圍感覺降低，例如麻風病 無法機械清創蟎蟲的患者，例如唐氏綜合症和甲下角化過度症。導致蟎蟲不受控制地增殖（數千至數百萬隻蟎蟲，而經典疥瘡中的蟎蟲數量為 10-15 只）。大皰性疥瘡 通常見於老年男性。大皰可能緊張或鬆弛。被認為是由於金黃色葡萄球菌的疥瘡病變繼發感染或由於自身抗體反應。結節性疥瘡可能是由於對死蟎的局部過敏反應或可能繼發於持續感染。通常影響男性生殖器（可能是兒童中普遍存在的顯性特徵）和乳房。可以在腋窩周圍或臀部看到。儘管疥瘡治療成功，但仍可能持續數月。經典疥瘡的其他並發症包括： 隱匿性疥瘡 誤診後因不恰當使用類固醇而導致的臨床表現改變。導致診斷延遲，有時長達數月甚至數年。繼發細菌感染金黃色葡萄球菌或化膿性鏈球菌菌血症。膿皰瘡。手掌、腳底、手指和腳趾出現膿皰性病變。毒素介導的疾病，如中毒性休克綜合徵、腎小球腎炎和急性風濕熱。心理困擾 第一次離家居住的年輕人經常會受到疥瘡的困擾，並且出現傳染性皮疹可能會令人尷尬。恥辱可能導致無法確保家庭或性接觸得到治療。睡眠障礙和難看的皮疹會加劇疾病對情緒的影響，尤其是在診斷和綜合治療被延誤的情況下，症狀可能會持續數月。伴有鏈球菌感染的疥瘡 腋窩結節 嬰兒腋窩結節

title: Scalp folliculitis
snippet: Scalp folliculitis is an inflammatory condition of the hair follicles on the scalp, presenting with small itchy or painful pustules.
causes: The exact cause is unclear. It is thought to be an inflammatory reaction involving micro-organisms in the hair follicle, including Cutibacterium acnes, Staphylococcus aureus in severe cases, Malassezia yeasts, and Demodex mites.
symptoms: Small itchy or tender pustules on the scalp, sometimes with crusting or mild hair shedding.
snippet_zh: 頭皮毛囊炎是發生在頭皮毛囊的炎症性疾病，常見為小型且會癢或疼痛的膿皰。
causes_zh: 確切病因不明，推測與毛囊內微生物引起的發炎反應相關，包括痤瘡桿菌、嚴重時可見金黃色葡萄球菌、馬拉色菌酵母及毛囊蠕形蟎。
symptoms_zh: 表現為頭皮上小型、會癢或觸痛的膿皰，有時伴隨結痂或輕微掉髮。

title: Scalp psoriasis
snippet: Scalp psoriasis is characterised by well-defined , red, thickened patches or plaques on the scalp with overlying silvery-white scales. Scales can flake off causing ‘dandruff’. It can be localised to parts of the scalp and often affects the back of the head, or can involve the entire scalp. It can be
causes: In psoriasis , skin cells tend to form quickly ( hyperproliferation ), within days rather than weeks, due to faulty immune system signals. As a result, excess cells pile up on the skin surface, causing patches and plaques. Psoriasis, including scalp psoriasis, is thought to be caused and affected by a combination of genetic , immune, hormonal, and environmental factors, such as: Bacterial infections, such as streptococcal sore throats Human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection and acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (AIDS) Hormonal changes (psoriasis often intensifies around puberty , the postpartum period, and menopause; and often improves during pregnancy ) Sunlight/ ultraviolet radiation — usually helps but occasionally exacerbates psoriasis Use of harsh chemical products or soaps Stress Obesity Trauma or injury to the skin ( Koebner phenomenon ) Cigarette smoking Alcohol consumption Medication — this may induce or exacerbate psoriasis.
symptoms: Scalp psoriasis is characterised by well-defined , red, thickened patches or plaques on the scalp with overlying silvery-white scales. Scales can flake off causing ‘dandruff’. It can be localised to parts of the scalp and often affects the back of the head, or can involve the entire scalp. It can be very itchy Scaling may build up and produce an appearance similar to overlapping Mediterranean roof tiles ( Pityriasis amiantacea ) In severe cases, scalp psoriasis can be associated with temporary localised hair loss ( alopecia ). Click here for images
epidemiology: Psoriasis is estimated to affect 2% of the population worldwide and can occur at any age. Among those affected by psoriasis, approximately 80% experience scalp involvement.
prognosis: Dry itchy scalp. Sleep disturbance secondary to itching. Skin infections due to scratching and impaired skin barrier. Anxiety and reduced self-esteem due to scalp appearance and dandruff-like flaking. Reversible hair loss ( alopecia ). Rarely, scarring alopecia can develop due to chronic, relapsing scalp psoriasis. Scalp psoriasis may be associated with psoriatic arthritis (PsA).

causes_zh: 在牛皮癬中，由於免疫系統信號錯誤，皮膚細胞往往在幾天而不是幾週內迅速形成（過度增殖）。結果，多餘的細胞堆積在皮膚表面，形成斑塊和斑塊。牛皮癬，包括頭皮牛皮癬，被認為是由遺傳、免疫、激素和環境因素共同引起和影響的，例如： 細菌感染，例如鍊球菌喉嚨痛 人類免疫缺陷病毒 (HIV) 感染和獲得性免疫缺陷綜合徵 (AIDS) 激素變化（牛皮癬通常在青春期、產後期和更年期左右加劇；並且通常在懷孕期間改善）陽光/紫外線輻射 — 通常有幫助，但偶爾會加劇牛皮癬 使用刺激性化學產品或肥皂 壓力 肥胖 皮膚創傷或損傷（科布納現象） 吸煙 飲酒 藥物 — 這可能會誘發或加劇牛皮癬。
symptoms_zh: 頭皮牛皮癬的特點是頭皮上有界限清楚的紅色增厚斑塊或斑塊，上面覆蓋著銀白色鱗屑。鱗片可能會脫落，導致“頭皮屑”。它可以局限於頭皮的某些部分，並且經常影響後腦勺，或者可以累及整個頭皮。可能會非常瘙癢。鱗屑可能會堆積，並產生類似於重疊的地中海屋頂瓦片的外觀（牛皮癬）。在嚴重的情況下，頭皮牛皮癬可能會導致暫時性局部脫髮（脫髮）。單擊此處查看圖像
epidemiology_zh: 據估計，牛皮癬影響著全世界 2% 的人口，並且可以發生在任何年齡。在銀屑病患者中，大約 80% 的人會出現頭皮受累的情況。
prognosis_zh: 頭皮乾燥發癢。繼發瘙癢的睡眠障礙。由於抓傷和皮膚屏障受損而引起的皮膚感染。由於頭皮外觀和頭皮屑樣剝落而感到焦慮和自尊心下降。可逆性脫髮（脫髮）。罕見情況下，慢性、復發性頭皮牛皮癬會導致疤痕性脫髮。頭皮銀屑病可能與銀屑病關節炎（PsA）有關。
