causes_zh: 體癬主要由毛癬菌屬和小孢子菌屬的皮膚真菌引起。嗜人性物种红色毛癬菌是全世界（包括新西蘭）體癬最常見的病原體。其他可能引起體癬的物種包括： 指間毛癬菌（T. interdigitale） 斷發毛癬菌（T.tonsurans）——繼發於頭癬或皮膚接觸性癬菌 犬毛癬菌（貓、狗），以及不太常見的其他人畜共患病物種，包括疣毛癬菌（牛）、馬毛癬菌（馬）和刺猬毛癬菌（刺猬）。體癬通過受感染皮膚脫落的真菌孢子傳播。溫暖、潮濕的環境以及共用床上用品、毛巾和衣服等污染物會促進傳播。皮膚其他部位的皮膚癬菌感染，例如足癬，也可以轉移。潛伏期為1-3週。皮膚癬菌侵入並在角質層中擴散，但無法滲透到健康皮膚的更深層。
symptoms_zh: 體癬最初表現為孤立的圓形紅色斑塊，前緣有凸起的鱗片狀。病變從中心向外擴散，形成環形，中央色素沉著不足，周圍有鱗狀紅色邊緣（癬）。邊界可為丘疹狀或膿皰狀。瘙癢很常見。隨著時間的推移，可能會出現多個病變，這些病變可能合併形成多循環模式。病變的分佈通常是不對稱的。體癬尖銳的紅色鱗狀邊緣 體癬丘疹和膿皰 體癬不對稱 另請參閱體癬圖像
epidemiology_zh: 體癬存在於世界大部分地區，特別是在炎熱潮濕的氣候中。它最常見於兒童和年輕人，但所有年齡段的人都可能被感染，包括新生兒。醫療危險因素包括： 既往或併發的癬感染 糖尿病 免疫缺陷 多汗症 乾燥症 魚鱗病。環境風險因素包括： 家庭擁擠 家庭成員感染 飼養寵物 穿著封閉性衣服 涉及與他人密切接觸的娛樂活動，包括共用更衣室。已假定存在遺傳傾向，特別是對於覆瓦癬。
prognosis_zh: 體癬具有傳染性，可傳播到皮膚的其他部位並傳播給其他人。免疫抑制患者，例如艾滋病毒/艾滋病患者，可能會出現播散性感染。慢性皮膚癬菌病是至少四個身體部位的紅色毛癬菌感染，病程長期波動，儘管經過治療仍會復發。皮膚癬菌反應是由炎性真菌感染引起的遠處部位過敏性皮疹。金黃色葡萄球菌繼發細菌感染在患有特應性皮炎和體癬的兒童中很常見。

title: Tinea cruris
snippet: Tinea cruris usually begins in the inguinal (groin) skin fold on one side which can evolve to become a bilateral but characteristically asymmetrical rash. The rash can extend down the inner aspect of the thigh or to the lower abdomen and pubic area. Involvement of the buttocks and perineum may be se
causes: Tinea cruris is caused by a dermatophyte fungus, most commonly Trichophyton rubrum and Epidermophyton floccosum . Spread of the infection to the groin is commonly from the feet ( tinea pedis ) or nails ( tinea unguium ) by scratching or use of contaminated towels or bed sheets.
symptoms: Tinea cruris usually begins in the inguinal (groin) skin fold on one side which can evolve to become a bilateral but characteristically asymmetrical rash. The rash can extend down the inner aspect of the thigh or to the lower abdomen and pubic area. Involvement of the buttocks and perineum may be seen but there is typically sparing of the penis, scrotum, and vulva. Acute tinea cruris may present as a moist and exudative rash. Chronic tinea cruris presents as a large well- demarcated scaly plaque with a raised border and central clearing. Scale is most prominent at the leading edge of the plaque. Dermatophytic folliculitis may present as papules and pustules along the border. Tinea cruris is usually itchy. Wood lamp examination does not demonstrate fluorescence. Scaly rash in inguinal skin fold Bilateral but asymmetrical rash Raised border, central clearing
epidemiology: Tinea cruris affects both sexes, with a male predominance (3:1). All ages can develop tinea cruris, adolescents and adults more commonly than children and the elderly. Tinea cruris can affect all races, being particularly common in hot humid tropical climates. Predisposing factors for tinea cruris include: Longstanding tinea pedis Previous episodes of tinea cruris Occlusive clothing Obesity Excessive sweating ( hyperhidrosis ) Diabetes mellitus Topical steroid use.
prognosis: Maceration and secondary infection with bacteria or candida Secondary excoriation , lichenification , and pigmentation Tinea incognito due to use of topical steroids
snippet_zh: 股癬通常始於一側腹股溝（腹股溝）皮膚皺襞，可發展為雙側但特徵不對稱的皮疹。皮疹可以向下延伸到大腿內側或下腹部和恥骨區。臀部和會陰可能受累
causes_zh: 股癬是由皮膚癬菌引起的，最常見的是紅色毛癬菌和絮狀表皮癬菌。感染通常通過抓撓或使用受污染的毛巾或床單從腳（足癬）或指甲（甲癬）傳播到腹股溝。
symptoms_zh: 股癬通常始於一側腹股溝（腹股溝）皮膚皺襞，可發展為雙側但特徵不對稱的皮疹。皮疹可以向下延伸到大腿內側或下腹部和恥骨區。臀部和會陰可能受累，但陰莖、陰囊和外陰通常不受影響。急性股癬可能表現為濕潤、滲出性皮疹。慢性股癬表現為邊界清楚的大鱗片狀斑塊，具有凸起的邊緣和中央間隙。鱗片在斑塊的前緣最為突出。皮膚癬菌性毛囊炎可能表現為邊緣出現丘疹和膿皰。股癬通常很癢。木燈檢查未顯示熒光。腹股溝皮膚皺襞出現鱗狀皮疹 雙側但不對稱皮疹 邊緣凸起，中央清晰
epidemiology_zh: 股癬影響兩性，其中男性佔多數（3:1）。所有年齡段均可患股癬，青少年和成人比兒童和老年人更常見。股癬可影響所有種族，在炎熱潮濕的熱帶氣候中尤其常見。股癬的誘發因素包括： 長期存在足癬 以前曾發生過股癬 衣服封閉 肥胖 出汗過多（多汗症） 糖尿病 局部類固醇的使用。
prognosis_zh: 浸漬和細菌或念珠菌繼發感染繼發性表皮剝脫、苔蘚樣變和色素沉著由於使用局部類固醇而導致的隱匿性癬。

title: Tinea pedis
snippet: Tinea pedis tends to be asymmetrical , and may be unilateral. It usually presents in one of three ways: Itchy erosions and/or scales between the toes, especially between 4 th and 5 th toes Scale covering the sole and sides of the feet ( hyperkeratotic /moccasin type, usually caused by T. rubrum) Sma
causes: The three most common dermatophyte fungi causing tinea pedis are: Trichophyton (T.) rubrum T. interdigitale , previously called T. mentagrophytes var. interdigitale Epidermophyton floccosum Moccasin tinea pedis Tinea pedis Tinea pedis Tinea pedis Tinea pedis Tinea pedis See more images of tinea pedis ...
symptoms: Tinea pedis tends to be asymmetrical , and may be unilateral. It usually presents in one of three ways: Itchy erosions and/or scales between the toes, especially between 4 th and 5 th toes Scale covering the sole and sides of the feet ( hyperkeratotic /moccasin type, usually caused by T. rubrum) Small to medium-sized blisters, usually affecting the inner aspect of the foot ( vesiculobullous type). It can also uncommonly cause oozing and ulceration between the toes (ulcerative type), or pustules (these are more common in tinea pedis due to T. interdigitale than that due to T. rubrum ).
epidemiology: Tinea pedis usually occurs in males and adolescents/young adults, but can also affect females, children and older people. Infection is usually acquired by direct contact with the causative organism , for example using a shared towel, or by walking barefoot in a public change room. Other risk factors include: Occlusive footwear (for example, heavy industrial boots) Excessive sweating ( hyperhidrosis ) Underlying immunodeficiency or diabetes mellitus Systemic corticosteroids or immune suppressive medications Poor peripheral circulation or lymphoedema .
snippet_zh: 足癬往往是不對稱的，並且可能是單側的。它通常以三種方式之一出現： 腳趾間發癢糜爛和/或鱗屑，尤其是第四和第五個腳趾之間 鱗屑覆蓋腳底和腳側（角化過度/莫卡辛型，通常由紅色毛癬菌引起） Sma
causes_zh: 引起足癬的三種最常見的皮膚癬菌是： 紅色毛癬菌 (T.)、指間毛癬菌 (T. interdigitale)，以前稱為須癬毛癬菌 (T. mentagrophytes var.)。趾間鱗狀表皮癬菌 莫卡辛足癬 足癬 足癬 足癬 足癬 足癬 足癬 查看更多足癬圖片 ...
symptoms_zh: 足癬往往是不對稱的，並且可能是單側的。它通常以三種方式之一呈現： 腳趾間發癢糜爛和/或鱗屑，尤其是第四和第五個腳趾之間 鱗屑覆蓋腳底和腳側（角化過度/莫卡辛型，通常由紅色毛癬菌引起） 小到中型水皰，通常影響腳的內部（水泡型）。罕見情況下，它還會導致腳趾間滲出和潰瘍（潰瘍型）或膿皰（這些在趾間毛癬菌引起的足癬中比紅色毛癬菌引起的足癬更常見）。
epidemiology_zh: 足癬通常發生於男性和青少年，但也可能影響女性、兒童和老年人。感染通常是通過直接接觸致病微生物而獲得的，例如使用共用毛巾，或在公共更衣室赤腳行走。其他危險因素包括： 封閉性鞋類（例如重型工業靴） 出汗過多（多汗症） 潛在免疫缺陷或糖尿病 全身性皮質類固醇或免疫抑製藥物 外周循環不良或淋巴水腫。

title: Topical antifungal medication
snippet: Topical antifungal medications are creams, gels, and solutions used to treat fungal infections of the skin such as tinea, candidiasis, and pityriasis versicolor.
causes: Topical antifungals work by inhibiting fungal cell membrane synthesis or disrupting fungal metabolic pathways. They are used when dermatophytes, yeasts, or moulds infect the skin.
symptoms: Improvement includes reduced scaling, redness, itching, and clearing of fungal lesions. Possible side effects include mild irritation, burning, stinging, or allergic contact dermatitis.
snippet_zh: 外用抗真菌藥物是乳膏、凝膠或藥液，用於治療如癬、念珠菌感染與花斑癬等皮膚真菌感染。
causes_zh: 局部抗真菌藥物透過抑制真菌細胞膜合成或干擾其代謝途徑來發揮作用，適用於皮膚被皮癬菌、酵母菌或黴菌感染時。
symptoms_zh: 改善表現包括脫屑、紅腫、搔癢減輕及真菌病灶逐漸清除。可能副作用包括輕度刺激、灼熱、刺痛或接觸性皮膚炎。

title: Topical steroid
snippet: Topical steroids are anti-inflammatory corticosteroid creams and ointments used to reduce redness, swelling, and itch in various skin conditions.
causes: Topical corticosteroids act by suppressing inflammatory pathways, reducing immune activity in the skin, and limiting vasodilation. They are used to manage eczema, dermatitis, psoriasis flares, insect bite reactions, and other inflammatory dermatoses.
symptoms: Expected effects include decreased redness, itch, and inflammation. Possible adverse effects with prolonged or inappropriate use include skin thinning, striae, telangiectasia, perioral dermatitis, steroid acne, and rebound flare upon withdrawal.
snippet_zh: 外用類固醇是具有抗發炎作用的皮質類固醇乳膏或藥膏，用於降低皮膚的紅腫、搔癢與發炎反應。
causes_zh: 外用皮質類固醇透過抑制發炎路徑、降低皮膚局部免疫反應並減少血管擴張來發揮作用。常用於治療濕疹、皮膚炎、乾癬發作、昆蟲叮咬反應及其他發炎性皮膚病。
symptoms_zh: 常見效果包括紅腫減輕、搔癢改善與發炎下降。不當或長期使用可能導致皮膚變薄、妊娠紋、微血管擴張、口周皮膚炎、類固醇痤瘡及停藥反彈惡化。

title: Transient acantholytic dermatosis
snippet: Grover disease often starts quite suddenly. Some (but not all) studies report it is more common in winter than in summer. The most common sites affected are central back, mid chest, and upper arms. Lesions are small red, crusted , or eroded papules and vesicles The rash is typically intensely itchy.
causes: The cause of transient acantholytic dermatosis is unknown. Due to the frequent association with skin occlusion , heat, and sweating, one theory suggests Grover disease is due to sweat duct damage and occlusion. Drug-induced transient acantholytic dermatosis may be due to the drug or its metabolites being excreted in the sweat with toxic effects on the adjacent epidermis causing acantholysis and dyskeratosis. BRAF-induced Grover disease may result from keratinocyte proliferation via activation of the MAP-kinase pathway. SARS-CoV-2 was demonstrated on immunohistochemistry in the sweat gland epithelium and dermal vessels in a patient with COVID-19.
symptoms: Grover disease often starts quite suddenly. Some (but not all) studies report it is more common in winter than in summer. The most common sites affected are central back, mid chest, and upper arms. Lesions are small red, crusted , or eroded papules and vesicles The rash is typically intensely itchy.
epidemiology: Transient acantholytic dermatosis most often affects Caucasian men over 50 years of age with sundamaged skin ( mean age at diagnosis 61 years). It is less common in skin of colour, women, and younger adults. Risk factors include sun-exposure, sweating, fever , malignancy , and being hospitalised or bedridden. A Grover-like rash has been reported during the febrile phase of COVID-19 . Transient acantholytic dermatosis is increasingly reported with the use of BRAF - inhibitors such as vemurafenib and dabrafenib monotherapy, and cytotoxic chemotherapy drugs .
prognosis: Transient acantholytic dermatosis may be complicated by the development of dermatitis , usually in a discoid pattern with round or oval, dry or crusted plaques. The plaques start on the chest and back and may spread to affect the limbs.
title_zh: 暫時性棘層松解性皮膚病
snippet_zh: 格羅弗病通常發病得很突然。一些（但不是全部）研究報告稱，這種情況在冬季比夏季更常見。最常見受影響的部位是背部中央、胸部中部和上臂。皮損為紅色、結痂或糜爛的小丘疹和水皰。皮疹通常會劇烈瘙癢。
causes_zh: 暫時性棘層松解性皮膚病的病因尚不清楚。由於經常與皮膚閉塞、高溫和出汗相關，一種理論認為格羅弗病是由於汗管損傷和閉塞引起的。藥物引起的短暫性棘層松解性皮膚病可能是由於藥物或其代謝物隨汗液排出，對鄰近表皮產生毒性作用，引起棘層松解和角化不良。BRAF 誘導的 Grover 病可能是由於 MAP 激酶途徑激活導致角質形成細胞增殖所致。SARS-CoV-2 通過免疫組織化學在一名 COVID-19 患者的汗腺上皮和真皮血管中得到證實。
symptoms_zh: 格羅弗病通常發病得很突然。一些（但不是全部）研究報告稱，這種情況在冬季比夏季更常見。最常見受影響的部位是背部中央、胸部中部和上臂。皮損為紅色、結痂或糜爛的小丘疹和水皰。皮疹通常會劇烈瘙癢。
epidemiology_zh: 短暫性棘層松解性皮膚病最常影響 50 歲以上皮膚曬傷的白人男性（診斷時平均年齡 61 歲）。在有色人種、女性和年輕人中較少見。危險因素包括日曬、出汗、發燒、惡性腫瘤、住院或臥床不起。據報導，在 COVID-19 發熱期會出現格羅弗樣皮疹。隨著使用 BRAF 抑製劑（例如維莫非尼和達拉非尼單藥治療）以及細胞毒性化療藥物，出現暫時性棘層松解性皮膚病的報導越來越多。
prognosis_zh: 暫時性棘層松解性皮膚病可能會因皮炎的發展而變得複雜，皮炎通常呈盤狀，伴有圓形或橢圓形、乾燥或結痂的斑塊。斑塊從胸部和背部開始，可能會擴散到四肢。

title: Ultraviolet radiation and human health
snippet: Ultraviolet (UV) radiation affects the skin by contributing to sunburn, photoageing, immune suppression, and increasing the risk of skin cancers.
causes: UV radiation, including UVA, UVB, and UVC, interacts with skin cells by generating DNA damage, oxidative stress, and inflammatory responses. UVB primarily causes direct DNA damage and sunburn, while UVA penetrates deeper, contributing to ageing and immunosuppression. Environmental exposure, altitude, reflective surfaces, and tanning devices increase total UV exposure.
symptoms: Skin effects of UV exposure include sunburn, tanning, pigmentation changes, premature ageing (wrinkles, laxity), actinic keratoses, and an elevated risk of skin cancers such as melanoma, squamous cell carcinoma, and basal cell carcinoma.
title_zh: 紫外線輻射與人類健康
snippet_zh: 紫外線（UV）可能導致曬傷、光老化、免疫抑制並增加皮膚癌風險，是皮膚健康的重要環境因素。
causes_zh: 紫外線包含 UVA、UVB、UVC，可造成 DNA 損傷、氧化壓力與發炎反應。UVB 主要造成直接 DNA 破壞與曬傷；UVA 穿透較深，促進光老化與免疫抑制。環境暴露量、海拔、反射面及人工日曬設備皆會提高 UV 暴露量。
symptoms_zh: 紫外線造成的皮膚影響包括曬傷、曬黑、色素變化、光老化（皺紋、鬆弛）、日光性角化症，以及黑色素瘤、鱗狀細胞癌與基底細胞癌等皮膚癌風險增加。

title: Upadacitinib
snippet: Upadacitinib is an oral Janus kinase (JAK) inhibitor used to treat inflammatory skin and immune-mediated conditions such as atopic dermatitis.
causes: Upadacitinib works by selectively inhibiting the JAK1 signaling pathway, reducing inflammatory cytokine activity. This leads to decreased immune overactivation in conditions like eczema, psoriasis, and other chronic inflammatory diseases.
symptoms: Upadacitinib is prescribed to relieve symptoms such as severe itching, redness, skin thickening, and widespread eczematous plaques in atopic dermatitis. It may also improve systemic symptoms in related inflammatory disorders.
snippet_zh: 烏帕替尼為口服 JAK 抑制劑，用於治療異位性皮膚炎等免疫相關的發炎性疾病。
causes_zh: 烏帕替尼透過選擇性抑制 JAK1 訊號通路，降低多種發炎細胞激素的活性，從而減少免疫過度反應，適用於濕疹、乾癬等慢性發炎疾病。
symptoms_zh: 主要用於改善異位性皮膚炎的嚴重搔癢、紅腫、皮膚增厚及廣泛性濕疹斑塊，也能緩解相關免疫疾病的全身性發炎症狀。

title: Uraemic pruritus
snippet: Itch in uremic pruritus most commonly affects the back, however, it can also involve the arms, head, and abdomen. Generalized pruritus is also noted in a proportion of affected patients (20-50%). Other characteristic features include: Itch becoming worse at night, often resulting in disruption of sl
causes: Uraemic pruritus is thought to be due to a combination of factors including: Dry skin Reduced sweating Abnormal metabolism of calcium and phosphorus / raised parathyroid hormone Abnormal magnesium and aluminium concentrations Accumulation of toxins Sprouting of new nerves Systemic inflammation Co-existing systemic diseases, particularly diabetes and liver disease Suboptimal dialysis regime. Some patients develop acquired reactive perforating collagenosis .
symptoms: Itch in uremic pruritus most commonly affects the back, however, it can also involve the arms, head, and abdomen. Generalized pruritus is also noted in a proportion of affected patients (20-50%). Other characteristic features include: Itch becoming worse at night, often resulting in disruption of sleep Exacerbation of itch with heat and stress Relief of itch with physical activity, cooler temperatures, and hot or cold showers Fluctuation of symptoms during haemodialysis sessions. Uraemic pruritus can be associated with several non-specific cutaneous features resulting from repetitive scratching. These may include: Excoriations and dry skin ( xerosis ) Lichen simplex chronicus Prurigo nodules.
epidemiology: The prevalence rates of uremic pruritus are between 20–50% in those with chronic kidney disease, however, the reported rates appear lower in children at approximately 9%. Uraemic pruritus is not associated with sex , age, ethnicity, duration of dialysis, or cause of renal failure. Pruritus does not arise when uraemia is due to acute renal failure.
prognosis: Scratching may lead to impetigo (skin infection ), prurigo ( papules ) and chronic, lichenified dermatitis/eczema . Uraemic pruritus can be very unpleasant; about half of affected individuals become agitated or depressed. Uraemic pruritus in haemodialysis patients is associated with a 17% increase in mortality.
snippet_zh: 尿毒症瘙癢最常影響背部，但也可能累及手臂、頭部和腹部。部分受影響的患者（20-50%）也出現全身性瘙癢。其他特徵包括： 瘙癢在夜間變得更嚴重，通常會導致睡眠障礙
causes_zh: 尿毒症瘙癢被認為是由多種因素造成的，包括： 皮膚乾燥 出汗減少 鈣和磷代謝異常/甲狀旁腺激素升高 鎂和鋁濃度異常 毒素積累 新神經萌發 全身炎症 共存全身性疾病，特別是糖尿病和肝病 透析方案不理想。一些患者出現獲得性反應性穿孔性膠原病。
symptoms_zh: 尿毒症瘙癢最常影響背部，但也可能累及手臂、頭部和腹部。部分受影響的患者（20-50%）也出現全身性瘙癢。其他特徵包括： 瘙癢在夜間變得更嚴重，通常會導致睡眠中斷 瘙癢因熱和壓力而加劇 體力活動、較低的溫度以及熱水或冷水淋浴可緩解瘙癢 血液透析期間症狀波動。尿毒症瘙癢症可能與反复抓撓導致的幾種非特異性皮膚特徵有關。這些可能包括： 擦傷和皮膚乾燥（乾燥症） 慢性單純性苔蘚 癢疹結節。
epidemiology_zh: 慢性腎病患者尿毒症瘙癢症的患病率在 20-50% 之間，但據報導，兒童的患病率較低，約為 9%。尿毒症瘙癢與性別、年齡、種族、透析持續時間或腎衰竭原因無關。當尿毒症是由急性腎功能衰竭引起時，不會出現瘙癢。
prognosis_zh: 抓撓可能導致膿皰病（皮膚感染）、癢疹（丘疹）和慢性苔蘚化皮炎/濕疹。尿毒症性瘙癢可能會非常令人不快；大約一半受影響的人變得焦躁或抑鬱。血液透析患者的尿毒症瘙癢與死亡率增加 17% 相關。

title: Urea
snippet: Urea is a humectant and keratolytic agent used in topical skincare products to treat dry, rough, or thickened skin.
causes: Urea works by attracting and retaining moisture in the stratum corneum and by softening and loosening thickened or scaly skin through keratolysis. It enhances skin hydration and improves barrier function.
symptoms: Topical urea is used to manage symptoms such as dryness, scaling, cracking, hyperkeratosis, and rough skin found in conditions like eczema, psoriasis, ichthyosis, or calluses.
snippet_zh: 尿素是一種常用於外用保養與治療產品的保濕與角質軟化成分，用於乾燥、粗糙或角化增厚的皮膚。
causes_zh: 尿素透過吸水與鎖水提升角質層含水量，並具有角質溶解作用，可軟化與減少增厚、脫屑或粗糙的角質層，改善皮膚屏障功能。
symptoms_zh: 局部使用尿素可改善乾燥、脫屑、龜裂、角化增生與粗糙皮膚，常應用於濕疹、乾癬、魚鱗癬或胼胝等狀況。

title: Urticaria – an overview
snippet: Urticarial weals can be a few millimetres or several centimetres in diameter, coloured white or red, with or without a red flare. Each weal may last a few minutes or several hours and may change shape. Weals may be round, or form rings, a map-like pattern, or giant patches. Urticaria can affect any
causes: Weals are due to release of chemical mediators from tissue mast cells and circulating basophils. These chemical mediators include histamine , platelet -activating factor and cytokines. The mediators activate sensory nerves and cause dilation of blood vessels and leakage of fluid into surrounding tissues. Bradykinin release causes angioedema. Several hypotheses have been proposed to explain urticaria. The immune, arachidonic acid and coagulation systems are involved, and genetic mutations are under investigation.
symptoms: Urticarial weals can be a few millimetres or several centimetres in diameter, coloured white or red, with or without a red flare. Each weal may last a few minutes or several hours and may change shape. Weals may be round, or form rings, a map-like pattern, or giant patches. Urticaria can affect any site of the body and tends to be distributed widely. Angioedema is more often localised. It commonly affects the face (especially eyelids and perioral sites), hands, feet, and genitalia. It may involve tongue, uvula, soft palate , or larynx. Serum sickness due to blood transfusion and serum sickness-like reactions due to certain drugs cause acute urticaria leaving bruises, fever, swollen lymph glands , joint pain and swelling. In chronic inducible urticaria , weals appear about 5 minutes after the stimulus and last a few minutes or up to one hour. Characteristically, weals are: Linear in dermographism Tiny in cholinergic urticaria Confined to contact areas in contact urticaria Diffuse in cold urticaria —if large areas of skin are affected, they can lead to fainting (potentially dangerous if swimming in cold water). The weals are more persistent in chronic spontaneous urticaria, but each individual lesion will resolve within 24 hours. They may occur at certain times of the day.
epidemiology: One in five children or adults has an episode of acute urticaria during their lifetime. It affects all races and both sexes. Acute urticaria can occur in newborns and infants but is uncommon. Acute urticaria in children is usually caused by infection , even if afebrile. In older children food, medication, and inhaled allergens are also important causes. In adults urticaria is usually idiopathic and spontaneous. Acute urticaria with fever can be the first sign of COVID-19 infection. Chronic spontaneous urticaria affects 0.5–2% of the population; in some series, two-thirds are women. Chronic inducible urticaria is however more common. There are genetic and autoimmune associations.
snippet_zh: 蕁麻疹疤痕直徑可為幾毫米或幾厘米，顏色為白色或紅色，有或沒有紅色耀斑。每次傷口可能會持續幾分鐘或幾個小時，並且可能會改變形狀。傷痕可能是圓形的，也可能形成環狀、地圖狀圖案或巨大的斑塊。蕁麻疹可以影響任何
causes_zh: 傷痕是由於組織肥大細胞和循環嗜鹼性粒細胞釋放化學介質造成的。這些化學介質包括組胺、血小板激活因子和細胞因子。這些介質激活感覺神經並導致血管擴張和液體滲漏到周圍組織中。緩激肽釋放引起血管性水腫。已經提出了幾種假設來解釋蕁麻疹。涉及免疫、花生四烯酸和凝血系統，基因突變正在研究中。
symptoms_zh: 蕁麻疹疤痕直徑可為幾毫米或幾厘米，顏色為白色或紅色，有或沒有紅色耀斑。每次傷口可能會持續幾分鐘或幾個小時，並且可能會改變形狀。傷痕可能是圓形的，也可能形成環狀、地圖狀圖案或巨大的斑塊。蕁麻疹可以影響身體的任何部位，並且分佈廣泛。血管性水腫通常是局部的。它通常影響面部（尤其是眼瞼和口周部位）、手、腳和生殖器。它可能涉及舌頭、懸雍垂、軟齶或喉部。輸血引起的血清病和某些藥物引起的血清病樣反應會引起急性蕁麻疹，導致瘀傷、發燒、淋巴腺腫脹、關節疼痛和腫脹。在慢性誘導性蕁麻疹中，傷痕在刺激後約 5 分鐘出現，並持續幾分鐘或長達一小時。其特徵為： 皮膚划痕呈線性 膽鹼能性蕁麻疹 微小 接觸性蕁麻疹 僅限於接觸區域 寒冷性蕁麻疹 瀰漫性 — 如果大面積皮膚受到影響，可能會導致昏厥（如果在冷水中游泳則可能存在危險）。慢性自發性蕁麻疹的傷痕更為持久，但每個皮損都會在 24 小時內消退。它們可能發生在一天中的某些時間。
epidemiology_zh: 五分之一的兒童或成人在其一生中曾患過急性蕁麻疹。它影響所有種族和性別。急性蕁麻疹可能發生在新生兒和嬰兒中，但並不常見。兒童急性蕁麻疹通常是由感染引起的，即使沒有發燒。對於年齡較大的兒童，食物、藥物和吸入過敏原也是重要原因。成人蕁麻疹通常是特發性和自發性的。伴有發燒的急性蕁麻疹可能是 COVID-19 感染的第一個跡象。慢性自發性蕁麻疹影響 0.5-2% 的人口；在某些系列中，三分之二是女性。然而，慢性誘導性蕁麻疹更為常見。存在遺傳和自身免疫關聯。

title: Urticaria and urticaria-like conditions
snippet: Urticaria and urticaria-like conditions present as transient, itchy wheals or plaques caused by mast-cell–mediated inflammation or other similar skin reactions.
causes: Urticaria is triggered by mast cell degranulation, leading to histamine release. Causes include allergens, infections, medications, physical stimuli (pressure, cold, heat), autoimmune activation, and idiopathic mechanisms. Urticaria-like conditions mimic hives but may arise from vasculitis, autoinflammatory disorders, or other dermatoses.
symptoms: Typical findings include itchy wheals, raised red or skin-colored plaques, angioedema, or hive-like eruptions lasting minutes to hours. Urticaria-like disorders may show longer-lasting lesions, bruising, or systemic symptoms depending on the underlying cause.
title_zh: 蕁麻疹和蕁麻疹樣病症
snippet_zh: 蕁麻疹及其類似病症常呈現短暫、搔癢的膨疹或斑塊，由肥大細胞介導的發炎或其他類似反應引起。
causes_zh: 蕁麻疹因肥大細胞釋放組織胺而發生，誘因包括過敏、感染、藥物、物理刺激（如壓力、冷、熱）、自體免疫或不明原因。蕁麻疹樣病症則可能由血管炎、自體發炎疾病或其他皮膚病變產生類似膨疹反應。
symptoms_zh: 典型表現為搔癢、隆起的紅色或膚色膨疹，可伴隨血管性水腫，通常持續數分鐘至數小時。蕁麻疹樣疾病則可能伴隨持續較久的皮疹、瘀斑或依病因而出的全身症狀。

title: Urticaria in children
snippet: Urticarial weals may appear on any part of the body and are often very itchy. They can vary in size from the size of a pinpoint to several centimetres in diameter. They are either white or red and can be either localised or widespread. Weals change shape and size and each one lasts from a few minute
causes: Weals are caused by a number of chemical mediators , such as histamine and cytokines , which are released from inflammatory cells, including mast cells. The mediators cause vasodilation and leakage of fluid into surrounding tissues to produce the redness and swelling of urticarial weals. Triggers of acute spontaneous urticaria can include: Viral infection (in 40% of cases), such as upper respiratory tract infection, viral hepatitis , or glandular fever (i nfectious mononucleosis) Bacterial infection, such as sinusitis or a dental abscess Food allergy , usually on or after the first exposure to a particular food such as egg, milk, soy, peanut , and wheat Drug-induced urticaria , such as that caused by an antibiotic or nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) Bee or wasp sting . There is no obvious trigger in approximately 50% of cases of acute urticaria. This may be called ‘ idiopathic ’ urticaria. Chronic urticaria is usually caused by autoimmunity or a chronic underlying infection. It is rare in children. Inducible urticaria is caused by a direct stimulus, such as dermographism , delayed pressure , cold , heat , sunlight , vibration , or exercise . It is linked with atopy and chronic urticaria, but the pathogenesis is not fully understood.
symptoms: Urticarial weals may appear on any part of the body and are often very itchy. They can vary in size from the size of a pinpoint to several centimetres in diameter. They are either white or red and can be either localised or widespread. Weals change shape and size and each one lasts from a few minutes to several hours. Angioedema is usually localised to a single area such as the hands, feet, and genitalia. It most commonly affects the face in children. The child may have a swollen tongue, eyelids, or lips. Angioedema is often tender or painful. Inducible urticaria due to a physical stimulus often comes on within minutes after exposure and resolves in less than an hour. The weals will be localised to the exposed site. Angioedema is exceptionally rare in these cases.
prognosis: Urticaria is usually self-limiting and will go away on its own. However, it can often be very uncomfortable for a child due to the intense itchiness. There are usually no serious long-term consequences for children. Urticaria may be a component of anaphylaxis (severe allergic response). If the child is also struggling to breathe, wheezing, collapses, or seems unwell, seek urgent medical attention.
snippet_zh: 蕁麻疹傷痕可能出現在身體的任何部位，並且通常非常瘙癢。它們的尺寸可以從針尖到直徑幾厘米不等。它們是白色或紅色的，可以是局部的，也可以是廣泛的。傷痕的形狀和大小會發生變化，每條傷痕都會持續幾分鐘
causes_zh: 傷痕是由許多化學介質引起的，例如組胺和細胞因子，這些化學介質是從包括肥大細胞在內的炎症細胞中釋放的。這些介質引起血管舒張和液體滲漏到周圍組織中，從而產生蕁麻疹性傷痕的紅腫。急性自發性蕁麻疹的誘因包括： 病毒感染（40% 的病例），例如上呼吸道感染、病毒性肝炎或腺熱（傳染性單核細胞增多症） 細菌感染，例如鼻竇炎或牙膿腫 食物過敏，通常在第一次接觸特定食物（例如雞蛋、牛奶、大豆、花生和小麥）時或之後 藥物性蕁麻疹，例如由抗生素或非類固醇引起的蕁麻疹抗炎藥 (NSAID) 蜜蜂或黃蜂蜇傷。大約 50% 的急性蕁麻疹病例沒有明顯的觸發因素。這可能被稱為“特發性”蕁麻疹。慢性蕁麻疹通常是由自身免疫或慢性潛在感染引起的。這在兒童中很少見。誘發性蕁麻疹是由直接刺激引起的，例如皮膚划痕、延遲壓力、冷、熱、陽光、振動或運動。它與特應性和慢性蕁麻疹有關，但發病機制尚不完全清楚。
symptoms_zh: 蕁麻疹傷痕可能出現在身體的任何部位，並且通常非常瘙癢。它們的尺寸可以從針尖到直徑幾厘米不等。它們是白色或紅色的，可以是局部的，也可以是廣泛的。傷痕的形狀和大小會發生變化，每一個都會持續幾分鐘到幾個小時。血管性水腫通常局限於單一區域，例如手、腳和生殖器。它最常影響兒童的面部。孩子的舌頭、眼瞼或嘴唇可能腫脹。血管性水腫通常有壓痛或疼痛。由於物理刺激引起的誘發性蕁麻疹通常在接觸後幾分鐘內出現，並在不到一小時內消退。傷痕將局限於暴露部位。在這些病例中，血管性水腫極為罕見。
prognosis_zh: 蕁麻疹通常是自限性的，會自行消失。然而，由於劇烈的瘙癢，孩子通常會感到非常不舒服。通常不會對兒童造成嚴重的長期後果。蕁麻疹可能是過敏反應（嚴重過敏反應）的一個組成部分。如果孩子也呼吸困難、喘息、虛脫或看起來不適，請立即就醫。

title: Urticarial vasculitis
snippet: The first symptom of urticarial vasculitis is an urticarial eruption (these are characterised by weals) that is often painful or has a burning sensation. In some cases, the weals are itchy. The lesions are red patches or plaques that may have a white centre, and petechiae may appear. Unlike urticari
causes: The cause of urticarial vasculitis is unknown, but it has been associated with the following conditions: Inflammatory connective disorders such as SLE and Sjögren syndrome . Immunoglobulin disorders such as immunoglobulin A and immunoglobulin M monoclonal gammopathies Leukaemia and internal cancers Viral diseases such as hepatitis B, hepatitis C and infectious mononucleosis (glandular fever) Drug-induced conditions from ACE inhibitors , penicillin , sulfonamides , fluoxetine and thiazides. However, the majority of cases of urticarial vasculitis are idiopathic (ie there is no known cause).
symptoms: The first symptom of urticarial vasculitis is an urticarial eruption (these are characterised by weals) that is often painful or has a burning sensation. In some cases, the weals are itchy. The lesions are red patches or plaques that may have a white centre, and petechiae may appear. Unlike urticaria , urticarial vasculitis lesions usually last for more than 24 hours in a fixed location, after which they will slowly resolve spontaneously. Ecchymoses or hyperpigmentation may occur in the healing process. In addition to the skin lesions, patients with urticarial vasculitis may also develop systemic symptoms including photosensitivity , swollen lymph nodes , joint pain (50%), fever, abdominal pain (20%), difficulty breathing, and lung and kidney problems. See more images of urticarial vasculitis .
snippet_zh: 蕁麻疹性血管炎的第一個症狀是蕁麻疹皮疹（其特徵是傷痕），通常會感到疼痛或有燒灼感。在某些情況下，傷痕會發癢。病變為紅色斑塊或斑塊，中心可能為白色，並可能出現瘀點。與蕁麻疹不同
causes_zh: 蕁麻疹性血管炎的病因尚不清楚，但它與以下疾病有關： 炎症性結締組織疾病，如係統性紅斑狼瘡和乾燥綜合徵。免疫球蛋白疾病，例如免疫球蛋白 A 和免疫球蛋白 M 單克隆丙種球蛋白病 白血病和內癌 病毒性疾病，例如乙型肝炎、丙型肝炎和傳染性單核細胞增多症（腺熱） 由 ACE 抑製劑、青黴素、磺胺類藥物、氟西汀和噻嗪類藥物誘發的病症。然而，大多數蕁麻疹性血管炎病例是特發性的（即沒有已知的原因）。
symptoms_zh: 蕁麻疹性血管炎的第一個症狀是蕁麻疹皮疹（其特徵是傷痕），通常會感到疼痛或有燒灼感。在某些情況下，傷痕會發癢。病變為紅色斑塊或斑塊，中心可能為白色，並可能出現瘀點。與蕁麻疹不同，蕁麻疹性血管炎病變通常在固定部位持續24小時以上，之後會慢慢自行消退。癒合過程中可能會出現瘀斑或色素沉著過度。除了皮膚病變外，蕁麻疹性血管炎患者還可能出現全身症狀，包括光過敏、淋巴結腫大、關節痛（50%）、發燒、腹痛（20%）、呼吸困難以及肺和腎問題。查看更多蕁麻疹性血管炎的圖片。

title: Useful dermatology resources for health professionals
snippet: A curated set of dermatology tools, online references, and clinical resources designed to support diagnosis, treatment decisions, and ongoing education for healthcare professionals.
causes: These resources are compiled to help clinicians access reliable dermatology information, clinical guidelines, diagnostic aids, and evidence-based updates. They support accurate diagnosis, appropriate management, and improved patient care.
symptoms: Resources commonly include image libraries, diagnostic algorithms, treatment guidelines, case studies, continuing education materials, and links to professional dermatology societies.
title_zh: 對衛生專業人員有用的皮膚科資源
snippet_zh: 彙整醫療人員常用的皮膚科工具、線上資料庫與臨床資源，有助於診斷、治療判斷與持續教育。
causes_zh: 這些資源的目的在於提供可靠的皮膚科資訊、臨床指引、診斷輔助工具與最新文獻，協助醫療人員提升診斷準確度與治療品質。
symptoms_zh: 內容通常包含皮膚病影像庫、診斷流程、治療建議、臨床案例、持續教育教材及專業皮膚科組織的連結。

title: UVB phototherapy
snippet: UVB phototherapy uses ultraviolet B light to reduce skin inflammation and slow excessive skin cell growth, commonly used for psoriasis, eczema, and vitiligo.
causes: UVB improves skin conditions by suppressing local immune activity, reducing inflammatory cytokines, and slowing the rapid turnover of epidermal cells. It can also induce repigmentation in conditions like vitiligo through stimulation of melanocyte activity.
symptoms: Expected effects include gradual reduction of redness, scaling, itching, or plaques. Side effects may include temporary redness, dryness, tanning, or mild sunburn-like reactions depending on dose and skin sensitivity.
snippet_zh: UVB 光療利用窄波或寬波紫外線 B 來減少皮膚發炎並抑制過度增生，常用於治療乾癬、濕疹及白癜風。
causes_zh: UVB 透過抑制局部免疫反應、降低發炎介質、並減緩表皮細胞的快速更新來改善皮膚狀況。對白癜風患者則可刺激黑色素細胞活性並促進再色素化。
symptoms_zh: 治療效果包括紅腫、脫屑、搔癢或斑塊逐漸改善。可能的副作用包括暫時性紅斑、乾燥、皮膚變深或類似輕微日曬反應，依照劑量及皮膚敏感度而異。

title: Vascular proliferations and abnormalities of blood vessels
snippet: Vascular proliferations and vascular abnormalities include benign, reactive, and congenital changes of blood vessels that may appear as red, purple, or blue skin lesions.
causes: These conditions arise from overgrowth of endothelial cells, malformation of blood vessels, or reactive vascular changes triggered by trauma, inflammation, infection, or congenital genetic factors. They may involve capillaries, veins, arteries, or lymphatic vessels.
symptoms: Skin findings vary from flat or raised red patches, telangiectasia, and vascular nodules to hemangiomas, venous lakes, or purpuric lesions. Symptoms may include bleeding, swelling, pain, or cosmetic concerns depending on the type of vascular abnormality.
snippet_zh: 血管增生與血管異常包含先天性或後天性的血管增長、擴張或畸形，通常呈現紅色、紫色或藍色皮膚病灶。
causes_zh: 這些狀況可由內皮細胞過度增生、血管發育異常、或因外傷、發炎、感染等引起的反應性血管變化造成。可能涉及毛細血管、靜脈、動脈或淋巴管。
symptoms_zh: 表現可為平坦或隆起的紅斑、擴張血管、血管性結節、血管瘤、靜脈湖或紫斑病灶。部分患者可能出現出血、腫脹、疼痛或純外觀困擾。

title: Venous eczema
snippet: Venous eczema can form discrete patches or become confluent and circumferential. Features include: Itchy red, blistered and crusted plaques ; or dry fissured and scaly plaques on one or both lower legs Orange-brown macular pigmentation due to haemosiderin deposition Atrophie blanche (white irregular
causes: Venous eczema appears to be due to fluid collecting in the tissues and activation of the innate immune response. Normally during walking the leg muscles pump blood upwards and valves in the veins prevent pooling. A clot in the deep leg veins (deep venous thrombosis or DVT) or varicose veins may damage the valves. As a result back pressure develops and fluid collects in the tissues. An inflammatory reaction occurs.
symptoms: Venous eczema can form discrete patches or become confluent and circumferential. Features include: Itchy red, blistered and crusted plaques ; or dry fissured and scaly plaques on one or both lower legs Orange-brown macular pigmentation due to haemosiderin deposition Atrophie blanche (white irregular scars surrounded by red spots) 'Champagne bottle' shape of the lower leg — narrowing at the ankles and induration ( lipodermatosclerosis ) Venous eczema Lipodermatosclerosis Venous ulcer
epidemiology: Venous eczema is most often seen in middle-aged and older patients — it is reported to affect 20% of those over 70 years. It is associated with: History of deep venous thrombosis in an affected limb History of cellulitis in an affected limb Chronic swelling of the lower leg, aggravated by hot weather and prolonged standing Varicose veins Stasis ulcers .
prognosis: Impetiginisation — secondary infection with Staphylococcus aureus resulting in yellowish crusts Cellulitis — infection with Streptococcus pyogenes : there may be redness, swelling, pain, fever , a red streak up the leg, and swollen nodes in the groin Secondary eczema — eczema spreads to other areas on the body Contact allergy to one or more components of the ointments or creams used
snippet_zh: 靜脈性濕疹可以形成離散的斑塊或變得匯合併呈圓周狀。特徵包括： 發癢的紅色、起泡和結痂的斑塊；或一側或雙側小腿出現乾裂和鱗狀斑塊 由於含鐵血黃素沉積而導致橙棕色黃斑色素沉著 白色萎縮（白色不規則）
causes_zh: 靜脈性濕疹似乎是由於組織中積液和先天免疫反應激活所致。通常在行走過程中，腿部肌肉將血液向上泵送，靜脈瓣膜可防止血液淤積。腿部深靜脈中的凝塊（深靜脈血栓形成或 DVT）或靜脈曲張可能會損壞瓣膜。結果，產生背壓並且液體聚集在組織中。發生炎症反應。
symptoms_zh: 靜脈性濕疹可以形成離散的斑塊或變得匯合併呈圓周狀。特徵包括： 發癢的紅色、起泡和結痂的斑塊；一條或兩條小腿上出現乾裂和鱗狀斑塊 由於含鐵血黃素沉積而導致橙棕色黃斑色素沉著 白色萎縮（紅色斑點周圍的白色不規則疤痕） 小腿“香檳瓶”形狀 - 腳踝變窄和硬結（脂肪性皮膚硬化症） 靜脈性濕疹 脂肪性皮膚硬化症 靜脈性潰瘍
epidemiology_zh: 靜脈性濕疹最常見於中老年患者——據報導，70 歲以上患者中有 20% 患有靜脈性濕疹。它與以下因素相關： 受影響肢體的深靜脈血栓形成史 受影響肢體的蜂窩組織炎史 小腿慢性腫脹，因炎熱天氣和長時間站立而加劇 靜脈曲張 淤滯性潰瘍。
prognosis_zh: 膿皰化 — 金黃色葡萄球菌繼發感染，導致淡黃色痂皮 蜂窩織炎 — 化膿性鏈球菌感染：可能出現發紅、腫脹、疼痛、發燒、腿部出現紅色條紋以及腹股溝淋巴結腫大 繼發性濕疹 — 濕疹擴散至身體其他部位 對所用軟膏或面霜的一種或多種成分產生接觸性過敏

title: Venous insufficiency
snippet: Superficial venous insufficiency can be asymptomatic but may cause aching, cramping, throbbing, burning, or heaviness in the leg. Pain is typical of deep venous insufficiency. Symptoms improve with leg elevation. Clinical signs of chronic venous insufficiency include: Pitting oedema around the ankle
causes: The venous system in the lower legs consists of a low-pressure superficial network connected by perforating veins to a high-pressure deep network. Venous blood flows from the superficial to deep veins by the action of the calf muscle pump. Retrograde flow is prevented by competent valves. Chronic venous insufficiency can be caused by: Venous factors Incompetent valve in the superficial, perforating, and deep systems External compression of veins Deep venous obstruction Previous deep vein thrombosis Impaired calf muscle pump Immobility including lack of physical exercise and paralysis Joint disease particularly of the ankle Obesity Prolonged standing or sitting Previous leg injury. Once venous hypertension is established, the cutaneous features of chronic venous insufficiency are caused by: Leukocytes trapped in capillaries release proteolytic enzymes and oxygen free radicals which damage the capillary basement membrane Plasma proteins , such as fibrinogen , leak into the surrounding tissues, forming a fibrin cuff which reduces oxygen delivery to the tissues Inflammation and tissue loss.
symptoms: Superficial venous insufficiency can be asymptomatic but may cause aching, cramping, throbbing, burning, or heaviness in the leg. Pain is typical of deep venous insufficiency. Symptoms improve with leg elevation. Clinical signs of chronic venous insufficiency include: Pitting oedema around the ankle, worse at the end of the day Corona phlebectatica paraplantaris (malleolar flare) on the inner aspect of the ankle and instep – fan-shaped distribution of blue and red telangiectases ( intradermal and superficial venules ), capillary stasis spots (red-purple coin-shaped areas formed by papillary capillaries), and venous cups (dilated converging veins on the instep) Telangiectasia adjacent to perforating veins Pigmentation can be pinpoint or a patchy rusty-red due to extravasation of red blood cells and haemosiderin accumulation in the dermis Varicosities.
epidemiology: Venous insufficiency is common, affecting all races and both sexes. Estimates suggest rates as high as 50% in some populations. A US study found ethnic whites had a higher rate of venous insufficiency compared to Hispanics, African Americans, and Asians. The Edinburgh Vein Study reported the incidence of chronic venous insufficiency was similar in men and women. Prevalence increases with age, obesity, a family history of varicose veins , and multiple pregnancies.
prognosis: Venous eczema Stasis ulcer Lipodermatosclerosis Atrophie blanche
snippet_zh: 淺靜脈功能不全可能沒有症狀，但可能會導致腿部疼痛、痙攣、抽痛、灼燒感或沉重感。疼痛是深靜脈功能不全的典型症狀。症狀隨著腿部抬高而改善。慢性靜脈功能不全的臨床症狀包括： 踝關節周圍凹陷性水腫
causes_zh: 小腿的靜脈系統由低壓淺表網絡組成，通過穿靜脈與高壓深層網絡相連。靜脈血在小腿肌肉泵的作用下從淺靜脈流向深靜脈。有能力的閥門可以防止逆流。慢性靜脈功能不全可能由以下原因引起： 靜脈因素 淺表、穿通和深部系統的瓣膜功能不全 靜脈外部受壓 深靜脈梗阻 既往深靜脈血栓形成 小腿肌肉泵功能受損 不動，包括缺乏體育鍛煉和癱瘓 關節疾病，尤其是踝關節疾病 肥胖 長時間站立或久坐 既往腿部受傷史。一旦形成靜脈高壓，慢性靜脈功能不全的皮膚特徵是由以下原因引起的： 困在毛細血管中的白細胞釋放蛋白水解酶和氧自由基，從而損害毛細血管基底膜。 血漿蛋白，例如纖維蛋白原，滲漏到周圍組織中，形成纖維蛋白袖帶，減少向組織的氧氣輸送。 炎症和組織損失。
symptoms_zh: 淺靜脈功能不全可能沒有症狀，但可能會導致腿部疼痛、痙攣、抽痛、灼燒感或沉重感。疼痛是深靜脈功能不全的典型症狀。症狀隨著腿部抬高而改善。慢性靜脈功能不全的臨床症狀包括： 踝關節周圍凹陷性水腫，一天結束時情況更嚴重 踝關節和腳背內側出現足蹠冠狀靜脈擴張（踝部耀斑）——藍色和紅色毛細血管擴張（皮內和淺靜脈）呈扇形分佈、毛細血管瘀斑（由乳頭毛細血管形成的紅紫色硬幣形區域）和靜脈曲張杯狀（腳背上擴張的會聚靜脈） 鄰近穿靜脈的毛細血管擴張 由於紅細胞外滲和真皮中含鐵血黃素積聚，色素沉著可以是針尖狀或斑狀銹紅色 靜脈曲張。
epidemiology_zh: 靜脈功能不全很常見，影響所有種族和性別。據估計，某些人群的發病率高達 50%。美國的一項研究發現，與西班牙裔、非裔美國人和亞洲人相比，白人的靜脈功能不全發生率更高。愛丁堡靜脈研究報告稱，男性和女性慢性靜脈功能不全的發病率相似。患病率隨著年齡、肥胖、靜脈曲張家族史和多胎妊娠而增加。
prognosis_zh: 靜脈性濕疹 淤滯性潰瘍 脂肪性皮膚硬化症 白色萎縮症

title: Venous lake
snippet: A venous lake is a soft, squashable, blue or purple macule or papule, that is 0.2–1 cm in diameter. Although they may arise anywhere, most venous lakes are diagnosed on the lower lip (on the vermilion margin or mucosal surface), on an earlobe, or elsewhere on the face, neck, or upper trunk.
causes: The cause of venous lake is unknown.
symptoms: A venous lake is a soft, squashable, blue or purple macule or papule, that is 0.2–1 cm in diameter. Although they may arise anywhere, most venous lakes are diagnosed on the lower lip (on the vermilion margin or mucosal surface), on an earlobe, or elsewhere on the face, neck, or upper trunk.
epidemiology: A venous lake is most often diagnosed in middle-aged or older men and women of any race.
snippet_zh: 靜脈湖是一種柔軟、可壓扁的藍色或紫色斑點或丘疹，直徑為 0.2-1 厘米。雖然靜脈湖可能出現在任何地方，但大多數靜脈湖被診斷出在下唇（朱紅邊緣或粘膜表面）、耳垂或面部、頸部或上軀幹的其他地方。
causes_zh: 靜脈湖的成因尚不清楚。
symptoms_zh: 靜脈湖是一種柔軟、可壓扁的藍色或紫色斑點或丘疹，直徑為 0.2-1 厘米。雖然靜脈湖可能出現在任何地方，但大多數靜脈湖被診斷出在下唇（朱紅邊緣或粘膜表面）、耳垂或面部、頸部或上軀幹的其他地方。
epidemiology_zh: 靜脈湖最常見於任何種族的中年或老年男性和女性。

title: Viral infections and the skin
snippet: Viral infections of the skin are caused by a variety of viruses and can produce rashes, blisters, warts, or other characteristic lesions depending on the pathogen involved.
causes: Skin viral infections arise from viruses such as herpes simplex, varicella-zoster, human papillomavirus, poxviruses, enteroviruses, and others. These viruses may infect the epidermis, mucosa, or hair follicles, resulting in inflammation and lesion formation. Transmission may occur through contact, droplets, or autoinoculation.
symptoms: Common skin manifestations of viral infections include vesicles, blisters, ulcers, warts, erythematous rashes, and molluscum-like papules. Symptoms may include itching, pain, burning, or systemic illness depending on the virus.
snippet_zh: 病毒性皮膚感染由多種病毒引起，可依病毒種類呈現疹子、水疱、疣或其他特徵性皮膚病變。
causes_zh: 皮膚病毒感染通常由單純皰疹、帶狀皰疹、人類乳突病毒、痘病毒、腸病毒等造成。這些病毒可感染表皮、黏膜或毛囊，引發發炎與病灶形成，傳播方式包括接觸、飛沫或自體接種。
symptoms_zh: 常見的病毒性皮膚表現包括水疱、皰疹、潰瘍、疣狀突起、紅疹或傳染性軟疣樣丘疹。可能伴隨癢、痛、灼熱感，部分病毒亦可導致全身症狀。

title: Viral wart
snippet: Cutaneous viral warts have a hard, keratinous surface. Tiny red or black dots visible in the wart are papillary capillaries.
causes: Warts are due to infection by the human papillomavirus (HPV), a double-stranded DNA virus. There are more than 150 known HPV types, only some of which infect the skin, giving rise to a variety of clinical presentations. Infection begins in the basal layer of the epidermis , causing proliferation of the keratinocytes (skin cells) and hyperkeratosis , and production of infectious virus particles — the wart. The most common HPV types infecting the skin are types 1, 2, 3, 4, 10, 27, 29, and 57. HPV is spread by direct skin-to-skin contact or autoinoculation ; if a wart is scratched or picked, a wart may develop under the fingernail ( subungual wart) or virus may be spread to another area of skin. Autoinoculation of the virus in a scratch can result in a line of warts (pseudo-koebnerisation) The incubation period can be as long as twelve months, depending on the amount of virus inoculated. [see Non-sexually acquired human papillomavirus infection ]
symptoms: Cutaneous viral warts have a hard, keratinous surface. Tiny red or black dots visible in the wart are papillary capillaries.
epidemiology: Warts are particularly common in: School-aged children, however they may occur at any age Dermatitis , due to a defective skin barrier People with drug-induced immunosuppression such as with long-term azathioprine or ciclosporin use, or have human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection.
prognosis: Viral warts are infectious to the patient and others. Cutaneous warts can have significant psychosocial effects such as teasing at school, embarrassment, permission refused for swimming lessons. Periungual warts can cause nail dystrophy and destruction. Pain due to plantar warts (myrmecia type) interferes with walking and sporting activities, causing knee or hip pain. In epidermodysplasia verruciformis the specific HPV types involved can cause cutaneous squamous cell carcinomas.
snippet_zh: 皮膚病毒疣具有堅硬的角質表面。疣中可見的微小紅色或黑色點是乳頭狀毛細血管。
causes_zh: 疣是由人乳頭瘤病毒 (HPV)（一種雙鏈 DNA 病毒）感染引起的。已知的 HPV 類型有 150 多種，只有其中一些會感染皮膚，從而引起多種臨床表現。感染從表皮基底層開始，導致角質形成細胞（皮膚細胞）增殖和角化過度，並產生傳染性病毒顆粒——疣。感染皮膚的最常見 HPV 類型為 1、2、3、4、10、27、29 和 57 型。HPV 通過直接皮膚接觸或自身接種傳播；如果疣被抓傷或抓破，指甲下可能會長出疣（甲下疣），或者病毒可能會傳播到皮膚的其他區域。在划痕處自動接種病毒可導致出現疣線（假性克氏疣）。潛伏期可長達 12 個月，具體取決於接種的病毒量。[參見非性獲得性人乳頭瘤病毒感染]
symptoms_zh: 皮膚病毒疣具有堅硬的角質表面。疣中可見的微小紅色或黑色點是乳頭狀毛細血管。
epidemiology_zh: 疣在以下人群中特別常見： 學齡兒童，但任何年齡都可能發生 皮膚屏障缺陷導致的皮炎 患有藥物引起的免疫抑制的人，例如長期使用硫唑嘌呤或環孢素的人，或患有人類免疫缺陷病毒 (HIV) 感染的人。
prognosis_zh: 病毒疣對患者和其他人具有傳染性。皮膚疣會產生嚴重的社會心理影響，例如在學校被嘲笑、尷尬、游泳課被拒絕等。甲週疣可導致指甲營養不良和破壞。足底疣（myrmecia 型）引起的疼痛會干擾行走和體育活動，導致膝蓋或臀部疼痛。在疣狀表皮發育不良中，所涉及的特定 HPV 類型可導致皮膚鱗狀細胞癌。

title: Vitiligo
snippet: The onset of vitiligo is usually insidious. The most common presentation is the complete loss of pigment in single or multiple macules or patches of skin, with characteristic chalk- or milky-white colour.
causes: Vitiligo is due to the loss or destruction of melanocytes ( melanin -producing cells). Genetic factors appear to contribute to 80% of vitiligo risk, whilst environmental factors account for 20%. Many genetic loci have been identified, all related to the immune system, except for TYR which encodes tyrosinase , a key enzyme in melanin production and a major autoantigen in vitiligo. The convergence or integrated theory combines immunological, biochemical, oxidative, and environmental mechanisms that work jointly in those with a genetic susceptibility is widely accepted. This could be explained through three phases: Initial phase: less adhesive melanocytes are prone to internal and external oxidative stresses, leading to the production of more toxic reactive oxygen species (ROS). Progression phase: an imbalance between ROS and antioxidants will activate the adaptive immune system bridged by the innate immune system. CD8+ cytotoxic cells release cytokines , mainly interferon-γ (INF-γ) that activate the JAK-STAT pathway through its receptors on keratinocytes. This will lead to the production of chemokines (CXC), predominantly by keratinocytes, but also by melanocytes themselves, leading to IFN-γ–CXCR3- CXCL9/10 axis loop feedback. Acting together on their common CXCR3 receptor , CXCL9 drives the main bulk of CD8+ cell homing, while CXCL10 promotes their localisation to affected skin lesions and induction of melanocyte apoptosis through CXC3B activation. Of note, where both humoral ( antibody ) and T-cell responses appear to be implicated, antibody titres do not correlate with disease activity nor the localisation of distinct vitiligo lesions. Maintenance phase: established lesions are maintained by resident melanocyte reactive T-cells (TRM cells), through the IL15- dependent pathway. These TRM cells may be responsible for what is called an ‘autoimmune memory’, in which relapses occur mostly at the same exact site of previous lesions. Understanding the molecular pathogenesis of vitiligo serves as a promising source for the development of more targeted therapies.
symptoms: The onset of vitiligo is usually insidious. The most common presentation is the complete loss of pigment in single or multiple macules or patches of skin, with characteristic chalk- or milky-white colour.
epidemiology: Vitiligo affects 0.5–2% of the population. Race: relatively consistent incidence in all races, but appears to be: Less common in the Han Chinese population More common in India (up to 8.8% of the population). Sex : both men and women appear to be equally affected Women tend to constitute a higher percentage of overall outpatient visits, due to greater concerns about cosmetic appearance. Onset: the average age of onset is between 20–24 years, but can occur at any age. Typically, there are two peaks of onset, early (<10 years) or late (around 30 years). 41% of segmental vitiligo cases start before the age of 10. 50% of non-segmental vitiligo cases start before the age of 20. 80% of all cases present before the age of 30. Inheritance: follows a polygenic pattern, with a 23% monozygotic twin concordance, supporting the cause of vitiligo to be multifactorial ( genetic and non-genetic environmental factors). More than 20–30% of the affected individuals report vitiligo in a first or second-degree relative. Autoimmune disease development has been associated with generalized vitiligo, the most common type of vitiligo, especially if there is a family history of vitiligo and other autoimmune disorders. The strongest association is with thyroid disease , which can affect up to 15% of adults and 5–10% of children with vitiligo. Other less frequently associated autoimmune disorders with vitiligo are: Rheumatoid arthritis Insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus (mostly adult-onset) Pernicious anaemia (B12 deficiency) Addison disease Systemic lupus erythematosus Alopecia areata Other autoimmune dermatologic conditions, eg, psoriasis and lichen sclerosus . Vitiligo is also three times more common in recipients of allogeneic bone marrow and stem-cell transplants than in the healthy population.
prognosis: Cosmetically disabling Psychosocial stresses and social stigmata to affected individuals, particularly in people with dark skin. Higher risk of acquiring an associated autoimmune condition among individuals with vitiligo compared to the general population. Vitiligo has an otherwise benign nature with most of those affected being in good health.
snippet_zh: 白癜風的發作通常是隱匿性的。最常見的表現是皮膚上單個或多個斑點或斑塊色素完全喪失，具有特有的白堊色或乳白色。
causes_zh: 白癜風是由於黑色素細胞（產生黑色素的細胞）的損失或破壞造成的。遺傳因素似乎導致了 80% 的白癜風風險，而環境因素則佔 20%。許多基因位點已被鑑定，除了編碼酪氨酸酶的 TYR 外，所有基因位點都與免疫系統有關，酪氨酸酶是黑色素生成的關鍵酶，也是白癜風的主要自身抗原。融合或整合理論結合了免疫學、生化、氧化和環境機制，這些機制在具有遺傳易感性的人群中共同發揮作用，已被廣泛接受。這可以通過三個階段來解釋： 初始階段：粘附性較低的黑素細胞容易受到內部和外部氧化應激，導致產生更多有毒的活性氧（ROS）。進展階段：ROS和抗氧化劑之間的不平衡將激活由先天免疫系統橋接的適應性免疫系統。CD8+細胞毒性細胞釋放細胞因子，主要是乾擾素-γ (INF-γ)，通過角質形成細胞上的受體激活 JAK-STAT 通路。這將導致趨化因子 (CXC) 的產生，主要由角質形成細胞產生，但黑素細胞本身也產生，從而導致 IFN-γ–CXCR3-CXCL9/10 軸環反饋。CXCL9 共同作用於其共同的 CXCR3 受體，驅動大部分 CD8+ 細胞歸巢，而 CXCL10 則促進其定位到受影響的皮膚病變，並通過 CXC3B 激活誘導黑素細胞凋亡。值得注意的是，在體液（抗體）和 T 細胞反應似乎都參與的情況下，抗體滴度與疾病活動性或不同白癜風病變的定位無關。維持階段：已形成的病變由常駐黑素細胞反應性 T 細胞（TRM 細胞）通過 IL15 依賴性途徑維持。這些 TRM 細胞可能負責所謂的“自身免疫記憶”，其中復發大多發生在先前病變的同一部位。了解白癜風的分子發病機制是開發更有針對性的治療方法的有希望的來源。
symptoms_zh: 白癜風的發作通常是隱匿性的。最常見的表現是皮膚上單個或多個斑點或斑塊色素完全喪失，具有特有的白堊色或乳白色。
epidemiology_zh: 白癜風影響 0.5-2% 的人口。種族：在所有種族中發病率相對一致，但似乎： 在漢族人群中不太常見 在印度更常見（高達人口的 8.8%）。性別：男性和女性似乎受到同樣的影響。由於對美容外觀的更多關注，女性在門診就診總量中所佔比例往往較高。發病：平均發病年齡為20-24歲，但可發生於任何年齡。通常，有兩個發病高峰：早期（<10 年）或晚期（約 30 年）。41% 的節段性白癜風病例在 10 歲之前開始。 50% 的非節段性白癜風病例在 20 歲之前開始。 80% 的病例在 30 歲之前出現。 遺傳：遵循多基因模式，單卵雙胞胎一致性為 23%，支持白癜風的病因是多因素的（遺傳和非遺傳環境因素）。超過 20-30% 的受影響個體報告其一級或二級親屬患有白癜風。自身免疫性疾病的發展與全身性白癜風（最常見的白癜風類型）有關，特別是如果有白癜風和其他自身免疫性疾病家族史的話。最強的關聯是甲狀腺疾病，多達 15% 的成人和 5-10% 的兒童患有白癜風。其他不太常見的與白癜風相關的自身免疫性疾病有： 類風濕性關節炎 胰島素依賴型糖尿病（大多為成人發病） 惡性貧血（B12 缺乏症） 艾迪生病 系統性紅斑狼瘡 斑禿 其他自身免疫性皮膚病，例如牛皮癬和硬化性苔蘚。在同種異體骨髓和乾細胞移植的接受者中，白癜風的發病率也是健康人群的三倍。
prognosis_zh: 美容致殘給受影響的人帶來社會心理壓力和社會恥辱，尤其是深色皮膚的人。與一般人群相比，白癜風患者患相關自身免疫性疾病的風險更高。白癜風本質上是良性的，大多數受影響的人健康狀況良好。

title: Vulval cysts
snippet: Vulval cysts are dome-shaped, firm or fluctuant , discrete lesions which may be asymptomatic and noticed incidentally, or present due to pain or dyspareunia which may be cyclic , intermittent, or persistent. The location or distribution of the cysts can be characteristic for a particular type of cys
causes: Vulval cysts can be developmental , genetic , post- traumatic , or spontaneous.
symptoms: Vulval cysts are dome-shaped, firm or fluctuant , discrete lesions which may be asymptomatic and noticed incidentally, or present due to pain or dyspareunia which may be cyclic , intermittent, or persistent. The location or distribution of the cysts can be characteristic for a particular type of cyst. See Vulval cyst images .
epidemiology: Females of any age can present with a vulval cyst; however, a particular type of cyst may be more common in a specific age group.
prognosis: Cyst rupture Inflammation and infection Pressure effects Dyspareunia (painful sexual intercourse)
snippet_zh: 外陰囊腫是圓頂狀、堅硬或波動的、離散的病變，可能無症狀且偶然發現，或因疼痛或性交困難而出現，可能是周期性的、間歇性的或持續性的。包囊的位置或分佈可能是特定類型半胱氨酸的特徵
causes_zh: 外陰囊腫可以是發育性的、遺傳性的、創傷後的或自發性的。
symptoms_zh: 外陰囊腫是圓頂狀、堅硬或波動的、離散的病變，可能無症狀且偶然發現，或因疼痛或性交困難而出現，可能是周期性的、間歇性的或持續性的。囊腫的位置或分佈可以是特定類型囊腫的特徵。請參閱外陰囊腫圖像。
epidemiology_zh: 任何年齡的女性都可能出現外陰囊腫；然而，特定類型的囊腫在特定年齡組中可能更常見。
prognosis_zh: 囊腫破裂 炎症和感染 壓力影響 性交困難（性交疼痛）

title: Vulval intraepithelial neoplasia
snippet: Vulval intraepithelial neoplasia (VIN) is a precancerous condition of the vulvar epithelium, classified as LSIL, HSIL/uVIN, or dVIN depending on the underlying cause and degree of atypia.
causes: VIN may be driven by high-risk HPV infection (uVIN/HSIL) or chronic inflammatory and degenerative changes not related to HPV (dVIN). Risk factors include HPV exposure, smoking, immunosuppression, lichen sclerosus, and increasing age.
symptoms: VIN may present with vulval itching, burning, pain, discoloration, thickened plaques, or irregular lesions. Some cases are asymptomatic and detected on examination or biopsy. dVIN often appears as subtle pale, thickened or eroded areas, whereas uVIN/HSIL may show more defined pigmented or raised lesions.
prognosis: If left untreated: LSIL usually resolves within a year or two. uVIN/HSIL may develop into an invasive cancer . On average it takes 6–7 years for untreated HPV-associated uVIN/HSIL to progress to cancer. Untreated dVIN results in vulval cancer in most cases within 2–4 years. Cancer develops more rapidly in dVIN than in uVIN/HSIL, and the likelihood of this increases with age. Careful follow-up after treatment is essential long term. uVIN/HSIL and dVIN may recur in up to 50% of cases after treatment, particularly if excision margins are inadequate. Follow-up every 6–12 months is recommended for at least 5 years after surgery for uVIN/HSIL and indefinitely for dVIN. Up to 50% of women with uVIN/HSIL develop cervical intraepithelial neoplasia (CIN), anal intraepithelial neoplasia (AIN), vaginal intraepeithelial neoplasia (VAIN) or invasive cancer of the genital tract or anus . It is particularly important to have regular cervical smears. Immunosuppressed patients, especially those with HIV infection, should also undergo cytology of the anus.
snippet_zh: 外陰上皮內瘤變（VIN）是外陰上皮的癌前病變，依成因與異型程度分為 LSIL、HSIL/uVIN 與 dVIN。
causes_zh: VIN 可由高風險 HPV 感染（uVIN/HSIL）或非 HPV 的慢性發炎與退化性變化（dVIN）所致。風險因子包括 HPV 暴露、吸菸、免疫抑制、硬化性苔癬及高齡。
symptoms_zh: VIN 的臨床表現包括外陰癢感、灼熱、疼痛、顏色改變、增厚斑塊或不規則病灶。有些患者無症狀，需要檢查或切片才能確診。dVIN 常呈現細微的蒼白、增厚或糜爛區域；而 uVIN/HSIL 則可能有較明顯的色素沉著或隆起病灶。
prognosis_zh: 如果不及時治療：LSIL 通常會在一兩年內消退。uVIN/HSIL 可能發展成侵襲性癌症。未經治療的 HPV 相關 uVIN/HSIL 平均需要 6-7 年才能進展為癌症。大多數情況下，未經治療的 dVIN 會在 2-4 年內導致外陰癌。dVIN 中的癌症發展速度比 uVIN/HSIL 中的癌症發展速度更快，而且這種可能性隨著年齡的增長而增加。治療後的長期仔細隨訪至關重要。uVIN/HSIL 和 dVIN 在治療後可能會在高達 50% 的病例中復發，特別是在切除邊緣不足的情況下。建議 uVIN/HSIL 手術後至少 5 年每 6-12 個月進行一次隨訪，dVIN 則無限期隨訪。高達 50% 患有 uVIN/HSIL 的女性會出現宮頸上皮內瘤變 (CIN)、肛門上皮內瘤變 (AIN)、陰道上皮內瘤變 (VAIN) 或生殖道或肛門浸潤性癌。定期進行宮頸塗片檢查尤為重要。免疫抑制患者，尤其是艾滋病毒感染者，也應接受肛門細胞學檢查。

title: Vulval lumps and bumps
snippet: Vulval lumps and bumps refer to a wide range of benign, infectious, inflammatory, or neoplastic conditions that present as raised areas or nodules on the vulva.
causes: Common causes of vulval lumps include blocked glands (such as Bartholin or sebaceous cysts), infections like HPV warts or molluscum, inflammatory conditions, benign growths, and less commonly, premalignant or malignant lesions. Hormonal changes, irritation, and trauma may also contribute.
symptoms: Vulval lumps may appear as nodules, papules, cysts, warts, or plaques. They may be skin-colored, white, red, or pigmented. Some are painless, while others may itch, burn, or become tender if infected or inflamed. The appearance helps guide differential diagnosis.
snippet_zh: 外陰腫塊指的是外陰部出現的突起或結節，可能源自良性、感染性、發炎性或腫瘤性病變，外觀多樣。
causes_zh: 外陰腫塊的成因多樣，包括腺體阻塞（如巴氏氏腺囊腫、皮脂囊腫）、感染（如 HPV 疣或傳染性軟疣）、發炎性疾病、良性增生，少數可能為癌前或惡性病變。荷爾蒙變化、刺激與外傷也可能造成腫塊。
symptoms_zh: 外陰腫塊可能呈現為結節、丘疹、囊腫、疣狀或斑塊，顏色可為膚色、白色、紅色或深色。有些無痛，有些可能癢、灼熱、或在感染發炎時出現壓痛。其外觀與特徵有助於鑑別可能的病因。

title: Warfarin-induced skin necrosis
snippet: The first sign is usually pain and purpura (a purplish bruise-like rash ), which over a few days becomes bluish-black with a red rim. Blood blisters and full thickness skin necrosis (skin death) follows. There may be a red netlike rash around the necrotic area (retiform purpura ). Affected areas are
causes: Warfarin is a widely used anticoagulant or blood-thinner. It works by inactivating vitamin K- dependent clotting factors II, VII, IX and X. At the same time, Vitamin K dependent proteins C and S are inactivated – these are natural anticoagulants. Half the activated Protein C disappears within 6 hours (its half-life). So, Protein C runs out during the first few days of warfarin therapy, before Factor X and II disappear, which have half-lives of 2-5 days. In some circumstances, this leads to excessive clotting. Why the skin necrosis happens in the areas of fat abundance is unclear; possibly these areas are more susceptible because of reduced blood supply. Warfarin-induced calciphylaxis may be due to inhibition of the matrix protein Gla, which normally prevents calcium deposition in the blood vessels.
symptoms: The first sign is usually pain and purpura (a purplish bruise-like rash ), which over a few days becomes bluish-black with a red rim. Blood blisters and full thickness skin necrosis (skin death) follows. There may be a red netlike rash around the necrotic area (retiform purpura ). Affected areas are most often the breasts, thighs, buttocks, hips and abdomen, but early warfarin-induced skin necrosis can also cause blue toe syndrome . View images of warfarin-induced skin necrosis
epidemiology: Warfarin-induced skin necrosis is more common in women than men. It usually occurs between the age of 50 and 70 years. It is more common in obese patients and perimenopausal women. Warfarin-induced skin necrosis is more likely if warfarin is given without heparin or if a higher loading dose of warfarin is given in the first day or two of treatment. Very rarely, warfarin-induced skin necrosis occurs weeks or months after starting warfarin therapy. This may occur in the following circumstances: the dose of warfarin has been increased prescribed doses have not been taken liver disease drug interactions. Calciphylaxis is more often seen in the setting of chronic renal failure but may be rarely caused by warfarin when kidney function is normal.
title_zh: 華法林引起的皮膚壞死
snippet_zh: 第一個症狀通常是疼痛和紫癜（一種紫色瘀傷樣皮疹），幾天后會變成藍黑色，邊緣呈紅色。隨後出現血泡和全層皮膚壞死（皮膚死亡）。壞死區域周圍可能有紅色網狀皮疹（網狀紫癜）。受影響的地區是
causes_zh: 華法林是一種廣泛使用的抗凝劑或血液稀釋劑。它的作用是滅活維生素 K 依賴性凝血因子 II、VII、IX 和 X。同時，維生素 K 依賴性蛋白質 C 和 S 也被滅活——這些是天然抗凝血劑。一半的活化蛋白 C 在 6 小時內消失（其半衰期）。因此，蛋白質 C 在華法林治療的最初幾天內耗盡，然後因子 X 和 II 消失，其半衰期為 2-5 天。在某些情況下，這會導致過度凝血。為什麼脂肪豐富的區域會出現皮膚壞死，目前尚不清楚。由於血液供應減少，這些區域可能更容易受到影響。華法林誘導的鈣化防禦可能是由於抑制基質蛋白 Gla，該蛋白通常可以防止血管中的鈣沉積。
symptoms_zh: 第一個症狀通常是疼痛和紫癜（一種紫色瘀傷樣皮疹），幾天后會變成藍黑色，邊緣呈紅色。隨後出現血泡和全層皮膚壞死（皮膚死亡）。壞死區域周圍可能有紅色網狀皮疹（網狀紫癜）。受影響的部位最常見的是乳房、大腿、臀部、臀部和腹部，但早期華法林引起的皮膚壞死也可引起藍趾綜合症。查看華法林引起的皮膚壞死的圖像
epidemiology_zh: 華法林引起的皮膚壞死在女性中比男性更常見。它通常發生在50歲至70歲之間。它在肥胖患者和圍絕經期婦女中更為常見。如果在沒有肝素的情況下給予華法林，或者在治療的第一天或第二天給予較高負荷劑量的華法林，則更有可能出現華法林引起的皮膚壞死。極少數情況下，華法林引起的皮膚壞死會在開始華法林治療後數週或數月發生。這可能發生在以下情況下： 華法林的劑量已增加 處方劑量尚未服用 肝病藥物相互作用。鈣化防禦更常見於慢性腎功能衰竭的情況，但當腎功能正常時，華法林很少會引起鈣化防禦。

title: Eosinophilic cellulitis
snippet: Eosinophilic cellulitis usually presents as itchy or burning erythematous nodules or plaques resembling cellulitis or erysipelas on a limb. However, the clinical appearance is variable: lesions can be single or multiple, the face and trunk may be affected, and clinical morphology can include: Plaque
causes: The cause of eosinophilic cellulitis is unknown. It is believed to be a local hypersensitivity reaction. Most cases appear to be idiopathic. Implicated triggers or associations include: Infection Arthropod bite Medications and immunisations Haematological disorders and malignancies.
symptoms: Eosinophilic cellulitis usually presents as itchy or burning erythematous nodules or plaques resembling cellulitis or erysipelas on a limb. However, the clinical appearance is variable: lesions can be single or multiple, the face and trunk may be affected, and clinical morphology can include: Plaque type Annular granuloma -like Urticaria -like Papulovesicular Bullous Papulonodular Fixed drug eruption -like. The classic plaque-type variant of eosinophilic cellulitis is the most common presentation in children, whereas the annular granuloma-like variant is more frequently seen in adults. Individual lesions can resolve spontaneously but typically recur. Associated systemic symptoms may include fever and arthralgias.
epidemiology: Eosinophilic cellulitis can affect all age groups including children and infants.
prognosis: Eosinophilic cellulitis may be rarely complicated by superinfection. Severe swelling of a limb can cause compartment syndrome.
snippet_zh: 嗜酸粒細胞性蜂窩織炎通常表現為四肢發癢或燒灼感的紅斑結節或斑塊，類似於蜂窩織炎或丹毒。然而，臨床表現是可變的：病變可以是單個或多個，面部和軀幹可能受到影響，臨床形態可以包括： 斑塊
causes_zh: 嗜酸性蜂窩織炎的病因尚不清楚。據信這是一種局部超敏反應。大多數病例似乎是特發性的。相關的觸發因素或關聯包括： 感染 節肢動物咬傷 藥物和免疫接種 血液疾病和惡性腫瘤。
symptoms_zh: 嗜酸粒細胞性蜂窩織炎通常表現為四肢發癢或燒灼感的紅斑結節或斑塊，類似於蜂窩織炎或丹毒。然而，臨床表現多種多樣：皮損可為單發或多發，面部和軀幹可受累，臨床形態可包括： 斑塊型 環形肉芽腫樣 蕁麻疹樣 丘疹水皰性 大皰性 丘疹結節性 固定藥疹樣。嗜酸性蜂窩織炎的經典斑塊型變異是兒童中最常見的表現，而環形肉芽腫樣變異更常見於成人。個別病變可以自行消退，但通常會復發。相關的全身症狀可能包括發燒和關節痛。
epidemiology_zh: 嗜酸性蜂窩織炎可影響所有年齡段，包括兒童和嬰兒。
prognosis_zh: 嗜酸粒細胞性蜂窩織炎很少會並發二重感染。肢體嚴重腫脹可導致骨筋膜室綜合徵。

title: Wells syndrome pathology
snippet: Wells syndrome pathology is characterized by prominent eosinophilic infiltration and distinctive 'flame figures' within the dermis, reflecting an inflammatory reaction pattern.
causes: Wells syndrome involves eosinophil-driven inflammation within the skin. The pathology shows dense dermal eosinophilic infiltrates, flame figures formed by eosinophil granule deposition on collagen, and later granulomatous inflammation. The exact trigger is unknown but may relate to hypersensitivity reactions.
symptoms: Pathology findings include dermal eosinophilic infiltrates, flame figures composed of eosinophil granule proteins coating collagen fibers, edema, and later granulomatous changes. These findings support diagnosis and differentiate Wells syndrome from other eosinophilic dermatoses.
snippet_zh: 威爾斯綜合徵的病理特徵包括顯著的嗜酸性球浸潤以及真皮中典型的「火焰圖樣」結構，是其代表性的發炎反應型態。
causes_zh: 威爾斯綜合徵屬於嗜酸性球主導的皮膚發炎。病理可見真皮中大量嗜酸性球浸潤、嗜酸性球顆粒沉積於膠原纖維形成的火焰圖樣，以及後期的肉芽腫性變化。確切誘因不明，可能與過敏或超敏反應相關。
symptoms_zh: 病理切片常見表現包括：真皮嗜酸性球浸潤、由嗜酸性球顆粒覆蓋膠原所構成的火焰圖樣、水腫與後期肉芽腫變化。這些特徵有助於鑑別威爾斯綜合徵與其他嗜酸性皮膚病變。

title: What is dermatology?
snippet: Dermatology is the medical specialty focused on diagnosing and treating conditions of the skin, hair, nails, and mucous membranes.
causes: Dermatology encompasses a wide range of conditions involving inflammation, infection, autoimmune disorders, genetic diseases, tumors, and cosmetic concerns affecting the skin, hair, and nails. Dermatologists also perform procedures such as biopsies, surgeries, and laser treatments.
symptoms: Dermatology addresses concerns such as rashes, itching, infections, pigment changes, hair loss, nail abnormalities, acne, eczema, psoriasis, skin cancers, and other skin-related symptoms and diseases.
snippet_zh: 皮膚科是一個專門診斷與治療皮膚、毛髮、指甲及黏膜疾病的醫學專科。
causes_zh: 皮膚科涵蓋多種疾病，包括發炎性疾病、感染、自體免疫疾病、遺傳疾病、腫瘤及美容相關問題，並包含皮膚切片、手術及雷射等醫療處置。
symptoms_zh: 皮膚科處理的常見問題包括皮疹、癢感、感染、色素異常、脫髮、指甲變化、痤瘡、濕疹、牛皮癬及皮膚癌等與皮膚相關的症狀與疾病。

title: White nail
snippet: White nail, or leukonychia, refers to white discoloration of the nail plate. It may appear as spots, bands, or diffuse whitening and can be related to trauma, inherited disorders, or systemic causes.
causes: Leukonychia occurs when the nail plate or nail matrix is disrupted, leading to impaired keratin formation and resulting in white discoloration. Common causes include trauma, hereditary conditions such as Darier disease or Hailey-Hailey disease, toxin exposure, medications, and systemic illnesses.
symptoms: Leukonychia presents with white abnormalities of the nail plate, including: punctate leukonychia (small white spots often caused by trauma), longitudinal leukonychia (white vertical streaks seen in inherited disorders), and transverse leukonychia or Mees lines (white horizontal bands). Widespread or multiple nails involved may warrant evaluation for systemic disease or toxin exposure.
epidemiology: White nails can affect anyone of any gender, age or ethnicity. Its presence may warrant a work-up for systemic disease.
prognosis: White nails are a cosmetic nuisance but may be a marker of an underlying systemic disease, but per se do not have any physical complications.
snippet_zh: 白指甲（白甲症）是指甲板出現白色變化，可呈現白點、白色條紋或大片泛白，常與外傷、遺傳疾病或全身性因素相關。
causes_zh: 白甲症是因指甲板或甲母質受影響，使角蛋白形成異常而出現白色變化。常見原因包括外傷、達里爾病或海利–海利病等遺傳性疾病、毒物或藥物暴露，以及潛在的全身性疾病。
symptoms_zh: 白甲症可呈現多種型態，包括：點狀白甲（由外傷引起的小白點）、縱向白甲（見於部分遺傳疾病的白色縱向條紋）、橫向白甲或米斯線（整片水平白帶）。若多指甲同時出現，可能需要進一步評估是否有全身性疾病或毒性暴露。
epidemiology_zh: 白指甲可出現在任何性別、年齡及族群。若病灶廣泛，可能需評估是否存在全身性原因。
prognosis_zh: 白指甲通常僅為美觀問題，但有時可能提示潛在疾病；其本身不會造成身體併發症。

title: Winter itch
snippet: Apparently normal skin Excoriations Dermatitis
causes: The exact cause of winter itch is unknown. Factors associated with winter itch include: Itching associated with cold weather, often coexisting with dry skin Itch presenting in autumn and winter, and clearing up during the summer months The aggravation of symptoms by the wearing of certain types of textures , such as flannel or woollen wear. Similar symptoms have also been reported in patients exposed to refrigerated air conditioning during the summer months. Winter itch is not influenced by frequency of bathing or by the temperature of the bath water.
symptoms: Apparently normal skin Excoriations Dermatitis
epidemiology: Winter itch can affect the healthy population of all ages, but has a higher prevalence in older people with dry skin . It is uncommon in children and adolescents. It affects men and women equally. It is not influenced by socioeconomic status or personal hygiene.
prognosis: Winter itch normally resolves after the winter months. The duration of itching varies among individuals. It may last for a few days or weeks, and occasionally throughout the winter. Winter itch may recur throughout a person’s lifetime or disappear permanently at the end of the first attack.
snippet_zh: 明顯正常的皮膚 抓痕 皮炎
causes_zh: 冬季瘙癢的確切原因尚不清楚。與冬季瘙癢相關的因素包括： 與寒冷天氣相關的瘙癢，通常與皮膚乾燥並存 瘙癢在秋季和冬季出現，並在夏季消失 穿著某些類型的質地（例如法蘭絨或羊毛衣服）會加重症狀。據報導，在夏季接觸冷凍空調的患者也出現了類似的症狀。冬季瘙癢不受洗澡頻率或洗澡水溫度的影響。
symptoms_zh: 明顯正常的皮膚 抓痕 皮炎
epidemiology_zh: 冬季瘙癢可影響各年齡段的健康人群，但在皮膚乾燥的老年人中患病率較高。這在兒童和青少年中並不常見。它對男性和女性的影響相同。它不受社會經濟地位或個人衛生的影響。
prognosis_zh: 冬季瘙癢通常會在冬季結束後消失。瘙癢持續時間因人而異。它可能會持續幾天或幾週，有時甚至整個冬天。冬季瘙癢可能會在人的一生中反復出現，或者在第一次發作結束時永久消失。

title: Wood lamp skin examination
snippet: A Wood lamp skin examination uses long-wave ultraviolet light to help identify pigment abnormalities, fungal and bacterial infections, and other skin conditions by observing characteristic fluorescence.
causes: The black light emitted by a Wood lamp is harmless. The lamp does not emit short-wavelength ultraviolet B radiation (290–320 nm), so it does not cause sunburn or otherwise damage healthy skin. It is possible that a patient with extreme photosensitivity might develop a rash on skin exposed to black light. However, Wood lamp examination is usually very brief and unlikely to cause problems even in very photosensitive patients. It is prudent to ask the patient to close their eyes when examining the face.
symptoms: The examination itself does not cause symptoms. Under the Wood lamp, some skin disorders show distinct fluorescent colors—such as bright white in vitiligo, yellow-green in certain fungal infections, and coral-red in erythrasma—providing useful diagnostic clues.
snippet_zh: 木燈皮膚檢查利用長波紫外線照射皮膚，可協助辨識色素異常、真菌與細菌感染，透過特定螢光反應提供診斷線索，是常用的皮膚檢查工具。
causes_zh: 伍德燈發出的黑光屬長波紫外線（UVA），對皮膚相對安全，不會造成曬傷或傷害健康皮膚。極少數高度光敏感者可能出現輕微皮疹，但檢查時間短且風險極低。檢查臉部時建議請患者閉眼以避免不適。
symptoms_zh: 此檢查本身不會產生症狀；在木燈下，皮膚可能出現特定螢光表現，如白癜風呈亮白、部分真菌感染呈黃綠色、紅癬呈珊瑚紅，有助判斷是否存在皮膚異常。

title: Wound cleansers
snippet: Wound cleansers are solutions or products used to clean and remove debris, bacteria, and contaminants from wounds, helping promote healing and reduce infection risk.
causes: Wound cleansers work by mechanically removing debris and reducing microbial load on the wound surface. They may contain saline, surfactants, antiseptics, or other cleansing agents designed to support wound healing while minimizing irritation.
symptoms: Wound cleansers do not cause symptoms themselves; they are used to clean wounds and may help reduce odor, discharge, and debris. Some formulations can cause mild stinging or irritation in sensitive skin or open wounds.
snippet_zh: 傷口清潔劑是用於清潔傷口的產品，可去除污物、細菌與分泌物，降低感染風險並促進傷口癒合。
causes_zh: 傷口清潔劑的作用原理多為物理性沖洗與降低微生物量，成分可能包含生理食鹽水、界面活性劑或溫和抗菌成分，設計目的是清潔傷口同時減少刺激。
symptoms_zh: 傷口清潔劑本身不會產生症狀；其用途是清潔傷口、減少異味與分泌物。部分配方可能在敏感皮膚或開放性傷口上引起短暫刺激或刺痛感。

title: Surgical wound closure
snippet: Surgical wound closure refers to techniques used to bring wound edges together—such as sutures, staples, adhesives, or tapes—to support healing, reduce infection risk, and improve cosmetic outcomes.
causes: Wound closure techniques aim to restore skin integrity by approximating wound edges, minimizing tension, protecting underlying tissues, and reducing the risk of infection. Methods include sutures, staples, skin adhesives, and adhesive strips, chosen based on wound depth, location, and healing needs.
symptoms: Surgical wound closure does not cause disease symptoms; expected findings include mild redness, tenderness, or swelling during early healing. Proper closure supports faster healing and reduces scarring, while complications such as infection or dehiscence may present with increased pain, redness, or discharge.
snippet_zh: 手術傷口閉合是利用縫線、皮膚釘、皮膚膠或膠帶等方式將傷口邊緣拉攏，以促進癒合、降低感染風險並改善外觀的醫療處置。
causes_zh: 傷口閉合的目的在於讓傷口邊緣貼合、減少張力、保護深層組織並降低感染風險。常見方式包括縫線、皮膚釘、皮膚膠與膠帶，依傷口深度、位置與癒合需求選擇最適方法。
symptoms_zh: 手術傷口閉合本身不會產生症狀；常見正常癒合表現包括輕微紅腫、壓痛或緊繃感。若出現紅腫加劇、劇痛或分泌物，則可能表示感染或傷口裂開等併發症。

title: Wound infection
snippet: A wound infection occurs when microorganisms invade and multiply within a wound, leading to inflammation, delayed healing, and possible systemic symptoms if not treated promptly.
causes: Wound infections occur when microorganisms enter and proliferate within a surgical or traumatic wound. Sources of contamination include direct contact from equipment or hands, airborne spread of microorganisms, and self-contamination from the patient’s own skin, mucous membranes, or gastrointestinal flora. Common pathogens include Staphylococcus aureus/MRSA, Streptococcus pyogenes, Enterococci, and Pseudomonas aeruginosa.
symptoms: Typical signs of wound infection include increasing redness, warmth, pain, swelling, pus or cloudy discharge, delayed healing, foul odor, and sometimes fever or systemic illness in more severe cases.
snippet_zh: 傷口感染是指微生物進入並在傷口內繁殖，引發發炎、延遲癒合，若未及時治療可能進一步擴散或引起全身症狀。
causes_zh: 傷口感染可因微生物侵入手術或外傷傷口並增殖所致。常見來源包括手術器械或醫療人員接觸、空氣中的微生物沉降，以及患者自身皮膚、黏膜或腸胃道的菌群遷移。常見病原包括金黃色葡萄球菌（含MRSA）、化膿性鏈球菌、腸球菌與銅綠假單胞菌。
symptoms_zh: 傷口感染的典型表現包括紅腫、發熱、疼痛、腫脹、化膿或混濁分泌物、癒合遲緩、異味，嚴重時可能出現發燒或全身不適。
